2478#ifndef RGFW_WINDOWS
2479void* RGFW_window_getHWND(RGFW_window* win) { RGFW_UNUSED(win); return NULL; }
2480void* RGFW_window_getHDC(RGFW_window* win) { RGFW_UNUSED(win); return NULL; }
2481#endif
2482
2483#ifndef RGFW_MACOS
2484void* RGFW_window_getView_OSX(RGFW_window* win) { RGFW_UNUSED(win); return NULL; }
2485void RGFW_window_setLayer_OSX(RGFW_window* win, void* layer) { RGFW_UNUSED(win); RGFW_UNUSED(layer); }
2486void* RGFW_getLayer_OSX(void) { return NULL; }
2487void* RGFW_window_getWindow_OSX(RGFW_window* win) { RGFW_UNUSED(win); return NULL; }
2488#endif
2489
2490void RGFW_setBit(u32* var, u32 mask, RGFW_bool set) {
2491 if (set) *var |= mask;
2492 else *var &= ~mask;
2493}
2494
2495void RGFW_window_center(RGFW_window* win) {
2496 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
2497 RGFW_monitor mon = RGFW_window_getMonitor(win);
2498 RGFW_window_move(win, (i32)(mon.mode.w - win->w) / 2, (mon.mode.h - win->h) / 2);
2499}
2500
2501RGFW_bool RGFW_monitor_scaleToWindow(RGFW_monitor mon, RGFW_window* win) {
2502 RGFW_monitorMode mode;
2503 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
2504
2505 mode.w = win->w;
2506 mode.h = win->h;
2507 return RGFW_monitor_requestMode(mon, mode, RGFW_monitorScale);
2508}
2509
2510void RGFW_splitBPP(u32 bpp, RGFW_monitorMode* mode) {
2511 if (bpp == 32) bpp = 24;
2512 mode->red = mode->green = mode->blue = (u8)(bpp / 3);
2513
2514 u32 delta = bpp - (mode->red * 3); /* handle leftovers */
2515 if (delta >= 1) mode->green = mode->green + 1;
2516 if (delta == 2) mode->red = mode->red + 1;
2517}
2518
2519RGFW_bool RGFW_monitorModeCompare(RGFW_monitorMode mon, RGFW_monitorMode mon2, RGFW_modeRequest request) {
2520 return (((mon.w == mon2.w && mon.h == mon2.h) || !(request & RGFW_monitorScale)) &&
2521 ((mon.refreshRate == mon2.refreshRate) || !(request & RGFW_monitorRefresh)) &&
2522 ((mon.red == mon2.red && mon.green == mon2.green && mon.blue == mon2.blue) || !(request & RGFW_monitorRGB)));
2523}
2524
2525RGFW_bool RGFW_window_shouldClose(RGFW_window* win) {
2526 return (win == NULL || win->internal.shouldClose || (win->internal.exitKey && RGFW_window_isKeyPressed(win, win->internal.exitKey)));
2527}
2528
2529void RGFW_window_setShouldClose(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_bool shouldClose) {
2530 if (shouldClose) {
2531 win->internal.shouldClose = RGFW_TRUE;
2532 RGFW_windowQuitCallback(win);
2533 } else {
2534 win->internal.shouldClose = RGFW_FALSE;
2535 }
2536}
2537
2538#ifndef RGFW_NO_MONITOR
2539void RGFW_window_scaleToMonitor(RGFW_window* win) {
2540 RGFW_monitor monitor = RGFW_window_getMonitor(win);
2541 if (monitor.scaleX == 0 && monitor.scaleY == 0)
2542 return;
2543
2544 RGFW_window_resize(win, (i32)(monitor.scaleX * (float)win->w), (i32)(monitor.scaleY * (float)win->h));
2545}
2546
2547void RGFW_window_moveToMonitor(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_monitor m) {
2548 RGFW_window_move(win, m.x + win->x, m.y + win->y);
2549}
2550#endif
2551
2552RGFW_surface* RGFW_createSurface(u8* data, i32 w, i32 h, RGFW_format format) {
2553 RGFW_surface* surface = (RGFW_surface*)RGFW_ALLOC(sizeof(RGFW_surface));
2554 RGFW_MEMSET(surface, 0, sizeof(RGFW_surface));
2555 RGFW_createSurfacePtr(data, w, h, format, surface);
2556 return surface;
2557}
2558
2559void RGFW_surface_free(RGFW_surface* surface) {
2560 RGFW_surface_freePtr(surface);
2561 RGFW_FREE(surface);
2562}
2563
2564RGFW_nativeImage* RGFW_surface_getNativeImage(RGFW_surface* surface) {
2565 return &surface->native;
2566}
2567
2568RGFW_surface* RGFW_window_createSurface(RGFW_window* win, u8* data, i32 w, i32 h, RGFW_format format) {
2569 RGFW_surface* surface = (RGFW_surface*)RGFW_ALLOC(sizeof(RGFW_surface));
2570 RGFW_MEMSET(surface, 0, sizeof(RGFW_surface));
2571 RGFW_window_createSurfacePtr(win, data, w, h, format, surface);
2572 return surface;
2573}
2574#ifndef RGFW_X11
2575RGFW_bool RGFW_window_createSurfacePtr(RGFW_window* win, u8* data, i32 w, i32 h, RGFW_format format, RGFW_surface* surface) {
2576 RGFW_UNUSED(win);
2577 return RGFW_createSurfacePtr(data, w, h, format, surface);
2578}
2579#endif
2580
2581const RGFW_colorLayout RGFW_layouts[RGFW_formatCount] = {
2582 { 0, 1, 2, 3 }, /* RGFW_formatRGB8 */
2583 { 2, 1, 0, 3 }, /* RGFW_formatBGR8 */
2584 { 0, 1, 2, 3 }, /* RGFW_formatRGBA8 */
2585 { 1, 2, 3, 0 }, /* RGFW_formatARGB8 */
2586 { 2, 1, 0, 3 }, /* RGFW_formatBGRA8 */
2587 { 3, 2, 1, 0 }, /* RGFW_formatABGR8 */
2588};
2589
2590
2591void RGFW_copyImageData(u8* dest_data, i32 w, i32 h, RGFW_format dest_format, u8* src_data, RGFW_format src_format) {
2592 RGFW_copyImageData64(dest_data, w, h, dest_format, src_data, src_format, RGFW_FALSE);
2593}
2594
2595void RGFW_copyImageData64(u8* dest_data, i32 dest_w, i32 dest_h, RGFW_format dest_format, u8* src_data, RGFW_format src_format, RGFW_bool is64bit) {
2596 RGFW_ASSERT(dest_data && src_data);
2597
2598 u32 src_channels = (src_format >= RGFW_formatRGBA8) ? 4 : 3;
2599 u32 dest_channels = (dest_format >= RGFW_formatRGBA8) ? 4 : 3;
2600
2601 u32 pixel_count = (u32)(dest_w * dest_h);
2602
2603 if (src_format == dest_format) {
2604 RGFW_MEMCPY(dest_data, src_data, pixel_count * dest_channels);
2605 return;
2606 }
2607
2608 const RGFW_colorLayout* src_layout = &RGFW_layouts[src_format];
2609 const RGFW_colorLayout* dest_layout = &RGFW_layouts[dest_format];
2610
2611 u32 i, i2 = 0;
2612 for (i = 0; i < pixel_count; i++) {
2613 const u8* src_px = &src_data[i * src_channels];
2614 u8* dst_px = &dest_data[i2 * dest_channels];
2615 u8 rgba[4] = { src_px[src_layout->r], src_px[src_layout->g], src_px[src_layout->b], 255 };
2616 if (src_channels == 4)
2617 rgba[3] = src_px[src_layout->a];
2618
2619 dst_px[dest_layout->r] = rgba[0];
2620 dst_px[dest_layout->g] = rgba[1];
2621 dst_px[dest_layout->b] = rgba[2];
2622 if (dest_channels == 4)
2623 dst_px[dest_layout->a] = rgba[3];
2624
2625 i2 += 1 + is64bit;
2626 }
2627}
2628
2629RGFW_monitorNode* RGFW_monitors_add(RGFW_monitor mon) {
2630 RGFW_monitorNode* node = NULL;
2631 if (_RGFW->monitors.freeList.head == NULL) return node;
2632
2633 node = _RGFW->monitors.freeList.head;
2634 mon = node->mon;
2635
2636 _RGFW->monitors.freeList.head = node->next;
2637 if (_RGFW->monitors.freeList.head == NULL) {
2638 _RGFW->monitors.freeList.cur = NULL;
2639 }
2640
2641 node->next = NULL;
2642
2643 if (_RGFW->monitors.list.head == NULL) {
2644 _RGFW->monitors.list.head = node;
2645 } else {
2646 _RGFW->monitors.list.cur->next = node;
2647 }
2648
2649 _RGFW->monitors.list.cur = node;
2650
2651 node->mon = mon;
2652 _RGFW->monitors.count += 1;
2653 return node;
2654}
2655
2656void RGFW_monitors_remove(RGFW_monitorNode* node, RGFW_monitorNode* prev) {
2657 _RGFW->monitors.count -= 1;
2658
2659 /* remove node from the list */
2660 if (prev != node) {
2661 prev->next = node->next;
2662 } else { /* node is the head */
2663 _RGFW->monitors.list.head = NULL;
2664 }
2665
2666 node->next = NULL;
2667
2668 /* move node to the free list */
2669 if (_RGFW->monitors.freeList.head == NULL) {
2670 _RGFW->monitors.freeList.head = node;
2671 } else {
2672 _RGFW->monitors.freeList.cur->next = node;
2673 }
2674
2675 _RGFW->monitors.freeList.cur = node;
2676}
2677
2678RGFW_bool RGFW_window_setIcon(RGFW_window* win, u8* data, i32 w, i32 h, RGFW_format format) {
2679 return RGFW_window_setIconEx(win, data, w, h, format, RGFW_iconBoth);
2680}
2681
2682void RGFW_window_holdMouse(RGFW_window* win) {
2683 win->internal.holdMouse = RGFW_TRUE;
2684 _RGFW->mouseOwner = win;
2685 RGFW_captureCursor(win);
2686 RGFW_window_moveMouse(win, win->x + (win->w / 2), win->y + (win->h / 2));
2687}
2688
2689RGFW_bool RGFW_window_isHoldingMouse(RGFW_window* win) { return RGFW_BOOL(win->internal.holdMouse); }
2690
2691void RGFW_window_unholdMouse(RGFW_window* win) {
2692 win->internal.holdMouse = RGFW_FALSE;
2693 _RGFW->mouseOwner = NULL;
2694 RGFW_releaseCursor(win);
2695}
2696
2697void RGFW_updateKeyMod(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_keymod mod, RGFW_bool value) {
2698 if (value) win->internal.mod |= mod;
2699 else win->internal.mod &= ~mod;
2700}
2701
2702void RGFW_updateKeyModsEx(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_bool capital, RGFW_bool numlock, RGFW_bool control, RGFW_bool alt, RGFW_bool shift, RGFW_bool super, RGFW_bool scroll) {
2703 RGFW_updateKeyMod(win, RGFW_modCapsLock, capital);
2704 RGFW_updateKeyMod(win, RGFW_modNumLock, numlock);
2705 RGFW_updateKeyMod(win, RGFW_modControl, control);
2706 RGFW_updateKeyMod(win, RGFW_modAlt, alt);
2707 RGFW_updateKeyMod(win, RGFW_modShift, shift);
2708 RGFW_updateKeyMod(win, RGFW_modSuper, super);
2709 RGFW_updateKeyMod(win, RGFW_modScrollLock, scroll);
2710}
2711
2712void RGFW_updateKeyMods(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_bool capital, RGFW_bool numlock, RGFW_bool scroll) {
2713 RGFW_updateKeyModsEx(win, capital, numlock,
2714 RGFW_window_isKeyPressed(win, RGFW_controlL) || RGFW_window_isKeyPressed(win, RGFW_controlR),
2715 RGFW_window_isKeyPressed(win, RGFW_altL) || RGFW_window_isKeyPressed(win, RGFW_altR),
2716 RGFW_window_isKeyPressed(win, RGFW_shiftL) || RGFW_window_isKeyPressed(win, RGFW_shiftR),
2717 RGFW_window_isKeyPressed(win, RGFW_superL) || RGFW_window_isKeyPressed(win, RGFW_superR),
2718 scroll);
2719}
2720
2721void RGFW_window_showMouseFlags(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_bool show) {
2722 if (show && (win->internal.flags & RGFW_windowHideMouse))
2723 win->internal.flags ^= RGFW_windowHideMouse;
2724 else if (!show && !(win->internal.flags & RGFW_windowHideMouse))
2725 win->internal.flags |= RGFW_windowHideMouse;
2726}
2727
2728RGFW_bool RGFW_window_isMouseHidden(RGFW_window* win) {
2729 return (RGFW_bool)RGFW_BOOL(((RGFW_window*)win)->internal.flags & RGFW_windowHideMouse);
2730}
2731
2732RGFW_bool RGFW_window_borderless(RGFW_window* win) {
2733 return (RGFW_bool)RGFW_BOOL(win->internal.flags & RGFW_windowNoBorder);
2734}
2735
2736RGFW_bool RGFW_window_isFullscreen(RGFW_window* win){ return RGFW_BOOL(win->internal.flags & RGFW_windowFullscreen); }
2737RGFW_bool RGFW_window_allowsDND(RGFW_window* win) { return RGFW_BOOL(win->internal.flags & RGFW_windowAllowDND); }
2738
2739void RGFW_window_focusLost(RGFW_window* win) {
2740 /* standard routines for when a window looses focus */
2741 win->internal.inFocus = RGFW_FALSE;
2742 if ((win->internal.flags & RGFW_windowFullscreen))
2743 RGFW_window_minimize(win);
2744
2745 size_t key;
2746 for (key = 0; key < RGFW_keyLast; key++) {
2747 if (RGFW_isKeyPressed((u8)key) == RGFW_FALSE) continue;
2748 _RGFW->keyboard[key].current = RGFW_FALSE;
2749 u8 sym = RGFW_rgfwToKeyChar((u32)key);
2750 if ((win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_BIT(RGFW_keyReleased))) {
2751 RGFW_keyCallback(win, (u8)key, sym, win->internal.mod, RGFW_FALSE, RGFW_FALSE);
2752 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_keyReleased;
2753 e.key.value = (u8)key;
2754 e.key.sym = sym;
2755 e.key.repeat = RGFW_FALSE;
2756 e.key.mod = win->internal.mod;
2757 e.common.win = win);
2758 }
2759 }
2760
2761 RGFW_resetKey();
2762}
2763
2764#ifndef RGFW_WINDOWS
2765void RGFW_window_setDND(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_bool allow) {
2766 RGFW_setBit(&win->internal.flags, RGFW_windowAllowDND, allow);
2767}
2768#endif
2769
2770#if defined(RGFW_X11) || defined(RGFW_MACOS) || defined(RGFW_WASM) || defined(RGFW_WAYLAND)
2771#ifndef __USE_POSIX199309
2772 #define __USE_POSIX199309
2773#endif
2774#include <time.h>
2775struct timespec;
2776#endif
2777
2778#if defined(RGFW_WAYLAND) || defined(RGFW_X11) || defined(RGFW_WINDOWS)
2779void RGFW_window_showMouse(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_bool show) {
2780 RGFW_window_showMouseFlags(win, show);
2781 if (show == 0)
2782 RGFW_window_setMouse(win, _RGFW->hiddenMouse);
2783 else
2784 RGFW_window_setMouseDefault(win);
2785}
2786#endif
2787
2788#ifndef RGFW_MACOS
2789void RGFW_moveToMacOSResourceDir(void) { }
2790#endif
2791
2792/*
2793 graphics API specific code (end of generic code)
2794 starts here
2795*/
2796
2797
2798/*
2799 OpenGL defines start here (Normal, EGL, OSMesa)
2800*/
2801
2802#if defined(RGFW_OPENGL)
2803/* EGL, OpenGL */
2804#define RGFW_DEFAULT_GL_HINTS { \
2805 /* Stencil */ 0, \
2806 /* Samples */ 0, \
2807 /* Stereo */ RGFW_FALSE, \
2808 /* AuxBuffers */ 0, \
2809 /* DoubleBuffer */ RGFW_TRUE, \
2810 /* Red */ 8, \
2811 /* Green */ 8, \
2812 /* Blue */ 8, \
2813 /* Alpha */ 8, \
2814 /* Depth */ 24, \
2815 /* AccumRed */ 0, \
2816 /* AccumGreen */ 0, \
2817 /* AccumBlue */ 0, \
2818 /* AccumAlpha */ 0, \
2819 /* SRGB */ RGFW_FALSE, \
2820 /* Robustness */ RGFW_FALSE, \
2821 /* Debug */ RGFW_FALSE, \
2822 /* NoError */ RGFW_FALSE, \
2823 /* ReleaseBehavior */ RGFW_glReleaseNone, \
2824 /* Profile */ RGFW_glCore, \
2825 /* Major */ 1, \
2826 /* Minor */ 0, \
2827 /* Share */ NULL, \
2828 /* Share_EGL */ NULL, \
2829 /* renderer */ RGFW_glAccelerated \
2830}
2831
2832RGFW_glHints RGFW_globalHints_OpenGL_SRC = RGFW_DEFAULT_GL_HINTS;
2833RGFW_glHints* RGFW_globalHints_OpenGL = &RGFW_globalHints_OpenGL_SRC;
2834
2835void RGFW_resetGlobalHints_OpenGL(void) {
2836#if !defined(__cplusplus) || defined(RGFW_MACOS)
2837 RGFW_globalHints_OpenGL_SRC = (RGFW_glHints)RGFW_DEFAULT_GL_HINTS;
2838#else
2839 RGFW_globalHints_OpenGL_SRC = RGFW_DEFAULT_GL_HINTS;
2840#endif
2841}
2842void RGFW_setGlobalHints_OpenGL(RGFW_glHints* hints) { RGFW_globalHints_OpenGL = hints; }
2843RGFW_glHints* RGFW_getGlobalHints_OpenGL(void) { RGFW_init(); return RGFW_globalHints_OpenGL; }
2844
2845
2846void* RGFW_glContext_getSourceContext(RGFW_glContext* ctx) {
2847#ifdef RGFW_WAYLAND
2848 if (RGFW_usingWayland()) return (void*)ctx->egl.ctx;
2849#endif
2850#if !defined(RGFW_WAYLAND) || defined(RGFW_X11)
2851 return (void*)ctx->ctx;
2852#endif
2853 return NULL;
2854}
2855
2856RGFW_glContext* RGFW_window_createContext_OpenGL(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_glHints* hints) {
2857 #ifdef RGFW_WAYLAND
2858 if (RGFW_usingWayland()) {
2859 return (RGFW_glContext*)RGFW_window_createContext_EGL(win, hints);
2860 }
2861 #endif
2862 RGFW_glContext* ctx = (RGFW_glContext*)RGFW_ALLOC(sizeof(RGFW_glContext));
2863 if (RGFW_window_createContextPtr_OpenGL(win, ctx, hints) == RGFW_FALSE) {
2864 RGFW_FREE(ctx);
2865 win->src.ctx.native = NULL;
2866 return NULL;
2867 }
2868 win->src.gfxType |= RGFW_gfxOwnedByRGFW;
2869 return ctx;
2870}
2871
2872RGFW_glContext* RGFW_window_getContext_OpenGL(RGFW_window* win) {
2873 if (win->src.gfxType & RGFW_windowEGL) return NULL;
2874 return win->src.ctx.native;
2875}
2876
2877void RGFW_window_deleteContext_OpenGL(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_glContext* ctx) {
2878 RGFW_window_deleteContextPtr_OpenGL(win, ctx);
2879 if (win->src.gfxType & RGFW_gfxOwnedByRGFW) RGFW_FREE(ctx);
2880}
2881
2882RGFW_bool RGFW_extensionSupportedStr(const char* extensions, const char* ext, size_t len) {
2883 const char *start = extensions;
2884 const char *where;
2885 const char* terminator;
2886
2887 if (extensions == NULL || ext == NULL) {
2888 return RGFW_FALSE;
2889 }
2890
2891 while (ext[len - 1] == '\0' && len > 3) {
2892 len--;
2893 }
2894
2895 where = RGFW_STRSTR(extensions, ext);
2896 while (where) {
2897 terminator = where + len;
2898 if ((where == start || *(where - 1) == ' ') &&
2899 (*terminator == ' ' || *terminator == '\0')) {
2900 return RGFW_TRUE;
2901 }
2902 where = RGFW_STRSTR(terminator, ext);
2903 }
2904
2905 return RGFW_FALSE;
2906}
2907
2908RGFWDEF RGFW_bool RGFW_extensionSupported_base(const char* extension, size_t len);
2909RGFW_bool RGFW_extensionSupported_base(const char* extension, size_t len) {
2910 #ifdef GL_NUM_EXTENSIONS
2911 if (RGFW_globalHints_OpenGL->major >= 3) {
2912 i32 i;
2913
2914 GLint count = 0;
2915
2916 RGFW_proc RGFW_glGetStringi = RGFW_getProcAddress_OpenGL("glGetStringi");
2917 RGFW_proc RGFW_glGetIntegerv = RGFW_getProcAddress_OpenGL("glGetIntegerv");
2918 if (RGFW_glGetIntegerv)
2919 ((void(*)(GLenum, GLint*))RGFW_glGetIntegerv)(GL_NUM_EXTENSIONS, &count);
2920
2921 for (i = 0; RGFW_glGetStringi && i < count; i++) {
2922 const char* en = ((const char* (*)(u32, u32))RGFW_glGetStringi)(GL_EXTENSIONS, (u32)i);
2923 if (en && RGFW_STRNCMP(en, extension, len) == 0) {
2924 return RGFW_TRUE;
2925 }
2926 }
2927 } else
2928#endif
2929 {
2930 RGFW_proc RGFW_glGetString = RGFW_getProcAddress_OpenGL("glGetString");
2931 #define RGFW_GL_EXTENSIONS 0x1F03
2932 if (RGFW_glGetString) {
2933 const char* extensions = ((const char*(*)(u32))RGFW_glGetString)(RGFW_GL_EXTENSIONS);
2934
2935 if ((extensions != NULL) && RGFW_extensionSupportedStr(extensions, extension, len)) {
2936 return RGFW_TRUE;
2937 }
2938 }
2939 }
2940 return RGFW_FALSE;
2941}
2942
2943RGFW_bool RGFW_extensionSupported_OpenGL(const char* extension, size_t len) {
2944 if (RGFW_extensionSupported_base(extension, len)) return RGFW_TRUE;
2945 return RGFW_extensionSupportedPlatform_OpenGL(extension, len);
2946}
2947
2948void RGFW_window_makeCurrentWindow_OpenGL(RGFW_window* win) {
2949 _RGFW->current = win;
2950 RGFW_window_makeCurrentContext_OpenGL(win);
2951}
2952
2953RGFW_window* RGFW_getCurrentWindow_OpenGL(void) { return _RGFW->current; }
2954void RGFW_attribStack_init(RGFW_attribStack* stack, i32* attribs, size_t max) { stack->attribs = attribs; stack->count = 0; stack->max = max; }
2955void RGFW_attribStack_pushAttrib(RGFW_attribStack* stack, i32 attrib) {
2956 RGFW_ASSERT(stack->count < stack->max);
2957 stack->attribs[stack->count] = attrib;
2958 stack->count += 1;
2959}
2960void RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(RGFW_attribStack* stack, i32 attrib1, i32 attrib2) {
2961 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttrib(stack, attrib1);
2962 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttrib(stack, attrib2);
2963}
2964
2965/* EGL */
2966#ifdef RGFW_EGL
2967#include <EGL/egl.h>
2968
2969PFNEGLINITIALIZEPROC RGFW_eglInitialize;
2970PFNEGLGETCONFIGSPROC RGFW_eglGetConfigs;
2971PFNEGLCHOOSECONFIGPROC RGFW_eglChooseConfig;
2972PFNEGLCREATEWINDOWSURFACEPROC RGFW_eglCreateWindowSurface;
2973PFNEGLCREATECONTEXTPROC RGFW_eglCreateContext;
2974PFNEGLMAKECURRENTPROC RGFW_eglMakeCurrent;
2975PFNEGLGETDISPLAYPROC RGFW_eglGetDisplay;
2976PFNEGLSWAPBUFFERSPROC RGFW_eglSwapBuffers;
2977PFNEGLSWAPINTERVALPROC RGFW_eglSwapInterval;
2978PFNEGLBINDAPIPROC RGFW_eglBindAPI;
2979PFNEGLDESTROYCONTEXTPROC RGFW_eglDestroyContext;
2980PFNEGLTERMINATEPROC RGFW_eglTerminate;
2981PFNEGLDESTROYSURFACEPROC RGFW_eglDestroySurface;
2982PFNEGLGETCURRENTCONTEXTPROC RGFW_eglGetCurrentContext;
2983PFNEGLGETPROCADDRESSPROC RGFW_eglGetProcAddress = NULL;
2984PFNEGLQUERYSTRINGPROC RGFW_eglQueryString;
2985PFNEGLGETCONFIGATTRIBPROC RGFW_eglGetConfigAttrib;
2986
2987#define EGL_SURFACE_MAJOR_VERSION_KHR 0x3098
2988#define EGL_SURFACE_MINOR_VERSION_KHR 0x30fb
2989
2990#ifdef RGFW_WINDOWS
2991 #include <windows.h>
2992#elif defined(RGFW_MACOS) || defined(RGFW_UNIX)
2993 #include <dlfcn.h>
2994#endif
2995
2996#ifdef RGFW_WAYLAND
2997#include <wayland-egl.h>
2998#endif
2999
3000void* RGFW_eglLibHandle = NULL;
3001
3002void* RGFW_getDisplay_EGL(void) { return _RGFW->EGL_display; }
3003void* RGFW_eglContext_getSourceContext(RGFW_eglContext* ctx) { return ctx->ctx; }
3004void* RGFW_eglContext_getSurface(RGFW_eglContext* ctx) { return ctx->surface; }
3005struct wl_egl_window* RGFW_eglContext_wlEGLWindow(RGFW_eglContext* ctx) { return ctx->eglWindow; }
3006
3007RGFW_bool RGFW_loadEGL(void) {
3008 RGFW_init();
3009 if (RGFW_eglGetProcAddress != NULL) {
3010 return RGFW_TRUE;
3011 }
3012
3013#ifndef RGFW_WASM
3014 #ifdef RGFW_WINDOWS
3015 const char* libNames[] = { "libEGL.dll", "EGL.dll" };
3016 #elif defined(RGFW_MACOS) || defined(RGFW_UNIX)
3017 // Linux and macOS
3018 const char* libNames[] = {
3019 "libEGL.so.1", // most common
3020 "libEGL.so", // fallback
3021 "/System/Library/Frameworks/OpenGL.framework/OpenGL" // fallback for older macOS EGL-like systems
3022 };
3023 #endif
3024
3025 for (size_t i = 0; i < sizeof(libNames) / sizeof(libNames[0]); ++i) {
3026 #ifdef RGFW_WINDOWS
3027 RGFW_eglLibHandle = (void*)LoadLibraryA(libNames[i]);
3028 if (RGFW_eglLibHandle) {
3029 RGFW_eglGetProcAddress = (PFNEGLGETPROCADDRESSPROC)(RGFW_proc)GetProcAddress((HMODULE)RGFW_eglLibHandle, "eglGetProcAddress");
3030 break;
3031 }
3032 #elif defined(RGFW_MACOS) || defined(RGFW_UNIX)
3033 RGFW_eglLibHandle = dlopen(libNames[i], RTLD_LAZY | RTLD_GLOBAL);
3034 if (RGFW_eglLibHandle) {
3035 void* lib = dlsym(RGFW_eglLibHandle, "eglGetProcAddress");
3036 if (lib != NULL) RGFW_MEMCPY(&RGFW_eglGetProcAddress, &lib, sizeof(PFNEGLGETPROCADDRESSPROC));
3037 break;
3038 }
3039 #endif
3040 }
3041
3042 if (!RGFW_eglLibHandle || !RGFW_eglGetProcAddress) {
3043 return RGFW_FALSE;
3044 }
3045
3046 RGFW_eglInitialize = (PFNEGLINITIALIZEPROC) RGFW_eglGetProcAddress("eglInitialize");
3047 RGFW_eglGetConfigs = (PFNEGLGETCONFIGSPROC) RGFW_eglGetProcAddress("eglGetConfigs");
3048 RGFW_eglChooseConfig = (PFNEGLCHOOSECONFIGPROC) RGFW_eglGetProcAddress("eglChooseConfig");
3049 RGFW_eglCreateWindowSurface = (PFNEGLCREATEWINDOWSURFACEPROC) RGFW_eglGetProcAddress("eglCreateWindowSurface");
3050 RGFW_eglCreateContext = (PFNEGLCREATECONTEXTPROC) RGFW_eglGetProcAddress("eglCreateContext");
3051 RGFW_eglMakeCurrent = (PFNEGLMAKECURRENTPROC) RGFW_eglGetProcAddress("eglMakeCurrent");
3052 RGFW_eglGetDisplay = (PFNEGLGETDISPLAYPROC) RGFW_eglGetProcAddress("eglGetDisplay");
3053 RGFW_eglSwapBuffers = (PFNEGLSWAPBUFFERSPROC) RGFW_eglGetProcAddress("eglSwapBuffers");
3054 RGFW_eglSwapInterval = (PFNEGLSWAPINTERVALPROC) RGFW_eglGetProcAddress("eglSwapInterval");
3055 RGFW_eglBindAPI = (PFNEGLBINDAPIPROC) RGFW_eglGetProcAddress("eglBindAPI");
3056 RGFW_eglDestroyContext = (PFNEGLDESTROYCONTEXTPROC) RGFW_eglGetProcAddress("eglDestroyContext");
3057 RGFW_eglTerminate = (PFNEGLTERMINATEPROC) RGFW_eglGetProcAddress("eglTerminate");
3058 RGFW_eglDestroySurface = (PFNEGLDESTROYSURFACEPROC) RGFW_eglGetProcAddress("eglDestroySurface");
3059 RGFW_eglQueryString = (PFNEGLQUERYSTRINGPROC) RGFW_eglGetProcAddress("eglQueryString");
3060 RGFW_eglGetCurrentContext = (PFNEGLGETCURRENTCONTEXTPROC) RGFW_eglGetProcAddress("eglGetCurrentContext");
3061 RGFW_eglGetConfigAttrib = (PFNEGLGETCONFIGATTRIBPROC) RGFW_eglGetProcAddress("eglGetConfigAttrib");
3062
3063#else
3064 RGFW_eglGetProcAddress = eglGetProcAddress;
3065 RGFW_eglInitialize = (PFNEGLINITIALIZEPROC) eglInitialize;
3066 RGFW_eglGetConfigs = (PFNEGLGETCONFIGSPROC) eglGetConfigs;
3067 RGFW_eglChooseConfig = (PFNEGLCHOOSECONFIGPROC) eglChooseConfig;
3068 RGFW_eglCreateWindowSurface = (PFNEGLCREATEWINDOWSURFACEPROC) eglCreateWindowSurface;
3069 RGFW_eglCreateContext = (PFNEGLCREATECONTEXTPROC) eglCreateContext;
3070 RGFW_eglMakeCurrent = (PFNEGLMAKECURRENTPROC) eglMakeCurrent;
3071 RGFW_eglGetDisplay = (PFNEGLGETDISPLAYPROC) eglGetDisplay;
3072 RGFW_eglSwapBuffers = (PFNEGLSWAPBUFFERSPROC) eglSwapBuffers;
3073 RGFW_eglSwapInterval = (PFNEGLSWAPINTERVALPROC) eglSwapInterval;
3074 RGFW_eglBindAPI = (PFNEGLBINDAPIPROC) eglBindAPI;
3075 RGFW_eglDestroyContext = (PFNEGLDESTROYCONTEXTPROC) eglDestroyContext;
3076 RGFW_eglTerminate = (PFNEGLTERMINATEPROC) eglTerminate;
3077 RGFW_eglDestroySurface = (PFNEGLDESTROYSURFACEPROC) eglDestroySurface;
3078 RGFW_eglQueryString = (PFNEGLQUERYSTRINGPROC) eglQueryString;
3079 RGFW_eglGetCurrentContext = (PFNEGLGETCURRENTCONTEXTPROC) eglGetCurrentContext;
3080 RGFW_eglGetConfigAttrib = (PFNEGLGETCONFIGATTRIBPROC)eglGetConfigAttrib;
3081#endif
3082
3083 RGFW_bool out = RGFW_BOOL(RGFW_eglInitialize!= NULL &&
3084 RGFW_eglGetConfigs!= NULL &&
3085 RGFW_eglChooseConfig!= NULL &&
3086 RGFW_eglCreateWindowSurface!= NULL &&
3087 RGFW_eglCreateContext!= NULL &&
3088 RGFW_eglMakeCurrent!= NULL &&
3089 RGFW_eglGetDisplay!= NULL &&
3090 RGFW_eglSwapBuffers!= NULL &&
3091 RGFW_eglSwapInterval != NULL &&
3092 RGFW_eglBindAPI!= NULL &&
3093 RGFW_eglDestroyContext!= NULL &&
3094 RGFW_eglTerminate!= NULL &&
3095 RGFW_eglDestroySurface!= NULL &&
3096 RGFW_eglQueryString != NULL &&
3097 RGFW_eglGetCurrentContext != NULL &&
3098 RGFW_eglGetConfigAttrib != NULL);
3099
3100 if (out) {
3101 #ifdef RGFW_WINDOWS
3102 HDC dc = GetDC(NULL);
3103 _RGFW->EGL_display = RGFW_eglGetDisplay((EGLNativeDisplayType) dc);
3104 ReleaseDC(NULL, dc);
3105 #elif defined(RGFW_WAYLAND)
3106 if (_RGFW->useWaylandBool)
3107 _RGFW->EGL_display = RGFW_eglGetDisplay((EGLNativeDisplayType) _RGFW->wl_display);
3108 else
3109 #endif
3110 #ifdef RGFW_X11
3111 _RGFW->EGL_display = RGFW_eglGetDisplay((EGLNativeDisplayType) _RGFW->display);
3112 #else
3113 {}
3114 #endif
3115 #if !defined(RGFW_WAYLAND) && !defined(RGFW_WINDOWS) && !defined(RGFW_X11)
3116 _RGFW->EGL_display = RGFW_eglGetDisplay(EGL_DEFAULT_DISPLAY);
3117 #endif
3118 }
3119
3120 RGFW_eglInitialize(_RGFW->EGL_display, NULL, NULL);
3121 return out;
3122}
3123
3124
3125void RGFW_unloadEGL(void) {
3126 if (!RGFW_eglLibHandle) return;
3127 RGFW_eglTerminate(_RGFW->EGL_display);
3128 #ifdef RGFW_WINDOWS
3129 FreeLibrary((HMODULE)RGFW_eglLibHandle);
3130 #elif defined(RGFW_MACOS) || defined(RGFW_UNIX)
3131 dlclose(RGFW_eglLibHandle);
3132 #endif
3133
3134 RGFW_eglLibHandle = NULL;
3135 RGFW_eglGetProcAddress = NULL;
3136}
3137
3138RGFW_bool RGFW_window_createContextPtr_EGL(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_eglContext* ctx, RGFW_glHints* hints) {
3139 if (RGFW_loadEGL() == RGFW_FALSE) return RGFW_FALSE;
3140 win->src.ctx.egl = ctx;
3141 win->src.gfxType = RGFW_gfxEGL;
3142#ifdef RGFW_WAYLAND
3143 if (_RGFW->useWaylandBool)
3144 win->src.ctx.egl->eglWindow = wl_egl_window_create(win->src.surface, win->w, win->h);
3145#endif
3146
3147 #ifndef EGL_OPENGL_ES1_BIT
3148 #define EGL_OPENGL_ES1_BIT 0x1
3149 #endif
3150
3151 EGLint egl_config[24];
3152
3153 {
3154 RGFW_attribStack stack;
3155 RGFW_attribStack_init(&stack, egl_config, 24);
3156
3157 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, EGL_SURFACE_TYPE, EGL_WINDOW_BIT);
3158 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttrib(&stack, EGL_RENDERABLE_TYPE);
3159
3160 if (hints->profile == RGFW_glES) {
3161 switch (hints->major) {
3162 case 1: RGFW_attribStack_pushAttrib(&stack, EGL_OPENGL_ES1_BIT); break;
3163 case 2: RGFW_attribStack_pushAttrib(&stack, EGL_OPENGL_ES2_BIT); break;
3164 case 3: RGFW_attribStack_pushAttrib(&stack, EGL_OPENGL_ES3_BIT); break;
3165 default: break;
3166 }
3167 } else {
3168 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttrib(&stack, EGL_OPENGL_BIT);
3169 }
3170
3171 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, EGL_RED_SIZE, hints->red);
3172 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, EGL_GREEN_SIZE, hints->green);
3173 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, EGL_BLUE_SIZE, hints->blue);
3174 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, EGL_ALPHA_SIZE, hints->alpha);
3175 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, EGL_DEPTH_SIZE, hints->depth);
3176
3177 if (hints->sRGB)
3178 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, 0x3089, hints->sRGB);
3179
3180 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, EGL_STENCIL_SIZE, hints->stencil);
3181 if (hints->samples) {
3182 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, EGL_SAMPLE_BUFFERS, 1);
3183 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, EGL_SAMPLES, hints->samples);
3184 }
3185
3186 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, EGL_NONE, EGL_NONE);
3187 }
3188
3189 EGLint numConfigs, best_config = -1, best_samples = 0;
3190
3191 RGFW_eglChooseConfig(_RGFW->EGL_display, egl_config, NULL, 0, &numConfigs);
3192 EGLConfig* configs = (EGLConfig*)RGFW_ALLOC(sizeof(EGLConfig) * (u32)numConfigs);
3193
3194 RGFW_eglChooseConfig(_RGFW->EGL_display, egl_config, configs, numConfigs, &numConfigs);
3195
3196#ifdef RGFW_X11
3197 RGFW_bool transparent = (win->internal.flags & RGFW_windowTransparent);
3198 EGLint best_depth = 0;
3199#endif
3200
3201 for (EGLint i = 0; i < numConfigs; i++) {
3202 EGLint visual_id = 0;
3203 EGLint samples = 0;
3204
3205 RGFW_eglGetConfigAttrib(_RGFW->EGL_display, configs[i], EGL_NATIVE_VISUAL_ID, &visual_id);
3206 RGFW_eglGetConfigAttrib(_RGFW->EGL_display, configs[i], EGL_SAMPLES, &samples);
3207
3208 if (best_config == -1) best_config = i;
3209
3210 #ifdef RGFW_X11
3211 XVisualInfo vinfo_template;
3212 vinfo_template.visualid = (VisualID)visual_id;
3213
3214 int num_visuals = 0;
3215 XVisualInfo* vi = XGetVisualInfo(_RGFW->display, VisualIDMask, &vinfo_template, &num_visuals);
3216 if (!vi) continue;
3217 if ((!transparent || vi->depth == 32) && best_depth == 0) {
3218 best_config = i;
3219 best_depth = vi->depth;
3220 }
3221
3222 if ((!(transparent) || vi->depth == 32) && (samples <= hints->samples && samples > best_samples)) {
3223 best_depth = vi->depth;
3224 best_config = i;
3225 best_samples = samples;
3226 XFree(vi);
3227 continue;
3228 }
3229 #endif
3230
3231 if (samples <= hints->samples && samples > best_samples) {
3232 best_config = i;
3233 best_samples = samples;
3234 }
3235 }
3236
3237 EGLConfig config = configs[best_config];
3238 RGFW_FREE(configs);
3239#ifdef RGFW_X11
3240 if (_RGFW->useWaylandBool == RGFW_FALSE) {
3241 /* This is required so that way the user can create their own OpenGL context after RGFW_createWindow is used */
3242 XVisualInfo* result;
3243 XVisualInfo desired;
3244 EGLint visualID = 0, count = 0;
3245
3246 RGFW_eglGetConfigAttrib(_RGFW->EGL_display, config, EGL_NATIVE_VISUAL_ID, &visualID);
3247 if (visualID) {
3248 desired.visualid = (VisualID)visualID;
3249 result = XGetVisualInfo(_RGFW->display, VisualIDMask, &desired, &count);
3250 } else RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeError, RGFW_errEGLContext, "Failed to fetch a valid EGL VisualID");
3251
3252 if (result == NULL || count == 0) {
3253 if (win->src.window == 0) {
3254 /* try to create a EGL context anyway (this will work if you're not using a NVidia driver) */
3255 win->internal.flags &= ~(u32)RGFW_windowEGL;
3256 RGFW_createWindowPlatform("", win->internal.flags, win);
3257 }
3258 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeError, RGFW_errEGLContext, "Failed to find a valid visual for the EGL config");
3259 } else {
3260 if (win->src.window) RGFW_window_closePlatform(win);
3261 RGFW_XCreateWindow(*result, "", win->internal.flags, win);
3262 XFree(result);
3263 }
3264 }
3265#endif
3266
3267 EGLint surf_attribs[9];
3268
3269 {
3270 RGFW_attribStack stack;
3271 RGFW_attribStack_init(&stack, surf_attribs, 9);
3272
3273 const char present_opaque_str[] = "EGL_EXT_present_opaque";
3274 RGFW_bool opaque_extension_Found = RGFW_extensionSupportedPlatform_EGL(present_opaque_str, sizeof(present_opaque_str));
3275
3276 #ifndef EGL_PRESENT_OPAQUE_EXT
3277 #define EGL_PRESENT_OPAQUE_EXT 0x31df
3278 #endif
3279
3280 if (!(win->internal.flags & RGFW_windowTransparent) && opaque_extension_Found)
3281 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, EGL_PRESENT_OPAQUE_EXT, EGL_TRUE);
3282
3283 if (hints->doubleBuffer == 0) {
3284 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, EGL_RENDER_BUFFER, EGL_SINGLE_BUFFER);
3285 }
3286
3287 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, EGL_NONE, EGL_NONE);
3288 }
3289 #if defined(RGFW_MACOS)
3290 void* layer = RGFW_getLayer_OSX();
3291
3292 RGFW_window_setLayer_OSX(win, layer);
3293
3294 win->src.ctx.egl->surface = RGFW_eglCreateWindowSurface(_RGFW->EGL_display, config, (EGLNativeWindowType) layer, surf_attribs);
3295 #elif defined(RGFW_WINDOWS)
3296 win->src.ctx.egl->surface = RGFW_eglCreateWindowSurface(_RGFW->EGL_display, config, (EGLNativeWindowType) win->src.window, surf_attribs);
3297 #elif defined(RGFW_WAYLAND)
3298 if (_RGFW->useWaylandBool)
3299 win->src.ctx.egl->surface = RGFW_eglCreateWindowSurface(_RGFW->EGL_display, config, (EGLNativeWindowType) win->src.ctx.egl->eglWindow, surf_attribs);
3300 else
3301 #endif
3302 #ifdef RGFW_X11
3303 win->src.ctx.egl->surface = RGFW_eglCreateWindowSurface(_RGFW->EGL_display, config, (EGLNativeWindowType) win->src.window, surf_attribs);
3304 #else
3305 {}
3306 #endif
3307 #ifdef RGFW_WASM
3308 win->src.ctx.egl->surface = eglCreateWindowSurface(_RGFW->EGL_display, config, 0, 0);
3309 #endif
3310
3311 if (win->src.ctx.egl->surface == NULL) {
3312 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeError, RGFW_errEGLContext, "Failed to create an EGL surface.");
3313 return RGFW_FALSE;
3314 }
3315
3316 EGLint attribs[20];
3317 {
3318 RGFW_attribStack stack;
3319 RGFW_attribStack_init(&stack, attribs, 20);
3320
3321 if (hints->major || hints->minor) {
3322 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, EGL_CONTEXT_MAJOR_VERSION, hints->major);
3323 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, EGL_CONTEXT_MINOR_VERSION, hints->minor);
3324 }
3325
3326 if (hints->profile == RGFW_glCore) {
3327 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, EGL_CONTEXT_OPENGL_PROFILE_MASK, EGL_CONTEXT_OPENGL_CORE_PROFILE_BIT);
3328 } else if (hints->profile == RGFW_glCompatibility) {
3329 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, EGL_CONTEXT_OPENGL_PROFILE_MASK, EGL_CONTEXT_OPENGL_COMPATIBILITY_PROFILE_BIT);
3330 }
3331
3332 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, EGL_CONTEXT_OPENGL_ROBUST_ACCESS, hints->robustness);
3333 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, EGL_CONTEXT_OPENGL_DEBUG, hints->debug);
3334
3335 #ifndef EGL_CONTEXT_RELEASE_BEHAVIOR_KHR
3336 #define EGL_CONTEXT_RELEASE_BEHAVIOR_KHR 0x2097
3337 #endif
3338
3339 #ifndef EGL_CONTEXT_RELEASE_BEHAVIOR_FLUSH_KHR
3340 #define EGL_CONTEXT_RELEASE_BEHAVIOR_FLUSH_KHR 0x2098
3341 #endif
3342
3343 if (hints->releaseBehavior == RGFW_glReleaseFlush) {
3344 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, EGL_CONTEXT_RELEASE_BEHAVIOR_KHR, EGL_CONTEXT_RELEASE_BEHAVIOR_FLUSH_KHR);
3345 } else {
3346 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, EGL_CONTEXT_RELEASE_BEHAVIOR_KHR, 0x0000);
3347 }
3348
3349 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, EGL_NONE, EGL_NONE);
3350 }
3351
3352 if (hints->profile == RGFW_glES)
3353 RGFW_eglBindAPI(EGL_OPENGL_ES_API);
3354 else
3355 RGFW_eglBindAPI(EGL_OPENGL_API);
3356
3357 win->src.ctx.egl->ctx = RGFW_eglCreateContext(_RGFW->EGL_display, config, hints->shareEGL, attribs);
3358
3359 if (win->src.ctx.egl->ctx == NULL) {
3360 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeError, RGFW_errEGLContext, "Failed to create an EGL context.");
3361 return RGFW_FALSE;
3362 }
3363
3364 RGFW_eglMakeCurrent(_RGFW->EGL_display, win->src.ctx.egl->surface, win->src.ctx.egl->surface, win->src.ctx.egl->ctx);
3365 RGFW_eglSwapBuffers(_RGFW->EGL_display, win->src.ctx.egl->surface);
3366 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeInfo, RGFW_infoOpenGL, "EGL context initalized.");
3367 return RGFW_TRUE;
3368}
3369
3370RGFW_eglContext* RGFW_window_getContext_EGL(RGFW_window* win) {
3371 if (win->src.gfxType == RGFW_windowOpenGL) return NULL;
3372 return win->src.ctx.egl;
3373}
3374
3375void RGFW_window_deleteContextPtr_EGL(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_eglContext* ctx) {
3376 if (_RGFW->EGL_display == NULL) return;
3377
3378 RGFW_eglDestroySurface(_RGFW->EGL_display, ctx->surface);
3379 RGFW_eglDestroyContext(_RGFW->EGL_display, ctx->ctx);
3380 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeInfo, RGFW_infoOpenGL, "EGL context freed");
3381 #ifdef RGFW_WAYLAND
3382 if (_RGFW->useWaylandBool == RGFW_FALSE) return;
3383 wl_egl_window_destroy(win->src.ctx.egl->eglWindow);
3384 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeInfo, RGFW_infoOpenGL, "EGL window context freed");
3385 #endif
3386 win->src.ctx.egl = NULL;
3387}
3388
3389void RGFW_window_makeCurrentContext_EGL(RGFW_window* win) { if (win) RGFW_ASSERT(win->src.ctx.egl);
3390 if (win == NULL)
3391 RGFW_eglMakeCurrent(_RGFW->EGL_display, EGL_NO_SURFACE, EGL_NO_SURFACE, EGL_NO_CONTEXT);
3392 else {
3393 RGFW_eglMakeCurrent(_RGFW->EGL_display, win->src.ctx.egl->surface, win->src.ctx.egl->surface, win->src.ctx.egl->ctx);
3394 }
3395}
3396
3397void RGFW_window_swapBuffers_EGL(RGFW_window* win) {
3398 if (RGFW_eglSwapBuffers)
3399 RGFW_eglSwapBuffers(_RGFW->EGL_display, win->src.ctx.egl->surface);
3400 else RGFW_window_swapBuffers_OpenGL(win);
3401}
3402
3403void* RGFW_getCurrentContext_EGL(void) {
3404 return RGFW_eglGetCurrentContext();
3405}
3406
3407RGFW_proc RGFW_getProcAddress_EGL(const char* procname) {
3408 #if defined(RGFW_WINDOWS)
3409 RGFW_proc proc = (RGFW_proc) GetProcAddress(RGFW_wgl_dll, procname);
3410
3411 if (proc)
3412 return proc;
3413 #endif
3414
3415 return (RGFW_proc) RGFW_eglGetProcAddress(procname);
3416}
3417
3418RGFW_bool RGFW_extensionSupportedPlatform_EGL(const char* extension, size_t len) {
3419 if (RGFW_loadEGL() == RGFW_FALSE) return RGFW_FALSE;
3420 const char* extensions = RGFW_eglQueryString(_RGFW->EGL_display, EGL_EXTENSIONS);
3421 return extensions != NULL && RGFW_extensionSupportedStr(extensions, extension, len);
3422}
3423
3424void RGFW_window_swapInterval_EGL(RGFW_window* win, i32 swapInterval) {
3425 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
3426 RGFW_eglSwapInterval(_RGFW->EGL_display, swapInterval);
3427}
3428
3429RGFW_bool RGFW_extensionSupported_EGL(const char* extension, size_t len) {
3430 if (RGFW_extensionSupported_base(extension, len)) return RGFW_TRUE;
3431 return RGFW_extensionSupportedPlatform_EGL(extension, len);
3432}
3433
3434void RGFW_window_makeCurrentWindow_EGL(RGFW_window* win) {
3435 _RGFW->current = win;
3436 RGFW_window_makeCurrentContext_EGL(win);
3437}
3438
3439RGFW_window* RGFW_getCurrentWindow_EGL(void) { return _RGFW->current; }
3440
3441RGFW_eglContext* RGFW_window_createContext_EGL(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_glHints* hints) {
3442 RGFW_eglContext* ctx = (RGFW_eglContext*)RGFW_ALLOC(sizeof(RGFW_eglContext));
3443 if (RGFW_window_createContextPtr_EGL(win, ctx, hints) == RGFW_FALSE) {
3444 RGFW_FREE(ctx);
3445 win->src.ctx.egl = NULL;
3446 return NULL;
3447 }
3448 win->src.gfxType |= RGFW_gfxOwnedByRGFW;
3449 return ctx;
3450}
3451
3452void RGFW_window_deleteContext_EGL(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_eglContext* ctx) {
3453 RGFW_window_deleteContextPtr_EGL(win, ctx);
3454 if (win->src.gfxType & RGFW_gfxOwnedByRGFW) RGFW_FREE(ctx);
3455}
3456
3457#endif /* RGFW_EGL */
3458
3459/*
3460 end of RGFW_EGL defines
3461*/
3462#endif /* end of RGFW_GL (OpenGL, EGL, OSMesa )*/
3463
3464/*
3465 RGFW_VULKAN defines
3466*/
3467#ifdef RGFW_VULKAN
3468#ifdef RGFW_MACOS
3469#include <objc/message.h>
3470#endif
3471
3472const char** RGFW_getRequiredInstanceExtensions_Vulkan(size_t* count) {
3473 static const char* arr[2] = {VK_KHR_SURFACE_EXTENSION_NAME};
3474 arr[1] = RGFW_VK_SURFACE;
3475 if (count != NULL) *count = 2;
3476
3477 return (const char**)arr;
3478}
3479
3480VkResult RGFW_window_createSurface_Vulkan(RGFW_window* win, VkInstance instance, VkSurfaceKHR* surface) {
3481 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL); RGFW_ASSERT(instance);
3482 RGFW_ASSERT(surface != NULL);
3483
3484 *surface = VK_NULL_HANDLE;
3485
3486#ifdef RGFW_X11
3487
3488 VkXlibSurfaceCreateInfoKHR x11 = { VK_STRUCTURE_TYPE_XLIB_SURFACE_CREATE_INFO_KHR, 0, 0, (Display*) _RGFW->display, (Window) win->src.window };
3489 return vkCreateXlibSurfaceKHR(instance, &x11, NULL, surface);
3490#endif
3491#if defined(RGFW_WAYLAND)
3492
3493 VkWaylandSurfaceCreateInfoKHR wayland = { VK_STRUCTURE_TYPE_WAYLAND_SURFACE_CREATE_INFO_KHR, 0, 0, (struct wl_display*) _RGFW->wl_display, (struct wl_surface*) win->src.surface };
3494 return vkCreateWaylandSurfaceKHR(instance, &wayland, NULL, surface);
3495#elif defined(RGFW_WINDOWS)
3496 VkWin32SurfaceCreateInfoKHR win32 = { VK_STRUCTURE_TYPE_WIN32_SURFACE_CREATE_INFO_KHR, 0, 0, GetModuleHandle(NULL), (HWND)win->src.window };
3497
3498 return vkCreateWin32SurfaceKHR(instance, &win32, NULL, surface);
3499#elif defined(RGFW_MACOS) && !defined(RGFW_MACOS_X11)
3500 void* contentView = ((void* (*)(id, SEL))objc_msgSend)((id)win->src.window, sel_getUid("contentView"));
3501 VkMacOSSurfaceCreateSurfaceMVK macos = { VK_STRUCTURE_TYPE_MACOS_SURFACE_CREATE_INFO_MVK, 0, 0, 0, (void*)contentView };
3502 return vkCreateMacOSSurfaceMVK(instance, &macos, NULL, surface);
3503#endif
3504}
3505
3506
3507RGFW_bool RGFW_getPresentationSupport_Vulkan(VkInstance instance, VkPhysicalDevice physicalDevice, u32 queueFamilyIndex) {
3508 RGFW_ASSERT(instance);
3509 if (_RGFW == NULL) RGFW_init();
3510#ifdef RGFW_X11
3511
3512 Visual* visual = DefaultVisual(_RGFW->display, DefaultScreen(_RGFW->display));
3513 RGFW_bool out = vkGetPhysicalDeviceXlibPresentationSupportKHR(physicalDevice, queueFamilyIndex, _RGFW->display, XVisualIDFromVisual(visual));
3514 return out;
3515#endif
3516#if defined(RGFW_WAYLAND)
3517
3518 RGFW_bool wlout = vkGetPhysicalDeviceWaylandPresentationSupportKHR(physicalDevice, queueFamilyIndex, _RGFW->wl_display);
3519 return wlout;
3520#elif defined(RGFW_WINDOWS)
3521#elif defined(RGFW_MACOS) && !defined(RGFW_MACOS_X11)
3522 return RGFW_FALSE; /* TODO */
3523#endif
3524}
3525#endif /* end of RGFW_vulkan */
3526
3527/*
3528This is where OS specific stuff starts
3529*/
3530
3531/* start of unix (wayland or X11 (unix) ) defines */
3532
3533#ifdef RGFW_UNIX
3534#include <fcntl.h>
3535#include <poll.h>
3536#include <unistd.h>
3537
3538void RGFW_stopCheckEvents(void) {
3539
3540 _RGFW->eventWait_forceStop[2] = 1;
3541 while (1) {
3542 const char byte = 0;
3543 const ssize_t result = write(_RGFW->eventWait_forceStop[1], &byte, 1);
3544 if (result == 1 || result == -1)
3545 break;
3546 }
3547}
3548
3549RGFWDEF u64 RGFW_linux_getTimeNS(i32 clock);
3550u64 RGFW_linux_getTimeNS(i32 clock) {
3551 struct timespec ts;
3552 clock_gettime(clock, &ts);
3553 return (u64)ts.tv_sec * 1000000000ull + (u64)ts.tv_nsec;
3554}
3555
3556void RGFW_waitForEvent(i32 waitMS) {
3557 if (waitMS == 0) return;
3558
3559 if (_RGFW->eventWait_forceStop[0] == 0 || _RGFW->eventWait_forceStop[1] == 0) {
3560 if (pipe(_RGFW->eventWait_forceStop) != -1) {
3561 fcntl(_RGFW->eventWait_forceStop[0], F_GETFL, 0);
3562 fcntl(_RGFW->eventWait_forceStop[0], F_GETFD, 0);
3563 fcntl(_RGFW->eventWait_forceStop[1], F_GETFL, 0);
3564 fcntl(_RGFW->eventWait_forceStop[1], F_GETFD, 0);
3565 }
3566 }
3567
3568 struct pollfd fds[] = {
3569 #ifdef RGFW_WAYLAND
3570 { wl_display_get_fd(_RGFW->wl_display), POLLIN, 0 },
3571 #else
3572 { ConnectionNumber(_RGFW->display), POLLIN, 0 },
3573 #endif
3574 #ifdef RGFW_X11
3575 { ConnectionNumber(_RGFW->display), POLLIN, 0 },
3576 #endif
3577 { _RGFW->eventWait_forceStop[0], POLLIN, 0 },
3578 };
3579
3580 u8 index = 2;
3581#ifdef RGFW_X11
3582 index++;
3583#endif
3584
3585 i32 clock = 0;
3586 #if defined(_POSIX_MONOTONIC_CLOCK)
3587 struct timespec ts;
3588 RGFW_MEMSET(&ts, 0, sizeof(struct timespec));
3589
3590 if (clock_gettime(CLOCK_MONOTONIC, &ts) == 0)
3591 clock = CLOCK_MONOTONIC;
3592 #else
3593 clock = CLOCK_REALTIME;
3594 #endif
3595
3596 u64 start = RGFW_linux_getTimeNS(clock);
3597
3598 #ifdef RGFW_WAYLAND
3599 while (wl_display_dispatch_pending(_RGFW->wl_display) <= 0
3600 #else
3601 while (XPending(_RGFW->display) == 0
3602 #endif
3603 #ifdef RGFW_X11
3604 && XPending(_RGFW->display) == 0
3605 #endif
3606 ) {
3607 if (poll(fds, index, waitMS) <= 0)
3608 break;
3609
3610 if (waitMS != RGFW_eventWaitNext) {
3611 waitMS -= (i32)(RGFW_linux_getTimeNS(clock) - start) / (i32)1e+6;
3612 }
3613 }
3614
3615 /* drain any data in the stop request */
3616 if (_RGFW->eventWait_forceStop[2]) {
3617 char data[64];
3618 RGFW_MEMSET(data, 0, sizeof(data));
3619 (void)!read(_RGFW->eventWait_forceStop[0], data, sizeof(data));
3620
3621 _RGFW->eventWait_forceStop[2] = 0;
3622 }
3623}
3624
3625char* RGFW_strtok(char* str, const char* delimStr);
3626char* RGFW_strtok(char* str, const char* delimStr) {
3627 static char* static_str = NULL;
3628
3629 if (str != NULL)
3630 static_str = str;
3631
3632 if (static_str == NULL) {
3633 return NULL;
3634 }
3635
3636 while (*static_str != '\0') {
3637 RGFW_bool delim = 0;
3638 const char* d;
3639 for (d = delimStr; *d != '\0'; d++) {
3640 if (*static_str == *d) {
3641 delim = 1;
3642 break;
3643 }
3644 }
3645 if (!delim)
3646 break;
3647 static_str++;
3648 }
3649
3650 if (*static_str == '\0')
3651 return NULL;
3652
3653 char* token_start = static_str;
3654 while (*static_str != '\0') {
3655 int delim = 0;
3656 const char* d;
3657 for (d = delimStr; *d != '\0'; d++) {
3658 if (*static_str == *d) {
3659 delim = 1;
3660 break;
3661 }
3662 }
3663
3664 if (delim) {
3665 *static_str = '\0';
3666 static_str++;
3667 break;
3668 }
3669 static_str++;
3670 }
3671
3672 return token_start;
3673}
3674
3675#ifdef RGFW_X11
3676RGFWDEF i32 RGFW_initPlatform_X11(void);
3677RGFWDEF void RGFW_deinitPlatform_X11(void);
3678#endif
3679#ifdef RGFW_WAYLAND
3680RGFWDEF i32 RGFW_initPlatform_Wayland(void);
3681RGFWDEF void RGFW_deinitPlatform_Wayland(void);
3682#endif
3683
3684RGFWDEF void RGFW_load_X11(void);
3685RGFWDEF void RGFW_load_Wayland(void);
3686
3687#if !defined(RGFW_X11) || !defined(RGFW_WAYLAND)
3688void RGFW_load_X11(void) { }
3689void RGFW_load_Wayland(void) { }
3690#endif
3691
3692/*
3693 * Sadly we have to use magic linux keycodes
3694 * We can't use X11 functions, because that breaks Wayland, but they use the same keycodes so there's no use redeffing them
3695 * We can't use linux enums, because the headers don't exist on BSD
3696 */
3697void RGFW_initKeycodesPlatform(void) {
3698 _RGFW->keycodes[49] = RGFW_backtick;
3699 _RGFW->keycodes[19] = RGFW_0;
3700 _RGFW->keycodes[10] = RGFW_1;
3701 _RGFW->keycodes[11] = RGFW_2;
3702 _RGFW->keycodes[12] = RGFW_3;
3703 _RGFW->keycodes[13] = RGFW_4;
3704 _RGFW->keycodes[14] = RGFW_5;
3705 _RGFW->keycodes[15] = RGFW_6;
3706 _RGFW->keycodes[16] = RGFW_7;
3707 _RGFW->keycodes[17] = RGFW_8;
3708 _RGFW->keycodes[18] = RGFW_9;
3709 _RGFW->keycodes[65] = RGFW_space;
3710 _RGFW->keycodes[38] = RGFW_a;
3711 _RGFW->keycodes[56] = RGFW_b;
3712 _RGFW->keycodes[54] = RGFW_c;
3713 _RGFW->keycodes[40] = RGFW_d;
3714 _RGFW->keycodes[26] = RGFW_e;
3715 _RGFW->keycodes[41] = RGFW_f;
3716 _RGFW->keycodes[42] = RGFW_g;
3717 _RGFW->keycodes[43] = RGFW_h;
3718 _RGFW->keycodes[31] = RGFW_i;
3719 _RGFW->keycodes[44] = RGFW_j;
3720 _RGFW->keycodes[45] = RGFW_k;
3721 _RGFW->keycodes[46] = RGFW_l;
3722 _RGFW->keycodes[58] = RGFW_m;
3723 _RGFW->keycodes[57] = RGFW_n;
3724 _RGFW->keycodes[32] = RGFW_o;
3725 _RGFW->keycodes[33] = RGFW_p;
3726 _RGFW->keycodes[24] = RGFW_q;
3727 _RGFW->keycodes[27] = RGFW_r;
3728 _RGFW->keycodes[39] = RGFW_s;
3729 _RGFW->keycodes[28] = RGFW_t;
3730 _RGFW->keycodes[30] = RGFW_u;
3731 _RGFW->keycodes[55] = RGFW_v;
3732 _RGFW->keycodes[25] = RGFW_w;
3733 _RGFW->keycodes[53] = RGFW_x;
3734 _RGFW->keycodes[29] = RGFW_y;
3735 _RGFW->keycodes[52] = RGFW_z;
3736 _RGFW->keycodes[60] = RGFW_period;
3737 _RGFW->keycodes[59] = RGFW_comma;
3738 _RGFW->keycodes[61] = RGFW_slash;
3739 _RGFW->keycodes[34] = RGFW_bracket;
3740 _RGFW->keycodes[35] = RGFW_closeBracket;
3741 _RGFW->keycodes[47] = RGFW_semicolon;
3742 _RGFW->keycodes[48] = RGFW_apostrophe;
3743 _RGFW->keycodes[51] = RGFW_backSlash;
3744 _RGFW->keycodes[36] = RGFW_return;
3745 _RGFW->keycodes[119] = RGFW_delete;
3746 _RGFW->keycodes[77] = RGFW_numLock;
3747 _RGFW->keycodes[106] = RGFW_kpSlash;
3748 _RGFW->keycodes[63] = RGFW_kpMultiply;
3749 _RGFW->keycodes[86] = RGFW_kpPlus;
3750 _RGFW->keycodes[82] = RGFW_kpMinus;
3751 _RGFW->keycodes[87] = RGFW_kp1;
3752 _RGFW->keycodes[88] = RGFW_kp2;
3753 _RGFW->keycodes[89] = RGFW_kp3;
3754 _RGFW->keycodes[83] = RGFW_kp4;
3755 _RGFW->keycodes[84] = RGFW_kp5;
3756 _RGFW->keycodes[85] = RGFW_kp6;
3757 _RGFW->keycodes[81] = RGFW_kp9;
3758 _RGFW->keycodes[90] = RGFW_kp0;
3759 _RGFW->keycodes[91] = RGFW_kpPeriod;
3760 _RGFW->keycodes[104] = RGFW_kpReturn;
3761 _RGFW->keycodes[20] = RGFW_minus;
3762 _RGFW->keycodes[21] = RGFW_equals;
3763 _RGFW->keycodes[22] = RGFW_backSpace;
3764 _RGFW->keycodes[23] = RGFW_tab;
3765 _RGFW->keycodes[66] = RGFW_capsLock;
3766 _RGFW->keycodes[50] = RGFW_shiftL;
3767 _RGFW->keycodes[37] = RGFW_controlL;
3768 _RGFW->keycodes[64] = RGFW_altL;
3769 _RGFW->keycodes[133] = RGFW_superL;
3770 _RGFW->keycodes[105] = RGFW_controlR;
3771 _RGFW->keycodes[134] = RGFW_superR;
3772 _RGFW->keycodes[62] = RGFW_shiftR;
3773 _RGFW->keycodes[108] = RGFW_altR;
3774 _RGFW->keycodes[67] = RGFW_F1;
3775 _RGFW->keycodes[68] = RGFW_F2;
3776 _RGFW->keycodes[69] = RGFW_F3;
3777 _RGFW->keycodes[70] = RGFW_F4;
3778 _RGFW->keycodes[71] = RGFW_F5;
3779 _RGFW->keycodes[72] = RGFW_F6;
3780 _RGFW->keycodes[73] = RGFW_F7;
3781 _RGFW->keycodes[74] = RGFW_F8;
3782 _RGFW->keycodes[75] = RGFW_F9;
3783 _RGFW->keycodes[76] = RGFW_F10;
3784 _RGFW->keycodes[95] = RGFW_F11;
3785 _RGFW->keycodes[96] = RGFW_F12;
3786 _RGFW->keycodes[111] = RGFW_up;
3787 _RGFW->keycodes[116] = RGFW_down;
3788 _RGFW->keycodes[113] = RGFW_left;
3789 _RGFW->keycodes[114] = RGFW_right;
3790 _RGFW->keycodes[118] = RGFW_insert;
3791 _RGFW->keycodes[115] = RGFW_end;
3792 _RGFW->keycodes[112] = RGFW_pageUp;
3793 _RGFW->keycodes[117] = RGFW_pageDown;
3794 _RGFW->keycodes[9] = RGFW_escape;
3795 _RGFW->keycodes[110] = RGFW_home;
3796 _RGFW->keycodes[78] = RGFW_scrollLock;
3797 _RGFW->keycodes[107] = RGFW_printScreen;
3798 _RGFW->keycodes[128] = RGFW_pause;
3799 _RGFW->keycodes[191] = RGFW_F13;
3800 _RGFW->keycodes[192] = RGFW_F14;
3801 _RGFW->keycodes[193] = RGFW_F15;
3802 _RGFW->keycodes[194] = RGFW_F16;
3803 _RGFW->keycodes[195] = RGFW_F17;
3804 _RGFW->keycodes[196] = RGFW_F18;
3805 _RGFW->keycodes[197] = RGFW_F19;
3806 _RGFW->keycodes[198] = RGFW_F20;
3807 _RGFW->keycodes[199] = RGFW_F21;
3808 _RGFW->keycodes[200] = RGFW_F22;
3809 _RGFW->keycodes[201] = RGFW_F23;
3810 _RGFW->keycodes[202] = RGFW_F24;
3811 _RGFW->keycodes[203] = RGFW_F25;
3812 _RGFW->keycodes[142] = RGFW_kpEqual;
3813 _RGFW->keycodes[161] = RGFW_world1; /* non-US key #1 */
3814 _RGFW->keycodes[162] = RGFW_world2; /* non-US key #2 */
3815}
3816
3817i32 RGFW_initPlatform(void) {
3818#ifdef RGFW_WAYLAND
3819 i32 ret = RGFW_initPlatform_Wayland();
3820 if (ret == 0) {
3821 RGFW_load_Wayland();
3822 return 0;
3823 } else {
3824 #ifdef RGFW_X11
3825 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeWarning, RGFW_warningWayland, "Falling back to X11");
3826 RGFW_useWayland(0);
3827 #else
3828 return ret;
3829 #endif
3830 }
3831#endif
3832#ifdef RGFW_X11
3833 RGFW_load_X11();
3834 return RGFW_initPlatform_X11();
3835#endif
3836 return 0;
3837}
3838
3839
3840void RGFW_deinitPlatform(void) {
3841#ifndef RGFW_NO_LINUX
3842 if (_RGFW->eventWait_forceStop[0] || _RGFW->eventWait_forceStop[1]){
3843 close(_RGFW->eventWait_forceStop[0]);
3844 close(_RGFW->eventWait_forceStop[1]);
3845 }
3846#endif
3847#ifdef RGFW_WAYLAND
3848 if (_RGFW->useWaylandBool) {
3849 RGFW_deinitPlatform_Wayland();
3850 return;
3851 }
3852#endif
3853#ifdef RGFW_X11
3854 RGFW_deinitPlatform_X11();
3855#endif
3856}
3857
3858#endif /* end of wayland or X11 defines */
3859
3860
3861/*
3862
3863
3864Start of Linux / Unix defines
3865
3866
3867*/
3868
3869#ifdef RGFW_X11
3870#ifdef RGFW_WAYLAND
3871#define RGFW_FUNC(func) func##_X11
3872#else
3873#define RGFW_FUNC(func) func
3874#endif
3875

3877#include <unistd.h>
3878
3879#include <limits.h> /* for data limits (mainly used in drag and drop functions) */
3880#include <poll.h>
3881
3882void RGFW_setXInstName(const char* name) { _RGFW->instName = name; }
3883#if !defined(RGFW_NO_X11_CURSOR) && defined(RGFW_X11)
3884 #include <X11/Xcursor/Xcursor.h>
3885#endif

3907 #define GLenum unsigned int

3958 PFN_XSyncIntToValue XSyncIntToValueSRC = NULL;
3959 #define XSyncIntToValue XSyncIntToValueSRC
3960
3961 typedef Status (* PFN_XSyncSetCounter)(Display*, XSyncCounter, XSyncValue);
3962 PFN_XSyncSetCounter XSyncSetCounterSRC = NULL;

3966 PFN_XSyncCreateCounter XSyncCreateCounterSRC = NULL;

3971 #define XShapeCombineMask XShapeCombineMaskSRC

3974 PFN_XShapeCombineRegion XShapeCombineRegionSRC;
3975 #define XShapeCombineRegion XShapeCombineRegionSRC
3976 void* X11XEXThandle = NULL;
3977#endif

3981 PFN_XcursorImageCreate XcursorImageCreateSRC = NULL;
3982 PFN_XcursorImageDestroy XcursorImageDestroySRC = NULL;

3986 #define XcursorImageDestroy XcursorImageDestroySRC
3987
3988 void* X11Cursorhandle = NULL;
3989#endif
3990
3991void* RGFW_getDisplay_X11(void) { return _RGFW->display; }
3992u64 RGFW_window_getWindow_X11(RGFW_window* win) { return (u64)win->src.window; }
3993
3994RGFWDEF RGFW_format RGFW_XImage_getFormat(XImage* image);
3995RGFW_format RGFW_XImage_getFormat(XImage* image) {
3996 switch (image->bits_per_pixel) {
3997 case 24:
3998 if (image->red_mask == 0xFF0000 && image->green_mask == 0x00FF00 && image->blue_mask == 0x0000FF)
3999 return RGFW_formatRGB8;
4000 if (image->red_mask == 0x0000FF && image->green_mask == 0x00FF00 && image->blue_mask == 0xFF0000)
4001 return RGFW_formatBGR8;
4002 break;
4003 case 32:
4004 if (image->red_mask == 0x00FF0000 && image->green_mask == 0x0000FF00 && image->blue_mask == 0x000000FF)
4005 return RGFW_formatBGRA8;
4006 if (image->red_mask == 0x000000FF && image->green_mask == 0x0000FF00 && image->blue_mask == 0x00FF0000)
4007 return RGFW_formatRGBA8;
4008 if (image->red_mask == 0x0000FF00 && image->green_mask == 0x00FF0000 && image->blue_mask == 0xFF000000)
4009 return RGFW_formatABGR8;
4010 if (image->red_mask == 0x00FF0000 && image->green_mask == 0x0000FF00 && image->blue_mask == 0x000000FF)
4011 return RGFW_formatARGB8; /* ambiguous without alpha */
4012 break;
4013 }
4014 return RGFW_formatARGB8;
4015}
4016
4017RGFW_bool RGFW_window_createSurfacePtr(RGFW_window* win, u8* data, i32 w, i32 h, RGFW_format format, RGFW_surface* surface) {
4018 RGFW_ASSERT(surface != NULL);
4019 surface->data = data;
4020 surface->w = w;
4021 surface->h = h;
4022 surface->format = format;
4023
4024 XWindowAttributes attrs;
4025 if (XGetWindowAttributes(_RGFW->display, win->src.window, &attrs) == 0) {
4026 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeError, RGFW_errBuffer, "Failed to get window attributes.");
4027 return RGFW_FALSE;
4028 }
4029
4030 surface->native.bitmap = XCreateImage(_RGFW->display, attrs.visual, (u32)attrs.depth,
4031 ZPixmap, 0, NULL, (u32)surface->w, (u32)surface->h, 32, 0);
4032
4033 surface->native.format = RGFW_XImage_getFormat(surface->native.bitmap);
4034
4035 if (surface->native.bitmap == NULL) {
4036 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeError, RGFW_errBuffer, "Failed to create XImage.");
4037 return RGFW_FALSE;
4038 }
4039
4040 surface->native.format = RGFW_formatBGRA8;
4041 return RGFW_TRUE;
4042}
4043
4044RGFW_bool RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_createSurfacePtr) (u8* data, i32 w, i32 h, RGFW_format format, RGFW_surface* surface) {
4045 return RGFW_window_createSurfacePtr(_RGFW->root, data, w, h, format, surface);
4046}
4047
4048void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_blitSurface) (RGFW_window* win, RGFW_surface* surface) {
4049 RGFW_ASSERT(surface != NULL);
4050 surface->native.bitmap->data = (char*) surface->data;
4051 RGFW_copyImageData((u8*)surface->native.bitmap->data, surface->w, RGFW_MIN(win->h, surface->h), surface->native.format, surface->data, surface->format);
4052
4053 XPutImage(_RGFW->display, win->src.window, win->src.gc, surface->native.bitmap, 0, 0, 0, 0, (u32)RGFW_MIN(win->w, surface->w), (u32)RGFW_MIN(win->h, surface->h));
4054 surface->native.bitmap->data = NULL;
4055 return;
4056}
4057
4058void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_surface_freePtr) (RGFW_surface* surface) {
4059 RGFW_ASSERT(surface != NULL);
4060 XDestroyImage(surface->native.bitmap);
4061 return;
4062}
4063
4064#define RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(name) \
4065 static Atom name = 0; \
4066 if (name == 0) name = XInternAtom(_RGFW->display, #name, False);
4067
4068void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_setBorder) (RGFW_window* win, RGFW_bool border) {
4069 RGFW_setBit(&win->internal.flags, RGFW_windowNoBorder, !border);
4070 RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(_MOTIF_WM_HINTS);
4071
4072 struct __x11WindowHints {
4073 unsigned long flags, functions, decorations, status;
4074 long input_mode;
4075 } hints;
4076 hints.flags = 2;
4077 hints.decorations = border;
4078
4079 XChangeProperty(_RGFW->display, win->src.window, _MOTIF_WM_HINTS, _MOTIF_WM_HINTS, 32, PropModeReplace, (u8*)&hints, 5);
4080
4081 if (RGFW_window_isHidden(win) == 0) {
4082 RGFW_window_hide(win);
4083 RGFW_window_show(win);
4084 }
4085}
4086
4087void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_releaseCursor) (RGFW_window* win) {
4088 RGFW_UNUSED(win);
4089 XUngrabPointer(_RGFW->display, CurrentTime);
4090
4091 /* disable raw input */
4092 unsigned char mask[] = { 0 };
4093 XIEventMask em;
4094 em.deviceid = XIAllMasterDevices;
4095 em.mask_len = sizeof(mask);
4096 em.mask = mask;
4097
4098 XISelectEvents(_RGFW->display, XDefaultRootWindow(_RGFW->display), &em, 1);
4099}
4100
4101void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_captureCursor) (RGFW_window* win) {
4102 /* enable raw input */
4103 unsigned char mask[XIMaskLen(XI_RawMotion)] = { 0 };
4104 XISetMask(mask, XI_RawMotion);
4105
4106 XIEventMask em;
4107 em.deviceid = XIAllMasterDevices;
4108 em.mask_len = sizeof(mask);
4109 em.mask = mask;
4110
4111 XISelectEvents(_RGFW->display, XDefaultRootWindow(_RGFW->display), &em, 1);
4112
4113 XGrabPointer(_RGFW->display, win->src.window, True, PointerMotionMask, GrabModeAsync, GrabModeAsync, None, None, CurrentTime);
4114 RGFW_window_moveMouse(win, win->x + (i32)(win->w / 2), win->y + (i32)(win->h / 2));
4115}
4116
4117#define RGFW_LOAD_LIBRARY(x, lib) if (x == NULL) x = dlopen(lib, RTLD_LAZY | RTLD_LOCAL)
4118#define RGFW_PROC_DEF(proc, name) if (name##SRC == NULL && proc != NULL) { \
4119 void* ptr = dlsym(proc, #name); \
4120 if (ptr != NULL) RGFW_MEMCPY(&name##SRC, &ptr, sizeof(PFN_##name)); \
4121}
4122
4123RGFWDEF void RGFW_window_getVisual(XVisualInfo* visual, RGFW_bool transparent);
4124void RGFW_window_getVisual(XVisualInfo* visual, RGFW_bool transparent) {
4125 visual->visual = DefaultVisual(_RGFW->display, DefaultScreen(_RGFW->display));
4126 visual->depth = DefaultDepth(_RGFW->display, DefaultScreen(_RGFW->display));
4127 if (transparent) {
4128 XMatchVisualInfo(_RGFW->display, DefaultScreen(_RGFW->display), 32, TrueColor, visual);
4129 if (visual->depth != 32)
4130 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeWarning, RGFW_warningOpenGL, "Failed to load a 32-bit depth.");
4131 }
4132}
4133
4134RGFWDEF int RGFW_XErrorHandler(Display* display, XErrorEvent* ev);
4135int RGFW_XErrorHandler(Display* display, XErrorEvent* ev) {
4136 char errorText[512];
4137 XGetErrorText(display, ev->error_code, errorText, sizeof(errorText));
4138
4139 char buf[1024];
4140 RGFW_SNPRINTF(buf, sizeof(buf), "[X Error] %s\n Error code: %d\n Request code: %d\n Minor code: %d\n Serial: %lu\n",
4141 errorText,
4142 ev->error_code, ev->request_code, ev->minor_code, ev->serial);
4143
4144 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeError, RGFW_errX11, buf);
4145 _RGFW->x11Error = ev;
4146 return 0;
4147}
4148
4149void RGFW_XCreateWindow (XVisualInfo visual, const char* name, RGFW_windowFlags flags, RGFW_window* win) {
4150 i64 event_mask = KeyPressMask | KeyReleaseMask | ButtonPressMask | ButtonReleaseMask | PointerMotionMask | StructureNotifyMask | FocusChangeMask | LeaveWindowMask | EnterWindowMask | ExposureMask;
4152 /* make X window attrubutes */
4153 XSetWindowAttributes swa;
4154 RGFW_MEMSET(&swa, 0, sizeof(swa));
4155
4156 Colormap cmap;
4157 swa.colormap = cmap = XCreateColormap(_RGFW->display,
4158 DefaultRootWindow(_RGFW->display),
4159 visual.visual, AllocNone);
4160 swa.event_mask = event_mask;
4161
4162 /* create the window */
4163 win->src.window = XCreateWindow(_RGFW->display, DefaultRootWindow(_RGFW->display), win->x, win->y, (u32)win->w, (u32)win->h,
4164 0, visual.depth, InputOutput, visual.visual,
4165 CWColormap | CWBorderPixel | CWEventMask, &swa);
4166
4167 XFreeColors(_RGFW->display, cmap, NULL, 0, 0);
4168
4169 XSaveContext(_RGFW->display, win->src.window, _RGFW->context, (XPointer)win);
4170
4171 win->src.gc = XCreateGC(_RGFW->display, win->src.window, 0, NULL);
4172
4173 /* In your .desktop app, if you set the property
4174 StartupWMClass=RGFW that will assoicate the launcher icon
4175 with your application - robrohan */
4176 if (_RGFW->className == NULL)
4177 _RGFW->className = (char*)name;
4178
4179 XClassHint hint;
4180 hint.res_class = (char*)_RGFW->className;
4181 if (_RGFW->instName == NULL) hint.res_name = (char*)name;
4182 else hint.res_name = (char*)_RGFW->instName;
4183 XSetClassHint(_RGFW->display, win->src.window, &hint);
4184
4185 #ifndef RGFW_NO_MONITOR
4186 if (flags & RGFW_windowScaleToMonitor)
4187 RGFW_window_scaleToMonitor(win);
4188 #endif
4189 XSelectInput(_RGFW->display, (Drawable) win->src.window, event_mask);
4191 /* make it so the user can't close the window until the program does */
4192 RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(WM_DELETE_WINDOW);
4193 XSetWMProtocols(_RGFW->display, (Drawable) win->src.window, &WM_DELETE_WINDOW, 1);
4194 /* set the background */
4195 RGFW_window_setName(win, name);
4196
4197 XMoveWindow(_RGFW->display, (Drawable) win->src.window, win->x, win->y);
4199 if (flags & RGFW_windowAllowDND) { /* init drag and drop atoms and turn on drag and drop for this window */
4200 win->internal.flags |= RGFW_windowAllowDND;
4201
4202 /* actions */
4203 Atom XdndAware = XInternAtom(_RGFW->display, "XdndAware", False);
4204 const u8 version = 5;
4205
4206 XChangeProperty(_RGFW->display, win->src.window,
4207 XdndAware, 4, 32,
4208 PropModeReplace, &version, 1);
4209 }
4210
4211#ifdef RGFW_ADVANCED_SMOOTH_RESIZE
4212 RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(_NET_WM_SYNC_REQUEST_COUNTER)
4213 RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(_NET_WM_SYNC_REQUEST)
4214
4215 Atom protcols[2] = {_NET_WM_SYNC_REQUEST, WM_DELETE_WINDOW};
4216 XSetWMProtocols(_RGFW->display, win->src.window, protcols, 2);
4217
4218 XSyncValue initial_value;
4219 XSyncIntToValue(&initial_value, 0);
4220 win->src.counter = XSyncCreateCounter(_RGFW->display, initial_value);
4221
4222 XChangeProperty(_RGFW->display, win->src.window, _NET_WM_SYNC_REQUEST_COUNTER, XA_CARDINAL, 32, PropModeReplace, (uint8_t*)&win->src.counter, 1);
4223#endif
4224
4225 win->src.x = win->x;
4226 win->src.y = win->y;
4227 win->src.w = win->w;
4228 win->src.h = win->h;
4229
4230 XSetWindowBackground(_RGFW->display, win->src.window, 0);
4231 XClearWindow(_RGFW->display, win->src.window);
4232}
4233
4234RGFW_window* RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_createWindowPlatform) (const char* name, RGFW_windowFlags flags, RGFW_window* win) {
4235 if ((flags & RGFW_windowOpenGL) || (flags & RGFW_windowEGL)) {
4236 win->src.window = 0;
4237 return win;
4238 }
4239
4240 XVisualInfo visual;
4241 RGFW_window_getVisual(&visual, RGFW_BOOL(win->internal.flags & RGFW_windowTransparent));
4242 RGFW_XCreateWindow(visual, name, flags, win);
4243 return win; /*return newly created window */
4244}
4245
4246RGFW_bool RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_getGlobalMouse) (i32* fX, i32* fY) {
4247 RGFW_init();
4248 i32 x, y;
4249 u32 z;
4250 Window window1, window2;
4251 XQueryPointer(_RGFW->display, XDefaultRootWindow(_RGFW->display), &window1, &window2, fX, fY, &x, &y, &z);
4252 return RGFW_TRUE;
4253}
4254
4255RGFWDEF void RGFW_XHandleClipboardSelection(XEvent* event);
4256void RGFW_XHandleClipboardSelection(XEvent* event) { RGFW_UNUSED(event);
4257 RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(ATOM_PAIR);
4258 RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(MULTIPLE);
4259 RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(TARGETS);
4260 RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(SAVE_TARGETS);
4261 RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(UTF8_STRING);
4262
4263 const XSelectionRequestEvent* request = &event->xselectionrequest;
4264 const Atom formats[] = { UTF8_STRING, XA_STRING };
4265 const int formatCount = sizeof(formats) / sizeof(formats[0]);
4266
4267 if (request->target == TARGETS) {
4268 const Atom targets[] = { TARGETS, MULTIPLE, UTF8_STRING, XA_STRING };
4269
4270 XChangeProperty(_RGFW->display, request->requestor, request->property,
4271 XA_ATOM, 32, PropModeReplace, (u8*) targets, sizeof(targets) / sizeof(Atom));
4272 } else if (request->target == MULTIPLE) {
4273 Atom* targets = NULL;
4274
4275 Atom actualType = 0;
4276 int actualFormat = 0;
4277 unsigned long count = 0, bytesAfter = 0;
4278
4279 XGetWindowProperty(_RGFW->display, request->requestor, request->property, 0, LONG_MAX,
4280 False, ATOM_PAIR, &actualType, &actualFormat, &count, &bytesAfter, (u8**) &targets);
4281
4282 unsigned long i;
4283 for (i = 0; i < (u32)count; i += 2) {
4284 if (targets[i] == UTF8_STRING || targets[i] == XA_STRING)
4285 XChangeProperty(_RGFW->display, request->requestor, targets[i + 1], targets[i],
4286 8, PropModeReplace, (const unsigned char *)_RGFW->clipboard, (i32)_RGFW->clipboard_len);
4287 else
4288 targets[i + 1] = None;
4289 }
4290
4291 XChangeProperty(_RGFW->display,
4292 request->requestor, request->property, ATOM_PAIR, 32,
4293 PropModeReplace, (u8*) targets, (i32)count);
4294
4295 XFlush(_RGFW->display);
4296 XFree(targets);
4297 } else if (request->target == SAVE_TARGETS)
4298 XChangeProperty(_RGFW->display, request->requestor, request->property, 0, 32, PropModeReplace, NULL, 0);
4299 else {
4300 int i;
4301 for (i = 0; i < formatCount; i++) {
4302 if (request->target != formats[i])
4303 continue;
4304 XChangeProperty(_RGFW->display, request->requestor, request->property, request->target,
4305 8, PropModeReplace, (u8*) _RGFW->clipboard, (i32)_RGFW->clipboard_len);
4306 }
4307 }
4308
4309 XEvent reply = { SelectionNotify };
4310 reply.xselection.property = request->property;
4311 reply.xselection.display = request->display;
4312 reply.xselection.requestor = request->requestor;
4313 reply.xselection.selection = request->selection;
4314 reply.xselection.target = request->target;
4315 reply.xselection.time = request->time;
4316
4317 XSendEvent(_RGFW->display, request->requestor, False, 0, &reply);
4318 XFlush(_RGFW->display);
4319}
4320
4321i32 RGFW_XHandleClipboardSelectionHelper(void);
4322
4323u8 RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_rgfwToKeyChar) (u32 key) {
4324 u32 keycode = RGFW_rgfwToApiKey(key);
4325
4326 Window root = DefaultRootWindow(_RGFW->display);
4327 Window ret_root, ret_child;
4328 int root_x, root_y, win_x, win_y;
4329 unsigned int mask;
4330 XQueryPointer(_RGFW->display, root, &ret_root, &ret_child, &root_x, &root_y, &win_x, &win_y, &mask);
4331 KeySym sym = (KeySym)XkbKeycodeToKeysym(_RGFW->display, (KeyCode)keycode, 0, (KeyCode)mask & ShiftMask ? 1 : 0);
4332
4333 if ((mask & LockMask) && sym >= XK_a && sym <= XK_z)
4334 sym = (mask & ShiftMask) ? sym + 32 : sym - 32;
4335 if ((u8)sym != (u32)sym)
4336 sym = 0;
4337
4338 return (u8)sym;
4339}
4340
4341RGFWDEF void RGFW_XHandleEvent(void);
4342void RGFW_XHandleEvent(void) {
4343 RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(XdndTypeList);
4344 RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(XdndSelection);
4345 RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(XdndEnter);
4346 RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(XdndPosition);
4347 RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(XdndStatus);
4348 RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(XdndLeave);
4349 RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(XdndDrop);
4350 RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(XdndFinished);
4351 RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(XdndActionCopy);
4352 RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(_NET_WM_SYNC_REQUEST);
4353 RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(WM_PROTOCOLS);
4354
4355 /* xdnd data */
4356 static Window source = 0;
4357 static long version = 0;
4358 static i32 format = 0;
4359
4360 XEvent reply = { ClientMessage };
4361 XEvent E;
4362 RGFW_event event;
4363 RGFW_MEMSET(&event, 0, sizeof(event));
4364
4365 XNextEvent(_RGFW->display, &E);
4366 switch (E.type) {
4367 case SelectionRequest:
4368 RGFW_XHandleClipboardSelection(&E);
4369 return;
4370 case GenericEvent: {
4371 RGFW_window* win = _RGFW->mouseOwner;
4372 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_BIT(RGFW_mousePosChanged))) return;
4373 if (win == NULL) return;
4374
4375 /* MotionNotify is used for mouse events if the mouse isn't held */
4376 if (!(win->internal.holdMouse)) {
4377 XFreeEventData(_RGFW->display, &E.xcookie);
4378 return;
4379 }
4380
4381 XGetEventData(_RGFW->display, &E.xcookie);
4382 if (E.xcookie.evtype == XI_RawMotion) {
4383 XIRawEvent *raw = (XIRawEvent *)E.xcookie.data;
4384 if (raw->valuators.mask_len == 0) {
4385 XFreeEventData(_RGFW->display, &E.xcookie);
4386 return;
4387 }
4388
4389 double deltaX = 0.0f;
4390 double deltaY = 0.0f;
4391
4392 /* check if relative motion data exists where we think it does */
4393 if (XIMaskIsSet(raw->valuators.mask, 0) != 0)
4394 deltaX += raw->raw_values[0];
4395 if (XIMaskIsSet(raw->valuators.mask, 1) != 0)
4396 deltaY += raw->raw_values[1];
4397
4398 event.mouse.vecX = (float)deltaX;
4399 event.mouse.vecY = (float)deltaY;
4400 _RGFW->vectorX = (float)event.mouse.vecX;
4401 _RGFW->vectorY = (float)event.mouse.vecY;
4402 event.mouse.x = win->internal.lastMouseX + (i32)event.mouse.vecX;
4403 event.mouse.y = win->internal.lastMouseY + (i32)event.mouse.vecY;
4404 win->internal.lastMouseX = event.mouse.x;
4405 win->internal.lastMouseY = event.mouse.y;
4406 RGFW_window_moveMouse(win, win->x + (win->w / 2), win->y + (win->h / 2));
4407
4408 event.type = RGFW_mousePosChanged;
4409 RGFW_mousePosCallback(win, event.mouse.x, event.mouse.y, (float)event.mouse.vecX, (float)event.mouse.vecY);
4410 }
4411
4412 XFreeEventData(_RGFW->display, &E.xcookie);
4413 if (event.type)
4414 RGFW_eventQueuePush(&event);
4415 return;
4416 }
4417 }
4418
4419 RGFW_window* win = NULL;
4420 if (XFindContext(_RGFW->display, E.xany.window, _RGFW->context, (XPointer*) &win) != 0) {
4421 return;
4422 }
4423
4424 event.common.win = win;
4425
4426 switch (E.type) {
4427 case KeyPress: {
4428 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_keyPressedFlag)) return;
4429 event.type = RGFW_keyPressed;
4430 event.key.value = (u8)RGFW_apiKeyToRGFW(E.xkey.keycode);
4431 event.key.sym = (u8)RGFW_rgfwToKeyChar(event.key.value);
4432
4433 _RGFW->keyboard[event.key.value].prev = _RGFW->keyboard[event.key.value].current;
4434 _RGFW->keyboard[event.key.value].current = RGFW_TRUE;
4435
4436 XkbStateRec state;
4437 XkbGetState(_RGFW->display, XkbUseCoreKbd, &state);
4438 RGFW_updateKeyMods(win, (state.locked_mods & LockMask), (state.locked_mods & Mod2Mask), (state.locked_mods & Mod3Mask));
4439
4440 RGFW_keyCallback(win, event.key.value, event.key.sym, win->internal.mod, event.key.repeat, RGFW_TRUE);
4441 break;
4442 }
4443 case KeyRelease: {
4444 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_keyReleasedFlag)) return;
4445 /* check if it's a real key release */
4446 if (XEventsQueued(_RGFW->display, QueuedAfterReading)) { /* get next event if there is one */
4447 XEvent NE;
4448 XPeekEvent(_RGFW->display, &NE);
4449
4450 if (E.xkey.time == NE.xkey.time && E.xkey.keycode == NE.xkey.keycode) { /* check if the current and next are both the same */
4451 event.key.repeat = RGFW_TRUE;
4452 return;
4453 }
4454 }
4455
4456 event.type = RGFW_keyReleased;
4457 event.key.value = (u8)RGFW_apiKeyToRGFW(E.xkey.keycode);
4458 event.key.sym = (u8)RGFW_rgfwToKeyChar(event.key.value);
4459
4460 /* get keystate data */
4461 _RGFW->keyboard[event.key.value].prev = _RGFW->keyboard[event.key.value].current;
4462 _RGFW->keyboard[event.key.value].current = RGFW_FALSE;
4463
4464 XkbStateRec state;
4465 XkbGetState(_RGFW->display, XkbUseCoreKbd, &state);
4466 RGFW_updateKeyMods(win, (state.locked_mods & LockMask), (state.locked_mods & Mod2Mask), (state.locked_mods & Mod3Mask));
4467
4468 RGFW_keyCallback(win, event.key.value, event.key.sym, win->internal.mod, event.key.repeat, RGFW_FALSE);
4469 break;
4470 }
4471 case ButtonPress:
4472 if (E.xbutton.button >= Button4 && E.xbutton.button <= 7) {
4473 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_mouseScrollFlag)) return;
4474 event.type = RGFW_mouseScroll;
4475 } else {
4476 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_mouseButtonPressedFlag) || E.xbutton.button > RGFW_mouseFinal) return;
4477 event.type = RGFW_mouseButtonPressed;
4478 }
4479
4480 switch(E.xbutton.button) {
4481 case Button1: event.button.value = RGFW_mouseLeft; break;
4482 case Button2: event.button.value = RGFW_mouseMiddle; break;
4483 case Button3: event.button.value = RGFW_mouseRight; break;
4484 case Button4: event.scroll.y = 1.0; break;
4485 case Button5: event.scroll.y = -1.0; break;
4486 case 6: event.scroll.x = 1.0f; break;
4487 case 7: event.scroll.x = -1.0f; break;
4488 default:
4489 event.button.value = (u8)E.xbutton.button - Button1 - 4;
4490 break;
4491 }
4492
4493 if (event.type == RGFW_mouseScroll) {
4494 _RGFW->scrollX = event.scroll.x;
4495 _RGFW->scrollY = event.scroll.y;
4496 RGFW_mouseScrollCallback(win, event.scroll.x, event.scroll.y);
4497 break;
4498 }
4499
4500 _RGFW->mouseButtons[event.button.value].prev = _RGFW->mouseButtons[event.button.value].current;
4501 _RGFW->mouseButtons[event.button.value].current = RGFW_TRUE;
4502 RGFW_mouseButtonCallback(win, event.button.value, RGFW_TRUE);
4503 break;
4504 case ButtonRelease:
4505 if (E.xbutton.button >= Button4 && E.xbutton.button <= 7) break;
4506 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_mouseButtonReleasedFlag) || E.xbutton.button > RGFW_mouseFinal) return;
4507 event.type = RGFW_mouseButtonReleased;
4508 switch(E.xbutton.button) {
4509 case Button1: event.button.value = RGFW_mouseLeft; break;
4510 case Button2: event.button.value = RGFW_mouseMiddle; break;
4511 case Button3: event.button.value = RGFW_mouseRight; break;
4512 default:
4513 event.button.value = (u8)E.xbutton.button - Button1 - 4;
4514 break;
4515 }
4516
4517 _RGFW->mouseButtons[event.button.value].prev = _RGFW->mouseButtons[event.button.value].current;
4518 _RGFW->mouseButtons[event.button.value].current = RGFW_FALSE;
4519 RGFW_mouseButtonCallback(win, event.button.value, RGFW_FALSE);
4520 break;
4521 case MotionNotify:
4522 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_mousePosChangedFlag)) return;
4523 event.mouse.x = E.xmotion.x;
4524 event.mouse.y = E.xmotion.y;
4525
4526 event.mouse.vecX = (float)(event.mouse.x - win->internal.lastMouseX);
4527 event.mouse.vecY = (float)(event.mouse.y - win->internal.lastMouseY);
4528 _RGFW->vectorX = event.mouse.vecX;
4529 _RGFW->vectorY = event.mouse.vecY;
4530 win->internal.lastMouseX = event.mouse.x;
4531 win->internal.lastMouseY = event.mouse.y;
4532 event.type = RGFW_mousePosChanged;
4533 RGFW_mousePosCallback(win, event.mouse.x, event.mouse.y, (float)event.mouse.vecX, (float)event.mouse.vecY);
4534 break;
4535
4536 case Expose: {
4537 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_windowRefreshFlag)) return;
4538 event.type = RGFW_windowRefresh;
4539 RGFW_windowRefreshCallback(win);
4540
4541#ifdef RGFW_ADVANCED_SMOOTH_RESIZE
4542 XSyncValue value;
4543 XSyncIntToValue(&value, (i32)win->src.counter_value);
4544 XSyncSetCounter(_RGFW->display, win->src.counter, value);
4545#endif
4546 break;
4547 }
4548 case MapNotify: case UnmapNotify: RGFW_window_checkMode(win); break;
4549 case ClientMessage: {
4550 RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(WM_DELETE_WINDOW);
4551 /* if the client closed the window */
4552 if (E.xclient.data.l[0] == (long)WM_DELETE_WINDOW) {
4553 event.type = RGFW_quit;
4554 RGFW_window_setShouldClose(win, RGFW_TRUE);
4555 RGFW_windowQuitCallback(win);
4556 break;
4557 }
4558#ifdef RGFW_ADVANCED_SMOOTH_RESIZE
4559 if (E.xclient.message_type == WM_PROTOCOLS && (Atom)E.xclient.data.l[0] == _NET_WM_SYNC_REQUEST) {
4560 RGFW_windowRefreshCallback(win);
4561 win->src.counter_value = 0;
4562 win->src.counter_value |= E.xclient.data.l[2];
4563 win->src.counter_value |= (E.xclient.data.l[3] << 32);
4564
4565 XSyncValue value;
4566 XSyncIntToValue(&value, (i32)win->src.counter_value);
4567 XSyncSetCounter(_RGFW->display, win->src.counter, value);
4568 break;
4569 }
4570#endif
4571 if ((win->internal.flags & RGFW_windowAllowDND) == 0)
4572 return;
4573
4574 reply.xclient.window = source;
4575 reply.xclient.format = 32;
4576 reply.xclient.data.l[0] = (long)win->src.window;
4577 reply.xclient.data.l[1] = 0;
4578 reply.xclient.data.l[2] = None;
4579
4580 if (E.xclient.message_type == XdndEnter) {
4581 if (version > 5)
4582 break;
4583
4584 unsigned long count;
4585 Atom* formats;
4586 Atom real_formats[6];
4587 Bool list = E.xclient.data.l[1] & 1;
4588
4589 source = (unsigned long int)E.xclient.data.l[0];
4590 version = E.xclient.data.l[1] >> 24;
4591 format = None;
4592 if (list) {
4593 Atom actualType;
4594 i32 actualFormat;
4595 unsigned long bytesAfter;
4596
4597 XGetWindowProperty(
4598 _RGFW->display, source, XdndTypeList,
4599 0, LONG_MAX, False, 4,
4600 &actualType, &actualFormat, &count, &bytesAfter, (u8**)&formats
4601 );
4602 } else {
4603 count = 0;
4604
4605 size_t i;
4606 for (i = 2; i < 5; i++) {
4607 if (E.xclient.data.l[i] != None) {
4608 real_formats[count] = (unsigned long int)E.xclient.data.l[i];
4609 count += 1;
4610 }
4611 }
4612
4613 formats = real_formats;
4614 }
4615
4616 Atom XtextPlain = XInternAtom(_RGFW->display, "text/plain", False);
4617 Atom XtextUriList = XInternAtom(_RGFW->display, "text/uri-list", False);
4618
4619 size_t i;
4620 for (i = 0; i < count; i++) {
4621 if (formats[i] == XtextUriList || formats[i] == XtextPlain) {
4622 format = (int)formats[i];
4623 break;
4624 }
4625 }
4626
4627 if (list) {
4628 XFree(formats);
4629 }
4630
4631 break;
4632 }
4633
4634 if (E.xclient.message_type == XdndPosition) {
4635 const i32 xabs = (E.xclient.data.l[2] >> 16) & 0xffff;
4636 const i32 yabs = (E.xclient.data.l[2]) & 0xffff;
4637 Window dummy;
4638 i32 xpos, ypos;
4639
4640 if (version > 5)
4641 break;
4642
4643 XTranslateCoordinates(
4644 _RGFW->display, XDefaultRootWindow(_RGFW->display), win->src.window,
4645 xabs, yabs, &xpos, &ypos, &dummy
4646 );
4647
4648 event.drag.x = xpos;
4649 event.drag.y = ypos;
4650
4651 reply.xclient.window = source;
4652 reply.xclient.message_type = XdndStatus;
4653
4654 if (format) {
4655 reply.xclient.data.l[1] = 1;
4656 if (version >= 2)
4657 reply.xclient.data.l[4] = (long)XdndActionCopy;
4658 }
4659
4660 XSendEvent(_RGFW->display, source, False, NoEventMask, &reply);
4661 XFlush(_RGFW->display);
4662 break;
4663 }
4664 if (E.xclient.message_type != XdndDrop)
4665 break;
4666
4667 if (version > 5)
4668 break;
4669
4670 event.type = RGFW_dataDrag;
4671
4672 if (format) {
4673 Time time = (version >= 1)
4674 ? (Time)E.xclient.data.l[2]
4675 : CurrentTime;
4676
4677 XConvertSelection(
4678 _RGFW->display, XdndSelection, (Atom)format,
4679 XdndSelection, win->src.window, time
4680 );
4681 } else if (version >= 2) {
4682 XEvent new_reply = { ClientMessage };
4683
4684 XSendEvent(_RGFW->display, source, False, NoEventMask, &new_reply);
4685 XFlush(_RGFW->display);
4686 }
4687
4688 _RGFW->windowState.win = win;
4689 _RGFW->windowState.dataDragging = RGFW_TRUE;
4690 _RGFW->windowState.dropX = event.drag.x;
4691 _RGFW->windowState.dropY = event.drag.y;
4692
4693 if (win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_dataDragFlag) return;
4694 RGFW_dataDragCallback(win, event.drag.x, event.drag.y);
4695 } break;
4696 case SelectionNotify: {
4697 /* this is only for checking for xdnd drops */
4698 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_dataDropFlag) || E.xselection.property != XdndSelection || !(win->internal.flags & RGFW_windowAllowDND))
4699 return;
4700 char* data;
4701 unsigned long result;
4702
4703 Atom actualType;
4704 i32 actualFormat;
4705 unsigned long bytesAfter;
4706
4707 XGetWindowProperty(_RGFW->display, E.xselection.requestor, E.xselection.property, 0, LONG_MAX, False, E.xselection.target, &actualType, &actualFormat, &result, &bytesAfter, (u8**) &data);
4708
4709 if (result == 0)
4710 break;
4711
4712 const char* prefix = (const char*)"file://";
4713
4714 char* line;
4715
4716 event.drop.files = _RGFW->files;
4717 event.drop.count = 0;
4718 event.type = RGFW_dataDrop;
4719
4720 while ((line = (char*)RGFW_strtok(data, "\r\n"))) {
4721 char path[RGFW_MAX_PATH];
4722
4723 data = NULL;
4724
4725 if (line[0] == '#')
4726 continue;
4727
4728 char* l;
4729 for (l = line; 1; l++) {
4730 if ((l - line) > 7)
4731 break;
4732 else if (*l != prefix[(l - line)])
4733 break;
4734 else if (*l == '\0' && prefix[(l - line)] == '\0') {
4735 line += 7;
4736 while (*line != '/')
4737 line++;
4738 break;
4739 } else if (*l == '\0')
4740 break;
4741 }
4742
4743 event.drop.count++;
4744
4745 size_t index = 0;
4746 while (*line) {
4747 if (line[0] == '%' && line[1] && line[2]) {
4748 const char digits[3] = { line[1], line[2], '\0' };
4749 path[index] = (char) RGFW_STRTOL(digits, NULL, 16);
4750 line += 2;
4751 } else
4752 path[index] = *line;
4753
4754 index++;
4755 line++;
4756 }
4757 path[index] = '\0';
4758 RGFW_MEMCPY(event.drop.files[event.drop.count - 1], path, index + 1);
4759 }
4760
4761 _RGFW->windowState.win = win;
4762 _RGFW->windowState.dataDrop = RGFW_TRUE;
4763 _RGFW->windowState.filesCount = event.drop.count;
4764
4765 RGFW_dataDropCallback(win, event.drop.files, event.drop.count);
4766 if (data)
4767 XFree(data);
4768
4769 if (version >= 2) {
4770 XEvent new_reply = { ClientMessage };
4771 new_reply.xclient.window = source;
4772 new_reply.xclient.message_type = XdndFinished;
4773 new_reply.xclient.format = 32;
4774 new_reply.xclient.data.l[1] = (long int)result;
4775 new_reply.xclient.data.l[2] = (long int)XdndActionCopy;
4776 XSendEvent(_RGFW->display, source, False, NoEventMask, &new_reply);
4777 XFlush(_RGFW->display);
4778 }
4779 break;
4780 }
4781 case FocusIn:
4782 if ((win->internal.flags & RGFW_windowFullscreen))
4783 XMapRaised(_RGFW->display, win->src.window);
4784 if ((win->internal.holdMouse)) RGFW_window_holdMouse(win);
4785
4786 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_focusInFlag)) return;
4787 win->internal.inFocus = RGFW_TRUE;
4788 event.type = RGFW_focusIn;
4789 RGFW_focusCallback(win, 1);
4790
4791 break;
4792 case FocusOut:
4793 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_focusOutFlag)) return;
4794 event.type = RGFW_focusOut;
