4795 RGFW_focusCallback(win, 0);
4796 RGFW_window_focusLost(win);
4797 break;
4798 case PropertyNotify: RGFW_window_checkMode(win); break;
4799 case EnterNotify: {
4800 win->internal.mouseInside = RGFW_TRUE;
4801 _RGFW->windowState.win = win;
4802 _RGFW->windowState.mouseEnter = RGFW_TRUE;
4803
4804 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_mouseEnterFlag)) return;
4805 event.type = RGFW_mouseEnter;
4806 event.mouse.x = E.xcrossing.x;
4807 event.mouse.y = E.xcrossing.y;
4808 RGFW_mouseNotifyCallback(win, event.mouse.x, event.mouse.y, 1);
4809 break;
4810 }
4811
4812 case LeaveNotify: {
4813 win->internal.mouseInside = RGFW_FALSE;
4814 _RGFW->windowState.winLeave = win;
4815 _RGFW->windowState.mouseLeave = RGFW_TRUE;
4816 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_mouseLeaveFlag)) return;
4817 event.type = RGFW_mouseLeave;
4818 RGFW_mouseNotifyCallback(win, event.mouse.x, event.mouse.y, 0);
4819 break;
4820 }
4821
4822 case ConfigureNotify: {
4823 /* detect resize */
4824 RGFW_window_checkMode(win);
4825 if (E.xconfigure.width != win->src.w || E.xconfigure.height != win->src.h) {
4826 win->src.w = win->w = E.xconfigure.width;
4827 win->src.h = win->h = E.xconfigure.height;
4828
4829 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_windowResizedFlag)) return;
4830 event.type = RGFW_windowResized;
4831 RGFW_windowResizedCallback(win, win->w, win->h);
4832 RGFW_eventQueuePush(&event);
4833 }
4834
4835 /* detect move */
4836 if (E.xconfigure.x != win->src.x || E.xconfigure.y != win->src.y) {
4837 win->src.x = win->x = E.xconfigure.x;
4838 win->src.y = win->y = E.xconfigure.y;
4839
4840 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_windowMovedFlag)) return;
4841 event.type = RGFW_windowMoved;
4842 RGFW_windowMovedCallback(win, win->x, win->y);
4843 RGFW_eventQueuePush(&event);
4844 }
4845 return;
4846 }
4847 default:
4848 break;
4849 }
4850
4851 if (event.type) {
4852 RGFW_eventQueuePush(&event);
4853 }
4854
4855 XFlush(_RGFW->display);
4856}
4857
4858void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_pollEvents) (void) {
4859 RGFW_resetPrevState();
4860
4861 XPending(_RGFW->display);
4862 /* if there is no unread queued events, get a new one */
4863 while ((QLength(_RGFW->display) || XEventsQueued(_RGFW->display, QueuedAlready) + XEventsQueued(_RGFW->display, QueuedAfterReading))) {
4864 RGFW_XHandleEvent();
4865 }
4866}
4867
4868void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_move) (RGFW_window* win, i32 x, i32 y) {
4869 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
4870 win->x = x;
4871 win->y = y;
4872
4873 XMoveWindow(_RGFW->display, win->src.window, x, y);
4874 return;
4875}
4876
4877
4878void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_resize) (RGFW_window* win, i32 w, i32 h) {
4879 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
4880 win->w = (i32)w;
4881 win->h = (i32)h;
4882
4883 if ((win->internal.flags & RGFW_windowNoResize)) {
4884 XSizeHints sh;
4885 sh.flags = (1L << 4) | (1L << 5);
4886 sh.min_width = sh.max_width = (i32)w;
4887 sh.min_height = sh.max_height = (i32)h;
4888
4889 XSetWMSizeHints(_RGFW->display, (Drawable) win->src.window, &sh, XA_WM_NORMAL_HINTS);
4890 }
4891 return;
4892}
4893
4894void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_setAspectRatio) (RGFW_window* win, i32 w, i32 h) {
4895 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
4896
4897
4898 if (w == 0 && h == 0)
4899 return;
4900 XSizeHints hints;
4901 long flags;
4902
4903 XGetWMNormalHints(_RGFW->display, win->src.window, &hints, &flags);
4904
4905 hints.flags |= PAspect;
4906
4907 hints.min_aspect.x = hints.max_aspect.x = (i32)w;
4908 hints.min_aspect.y = hints.max_aspect.y = (i32)h;
4909
4910 XSetWMNormalHints(_RGFW->display, win->src.window, &hints);
4911 return;
4912}
4913
4914void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_setMinSize) (RGFW_window* win, i32 w, i32 h) {
4915 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
4916
4917 long flags;
4918 XSizeHints hints;
4919 RGFW_MEMSET(&hints, 0, sizeof(XSizeHints));
4920
4921 XGetWMNormalHints(_RGFW->display, win->src.window, &hints, &flags);
4922
4923 hints.flags |= PMinSize;
4924
4925 hints.min_width = (i32)w;
4926 hints.min_height = (i32)h;
4927
4928 XSetWMNormalHints(_RGFW->display, win->src.window, &hints);
4929 return;
4930}
4931
4932void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_setMaxSize) (RGFW_window* win, i32 w, i32 h) {
4933 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
4934
4935 long flags;
4936 XSizeHints hints;
4937 RGFW_MEMSET(&hints, 0, sizeof(XSizeHints));
4938
4939 XGetWMNormalHints(_RGFW->display, win->src.window, &hints, &flags);
4940
4941 hints.flags |= PMaxSize;
4942
4943 hints.max_width = (i32)w;
4944 hints.max_height = (i32)h;
4945
4946 XSetWMNormalHints(_RGFW->display, win->src.window, &hints);
4947 return;
4948}
4949
4950void RGFW_toggleXMaximized(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_bool maximized);
4951void RGFW_toggleXMaximized(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_bool maximized) {
4952 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
4953 RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(_NET_WM_STATE);
4954 RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(_NET_WM_STATE_MAXIMIZED_VERT);
4955 RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(_NET_WM_STATE_MAXIMIZED_HORZ);
4956
4957 XEvent xev = {0};
4958 xev.type = ClientMessage;
4959 xev.xclient.window = win->src.window;
4960 xev.xclient.message_type = _NET_WM_STATE;
4961 xev.xclient.format = 32;
4962 xev.xclient.data.l[0] = maximized;
4963 xev.xclient.data.l[1] = (long int)_NET_WM_STATE_MAXIMIZED_HORZ;
4964 xev.xclient.data.l[2] = (long int)_NET_WM_STATE_MAXIMIZED_VERT;
4965 xev.xclient.data.l[3] = 0;
4966 xev.xclient.data.l[4] = 0;
4967
4968 XSendEvent(_RGFW->display, DefaultRootWindow(_RGFW->display), False, SubstructureRedirectMask | SubstructureNotifyMask, &xev);
4969}
4970
4971void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_maximize) (RGFW_window* win) {
4972 win->internal.oldX = win->x;
4973 win->internal.oldY = win->y;
4974 win->internal.oldW = win->w;
4975 win->internal.oldH = win->h;
4976
4977 RGFW_toggleXMaximized(win, 1);
4978 return;
4979}
4980
4981void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_focus) (RGFW_window* win) {
4982 RGFW_ASSERT(win);
4983
4984 XWindowAttributes attr;
4985 XGetWindowAttributes(_RGFW->display, win->src.window, &attr);
4986 if (attr.map_state != IsViewable) return;
4987
4988 XSetInputFocus(_RGFW->display, win->src.window, RevertToPointerRoot, CurrentTime);
4989 XFlush(_RGFW->display);
4990}
4991
4992void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_raise) (RGFW_window* win) {
4993 RGFW_ASSERT(win);
4994 XRaiseWindow(_RGFW->display, win->src.window);
4995 XMapRaised(_RGFW->display, win->src.window);
4996}
4997
4998void RGFW_window_setXAtom(RGFW_window* win, Atom netAtom, RGFW_bool fullscreen);
4999void RGFW_window_setXAtom(RGFW_window* win, Atom netAtom, RGFW_bool fullscreen) {
5000 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
5001 RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(_NET_WM_STATE);
5002
5003 XEvent xev = {0};
5004 xev.xclient.type = ClientMessage;
5005 xev.xclient.serial = 0;
5006 xev.xclient.send_event = True;
5007 xev.xclient.message_type = _NET_WM_STATE;
5008 xev.xclient.window = win->src.window;
5009 xev.xclient.format = 32;
5010 xev.xclient.data.l[0] = fullscreen;
5011 xev.xclient.data.l[1] = (long int)netAtom;
5012 xev.xclient.data.l[2] = 0;
5013
5014 XSendEvent(_RGFW->display, DefaultRootWindow(_RGFW->display), False, SubstructureNotifyMask | SubstructureRedirectMask, &xev);
5015}
5016
5017void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_setFullscreen)(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_bool fullscreen) {
5018 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
5019
5020 if (fullscreen) {
5021 win->internal.flags |= RGFW_windowFullscreen;
5022 win->internal.oldX = win->x;
5023 win->internal.oldY = win->y;
5024 win->internal.oldW = win->w;
5025 win->internal.oldH = win->h;
5026 }
5027 else win->internal.flags &= ~(u32)RGFW_windowFullscreen;
5028 RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(_NET_WM_STATE_FULLSCREEN);
5029
5030 RGFW_window_setXAtom(win, _NET_WM_STATE_FULLSCREEN, fullscreen);
5031
5032 XRaiseWindow(_RGFW->display, win->src.window);
5033 XMapRaised(_RGFW->display, win->src.window);
5034}
5035
5036void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_setFloating)(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_bool floating) {
5037 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
5038 RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(_NET_WM_STATE_ABOVE);
5039 RGFW_window_setXAtom(win, _NET_WM_STATE_ABOVE, floating);
5040}
5041
5042void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_setOpacity)(RGFW_window* win, u8 opacity) {
5043 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
5044 const u32 value = (u32) (0xffffffffu * (double) opacity);
5045 RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(NET_WM_WINDOW_OPACITY);
5046 XChangeProperty(_RGFW->display, win->src.window,
5047 NET_WM_WINDOW_OPACITY, XA_CARDINAL, 32, PropModeReplace, (unsigned char*) &value, 1);
5048}
5049
5050void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_minimize)(RGFW_window* win) {
5051 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
5052
5053 if (RGFW_window_isMaximized(win)) return;
5054
5055 win->internal.oldX = win->x;
5056 win->internal.oldY = win->y;
5057 win->internal.oldW = win->w;
5058 win->internal.oldH = win->h;
5059 XIconifyWindow(_RGFW->display, win->src.window, DefaultScreen(_RGFW->display));
5060 XFlush(_RGFW->display);
5061}
5062
5063void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_restore)(RGFW_window* win) {
5064 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
5065
5066 RGFW_toggleXMaximized(win, 0);
5067 RGFW_window_move(win, win->internal.oldX, win->internal.oldY);
5068 RGFW_window_resize(win, win->internal.oldW, win->internal.oldH);
5069
5070 RGFW_window_show(win);
5071 XFlush(_RGFW->display);
5072}
5073
5074RGFW_bool RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_isFloating)(RGFW_window* win) {
5075 RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(_NET_WM_STATE);
5076 RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(_NET_WM_STATE_ABOVE);
5077
5078 Atom actual_type;
5079 int actual_format;
5080 unsigned long nitems, bytes_after;
5081 Atom* prop_return = NULL;
5082
5083 int status = XGetWindowProperty(_RGFW->display, win->src.window, _NET_WM_STATE, 0, (~0L), False, XA_ATOM,
5084 &actual_type, &actual_format, &nitems, &bytes_after,
5085 (unsigned char **)&prop_return);
5086
5087 if (status != Success || actual_type != XA_ATOM)
5088 return RGFW_FALSE;
5089
5090 unsigned long i;
5091 for (i = 0; i < nitems; i++)
5092 if (prop_return[i] == _NET_WM_STATE_ABOVE) return RGFW_TRUE;
5093
5094 if (prop_return)
5095 XFree(prop_return);
5096 return RGFW_FALSE;
5097}
5098
5099void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_setName)(RGFW_window* win, const char* name) {
5100 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
5101
5102 XStoreName(_RGFW->display, win->src.window, name);
5103
5104 RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(_NET_WM_NAME); RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(UTF8_STRING);
5105
5106 char buf[256];
5107 RGFW_MEMSET(buf, 0, sizeof(buf));
5108 RGFW_STRNCPY(buf, name, sizeof(buf) - 1);
5109
5110 XChangeProperty(
5111 _RGFW->display, win->src.window, _NET_WM_NAME, UTF8_STRING,
5112 8, PropModeReplace, (u8*)buf, sizeof(buf)
5113 );
5114}
5115
5116#ifndef RGFW_NO_PASSTHROUGH
5117void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_setMousePassthrough) (RGFW_window* win, RGFW_bool passthrough) {
5118 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
5119 if (passthrough) {
5120 Region region = XCreateRegion();
5121 XShapeCombineRegion(_RGFW->display, win->src.window, ShapeInput, 0, 0, region, ShapeSet);
5122 XDestroyRegion(region);
5123
5124 return;
5125 }
5126
5127 XShapeCombineMask(_RGFW->display, win->src.window, ShapeInput, 0, 0, None, ShapeSet);
5128}
5129#endif /* RGFW_NO_PASSTHROUGH */
5130
5131RGFW_bool RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_setIconEx) (RGFW_window* win, u8* data_src, i32 w, i32 h, RGFW_format format, RGFW_icon type) {
5132 Atom _NET_WM_ICON = XInternAtom(_RGFW->display, "_NET_WM_ICON", False);
5133 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
5134 if (data_src == NULL) {
5135 RGFW_bool res = (RGFW_bool)XChangeProperty(
5136 _RGFW->display, win->src.window, _NET_WM_ICON, XA_CARDINAL, 32,
5137 PropModeReplace, (u8*)NULL, 0
5138 );
5139 return res;
5140 }
5141
5142 i32 count = (i32)(2 + (w * h));
5143
5144 unsigned long* data = (unsigned long*) RGFW_ALLOC((u32)count * sizeof(unsigned long));
5145 RGFW_ASSERT(data != NULL);
5146
5147 RGFW_MEMSET(data, 0, (u32)count * sizeof(unsigned long));
5148 data[0] = (unsigned long)w;
5149 data[1] = (unsigned long)h;
5150
5151 RGFW_copyImageData64((u8*)&data[2], w, h, RGFW_formatBGRA8, data_src, format, RGFW_TRUE);
5152 RGFW_bool res = RGFW_TRUE;
5153 if (type & RGFW_iconTaskbar) {
5154 res = (RGFW_bool)XChangeProperty(
5155 _RGFW->display, win->src.window, _NET_WM_ICON, XA_CARDINAL, 32,
5156 PropModeReplace, (u8*)data, count
5157 );
5158 }
5159
5160 RGFW_copyImageData64((u8*)&data[2], w, h, RGFW_formatBGRA8, data_src, format, RGFW_FALSE);
5161
5162 if (type & RGFW_iconWindow) {
5163 XWMHints wm_hints;
5164 wm_hints.flags = IconPixmapHint;
5165
5166 i32 depth = DefaultDepth(_RGFW->display, DefaultScreen(_RGFW->display));
5167 XImage *image = XCreateImage(_RGFW->display, DefaultVisual(_RGFW->display, DefaultScreen(_RGFW->display)),
5168 (u32)depth, ZPixmap, 0, (char *)&data[2], (u32)w, (u32)h, 32, 0);
5169
5170 wm_hints.icon_pixmap = XCreatePixmap(_RGFW->display, win->src.window, (u32)w, (u32)h, (u32)depth);
5171 XPutImage(_RGFW->display, wm_hints.icon_pixmap, DefaultGC(_RGFW->display, DefaultScreen(_RGFW->display)), image, 0, 0, 0, 0, (u32)w, (u32)h);
5172 image->data = NULL;
5173 XDestroyImage(image);
5174
5175 XSetWMHints(_RGFW->display, win->src.window, &wm_hints);
5176 }
5177
5178 RGFW_FREE(data);
5179 XFlush(_RGFW->display);
5180 return RGFW_BOOL(res);
5181}
5182
5183RGFW_mouse* RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_loadMouse) (u8* data, i32 w, i32 h, RGFW_format format) {
5184 RGFW_ASSERT(data);
5185#ifndef RGFW_NO_X11_CURSOR
5186 RGFW_init();
5187 XcursorImage* native = XcursorImageCreate((i32)w, (i32)h);
5188 native->xhot = 0;
5189 native->yhot = 0;
5190 RGFW_MEMSET(native->pixels, 0, (u32)(w * h * 4));
5191 RGFW_copyImageData((u8*)native->pixels, w, h, RGFW_formatBGRA8, data, format);
5192
5193 Cursor cursor = XcursorImageLoadCursor(_RGFW->display, native);
5194 XcursorImageDestroy(native);
5195
5196 return (void*)cursor;
5197#else
5198 RGFW_UNUSED(img);
5199 return NULL;
5200#endif
5201}
5202
5203void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_setMouse)(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_mouse* mouse) {
5204 RGFW_ASSERT(win && mouse);
5205 XDefineCursor(_RGFW->display, win->src.window, (Cursor)mouse);
5206}
5207
5208void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_freeMouse)(RGFW_mouse* mouse) {
5209 RGFW_ASSERT(mouse);
5210 XFreeCursor(_RGFW->display, (Cursor)mouse);
5211}
5212
5213void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_moveMouse)(RGFW_window* win, i32 x, i32 y) {
5214 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
5215
5216 XEvent event;
5217 XQueryPointer(_RGFW->display, DefaultRootWindow(_RGFW->display),
5218 &event.xbutton.root, &event.xbutton.window,
5219 &event.xbutton.x_root, &event.xbutton.y_root,
5220 &event.xbutton.x, &event.xbutton.y,
5221 &event.xbutton.state);
5222
5223 win->internal.lastMouseX = x - win->x;
5224 win->internal.lastMouseY = y - win->y;
5225 if (event.xbutton.x == x && event.xbutton.y == y)
5226 return;
5227
5228 XWarpPointer(_RGFW->display, None, win->src.window, 0, 0, 0, 0, (int) x - win->x, (int) y - win->y);
5229}
5230
5231RGFW_bool RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_setMouseDefault) (RGFW_window* win) {
5232 return RGFW_window_setMouseStandard(win, RGFW_mouseArrow);
5233}
5234
5235RGFW_bool RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_setMouseStandard) (RGFW_window* win, u8 mouse) {
5236 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
5237
5238 static const u8 mouseIconSrc[16] = { XC_arrow, XC_left_ptr, XC_xterm, XC_crosshair, XC_hand2, XC_sb_h_double_arrow, XC_sb_v_double_arrow, XC_bottom_left_corner, XC_bottom_right_corner, XC_fleur, XC_X_cursor};
5239
5240 if (mouse > (sizeof(mouseIconSrc) / sizeof(u8)))
5241 return RGFW_FALSE;
5242
5243 mouse = mouseIconSrc[mouse];
5244
5245 Cursor cursor = XCreateFontCursor(_RGFW->display, mouse);
5246 XDefineCursor(_RGFW->display, win->src.window, (Cursor) cursor);
5247 XFreeCursor(_RGFW->display, (Cursor) cursor);
5248 return RGFW_TRUE;
5249}
5250
5251void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_hide)(RGFW_window* win) {
5252 XUnmapWindow(_RGFW->display, win->src.window);
5253}
5254
5255void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_show) (RGFW_window* win) {
5256 win->internal.flags &= ~(u32)RGFW_windowHide;
5257 if (win->internal.flags & RGFW_windowFocusOnShow) RGFW_window_focus(win);
5258
5259 XMapWindow(_RGFW->display, win->src.window);
5260 RGFW_window_move(win, win->x, win->y);
5261 return;
5262}
5263
5264RGFW_ssize_t RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_readClipboardPtr)(char* str, size_t strCapacity) {
5265 RGFW_init();
5266 RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(XSEL_DATA); RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(UTF8_STRING); RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(CLIPBOARD);
5267 if (XGetSelectionOwner(_RGFW->display, CLIPBOARD) == _RGFW->helperWindow) {
5268 if (str != NULL)
5269 RGFW_STRNCPY(str, _RGFW->clipboard, _RGFW->clipboard_len - 1);
5270 _RGFW->clipboard[_RGFW->clipboard_len - 1] = '\0';
5271 return (RGFW_ssize_t)_RGFW->clipboard_len - 1;
5272 }
5273
5274 XEvent event;
5275 int format;
5276 unsigned long N, sizeN;
5277 char* data;
5278 Atom target;
5279
5280 XConvertSelection(_RGFW->display, CLIPBOARD, UTF8_STRING, XSEL_DATA, _RGFW->helperWindow, CurrentTime);
5281 XSync(_RGFW->display, 0);
5282 while (1) {
5283 XNextEvent(_RGFW->display, &event);
5284 if (event.type != SelectionNotify) continue;
5285
5286 if (event.xselection.selection != CLIPBOARD || event.xselection.property == 0)
5287 return -1;
5288 break;
5289 }
5290
5291 XGetWindowProperty(event.xselection.display, event.xselection.requestor,
5292 event.xselection.property, 0L, (~0L), 0, AnyPropertyType, &target,
5293 &format, &sizeN, &N, (u8**) &data);
5294
5295 RGFW_ssize_t size;
5296 if (sizeN > strCapacity && str != NULL)
5297 size = -1;
5298
5299 if ((target == UTF8_STRING || target == XA_STRING) && str != NULL) {
5300 RGFW_MEMCPY(str, data, sizeN);
5301 str[sizeN] = '\0';
5302 XFree(data);
5303 } else if (str != NULL) size = -1;
5304
5305 XDeleteProperty(event.xselection.display, event.xselection.requestor, event.xselection.property);
5306 size = (RGFW_ssize_t)sizeN;
5307
5308 return size;
5309}
5310
5311i32 RGFW_XHandleClipboardSelectionHelper(void) {
5312 RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(SAVE_TARGETS);
5313
5314 XEvent event;
5315 XPending(_RGFW->display);
5316
5317 if (QLength(_RGFW->display) || XEventsQueued(_RGFW->display, QueuedAlready) + XEventsQueued(_RGFW->display, QueuedAfterReading))
5318 XNextEvent(_RGFW->display, &event);
5319 else
5320 return 0;
5321
5322 switch (event.type) {
5323 case SelectionRequest:
5324 RGFW_XHandleClipboardSelection(&event);
5325 return 0;
5326 case SelectionNotify:
5327 if (event.xselection.target == SAVE_TARGETS)
5328 return 0;
5329 break;
5330 default: break;
5331 }
5332
5333 return 0;
5334}
5335
5336void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_writeClipboard)(const char* text, u32 textLen) {
5337 RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(SAVE_TARGETS); RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(CLIPBOARD);
5338 RGFW_init();
5339
5340 /* request ownership of the clipboard section and request to convert it, this means its our job to convert it */
5341 XSetSelectionOwner(_RGFW->display, CLIPBOARD, _RGFW->helperWindow, CurrentTime);
5342 if (XGetSelectionOwner(_RGFW->display, CLIPBOARD) != _RGFW->helperWindow) {
5343 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeError, RGFW_errClipboard, "X11 failed to become owner of clipboard selection");
5344 return;
5345 }
5346
5347 if (_RGFW->clipboard)
5348 RGFW_FREE(_RGFW->clipboard);
5349
5350 _RGFW->clipboard = (char*)RGFW_ALLOC(textLen);
5351 RGFW_ASSERT(_RGFW->clipboard != NULL);
5352
5353 RGFW_STRNCPY(_RGFW->clipboard, text, textLen - 1);
5354 _RGFW->clipboard[textLen - 1] = '\0';
5355 _RGFW->clipboard_len = textLen;
5356 return;
5357}
5358
5359RGFW_bool RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_isHidden)(RGFW_window* win) {
5360 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
5361 XWindowAttributes windowAttributes;
5362 XGetWindowAttributes(_RGFW->display, win->src.window, &windowAttributes);
5363
5364 return (windowAttributes.map_state == IsUnmapped && !RGFW_window_isMinimized(win));
5365}
5366
5367RGFW_bool RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_isMinimized)(RGFW_window* win) {
5368 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
5369 RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(WM_STATE);
5370
5371 Atom actual_type;
5372 i32 actual_format;
5373 unsigned long nitems, bytes_after;
5374 unsigned char* prop_data;
5375
5376 i32 status = XGetWindowProperty(_RGFW->display, win->src.window, WM_STATE, 0, 2, False,
5377 AnyPropertyType, &actual_type, &actual_format,
5378 &nitems, &bytes_after, &prop_data);
5379
5380 if (status == Success && nitems >= 1 && prop_data == (unsigned char*)IconicState) {
5381 XFree(prop_data);
5382 return RGFW_TRUE;
5383 }
5384
5385 if (prop_data != NULL)
5386 XFree(prop_data);
5387
5388 XWindowAttributes windowAttributes;
5389 XGetWindowAttributes(_RGFW->display, win->src.window, &windowAttributes);
5390 return windowAttributes.map_state != IsViewable;
5391}
5392
5393RGFW_bool RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_isMaximized)(RGFW_window* win) {
5394 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
5395 RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(_NET_WM_STATE);
5396 RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(_NET_WM_STATE_MAXIMIZED_VERT);
5397 RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(_NET_WM_STATE_MAXIMIZED_HORZ);
5398
5399 Atom actual_type;
5400 i32 actual_format;
5401 unsigned long nitems, bytes_after;
5402 unsigned char* prop_data;
5403
5404 i32 status = XGetWindowProperty(_RGFW->display, win->src.window, _NET_WM_STATE, 0, 1024, False,
5405 XA_ATOM, &actual_type, &actual_format,
5406 &nitems, &bytes_after, &prop_data);
5407
5408 if (status != Success) {
5409 if (prop_data != NULL)
5410 XFree(prop_data);
5411
5412 return RGFW_FALSE;
5413 }
5414
5415 u64 i;
5416 for (i = 0; i < nitems; ++i) {
5417 if (prop_data[i] == _NET_WM_STATE_MAXIMIZED_VERT ||
5418 prop_data[i] == _NET_WM_STATE_MAXIMIZED_HORZ) {
5419 XFree(prop_data);
5420 return RGFW_TRUE;
5421 }
5422 }
5423
5424 if (prop_data != NULL)
5425 XFree(prop_data);
5426
5427 return RGFW_FALSE;
5428}
5429
5430static float XGetSystemContentDPI(Display* display, i32 screen) {
5431 float dpi = 96.0f;
5432
5433 #ifndef RGFW_NO_DPI
5434 RGFW_UNUSED(screen);
5435 char* rms = XResourceManagerString(display);
5436 XrmDatabase db = NULL;
5437 if (rms) db = XrmGetStringDatabase(rms);
5438
5439 if (rms && db) {
5440 XrmValue value;
5441 char* type = NULL;
5442
5443 if (XrmGetResource(db, "Xft.dpi", "Xft.Dpi", &type, &value) && type && RGFW_STRNCMP(type, "String", 7) == 0)
5444 dpi = (float)RGFW_ATOF(value.addr);
5445 XrmDestroyDatabase(db);
5446 }
5447 #else
5448 dpi = RGFW_ROUND(DisplayWidth(display, screen) / (DisplayWidthMM(display, screen) / 25.4));
5449 #endif
5450
5451 return dpi;
5452}
5453
5454RGFW_monitor RGFW_XCreateMonitor(i32 screen);
5455RGFW_monitor RGFW_XCreateMonitor(i32 screen) {
5456 RGFW_monitor monitor;
5457 RGFW_init();
5458
5459 Display* display = _RGFW->display;
5460
5461 if (screen == -1) screen = DefaultScreen(display);
5462
5463 Screen* scrn = DefaultScreenOfDisplay(display);
5464
5465 monitor.x = 0;
5466 monitor.y = 0;
5467 monitor.mode.w = scrn->width;
5468 monitor.mode.h = scrn->height;
5469 monitor.physW = (float)DisplayWidthMM(display, screen) / 25.4f;
5470 monitor.physH = (float)DisplayHeightMM(display, screen) / 25.4f;
5471
5472 RGFW_splitBPP((u32)DefaultDepth(display, screen), &monitor.mode);
5473
5474 char* name = XDisplayName((const char*)display);
5475 RGFW_STRNCPY(monitor.name, name, sizeof(monitor.name) - 1);
5476 monitor.name[sizeof(monitor.name) - 1] = '\0';
5477
5478 float dpi = XGetSystemContentDPI(display, screen);
5479 monitor.pixelRatio = dpi >= 192.0f ? 2 : 1.0f;
5480 monitor.scaleX = (float) (dpi) / 96.0f;
5481 monitor.scaleY = (float) (dpi) / 96.0f;
5482
5483 #ifndef RGFW_NO_DPI
5484 XRRCrtcInfo* ci = NULL;
5485 XRRScreenResources* sr = NULL;
5486
5487 {
5488 XRRScreenConfiguration* conf = XRRGetScreenInfo(display, RootWindow(display, screen));
5489 monitor.mode.refreshRate = (u32)XRRConfigCurrentRate(conf);
5490
5491 sr = XRRGetScreenResourcesCurrent(display, RootWindow(display, screen));
5492 int crtc = screen;
5493
5494 if (sr->ncrtc > crtc) {
5495 ci = XRRGetCrtcInfo(display, sr, sr->crtcs[crtc]);
5496 }
5497
5498 XRRFreeScreenConfigInfo(conf);
5499 }
5500 #endif
5501
5502 #ifndef RGFW_NO_DPI
5503 XRROutputInfo* info = XRRGetOutputInfo (display, sr, sr->outputs[screen]);
5504
5505 if (info == NULL || ci == NULL) {
5506 XRRFreeScreenResources(sr);
5507 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeInfo, RGFW_infoMonitor, "monitor found");
5508 return monitor;
5509 }
5510
5511
5512 float physW = (float)info->mm_width / 25.4f;
5513 float physH = (float)info->mm_height / 25.4f;
5514
5515 RGFW_STRNCPY(monitor.name, info->name, sizeof(monitor.name) - 1);
5516 monitor.name[sizeof(monitor.name) - 1] = '\0';
5517
5518 XRRFreeOutputInfo(info);
5519 info = NULL;
5520
5521 if (physW > 0.0f && physH > 0.0f) {
5522 monitor.physW = physW;
5523 monitor.physH = physH;
5524 }
5525
5526 monitor.x = ci->x;
5527 monitor.y = ci->y;
5528
5529 if (ci->width && ci->height) {
5530 monitor.mode.w = (i32)ci->width;
5531 monitor.mode.h = (i32)ci->height;
5532 }
5533 #endif
5534
5535 #ifndef RGFW_NO_DPI
5536 XRRFreeCrtcInfo(ci);
5537 XRRFreeScreenResources(sr);
5538 #endif
5539
5540 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeInfo, RGFW_infoMonitor, "monitor found");
5541 return monitor;
5542}
5543
5544RGFW_monitor* RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_getMonitors)(size_t* len) {
5545 static RGFW_monitor monitors[7];
5546 RGFW_init();
5547
5548 Display* display = _RGFW->display;
5549 i32 max = ScreenCount(display);
5550
5551 i32 i;
5552 for (i = 0; i < max && i < 6; i++)
5553 monitors[i] = RGFW_XCreateMonitor(i);
5554
5555 if (len != NULL) *len = (size_t)((max <= 6) ? (max) : (6));
5556
5557 return monitors;
5558}
5559
5560RGFW_monitor RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_getPrimaryMonitor)(void) {
5561 return RGFW_XCreateMonitor(-1);
5562}
5563
5564RGFW_bool RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_monitor_requestMode)(RGFW_monitor mon, RGFW_monitorMode mode, RGFW_modeRequest request) {
5565 #ifndef RGFW_NO_DPI
5566 RGFW_init();
5567 XRRScreenConfiguration *conf = XRRGetScreenInfo(_RGFW->display, DefaultRootWindow(_RGFW->display));
5568 XRRScreenResources* screenRes = XRRGetScreenResources(_RGFW->display, DefaultRootWindow(_RGFW->display));
5569 if (screenRes == NULL) return RGFW_FALSE;
5570
5571 int i;
5572 for (i = 0; i < screenRes->ncrtc; i++) {
5573 XRRCrtcInfo* crtcInfo = XRRGetCrtcInfo(_RGFW->display, screenRes, screenRes->crtcs[i]);
5574 if (!crtcInfo) continue;
5575
5576 if (mon.x == crtcInfo->x && mon.y == crtcInfo->y && (u32)mon.mode.w == crtcInfo->width && (u32)mon.mode.h == crtcInfo->height) {
5577 RRMode rmode = None;
5578 int index;
5579 for (index = 0; index < screenRes->nmode; index++) {
5580 RGFW_monitorMode foundMode;
5581 foundMode.w = (i32)screenRes->modes[index].width;
5582 foundMode.h = (i32)screenRes->modes[index].height;
5583 foundMode.refreshRate = (u32)XRRConfigCurrentRate(conf);
5584 RGFW_splitBPP((u32)DefaultDepth(_RGFW->display, DefaultScreen(_RGFW->display)), &foundMode);
5585
5586 if (RGFW_monitorModeCompare(mode, foundMode, request)) {
5587 rmode = screenRes->modes[index].id;
5588
5589 RROutput output = screenRes->outputs[i];
5590 XRROutputInfo* info = XRRGetOutputInfo(_RGFW->display, screenRes, output);
5591 if (info) {
5592 XRRSetCrtcConfig(_RGFW->display, screenRes, screenRes->crtcs[i],
5593 CurrentTime, 0, 0, rmode, RR_Rotate_0, &output, 1);
5594 XRRFreeOutputInfo(info);
5595 XRRFreeCrtcInfo(crtcInfo);
5596 XRRFreeScreenResources(screenRes);
5597 return RGFW_TRUE;
5598 }
5599 }
5600 }
5601
5602 XRRFreeCrtcInfo(crtcInfo);
5603 XRRFreeScreenResources(screenRes);
5604 return RGFW_FALSE;
5605 }
5606
5607 XRRFreeCrtcInfo(crtcInfo);
5608 }
5609
5610 XRRFreeScreenResources(screenRes);
5611 XRRFreeScreenConfigInfo(conf);
5612#endif
5613 return RGFW_FALSE;
5614}
5615
5616RGFW_monitor RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_getMonitor) (RGFW_window* win) {
5617 RGFW_monitor mon;
5618 RGFW_MEMSET(&mon, 0, sizeof(mon));
5619
5620 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
5621
5622 XWindowAttributes attrs;
5623 if (!XGetWindowAttributes(_RGFW->display, win->src.window, &attrs)) {
5624 return mon;
5625 }
5626
5627 i32 i;
5628 for (i = 0; i < ScreenCount(_RGFW->display) && i < 6; i++) {
5629 Screen* screen = ScreenOfDisplay(_RGFW->display, i);
5630 if (attrs.x >= 0 && attrs.x < XWidthOfScreen(screen) &&
5631 attrs.y >= 0 && attrs.y < XHeightOfScreen(screen))
5632 return RGFW_XCreateMonitor(i);
5633 }
5634 return mon;
5635
5636}
5637
5638#ifdef RGFW_OPENGL
5639RGFW_bool RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_createContextPtr_OpenGL) (RGFW_window* win, RGFW_glContext* context, RGFW_glHints* hints) {
5640 /* for checking extensions later */
5641 const char sRGBARBstr[] = "GLX_ARB_framebuffer_sRGB";
5642 const char sRGBEXTstr[] = "GLX_EXT_framebuffer_sRGB";
5643 const char noErorrStr[] = "GLX_ARB_create_context_no_error";
5644 const char flushStr[] = "GLX_ARB_context_flush_control";
5645 const char robustStr[] = "GLX_ARB_create_context_robustness";
5646
5647 /* basic RGFW int */
5648 win->src.ctx.native = context;
5649 win->src.gfxType = RGFW_gfxNativeOpenGL;
5650 /* This is required so that way the user can create their own OpenGL context after RGFW_createWindow is used */
5651 if (win->src.window) RGFW_window_closePlatform(win);
5652
5653 RGFW_bool transparent = (win->internal.flags & RGFW_windowTransparent);
5654
5655 /* start by creating a GLX config / X11 Viusal */
5656 XVisualInfo visual;
5657 GLXFBConfig bestFbc;
5658
5659 i32 visual_attribs[40];
5660 RGFW_attribStack stack;
5661 RGFW_attribStack_init(&stack, visual_attribs, 40);
5662 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, GLX_X_VISUAL_TYPE, GLX_TRUE_COLOR);
5663 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, GLX_X_RENDERABLE, 1);
5664 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, GLX_RENDER_TYPE, GLX_RGBA_BIT);
5665 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, GLX_DRAWABLE_TYPE, GLX_WINDOW_BIT);
5666 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, GLX_DOUBLEBUFFER, 1);
5667 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, GLX_ALPHA_SIZE, hints->alpha);
5668 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, GLX_DEPTH_SIZE, hints->depth);
5669 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, GLX_STENCIL_SIZE, hints->stencil);
5670 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, GLX_STEREO, hints->stereo);
5671 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, GLX_AUX_BUFFERS, hints->auxBuffers);
5672 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, GLX_RED_SIZE, hints->red);
5673 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, GLX_GREEN_SIZE, hints->green);
5674 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, GLX_BLUE_SIZE, hints->blue);
5675 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, GLX_ACCUM_RED_SIZE, hints->accumRed);
5676 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, GLX_ACCUM_GREEN_SIZE, hints->accumGreen);
5677 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, GLX_ACCUM_BLUE_SIZE, hints->accumBlue);
5678 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, GLX_ACCUM_ALPHA_SIZE, hints->accumAlpha);
5679
5680 if (hints->sRGB) {
5681 if (RGFW_extensionSupportedPlatform_OpenGL(sRGBARBstr, sizeof(sRGBARBstr)))
5682 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, GLX_FRAMEBUFFER_SRGB_CAPABLE_ARB, hints->sRGB);
5683 if (RGFW_extensionSupportedPlatform_OpenGL(sRGBEXTstr, sizeof(sRGBEXTstr)))
5684 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, GLX_FRAMEBUFFER_SRGB_CAPABLE_EXT, hints->sRGB);
5685 }
5686
5687 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, 0, 0);
5688
5689 /* find the configs */
5690 i32 fbcount;
5691 GLXFBConfig* fbc = glXChooseFBConfig(_RGFW->display, DefaultScreen(_RGFW->display), visual_attribs, &fbcount);
5692
5693 i32 best_fbc = -1;
5694 i32 best_depth = 0;
5695 i32 best_samples = 0;
5696
5697 if (fbcount == 0) {
5698 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeError, RGFW_errOpenGLContext, "Failed to find any valid GLX visual configs.");
5699 return 0;
5700 }
5701
5702 /* search through all found configs to find the best match */
5703 i32 i;
5704 for (i = 0; i < fbcount; i++) {
5705 XVisualInfo* vi = glXGetVisualFromFBConfig(_RGFW->display, fbc[i]);
5706 if (vi == NULL)
5707 continue;
5708
5709 i32 samp_buf, samples;
5710 glXGetFBConfigAttrib(_RGFW->display, fbc[i], GLX_SAMPLE_BUFFERS, &samp_buf);
5711 glXGetFBConfigAttrib(_RGFW->display, fbc[i], GLX_SAMPLES, &samples);
5712
5713 if (best_fbc == -1) best_fbc = i;
5714 if ((!(transparent) || vi->depth == 32) && best_depth == 0) {
5715 best_fbc = i;
5716 best_depth = vi->depth;
5717 }
5718 if ((!(transparent) || vi->depth == 32) && samples <= hints->samples && samples > best_samples) {
5719 best_fbc = i;
5720 best_depth = vi->depth;
5721 best_samples = samples;
5722 }
5723 XFree(vi);
5724 }
5725
5726 if (best_fbc == -1) {
5727 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeError, RGFW_errOpenGLContext, "Failed to get a valid GLX visual.");
5728 return 0;
5729 }
5730
5731 /* we found a config */
5732 bestFbc = fbc[best_fbc];
5733 XVisualInfo* vi = glXGetVisualFromFBConfig(_RGFW->display, bestFbc);
5734 if (vi->depth != 32 && transparent)
5735 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeWarning, RGFW_warningOpenGL, "Failed to to find a matching visual with a 32-bit depth.");
5736
5737 if (best_samples < hints->samples)
5738 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeWarning, RGFW_warningOpenGL, "Failed to load a matching sample count.");
5739
5740 XFree(fbc);
5741 visual = *vi;
5742 XFree(vi);
5743
5744 /* use the visual to create a new window */
5745 RGFW_XCreateWindow(visual, "", win->internal.flags, win);
5746
5747 /* create the actual OpenGL context */
5748 i32 context_attribs[40];
5749 RGFW_attribStack_init(&stack, context_attribs, 40);
5750
5751 i32 mask = 0;
5752 switch (hints->profile) {
5753 case RGFW_glES: mask |= GLX_CONTEXT_ES_PROFILE_BIT_EXT; break;
5754 case RGFW_glCompatibility: mask |= GLX_CONTEXT_COMPATIBILITY_PROFILE_BIT_ARB; break;
5755 case RGFW_glCore: mask |= GLX_CONTEXT_CORE_PROFILE_BIT_ARB; break;
5756 default: mask |= GLX_CONTEXT_CORE_PROFILE_BIT_ARB; break;
5757 }
5758
5759 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, GLX_CONTEXT_PROFILE_MASK_ARB, mask);
5760
5761 if (hints->minor || hints->major) {
5762 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, GLX_CONTEXT_MAJOR_VERSION_ARB, hints->major);
5763 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, GLX_CONTEXT_MINOR_VERSION_ARB, hints->minor);
5764 }
5765
5766
5767 if (RGFW_extensionSupportedPlatform_OpenGL(flushStr, sizeof(flushStr))) {
5768 if (hints->releaseBehavior == RGFW_glReleaseFlush) {
5769 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, GLX_CONTEXT_RELEASE_BEHAVIOR_ARB, GLX_CONTEXT_RELEASE_BEHAVIOR_FLUSH_ARB);
5770 } else if (hints->releaseBehavior == RGFW_glReleaseNone) {
5771 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, GLX_CONTEXT_RELEASE_BEHAVIOR_ARB, GLX_CONTEXT_RELEASE_BEHAVIOR_NONE_ARB);
5772 }
5773 }
5774
5775 i32 flags = 0;
5776 if (hints->debug) flags |= GLX_CONTEXT_FLAGS_ARB;
5777 if (hints->robustness && RGFW_extensionSupportedPlatform_OpenGL(robustStr, sizeof(robustStr))) flags |= GLX_CONTEXT_ROBUST_ACCESS_BIT_ARB;
5778 if (flags)
5779 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, GLX_CONTEXT_FLAGS_ARB, flags);
5780
5781 if (RGFW_extensionSupportedPlatform_OpenGL(noErorrStr, sizeof(noErorrStr)))
5782 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, GLX_CONTEXT_OPENGL_NO_ERROR_ARB, hints->noError);
5783
5784 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, 0, 0);
5785
5786 /* create the context */
5787 glXCreateContextAttribsARBProc glXCreateContextAttribsARB = 0;
5788 glXCreateContextAttribsARB = (glXCreateContextAttribsARBProc)
5789 glXGetProcAddressARB((u8*) "glXCreateContextAttribsARB");
5790
5791 GLXContext ctx = NULL;
5792 if (hints->share) {
5793 ctx = hints->share->ctx;
5794 }
5795
5796 if (glXCreateContextAttribsARB == NULL) {
5797 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeError, RGFW_errOpenGLContext, "Failed to load proc address 'glXCreateContextAttribsARB', loading a generic OpenGL context.");
5798 win->src.ctx.native->ctx = glXCreateContext(_RGFW->display, &visual, ctx, True);
5799 } else {
5800 _RGFW->x11Error = NULL;
5801 win->src.ctx.native->ctx = glXCreateContextAttribsARB(_RGFW->display, bestFbc, ctx, True, context_attribs);
5802 if (_RGFW->x11Error || win->src.ctx.native->ctx == NULL) {
5803 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeError, RGFW_errOpenGLContext, "Failed to create an OpenGL context with AttribsARB, loading a generic OpenGL context.");
5804 win->src.ctx.native->ctx = glXCreateContext(_RGFW->display, &visual, ctx, True);
5805 }
5806 }
5807
5808 glXMakeCurrent(_RGFW->display, (Drawable)win->src.window, (GLXContext)win->src.ctx.native->ctx);
5809 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeInfo, RGFW_infoOpenGL, "OpenGL context initalized.");
5810
5811 return RGFW_TRUE;
5812}
5813
5814void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_deleteContextPtr_OpenGL) (RGFW_window* win, RGFW_glContext* ctx) {
5815 glXDestroyContext(_RGFW->display, ctx->ctx);
5816 win->src.ctx.native = NULL;
5817 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeInfo, RGFW_infoOpenGL, "OpenGL context freed.");
5818}
5819
5820RGFW_bool RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_extensionSupportedPlatform_OpenGL)(const char * extension, size_t len) {
5821 RGFW_init();
5822 const char* extensions = glXQueryExtensionsString(_RGFW->display, XDefaultScreen(_RGFW->display));
5823 return (extensions != NULL) && RGFW_extensionSupportedStr(extensions, extension, len);
5824}
5825
5826RGFW_proc RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_getProcAddress_OpenGL)(const char* procname) { return glXGetProcAddress((u8*) procname); }
5827
5828void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_makeCurrentContext_OpenGL) (RGFW_window* win) { if (win) RGFW_ASSERT(win->src.ctx.native);
5829 if (win == NULL)
5830 glXMakeCurrent(NULL, (Drawable)NULL, (GLXContext) NULL);
5831 else
5832 glXMakeCurrent(_RGFW->display, (Drawable) win->src.window, (GLXContext) win->src.ctx.native->ctx);
5833 return;
5834}
5835void* RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_getCurrentContext_OpenGL) (void) { return glXGetCurrentContext(); }
5836void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_swapBuffers_OpenGL) (RGFW_window* win) { RGFW_ASSERT(win->src.ctx.native); glXSwapBuffers(_RGFW->display, win->src.window); }
5837
5838void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_swapInterval_OpenGL) (RGFW_window* win, i32 swapInterval) {
5839 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
5840 /* cached pfn to avoid calling glXGetProcAddress more than once */
5841 static PFNGLXSWAPINTERVALEXTPROC pfn = (PFNGLXSWAPINTERVALEXTPROC)-1;
5842 static int (*pfn2)(int) = NULL;
5843
5844 if (pfn == (PFNGLXSWAPINTERVALEXTPROC)-1) {
5845 pfn = (PFNGLXSWAPINTERVALEXTPROC)glXGetProcAddress((u8*)"glXSwapIntervalEXT");
5846 if (pfn == NULL) {
5847 const char* array[] = {"GLX_MESA_swap_control", "GLX_SGI_swap_control"};
5848
5849 size_t i;
5850 for (i = 0; i < sizeof(array) / sizeof(char*) && pfn2 == NULL; i++) {
5851 pfn2 = (int(*)(int))glXGetProcAddress((u8*)array[i]);
5852 }
5853
5854 if (pfn2 != NULL) {
5855 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeError, RGFW_errOpenGLContext, "Failed to load swap interval function, fallingback to the native swapinterval function");
5856 } else {
5857 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeError, RGFW_errOpenGLContext, "Failed to load swap interval function");
5858 }
5859 }
5860 }
5861
5862 if (pfn != NULL) {
5863 pfn(_RGFW->display, win->src.window, swapInterval);
5864 }
5865 else if (pfn2 != NULL) {
5866 pfn2(swapInterval);
5867 }
5868}
5869#endif /* RGFW_OPENGL */
5870
5871i32 RGFW_initPlatform_X11(void) {
5872 #ifdef RGFW_USE_XDL
5873 XDL_init();
5874 #endif
5875
5876 #if !defined(RGFW_NO_X11_CURSOR) && !defined(RGFW_NO_X11_CURSOR_PRELOAD)
5877 #if defined(__CYGWIN__)
5878 RGFW_LOAD_LIBRARY(X11Cursorhandle, "libXcursor-1.so");
5879 #elif defined(__OpenBSD__) || defined(__NetBSD__)
5880 RGFW_LOAD_LIBRARY(X11Cursorhandle, "libXcursor.so");
5881 #else
5882 RGFW_LOAD_LIBRARY(X11Cursorhandle, "libXcursor.so.1");
5883 #endif
5884 RGFW_PROC_DEF(X11Cursorhandle, XcursorImageCreate);
5885 RGFW_PROC_DEF(X11Cursorhandle, XcursorImageDestroy);
5886 RGFW_PROC_DEF(X11Cursorhandle, XcursorImageLoadCursor);
5887 #endif
5888
5889 #if !defined(RGFW_NO_X11_XI_PRELOAD)
5890 #if defined(__CYGWIN__)
5891 RGFW_LOAD_LIBRARY(X11Xihandle, "libXi-6.so");
5892 #elif defined(__OpenBSD__) || defined(__NetBSD__)
5893 RGFW_LOAD_LIBRARY(X11Xihandle, "libXi.so");
5894 #else
5895 RGFW_LOAD_LIBRARY(X11Xihandle, "libXi.so.6");
5896 #endif
5897 RGFW_PROC_DEF(X11Xihandle, XISelectEvents);
5898 #endif
5899
5900 #if !defined(RGFW_NO_X11_EXT_PRELOAD)
5901 #if defined(__CYGWIN__)
5902 RGFW_LOAD_LIBRARY(X11XEXThandle, "libXext-6.so");
5903 #elif defined(__OpenBSD__) || defined(__NetBSD__)
5904 RGFW_LOAD_LIBRARY(X11XEXThandle, "libXext.so");
5905 #else
5906 RGFW_LOAD_LIBRARY(X11XEXThandle, "libXext.so.6");
5907 #endif
5908 RGFW_PROC_DEF(X11XEXThandle, XSyncCreateCounter);
5909 RGFW_PROC_DEF(X11XEXThandle, XSyncIntToValue);
5910 RGFW_PROC_DEF(X11XEXThandle, XSyncSetCounter);
5911 RGFW_PROC_DEF(X11XEXThandle, XShapeCombineRegion);
5912 RGFW_PROC_DEF(X11XEXThandle, XShapeCombineMask);
5913 #endif
5914
5915 XInitThreads();
5916 _RGFW->display = XOpenDisplay(0);
5917 _RGFW->context = XUniqueContext();
5918
5919 XSetWindowAttributes wa;
5920 RGFW_MEMSET(&wa, 0, sizeof(wa));
5921 wa.event_mask = PropertyChangeMask;
5922 _RGFW->helperWindow = XCreateWindow(_RGFW->display, XDefaultRootWindow(_RGFW->display), 0, 0, 1, 1, 0, 0,
5923 InputOnly, DefaultVisual(_RGFW->display, DefaultScreen(_RGFW->display)), CWEventMask, &wa);
5924
5925 u8 RGFW_blk[] = { 0, 0, 0, 0 };
5926 _RGFW->hiddenMouse = RGFW_loadMouse(RGFW_blk, 1, 1, RGFW_formatRGBA8);
5927 _RGFW->clipboard = NULL;
5928
5929 XkbComponentNamesRec rec;
5930 XkbDescPtr desc = XkbGetMap(_RGFW->display, 0, XkbUseCoreKbd);
5931 XkbDescPtr evdesc;
5932 XSetErrorHandler(RGFW_XErrorHandler);
5933 u8 old[256];
5934
5935 XkbGetNames(_RGFW->display, XkbKeyNamesMask, desc);
5936
5937 RGFW_MEMSET(&rec, 0, sizeof(rec));
5938 rec.keycodes = (char*)"evdev";
5939 evdesc = XkbGetKeyboardByName(_RGFW->display, XkbUseCoreKbd, &rec, XkbGBN_KeyNamesMask, XkbGBN_KeyNamesMask, False);
5940 /* memo: RGFW_keycodes[x11 keycode] = rgfw keycode */
5941 if(evdesc != NULL && desc != NULL) {
5942 int i, j;
5943 for(i = 0; i < (int)sizeof(old); i++){
5944 old[i] = _RGFW->keycodes[i];
5945 _RGFW->keycodes[i] = 0;
5946 }
5947 for(i = evdesc->min_key_code; i <= evdesc->max_key_code; i++){
5948 for(j = desc->min_key_code; j <= desc->max_key_code; j++){
5949 if(RGFW_STRNCMP(evdesc->names->keys[i].name, desc->names->keys[j].name, XkbKeyNameLength) == 0){
5950 _RGFW->keycodes[j] = old[i];
5951 break;
5952 }
5953 }
5954 }
5955 XkbFreeKeyboard(desc, 0, True);
5956 XkbFreeKeyboard(evdesc, 0, True);
5957 }
5958 return 0;
5959}
5960
5961void RGFW_deinitPlatform_X11(void) {
5962 #define RGFW_FREE_LIBRARY(x) if (x != NULL) dlclose(x); x = NULL;
5963 /* to save the clipboard on the x server after the window is closed */
5964 RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(CLIPBOARD_MANAGER); RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(CLIPBOARD);
5965 RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(SAVE_TARGETS);
5966 if (XGetSelectionOwner(_RGFW->display, CLIPBOARD) == _RGFW->helperWindow) {
5967 XConvertSelection(_RGFW->display, CLIPBOARD_MANAGER, SAVE_TARGETS, None, _RGFW->helperWindow, CurrentTime);
5968 while (RGFW_XHandleClipboardSelectionHelper());
5969 }
5970 if (_RGFW->clipboard) {
5971 RGFW_FREE(_RGFW->clipboard);
5972 _RGFW->clipboard = NULL;
5973 }
5974
5975 RGFW_freeMouse(_RGFW->hiddenMouse);
5976
5977 XDestroyWindow(_RGFW->display, (Drawable) _RGFW->helperWindow);
5978 XCloseDisplay(_RGFW->display);
5980 #if !defined(RGFW_NO_X11_CURSOR_PRELOAD) && !defined(RGFW_NO_X11_CURSOR)
5981 RGFW_FREE_LIBRARY(X11Cursorhandle);
5982 #endif
5983 #if !defined(RGFW_NO_X11_XI_PRELOAD)
5984 RGFW_FREE_LIBRARY(X11Xihandle);
5985 #endif
5986
5987 #ifdef RGFW_USE_XDL
5988 XDL_close();
5989 #endif
5990
5991 #if !defined(RGFW_NO_X11_EXT_PRELOAD)
5992 RGFW_FREE_LIBRARY(X11XEXThandle);
5993 #endif
5994}
5995
5996void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_closePlatform)(RGFW_window* win) {
5997 if (win->internal.holdMouse)
5998 XUngrabPointer(_RGFW->display, CurrentTime);
5999
6000 XFreeGC(_RGFW->display, win->src.gc);
6001 XDeleteContext(_RGFW->display, win->src.window, _RGFW->context);
6002 XDestroyWindow(_RGFW->display, (Drawable) win->src.window);
6003 return;
6004}
6005
6006#ifdef RGFW_WEBGPU
6007WGPUSurface RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_createSurface_WebGPU) (RGFW_window* window, WGPUInstance instance) {
6008 WGPUSurfaceDescriptor surfaceDesc = {0};
6009 WGPUSurfaceSourceXlibWindow fromXlib = {0};
6010 fromXlib.chain.sType = WGPUSType_SurfaceSourceXlibWindow;
6011 fromXlib.display = window->src.display; // Get Display* from RGFW
6012 fromXlib.window = window->src.window; // Get Window from RGFW
6013
6014 surfaceDesc.nextInChain = (WGPUChainedStruct*)&fromXlib.chain;
6015 return wgpuInstanceCreateSurface(instance, &surfaceDesc);
6016}
6017#endif
6018
6019#endif
6020/*
6021 End of X11 linux / wayland / unix defines
6022*/
6023
6024/*
6025
6026 Start of Wayland defayland
6027*/
6028
6029#ifdef RGFW_WAYLAND
6030#ifdef RGFW_X11
6031#undef RGFW_FUNC /* remove previous define */
6032#define RGFW_FUNC(func) func##_Wayland
6033#else
6034#define RGFW_FUNC(func) func
6035#endif
6036
6037/*
6038Wayland TODO: (out of date)
6039- fix RGFW_keyPressed lock state
6040
6041 RGFW_windowMoved, the window was moved (by the user)
6042 RGFW_windowResized the window was resized (by the user), [on WASM this means the browser was resized]
6043 RGFW_windowRefresh The window content needs to be refreshed
6044
6045 RGFW_dataDrop a file has been dropped into the window
6046 RGFW_dataDrag
6047
6048- window args:
6049 #define RGFW_windowNoResize the window cannot be resized by the user
6050 #define RGFW_windowAllowDND the window supports drag and drop
6051 #define RGFW_scaleToMonitor scale the window to the screen
6052
6053- other missing functions functions ("TODO wayland") (~30 functions)
6054- fix buffer rendering weird behavior
6055*/
6056#include <errno.h>
6057#include <unistd.h>
6058#include <sys/mman.h>
6059#include <xkbcommon/xkbcommon.h>
6060#include <xkbcommon/xkbcommon-keysyms.h>
6061#include <dirent.h>
6062#include <linux/kd.h>
6063#include <wayland-cursor.h>
6064#include <fcntl.h>
6065
6066struct wl_display* RGFW_getDisplay_Wayland(void) { return _RGFW->wl_display; }
6067struct wl_surface* RGFW_window_getWindow_Wayland(RGFW_window* win) { return win->src.surface; }
6068
6069
6070/* wayland global garbage (wayland bad, X11 is fine (ish) (not really)) */
6071#include "xdg-shell.h"
6072#include "xdg-decoration-unstable-v1.h"
6073#include "xdg-output-unstable-v1.h"
6074
6075void RGFW_toggleWaylandMaximized(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_bool maximized);
6076
6077static void RGFW_wl_setOpaque(RGFW_window* win) {
6078 struct wl_region* wl_region = wl_compositor_create_region(_RGFW->compositor);
6079
6080 if (!wl_region) return; // return if no region was created
6081
6082 wl_region_add(wl_region, 0, 0, win->w, win->h);
6083 wl_surface_set_opaque_region(win->src.surface, wl_region);
6084 wl_region_destroy(wl_region);
6085
6086}
6087
6088static void RGFW_wl_xdg_wm_base_ping_handler(void* data, struct xdg_wm_base* wm_base,
6089 u32 serial) {
6090 RGFW_UNUSED(data);
6091 xdg_wm_base_pong(wm_base, serial);
6092}
6093static void RGFW_wl_xdg_surface_configure_handler(void* data, struct xdg_surface* xdg_surface,
6094 u32 serial) {
6095
6096 xdg_surface_ack_configure(xdg_surface, serial);
6097
6098 RGFW_window* win = (RGFW_window*)data;
6099
6100 if (win == NULL) {
6101 win = _RGFW->kbOwner;
6102 if (win == NULL)
6103 return;
6104 }
6105
6106 if (win->src.activated != win->src.pending_activated) {
6107 win->src.activated = win->src.pending_activated;
6108 }
6109
6110 if (win->src.maximized != win->src.pending_maximized) {
6111 RGFW_toggleWaylandMaximized(win, win->src.pending_maximized);
6112
6113 RGFW_window_checkMode(win);
6114 }
6115
6116
6117 if (win->src.resizing) {
6118
6119 // Do not create a resize event if the window is maximized
6120 if (!win->src.maximized && win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_windowResizedFlag) {
6121 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_windowResized; e.common.win = win);
6122 RGFW_windowResizedCallback(win, win->w, win->h);
6123 }
6124 RGFW_window_resize(win, win->w, win->h);
6125 if (!(win->internal.flags & RGFW_windowTransparent)) {
6126 RGFW_wl_setOpaque(win);
6127 }
6128 }
6129
6130}
6131
6132static void RGFW_wl_xdg_toplevel_configure_handler(void* data, struct xdg_toplevel* toplevel,
6133 i32 width, i32 height, struct wl_array* states) {
6134
6135 RGFW_UNUSED(toplevel);
6136 RGFW_window* win = (RGFW_window*)data;
6137
6138 win->src.pending_activated = RGFW_FALSE;
6139 win->src.pending_maximized = RGFW_FALSE;
6140 win->src.resizing = RGFW_FALSE;
6141
6142
6143 enum xdg_toplevel_state* state;
6144 wl_array_for_each(state, states) {
6145 switch (*state) {
6146 case XDG_TOPLEVEL_STATE_ACTIVATED:
6147 win->src.pending_activated = RGFW_TRUE;
6148 break;
6149 case XDG_TOPLEVEL_STATE_MAXIMIZED:
6150 win->src.pending_maximized = RGFW_TRUE;
6151 break;
6152 default:
6153 break;
6154 }
6155
6156 }
6157 // if width and height are not zero and are not the same as the window
6158 // the window is resizing so update the values
6159 if ((width && height) && (win->w != width || win->h != height)) {
6160 win->src.resizing = RGFW_TRUE;
6161 win->src.w = win->w = width;
6162 win->src.h = win->h = height;
6163 }
6164}
6165
6166static void RGFW_wl_xdg_toplevel_close_handler(void* data, struct xdg_toplevel *toplevel) {
6167 RGFW_UNUSED(toplevel);
6168 RGFW_window* win = (RGFW_window*)data;
6169
6170 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_quit; e.common.win = win);
6171 RGFW_window_setShouldClose(win, RGFW_TRUE);
6172 RGFW_windowQuitCallback(win);
6173}
6174
6175static void RGFW_wl_xdg_decoration_configure_handler(void* data,
6176 struct zxdg_toplevel_decoration_v1* zxdg_toplevel_decoration_v1, u32 mode) {
6177 RGFW_UNUSED(data);
6178 zxdg_toplevel_decoration_v1_set_mode(zxdg_toplevel_decoration_v1, mode);
6179}
6180
6181static void RGFW_wl_shm_format_handler(void* data, struct wl_shm *shm, u32 format) {
6182 RGFW_UNUSED(data); RGFW_UNUSED(shm); RGFW_UNUSED(format);
6183}
6184
6185static void RGFW_wl_pointer_enter(void* data, struct wl_pointer* pointer, u32 serial,
6186 struct wl_surface *surface, wl_fixed_t surface_x, wl_fixed_t surface_y) {
6187 RGFW_UNUSED(data); RGFW_UNUSED(pointer); RGFW_UNUSED(serial);
6188 RGFW_window* win = (RGFW_window*)wl_surface_get_user_data(surface);
6189
6190 win->internal.mouseInside = RGFW_TRUE;
6191 _RGFW->windowState.win = win;
6192 _RGFW->windowState.mouseEnter = RGFW_TRUE;
6193
6194 _RGFW->mouseOwner = win;
6195 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_mouseEnterFlag)) return;
6196
6197 i32 x = (i32)wl_fixed_to_double(surface_x);
6198 i32 y = (i32)wl_fixed_to_double(surface_y);
6199
6200 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_mouseEnter;
6201 e.mouse.x = x;
6202 e.mouse.y = y;
6203 e.common.win = win);
6204
6205 win->internal.lastMouseX = x;
6206 win->internal.lastMouseY = y;
6207
6208 RGFW_mouseNotifyCallback(win, x, y, RGFW_TRUE);
6209}
6210
6211static void RGFW_wl_pointer_leave(void* data, struct wl_pointer *pointer, u32 serial, struct wl_surface *surface) {
6212 RGFW_UNUSED(data); RGFW_UNUSED(pointer); RGFW_UNUSED(serial);
6213 RGFW_window* win = (RGFW_window*)wl_surface_get_user_data(surface);
6214 if (_RGFW->mouseOwner == win)
6215 _RGFW->mouseOwner = NULL;
6216
6217 win->internal.mouseInside = RGFW_FALSE;
6218 _RGFW->windowState.winLeave = win;
6219 _RGFW->windowState.mouseLeave = RGFW_TRUE;
6220
6221 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_mouseLeaveFlag)) return;
6222
6223 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_mouseLeave;
6224 e.mouse.x = win->internal.lastMouseX;
6225 e.mouse.y = win->internal.lastMouseY;
6226 e.common.win = win);
6227
6228 RGFW_mouseNotifyCallback(win, win->internal.lastMouseX, win->internal.lastMouseY, RGFW_FALSE);
6229}
6230
6231static void RGFW_wl_pointer_motion(void* data, struct wl_pointer *pointer, u32 time, wl_fixed_t x, wl_fixed_t y) {
6232 RGFW_UNUSED(data); RGFW_UNUSED(pointer); RGFW_UNUSED(time);
6233
6234 RGFW_ASSERT(_RGFW->mouseOwner != NULL);
6235
6236 RGFW_window* win = _RGFW->mouseOwner;
6237
6238 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_mousePosChangedFlag)) return;
6239
6240 i32 convertedX = (i32)wl_fixed_to_double(x);
6241 i32 convertedY = (i32)wl_fixed_to_double(y);
6242
6243 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_mousePosChanged;
6244 e.mouse.x = convertedX;
6245 e.mouse.y = convertedY;
6246 e.common.win = win);
6247
6248 win->internal.lastMouseX = convertedX;
6249 win->internal.lastMouseY = convertedY;
6250
6251 RGFW_mousePosCallback(win, convertedX, convertedY, 0, 0);
6252}
6253
6254static void RGFW_wl_pointer_button(void* data, struct wl_pointer *pointer, u32 serial, u32 time, u32 button, u32 state) {
6255 RGFW_UNUSED(data); RGFW_UNUSED(pointer); RGFW_UNUSED(time); RGFW_UNUSED(serial);
6256 RGFW_ASSERT(_RGFW->mouseOwner != NULL);
6257 RGFW_window* win = _RGFW->mouseOwner;
6258
6259 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & (RGFW_BIT(RGFW_mouseButtonReleased - RGFW_BOOL(state))))) return;
6260 u32 b = (button - 0x110);
6261
6262 /* flip right and middle button codes */
6263 if (b == 1) b = 2;
6264 else if (b == 2) b = 1;
6265
6266 _RGFW->mouseButtons[b].prev = _RGFW->mouseButtons[b].current;
6267 _RGFW->mouseButtons[b].current = RGFW_BOOL(state);
6268
6269 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_mouseButtonReleased - RGFW_BOOL(state);
6270 e.button.value = (u8)b;
6271 e.common.win = win);
6272 RGFW_mouseButtonCallback(win, (u8)b, RGFW_BOOL(state));
6273}
6274
6275static void RGFW_wl_pointer_axis(void* data, struct wl_pointer *pointer, u32 time, u32 axis, wl_fixed_t value) {
6276 RGFW_UNUSED(data); RGFW_UNUSED(pointer); RGFW_UNUSED(time); RGFW_UNUSED(axis);
6277
6278 RGFW_ASSERT(_RGFW->mouseOwner != NULL);
6279 RGFW_window* win = _RGFW->mouseOwner;
6280
6281 float scrollX = 0.0;
6282 float scrollY = 0.0;
6283
6284 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & (RGFW_BIT(RGFW_mouseScroll)))) return;
6285
6286 if (axis == WL_POINTER_AXIS_HORIZONTAL_SCROLL)
6287 scrollX = (float)(-wl_fixed_to_double(value) / 10.0);
6288 else if (axis == WL_POINTER_AXIS_VERTICAL_SCROLL)
6289 scrollY = (float)(-wl_fixed_to_double(value) / 10.0);
6290
6291
6292 _RGFW->scrollX = (float)scrollX;
6293 _RGFW->scrollY = (float)scrollY;
6294 RGFW_mouseScrollCallback(win, scrollX, scrollY);
6295 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_mouseScroll;
6296 e.scroll.x = scrollX;
6297 e.scroll.y = scrollY;
6298 e.common.win = win);
6299}
6300
6301
6302static void RGFW_doNothing(void) { }
6303
6304static void RGFW_wl_keyboard_keymap (void* data, struct wl_keyboard *keyboard, u32 format, i32 fd, u32 size) {
6305 RGFW_UNUSED(data); RGFW_UNUSED(keyboard); RGFW_UNUSED(format);
6306
6307 char *keymap_string = mmap (NULL, size, PROT_READ, MAP_SHARED, fd, 0);
6308 xkb_keymap_unref (_RGFW->keymap);
6309 _RGFW->keymap = xkb_keymap_new_from_string (_RGFW->xkb_context, keymap_string, XKB_KEYMAP_FORMAT_TEXT_V1, XKB_KEYMAP_COMPILE_NO_FLAGS);
6310
6311 munmap (keymap_string, size);
6312 close (fd);
6313 xkb_state_unref (_RGFW->xkb_state);
6314 _RGFW->xkb_state = xkb_state_new (_RGFW->keymap);
6315}
6316static void RGFW_wl_keyboard_enter (void* data, struct wl_keyboard *keyboard, u32 serial, struct wl_surface *surface, struct wl_array *keys) {
6317 RGFW_UNUSED(data); RGFW_UNUSED(keyboard); RGFW_UNUSED(serial); RGFW_UNUSED(keys);
6318
6319 RGFW_window* win = (RGFW_window*)wl_surface_get_user_data(surface);
6320 _RGFW->kbOwner = win;
6321
6322 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_focusInFlag)) return;
6323
6324 win->internal.inFocus = RGFW_TRUE;
6325 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_focusIn; e.common.win = win);
6326 RGFW_focusCallback(win, RGFW_TRUE);
6327
6328 if ((win->internal.holdMouse)) RGFW_window_holdMouse(win);
6329}
6330static void RGFW_wl_keyboard_leave (void* data, struct wl_keyboard *keyboard, u32 serial, struct wl_surface *surface) {
6331 RGFW_UNUSED(data); RGFW_UNUSED(keyboard); RGFW_UNUSED(serial);
6332
6333 RGFW_window* win = (RGFW_window*)wl_surface_get_user_data(surface);
6334 if (_RGFW->kbOwner == win)
6335 _RGFW->kbOwner = NULL;
6336
6337 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_focusOutFlag)) return;
6338
6339 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_focusOut; e.common.win = win);
6340 RGFW_focusCallback(win, RGFW_FALSE);
6341 RGFW_window_focusLost(win);
6342}
6343static void RGFW_wl_keyboard_key (void* data, struct wl_keyboard *keyboard, u32 serial, u32 time, u32 key, u32 state) {
6344 RGFW_UNUSED(data); RGFW_UNUSED(keyboard); RGFW_UNUSED(serial); RGFW_UNUSED(time);
6345
6346 if (_RGFW->kbOwner == NULL) return;
6347 RGFW_window *RGFW_key_win = _RGFW->kbOwner;
6348 if (!(RGFW_key_win->internal.enabledEvents & (RGFW_BIT(RGFW_keyPressed + state)))) return;
6349
6350 xkb_keysym_t keysym = xkb_state_key_get_one_sym(_RGFW->xkb_state, key + 8);
6351
6352 u32 RGFWkey = RGFW_apiKeyToRGFW(key + 8);
6353 _RGFW->keyboard[RGFWkey].prev = _RGFW->keyboard[RGFWkey].current;
6354 _RGFW->keyboard[RGFWkey].current = RGFW_BOOL(state);
6355
6356 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = (u8)(RGFW_keyPressed + state);
6357 e.key.value = (u8)RGFWkey;
6358 e.key.sym = (u8)keysym;
6359 e.key.repeat = RGFW_window_isKeyDown(RGFW_key_win, (u8)RGFWkey);
6360 e.common.win = RGFW_key_win);
6361
6362 RGFW_updateKeyMods(RGFW_key_win, RGFW_BOOL(xkb_keymap_mod_get_index(_RGFW->keymap, "Lock")), RGFW_BOOL(xkb_keymap_mod_get_index(_RGFW->keymap, "Mod2")), RGFW_BOOL(xkb_keymap_mod_get_index(_RGFW->keymap, "ScrollLock")));
6363 RGFW_keyCallback(RGFW_key_win, (u8)RGFWkey, (u8)keysym, RGFW_key_win->internal.mod, RGFW_window_isKeyDown(RGFW_key_win, (u8)RGFWkey), RGFW_BOOL(state));
6364}
6365static void RGFW_wl_keyboard_modifiers (void* data, struct wl_keyboard *keyboard, u32 serial, u32 mods_depressed, u32 mods_latched, u32 mods_locked, u32 group) {
6366 RGFW_UNUSED(data); RGFW_UNUSED(keyboard); RGFW_UNUSED(serial); RGFW_UNUSED(time);
6367 xkb_state_update_mask (_RGFW->xkb_state, mods_depressed, mods_latched, mods_locked, 0, 0, group);
6368}
6369static void RGFW_wl_seat_capabilities (void* data, struct wl_seat *seat, u32 capabilities) {
6370 RGFW_UNUSED(data);
6371 static struct wl_pointer_listener pointer_listener;
6372 RGFW_MEMSET(&pointer_listener, 0, sizeof (pointer_listener));
6373 pointer_listener.enter = &RGFW_wl_pointer_enter;
6374 pointer_listener.leave = &RGFW_wl_pointer_leave;
6375 pointer_listener.motion = &RGFW_wl_pointer_motion;
6376 pointer_listener.button = &RGFW_wl_pointer_button;
6377 pointer_listener.axis = &RGFW_wl_pointer_axis;
6378
6379 static struct wl_keyboard_listener keyboard_listener;
6380 RGFW_MEMSET(&keyboard_listener, 0, sizeof (keyboard_listener));
6381 keyboard_listener.keymap = &RGFW_wl_keyboard_keymap;
6382 keyboard_listener.enter = &RGFW_wl_keyboard_enter;
6383 keyboard_listener.leave = &RGFW_wl_keyboard_leave;
6384 keyboard_listener.key = &RGFW_wl_keyboard_key;
6385 keyboard_listener.modifiers = &RGFW_wl_keyboard_modifiers;
6386
6387 if ((capabilities & WL_SEAT_CAPABILITY_POINTER) && !_RGFW->wl_pointer) {
6388 _RGFW->wl_pointer = wl_seat_get_pointer(seat);
6389 wl_pointer_add_listener(_RGFW->wl_pointer, &pointer_listener, _RGFW);
6390 }
6391 if ((capabilities & WL_SEAT_CAPABILITY_KEYBOARD) && !_RGFW->wl_keyboard) {
6392 _RGFW->wl_keyboard = wl_seat_get_keyboard(seat);
6393 wl_keyboard_add_listener(_RGFW->wl_keyboard, &keyboard_listener, _RGFW);
6394 }
6395
6396 if (!(capabilities & WL_SEAT_CAPABILITY_POINTER) && _RGFW->wl_pointer) {
6397 wl_pointer_destroy(_RGFW->wl_pointer);
6398 }
6399 if (!(capabilities & WL_SEAT_CAPABILITY_KEYBOARD) && _RGFW->wl_keyboard) {
6400 wl_keyboard_destroy(_RGFW->wl_keyboard);
6401 }
6402}
6403
6404static void RGFW_wl_output_set_geometry(void *data, struct wl_output *wl_output,
6405 int32_t x, int32_t y, int32_t physical_width, int32_t physical_height,
6406 int32_t subpixel, const char *make, const char *model, int32_t transform) {
6407
6408 RGFW_monitor* monitor = &((RGFW_monitorNode*)data)->mon;
6409 monitor->x = x;
6410 monitor->y = y;
6411
6412 monitor->physW = (float)physical_width / 25.4f;
6413 monitor->physH = (float)physical_height / 25.4f;
6414
6415 RGFW_UNUSED(wl_output);
6416 RGFW_UNUSED(subpixel);
6417 RGFW_UNUSED(make);
6418 RGFW_UNUSED(model);
6419 RGFW_UNUSED(transform);
6420}
6421
6422static void RGFW_wl_output_set_mode(void *data, struct wl_output *wl_output, uint32_t flags,
6423 int32_t width, int32_t height, int32_t refresh) {
6424
6425 RGFW_monitor* monitor = &((RGFW_monitorNode*)data)->mon;
6426
6427 monitor->mode.w = width;
6428 monitor->mode.h = height;
6429 monitor->mode.refreshRate = (u32)RGFW_ROUND( ((float)refresh / 1000) );
6430 RGFW_UNUSED(width);
6431 RGFW_UNUSED(height);
6432 RGFW_UNUSED(wl_output);
6433 RGFW_UNUSED(flags);
6434}
6435
6436static void RGFW_wl_output_set_scale(void *data, struct wl_output *wl_output, int32_t factor) {
6437 // this is for pixelRatio
6438 RGFW_monitor* monitor = &((RGFW_monitorNode*)data)->mon;
6439
6440 monitor->pixelRatio = (float)factor;
6441 RGFW_UNUSED(wl_output);
6442}
6443
6444static void RGFW_wl_output_set_name(void *data, struct wl_output *wl_output, const char *name) {
6445 RGFW_monitor* monitor = &((RGFW_monitorNode*)data)->mon;
6446
6447 RGFW_STRNCPY(monitor->name, name, sizeof(monitor->name) - 1);
6448 monitor->name[sizeof(monitor->name) - 1] = '\0';
6449
6450 RGFW_UNUSED(wl_output);
6451
6452}
6453
6454static void RGFW_xdg_output_logical_pos(void *data, struct zxdg_output_v1 *zxdg_output_v1, int32_t x, int32_t y) {
6455 RGFW_monitor* monitor = &((RGFW_monitorNode*)data)->mon;
6456 monitor->x = x;
6457 monitor->y = y;
6458 RGFW_UNUSED(zxdg_output_v1);
6459}
6460
6461static void RGFW_xdg_output_logical_size(void *data, struct zxdg_output_v1 *zxdg_output_v1, int32_t width, int32_t height) {
6462 RGFW_monitor* monitor = &((RGFW_monitorNode*)data)->mon;
6463
6464 float mon_float_width = (float) monitor->mode.w;
6465 float mon_float_height = (float) monitor->mode.h;
6466
6467 monitor->scaleX = (mon_float_width / (float) width);
6468 monitor->scaleY = (mon_float_height / (float) height);
6469
6470 // under xwayland the monitor changes w & h when compositor scales it
6471 monitor->mode.w = width;
6472 monitor->mode.h = height;
6473 RGFW_UNUSED(zxdg_output_v1);
6474}
6475
6476static void RGFW_wl_create_outputs(struct wl_registry *const registry, uint32_t id) {
6477 struct wl_output *output = wl_registry_bind(registry, id, &wl_output_interface, 4);
6478 RGFW_monitorNode* node;
6479 RGFW_monitor mon;
6480
6481 if (!output) return;
6482
6483 char RGFW_mon_default_name[10];
6484
6485 RGFW_SNPRINTF(RGFW_mon_default_name, sizeof(RGFW_mon_default_name), "monitor-%li", _RGFW->monitors.count);
6486 RGFW_STRNCPY(mon.name, RGFW_mon_default_name, sizeof(mon.name) - 1);
6487 mon.name[sizeof(mon.name) - 1] = '\0';
6488
6489 // set in case compositor does not send one
6490 // or no xdg_output support
6491 mon.scaleY = mon.scaleX = mon.pixelRatio = 1.0f;
6492
6493 node = RGFW_monitors_add(mon);
6494 if (node == NULL) return;
6495
6496 node->id = id;
6497 node->output = output;
6498
6499 static const struct wl_output_listener wl_output_listener = {
6500 .geometry = RGFW_wl_output_set_geometry,
6501 .mode = RGFW_wl_output_set_mode,
6502 .done = (void (*)(void *,struct wl_output *))&RGFW_doNothing,
6503 .scale = RGFW_wl_output_set_scale,
6504 .name = RGFW_wl_output_set_name,
6505 .description = (void (*)(void *, struct wl_output *, const char *))&RGFW_doNothing
6506 };
6507
6508 // pass the monitor so we can access it in the callback functions
6509 wl_output_add_listener(output, &wl_output_listener, node);
6510
6511 if (!_RGFW->xdg_output_manager) return; // compositor does not support it
6512
6513 static const struct zxdg_output_v1_listener xdg_output_listener = {
6514 .name = (void (*)(void *,struct zxdg_output_v1 *, const char *))&RGFW_doNothing,
6515 .done = (void (*)(void *,struct zxdg_output_v1 *))&RGFW_doNothing,
6516 .description = (void (*)(void *,struct zxdg_output_v1 *, const char *))&RGFW_doNothing,
6517 .logical_position = RGFW_xdg_output_logical_pos,
6518 .logical_size = RGFW_xdg_output_logical_size
6519 };
6520
6521 node->xdg_output = zxdg_output_manager_v1_get_xdg_output(_RGFW->xdg_output_manager, node->output);
6522 zxdg_output_v1_add_listener(node->xdg_output, &xdg_output_listener, node);
6523}
6524
6525static void RGFW_wl_global_registry_handler(void* data, struct wl_registry *registry, u32 id, const char *interface, u32 version) {
6526
6527 static struct wl_seat_listener seat_listener = {&RGFW_wl_seat_capabilities, (void (*)(void *, struct wl_seat *, const char *))&RGFW_doNothing};
6528 static const struct wl_shm_listener shm_listener = { .format = RGFW_wl_shm_format_handler };
6529
6530 RGFW_info* RGFW = (RGFW_info*)data;
6531 RGFW_UNUSED(version);
6532 if (RGFW_STRNCMP(interface, "wl_compositor", 16) == 0) {
6533 RGFW->compositor = wl_registry_bind(registry, id, &wl_compositor_interface, 4);
6534 } else if (RGFW_STRNCMP(interface, "xdg_wm_base", 12) == 0) {
6535 RGFW->xdg_wm_base = wl_registry_bind(registry, id, &xdg_wm_base_interface, 1);
6536 } else if (RGFW_STRNCMP(interface, zxdg_decoration_manager_v1_interface.name, 255) == 0) {
6537 RGFW->decoration_manager = wl_registry_bind(registry, id, &zxdg_decoration_manager_v1_interface, 1);
6538 } else if (RGFW_STRNCMP(interface, "wl_shm", 7) == 0) {
6539 RGFW->shm = wl_registry_bind(registry, id, &wl_shm_interface, 1);
6540 wl_shm_add_listener(RGFW->shm, &shm_listener, RGFW);
6541 } else if (RGFW_STRNCMP(interface,"wl_seat", 8) == 0) {
6542 RGFW->seat = wl_registry_bind(registry, id, &wl_seat_interface, 1);
6543 wl_seat_add_listener(RGFW->seat, &seat_listener, RGFW);
6544 } else if (RGFW_STRNCMP(interface, zxdg_output_manager_v1_interface.name, 255) == 0) {
6545 _RGFW->xdg_output_manager = wl_registry_bind(registry, id, &zxdg_output_manager_v1_interface, 1);
6546 } else if (RGFW_STRNCMP(interface,"wl_output", 10) == 0) {
6547 RGFW_wl_create_outputs(registry, id);
6548 }
6549}
6550
6551static void RGFW_wl_global_registry_remove(void* data, struct wl_registry *registry, u32 id) {
6552 RGFW_UNUSED(data); RGFW_UNUSED(registry);
6553 RGFW_monitorNode* prev = _RGFW->monitors.list.head;
6554 RGFW_monitorNode* node = NULL;
6555 if (prev == NULL) return;
6556
6557 if (prev->id != id) {
6558 /* find the first node that has a matching id */
6559 while(prev->next != NULL && prev->next->id != id) {
6560 prev = prev->next;
6561 }
6562
6563 if (prev->next == NULL) return;
6564 node = prev->next;
6565 } else {
6566 node = prev;
6567 }
6568
6569 if (node->output) {
6570 wl_output_destroy(node->output);
6571 }
6572
6573 if (node->xdg_output) {
6574 zxdg_output_v1_destroy(node->xdg_output);
6575 }
6576
6577 RGFW_monitors_remove(node, prev);
6578}
6579
6580static void RGFW_wl_randname(char *buf) {
6581 struct timespec ts;
6582 clock_gettime(CLOCK_REALTIME, &ts);
6583 long r = ts.tv_nsec;
6584
6585 int i;
6586 for (i = 0; i < 6; ++i) {
6587 buf[i] = (char)('A'+(r&15)+(r&16)*2);
6588 r >>= 5;
6589 }
6590}
6591
6592static size_t RGFW_wl_stringlen(char* name) {
6593 size_t i = 0;
6594 while (name[i]) { i++; }
6595 return i;
6596}
6597
6598static int RGFW_wl_anonymous_shm_open(void) {
6599 char name[] = "/RGFW-wayland-XXXXXX";
6600 int retries = 100;
6601
6602 do {
6603 RGFW_wl_randname(name + RGFW_wl_stringlen(name) - 6);
6604
6605 --retries;
6606 /* shm_open guarantees that O_CLOEXEC is set */
6607 int fd = shm_open(name, O_RDWR | O_CREAT | O_EXCL, 0600);
6608 if (fd >= 0) {
6609 shm_unlink(name);
6610 return fd;
6611 }
6612 } while (retries > 0 && errno == EEXIST);
6613
6614 return -1;
6615}
6616
6617static int RGFW_wl_create_shm_file(off_t size) {
6618 int fd = RGFW_wl_anonymous_shm_open();
6619 if (fd < 0) {
6620 return fd;
6621 }
6622
6623 if (ftruncate(fd, size) < 0) {
6624 close(fd);
6625 return -1;
6626 }
6627
6628 return fd;
6629}
6630
6631i32 RGFW_initPlatform_Wayland(void) {
6632 _RGFW->wl_display = wl_display_connect(NULL);
6633 if (_RGFW->wl_display == NULL) {
6634 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeError, RGFW_errWayland, "Failed to load Wayland display");
6635 return -1;
6636 }
6637
6638 _RGFW->compositor = NULL;
6639 static const struct wl_registry_listener registry_listener = {
6640 .global = RGFW_wl_global_registry_handler,
6641 .global_remove = RGFW_wl_global_registry_remove,
6642 };
6643
6644 _RGFW->registry = wl_display_get_registry(_RGFW->wl_display);
6645 wl_registry_add_listener(_RGFW->registry, &registry_listener, _RGFW);
6646
6647 wl_display_roundtrip(_RGFW->wl_display); // bind to globals
6648
6649 if (_RGFW->compositor == NULL) {
6650 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeError, RGFW_errWayland, "Can't find compositor.");
6651 return 1;
6652 }
6653
6654 if (_RGFW->wl_cursor_theme == NULL) {
6655 _RGFW->wl_cursor_theme = wl_cursor_theme_load(NULL, 24, _RGFW->shm);
6656 _RGFW->cursor_surface = wl_compositor_create_surface(_RGFW->compositor);
6657
6658 struct wl_cursor* cursor = wl_cursor_theme_get_cursor(_RGFW->wl_cursor_theme, "left_ptr");
6659 _RGFW->cursor_image = cursor->images[0];
6660 struct wl_buffer* cursor_buffer = wl_cursor_image_get_buffer(_RGFW->cursor_image);
6661
6662 wl_surface_attach(_RGFW->cursor_surface, cursor_buffer, 0, 0);
6663 wl_surface_commit(_RGFW->cursor_surface);
6664 }
6665
6666 static const struct xdg_wm_base_listener xdg_wm_base_listener = {
6667 .ping = RGFW_wl_xdg_wm_base_ping_handler,
6668 };
6669
6670 xdg_wm_base_add_listener(_RGFW->xdg_wm_base, &xdg_wm_base_listener, NULL);
6671
6672 _RGFW->xkb_context = xkb_context_new(XKB_CONTEXT_NO_FLAGS);
6673 return 0;
6674}
6675
6676
6677void RGFW_deinitPlatform_Wayland(void) {
6678 if (_RGFW->wl_pointer) {
6679 wl_pointer_destroy(_RGFW->wl_pointer);
6680 }
6681 if (_RGFW->wl_keyboard) {
6682 wl_keyboard_destroy(_RGFW->wl_keyboard);
6683 }
6684
6685 wl_registry_destroy(_RGFW->registry);
6686 if (_RGFW->decoration_manager != NULL)
6687 zxdg_decoration_manager_v1_destroy(_RGFW->decoration_manager);
6688
6689 if (_RGFW->xdg_output_manager != NULL)
6690 zxdg_output_manager_v1_destroy(_RGFW->xdg_output_manager);
6691
6692 RGFW_monitorNode* node = _RGFW->monitors.list.head;
6693
6694 while (node != NULL) {
6695 if (node->output) {
6696 wl_output_destroy(node->output);
6697 }
6698
6699 if (node->xdg_output) {
6700 zxdg_output_v1_destroy(node->xdg_output);
6701 }
6702
6703 _RGFW->monitors.count -= 1;
6704 node = node->next;
6705 }
6706
6707 wl_shm_destroy(_RGFW->shm);
6708 wl_seat_release(_RGFW->seat);
6709 xdg_wm_base_destroy(_RGFW->xdg_wm_base);
6710 wl_compositor_destroy(_RGFW->compositor);
6711 wl_display_disconnect(_RGFW->wl_display);
6712}
6713
6714RGFW_bool RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_createSurfacePtr) (u8* data, i32 w, i32 h, RGFW_format format, RGFW_surface* surface) {
6715 RGFW_ASSERT(surface != NULL);
6716 surface->data = data;
6717 surface->w = w;
6718 surface->h = h;
6719 surface->format = format;
6720 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeInfo, RGFW_infoBuffer, "Creating a 4 channel buffer");
6721
6722 u32 size = (u32)(surface->w * surface->h * 4);
6723 int fd = RGFW_wl_create_shm_file(size);
6724 if (fd < 0) {
6725 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeError, RGFW_errBuffer, "Failed to create a buffer.");
6726 return RGFW_FALSE;
6727 }
6728
6729 surface->native.buffer = mmap(NULL, size, PROT_READ | PROT_WRITE, MAP_SHARED, fd, 0);
6730 if (surface->native.buffer == MAP_FAILED) {
6731 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeError, RGFW_errBuffer, "mmap failed.");
6732 return RGFW_FALSE;
6733 }
6734
6735 struct wl_shm_pool* pool = wl_shm_create_pool(_RGFW->shm, fd, (i32)size);
6736 surface->native.wl_buffer = wl_shm_pool_create_buffer(pool, 0, (i32)surface->w, (i32)surface->h, (i32)surface->w * 4, WL_SHM_FORMAT_ARGB8888);
6737 wl_shm_pool_destroy(pool);
6738
6739 close(fd);
6740
6741 surface->native.format = RGFW_formatBGRA8;
6742 return RGFW_TRUE;
6743}
6744
6745void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_blitSurface) (RGFW_window* win, RGFW_surface* surface) {
6746 RGFW_ASSERT(surface != NULL);
6747 RGFW_copyImageData(surface->native.buffer, win->w, RGFW_MIN(win->h, surface->h), surface->native.format, surface->data, surface->format);
6748
6749 wl_surface_attach(win->src.surface, surface->native.wl_buffer, 0, 0);
6750 wl_surface_damage(win->src.surface, 0, 0, RGFW_MIN(win->w, surface->w), RGFW_MIN(win->h, surface->h));
6751 wl_surface_commit(win->src.surface);
6752}
6753
6754void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_surface_freePtr) (RGFW_surface* surface) {
6755 RGFW_ASSERT(surface != NULL);
6756 wl_buffer_destroy(surface->native.wl_buffer);
6757 munmap(surface->native.buffer, (size_t)(surface->w * surface->h * 4));
6758}
6759
6760void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_setBorder) (RGFW_window* win, RGFW_bool border) {
6761 RGFW_setBit(&win->internal.flags, RGFW_windowNoBorder, !border);
6762}
6763
6764void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_releaseCursor) (RGFW_window* win) {
6765 RGFW_UNUSED(win);
6766}
6767
6768void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_captureCursor) (RGFW_window* win) {
6769 RGFW_UNUSED(win);
6770}
6771
6772RGFW_window* RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_createWindowPlatform) (const char* name, RGFW_windowFlags flags, RGFW_window* win) {
6773 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeWarning, RGFW_warningWayland, "RGFW Wayland support is experimental");
6774
6775 static const struct xdg_surface_listener xdg_surface_listener = {
6776 .configure = RGFW_wl_xdg_surface_configure_handler,
6777 };
6778
6779 win->src.surface = wl_compositor_create_surface(_RGFW->compositor);
6780 wl_surface_set_user_data(win->src.surface, win);
6781
6782 win->src.xdg_surface = xdg_wm_base_get_xdg_surface(_RGFW->xdg_wm_base, win->src.surface);
6783 xdg_surface_add_listener(win->src.xdg_surface, &xdg_surface_listener, win);
6784
6785 xdg_wm_base_set_user_data(_RGFW->xdg_wm_base, win);
6786
6787 win->src.xdg_toplevel = xdg_surface_get_toplevel(win->src.xdg_surface);
6788
6789 xdg_surface_set_window_geometry(win->src.xdg_surface, 0, 0, win->w, win->h);
6790
6791 if (!(win->internal.flags & RGFW_windowTransparent)) { // no transparency
6792 RGFW_wl_setOpaque(win);
6793 }
6794
6795 static const struct xdg_toplevel_listener xdg_toplevel_listener = {
6796 .configure = RGFW_wl_xdg_toplevel_configure_handler,
6797 .close = RGFW_wl_xdg_toplevel_close_handler,
6798 };
6799
6800
6801 xdg_toplevel_add_listener(win->src.xdg_toplevel, &xdg_toplevel_listener, win);
6802
6803 if (_RGFW->decoration_manager) {
6804 if (!(flags & RGFW_windowNoBorder)) {
6805 win->src.decoration = zxdg_decoration_manager_v1_get_toplevel_decoration(
6806 _RGFW->decoration_manager, win->src.xdg_toplevel);
6807 }
6808
6809 static const struct zxdg_toplevel_decoration_v1_listener xdg_decoration_listener = {
6810 .configure = RGFW_wl_xdg_decoration_configure_handler
6811 };
6812
6813 zxdg_toplevel_decoration_v1_add_listener(win->src.decoration, &xdg_decoration_listener, NULL);
6814 } else if (!(flags & RGFW_windowNoBorder)) {
6815 /* TODO, some fallback */
6816 #ifdef RGFW_LIBDECOR
6817 static struct libdecor_interface interface = {
6818 .error = NULL,
6819 };
6820
6821 static struct libdecor_frame_interface frameInterface = {0}; /*= {
6822 RGFW_wl_handle_configure,
6823 RGFW_wl_handle_close,
6824 RGFW_wl_handle_commit,
6825 RGFW_wl_handle_dismiss_popup,
6826 };*/
6827
6828 win->src.decorContext = libdecor_new(_RGFW->wl_display, &interface);
6829 if (win->src.decorContext) {
6830 struct libdecor_frame *frame = libdecor_decorate(win->src.decorContext, win->src.surface, &frameInterface, win);
6831 if (!frame) {
6832 libdecor_unref(win->src.decorContext);
6833 win->src.decorContext = NULL;
6834 } else {
6835 libdecor_frame_set_app_id(frame, "my-libdecor-app");
6836 libdecor_frame_set_title(frame, "My Libdecor Window");
6837 }
6838 }
6839 #endif
6840 }
6841
6842 wl_surface_commit(win->src.surface);
6843 RGFW_window_show(win);
6844
6845 wl_display_roundtrip(_RGFW->wl_display);
6846 /* wait for the surface to be configured */
6847 while (wl_display_dispatch_pending(_RGFW->wl_display) > 0) { }
6848 wl_surface_commit(win->src.surface);
6849
6850 #ifndef RGFW_NO_MONITOR
6851 if (flags & RGFW_windowScaleToMonitor)
6852 RGFW_window_scaleToMonitor(win);
6853 #endif
6854
6855 RGFW_window_setName(win, name);
6856
6857 return win;
6858}
6859
6860RGFW_bool RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_getGlobalMouse) (i32* x, i32* y) {
6861 RGFW_init();
6862 if (x) *x = 0;
6863 if (y) *y = 0;
6864 return RGFW_TRUE;
6865}
6866
6867u8 RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_rgfwToKeyChar)(u32 key) {
6868 return (u8)key;
6869}
6870
6871void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_pollEvents) (void) {
6872 RGFW_resetPrevState();
6873 wl_display_roundtrip(_RGFW->wl_display);
6874}
6875
6876void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_move) (RGFW_window* win, i32 x, i32 y) {
6877 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
6878 win->x = x;
6879 win->y = y;
6880 if (_RGFW->compositor) {
6881 wl_display_flush(_RGFW->wl_display);
6882 }
6883}
6884
6885
6886void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_resize) (RGFW_window* win, i32 w, i32 h) {
6887 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
6888 win->w = w;
6889 win->h = h;
6890 if (_RGFW->compositor) {
6891 xdg_surface_set_window_geometry(win->src.xdg_surface, 0, 0, win->w, win->h);
6892 #ifdef RGFW_OPENGL
6893 if (win->src.ctx.egl)
6894 wl_egl_window_resize(win->src.ctx.egl->eglWindow, (i32)w, (i32)h, 0, 0);
6895 #endif
6896 }
6897}
6898
6899void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_setAspectRatio) (RGFW_window* win, i32 w, i32 h) {
6900 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
6901
6902 if (w == 0 && h == 0)
6903 return;
6904 xdg_toplevel_set_max_size(win->src.xdg_toplevel, (i32)w, (i32)h);
6905}
6906
6907void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_setMinSize) (RGFW_window* win, i32 w, i32 h) {
6908 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
6909 xdg_toplevel_set_min_size(win->src.xdg_toplevel, (i32)w, (i32)h);
6910}
6911
6912void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_setMaxSize) (RGFW_window* win, i32 w, i32 h) {
6913 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
6914 xdg_toplevel_set_max_size(win->src.xdg_toplevel, (i32)w, (i32)h);
6915}
6916
6917void RGFW_toggleWaylandMaximized(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_bool maximized) {
6918 win->src.maximized = RGFW_BOOL(maximized);
6919 if (maximized) {
6920 xdg_toplevel_set_maximized(win->src.xdg_toplevel);
6921 } else {
6922 xdg_toplevel_unset_maximized(win->src.xdg_toplevel);
6923 }
6924}
6925
6926void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_maximize) (RGFW_window* win) {
6927 win->internal.oldX = win->x;
6928 win->internal.oldY = win->y;
6929 win->internal.oldW = win->w;
6930 win->internal.oldH = win->h;
6931 RGFW_toggleWaylandMaximized(win, 1);
6932 return;
6933}
6934
6935void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_focus)(RGFW_window* win) {
6936 RGFW_ASSERT(win);
6937}
6938
6939void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_raise)(RGFW_window* win) {
6940 RGFW_ASSERT(win);
6941}
6942
6943void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_setFullscreen)(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_bool fullscreen) {
6944 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
6945 if (fullscreen) {
6946
6947 win->internal.flags |= RGFW_windowFullscreen;
6948 win->internal.oldX = win->x;
6949 win->internal.oldY = win->y;
6950 win->internal.oldW = win->w;
6951 win->internal.oldH = win->h;
6952 xdg_toplevel_set_fullscreen(win->src.xdg_toplevel, NULL); // let the compositor decide
6953 } else {
6954 win->internal.flags &= ~(u32)RGFW_windowFullscreen;
6955 xdg_toplevel_unset_fullscreen(win->src.xdg_toplevel);
6956 }
6957
6958}
6959
6960void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_setFloating) (RGFW_window* win, RGFW_bool floating) {
6961 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
6962 RGFW_UNUSED(floating);
6963}
6964
6965void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_setOpacity) (RGFW_window* win, u8 opacity) {
6966 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
6967 RGFW_UNUSED(opacity);
6968}
6969
6970void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_minimize)(RGFW_window* win) {
6971 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
6972 if (RGFW_window_isMaximized(win)) return;
6973 win->internal.oldX = win->x;
6974 win->internal.oldY = win->y;
6975 win->internal.oldW = win->w;
6976 win->internal.oldH = win->h;
6977}
6978
6979void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_restore)(RGFW_window* win) {
6980 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
6981 RGFW_toggleWaylandMaximized(win, 0);
6982
6983 RGFW_window_move(win, win->internal.oldX, win->internal.oldY);
6984 RGFW_window_resize(win, win->internal.oldW, win->internal.oldH);
6985
6986 RGFW_window_show(win);
6987 RGFW_window_move(win, win->internal.oldX, win->internal.oldY);
6988 RGFW_window_resize(win, win->internal.oldW, win->internal.oldH);
6989
6990 RGFW_window_show(win);
6991}
6992
6993RGFW_bool RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_isFloating)(RGFW_window* win) {
6994 return (!RGFW_window_isFullscreen(win) && !RGFW_window_isMaximized(win));
6995}
6996
6997void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_setName) (RGFW_window* win, const char* name) {
6998 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
6999 if (_RGFW->compositor)
7000 xdg_toplevel_set_title(win->src.xdg_toplevel, name);
7001}
7002
7003#ifndef RGFW_NO_PASSTHROUGH
7004void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_setMousePassthrough) (RGFW_window* win, RGFW_bool passthrough) {
7005 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
7006 RGFW_UNUSED(passthrough);
7007}
7008#endif /* RGFW_NO_PASSTHROUGH */
7009
7010RGFW_bool RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_setIconEx) (RGFW_window* win, u8* data, i32 w, i32 h, RGFW_format format, RGFW_icon type) {
7011 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL); RGFW_UNUSED(data); RGFW_UNUSED(w); RGFW_UNUSED(h); RGFW_UNUSED(format); RGFW_UNUSED(type);
7012 return RGFW_FALSE;
7013}
7014
7015RGFW_mouse* RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_loadMouse)(u8* data, i32 w, i32 h, RGFW_format format) {
7016 RGFW_ASSERT(data); RGFW_UNUSED(data); RGFW_UNUSED(w); RGFW_UNUSED(h); RGFW_UNUSED(format);
7017 return NULL; /* TODO */
7018}
7019
7020void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_setMouse)(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_mouse* mouse) {
7021 RGFW_UNUSED(win); RGFW_UNUSED(mouse);
7022}
7023
7024void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_freeMouse)(RGFW_mouse* mouse) {
7025 RGFW_UNUSED(mouse);
7026}
7027
