7028void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_moveMouse)(RGFW_window* win, i32 x, i32 y) {
7029 RGFW_UNUSED(win); RGFW_UNUSED(x); RGFW_UNUSED(y);
7030}
7031
7032RGFW_bool RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_setMouseDefault)(RGFW_window* win) {
7033 return RGFW_window_setMouseStandard(win, RGFW_mouseArrow);
7034}
7035
7036RGFW_bool RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_setMouseStandard)(RGFW_window* win, u8 mouse) {
7037 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
7038 static const char* iconStrings[16] = { "left_ptr", "left_ptr", "text", "cross", "pointer", "e-resize", "n-resize", "nw-resize", "ne-resize", "all-resize", "not-allowed" };
7039
7040 struct wl_cursor* wlcursor = wl_cursor_theme_get_cursor(_RGFW->wl_cursor_theme, iconStrings[mouse]);
7041 _RGFW->cursor_image = wlcursor->images[0];
7042 struct wl_buffer* cursor_buffer = wl_cursor_image_get_buffer(_RGFW->cursor_image);
7043
7044 wl_surface_attach(_RGFW->cursor_surface, cursor_buffer, 0, 0);
7045 wl_surface_commit(_RGFW->cursor_surface);
7046 return RGFW_TRUE;
7047}
7048
7049void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_hide) (RGFW_window* win) {
7050 wl_surface_attach(win->src.surface, NULL, 0, 0);
7051 wl_surface_commit(win->src.surface);
7052 win->internal.flags |= RGFW_windowHide;
7053}
7054
7055void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_show) (RGFW_window* win) {
7056 win->internal.flags &= ~(u32)RGFW_windowHide;
7057 if (win->internal.flags & RGFW_windowFocusOnShow) RGFW_window_focus(win);
7058 /* wl_surface_attach(win->src.surface, win->x, win->y, win->w, win->h, 0, 0); */
7059 wl_surface_commit(win->src.surface);
7060}
7061
7062RGFW_ssize_t RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_readClipboardPtr) (char* str, size_t strCapacity) {
7063 RGFW_UNUSED(str); RGFW_UNUSED(strCapacity);
7064 return 0;
7065}
7066
7067void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_writeClipboard) (const char* text, u32 textLen) {
7068 RGFW_UNUSED(text); RGFW_UNUSED(textLen);
7069}
7070
7071RGFW_bool RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_isHidden) (RGFW_window* win) {
7072 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
7073 return RGFW_FALSE;
7074}
7075
7076RGFW_bool RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_isMinimized) (RGFW_window* win) {
7077 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
7078 return RGFW_FALSE;
7079}
7080
7081RGFW_bool RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_isMaximized) (RGFW_window* win) {
7082 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
7083 return win->src.maximized;
7084}
7085
7086RGFW_monitor* RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_getMonitors) (size_t* len) {
7087 static RGFW_monitor monitors[RGFW_MAX_MONITORS];
7088 RGFW_init();
7089 if (len != NULL) {
7090 *len = _RGFW->monitors.count;
7091 }
7092
7093 u8 i = 0;
7094 RGFW_monitorNode* cur_node = _RGFW->monitors.list.head;
7095 while (cur_node != NULL) {
7096 monitors[i] = cur_node->mon;
7097 ++i;
7098 cur_node = cur_node->next;
7099 }
7100 return monitors;
7101}
7102
7103RGFW_monitor RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_getPrimaryMonitor) (void) {
7104 return _RGFW->monitors.list.head->mon;
7105}
7106
7107RGFW_bool RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_monitor_requestMode) (RGFW_monitor mon, RGFW_monitorMode mode, RGFW_modeRequest request) {
7108 RGFW_UNUSED(mon); RGFW_UNUSED(mode); RGFW_UNUSED(request);
7109 return RGFW_FALSE;
7110}
7111
7112RGFW_monitor RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_getMonitor) (RGFW_window* win) {
7113 RGFW_monitor mon;
7114 RGFW_MEMSET(&mon, 0, sizeof(mon));
7115
7116 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
7117 return mon;
7118
7119}
7120
7121#ifdef RGFW_OPENGL
7122RGFW_bool RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_extensionSupportedPlatform_OpenGL) (const char * extension, size_t len) { return RGFW_extensionSupportedPlatform_EGL(extension, len); }
7123RGFW_proc RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_getProcAddress_OpenGL) (const char* procname) { return RGFW_getProcAddress_EGL(procname); }
7124
7125
7126RGFW_bool RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_createContextPtr_OpenGL)(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_glContext* ctx, RGFW_glHints* hints) {
7127 RGFW_bool out = RGFW_window_createContextPtr_EGL(win, &ctx->egl, hints);
7128 win->src.gfxType = RGFW_gfxNativeOpenGL;
7129 return out;
7130}
7131void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_deleteContextPtr_OpenGL) (RGFW_window* win, RGFW_glContext* ctx) { RGFW_window_deleteContextPtr_EGL(win, &ctx->egl); win->src.ctx.native = NULL; }
7132
7133void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_makeCurrentContext_OpenGL) (RGFW_window* win) { RGFW_window_makeCurrentContext_EGL(win); }
7134void* RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_getCurrentContext_OpenGL) (void) { return RGFW_getCurrentContext_EGL(); }
7135void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_swapBuffers_OpenGL) (RGFW_window* win) { RGFW_window_swapBuffers_EGL(win); }
7136void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_swapInterval_OpenGL) (RGFW_window* win, i32 swapInterval) { RGFW_window_swapInterval_EGL(win, swapInterval); }
7137#endif /* RGFW_OPENGL */
7138
7139void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_closePlatform)(RGFW_window* win) {
7140 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
7141 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeInfo, RGFW_infoWindow, "a window was freed");
7142 #ifdef RGFW_LIBDECOR
7143 if (win->src.decorContext)
7144 libdecor_unref(win->src.decorContext);
7145 #endif
7146
7147 if (win->src.decoration) {
7148 zxdg_toplevel_decoration_v1_destroy(win->src.decoration);
7149 }
7150
7151 if (win->src.xdg_toplevel) {
7152 xdg_toplevel_destroy(win->src.xdg_toplevel);
7153 }
7154
7155 xdg_surface_destroy(win->src.xdg_surface);
7156 wl_surface_destroy(win->src.surface);
7157}
7158
7159#ifdef RGFW_WEBGPU
7160WGPUSurface RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_createSurface_WebGPU) (RGFW_window* window, WGPUInstance instance) {
7161 WGPUSurfaceDescriptor surfaceDesc = {0};
7162 WGPUSurfaceSourceWaylandSurface fromWl = {0};
7163 fromWl.chain.sType = WGPUSType_SurfaceSourceWaylandSurface;
7164 fromWl.display = window->src.wl_display;
7165 fromWl.surface = window->src.surface;
7166
7167 surfaceDesc.nextInChain = (WGPUChainedStruct*)&fromWl.chain;
7168 return wgpuInstanceCreateSurface(instance, &surfaceDesc);
7169}
7170#endif
7171
7172
7173
7174#endif /* RGFW_WAYLAND */
7175/*
7176 End of Wayland defines
7177*/
7178
7179/*
7180
7181 Start of Windows defines
7182
7183
7184*/
7185
7186#ifdef RGFW_WINDOWS
7187#define WIN32_LEAN_AND_MEAN
7188#define OEMRESOURCE
7189#include <windows.h>
7190
7191#include <windowsx.h>
7192#include <shellapi.h>
7193#include <shellscalingapi.h>
7194#include <wchar.h>
7195#include <locale.h>
7196#include <winuser.h>
7197
7198#ifndef WM_DPICHANGED
7199#define WM_DPICHANGED 0x02E0
7200#endif
7201
7202char* RGFW_createUTF8FromWideStringWin32(const WCHAR* source);
7203
7204#define GL_FRONT 0x0404
7205#define GL_BACK 0x0405
7206#define GL_LEFT 0x0406
7207#define GL_RIGHT 0x0407
7208
7209typedef int (*PFN_wglGetSwapIntervalEXT)(void);
7210PFN_wglGetSwapIntervalEXT wglGetSwapIntervalEXTSrc = NULL;
7211#define wglGetSwapIntervalEXT wglGetSwapIntervalEXTSrc
7212
7213/* these two wgl functions need to be preloaded */
7214typedef HGLRC (WINAPI *PFNWGLCREATECONTEXTATTRIBSARBPROC)(HDC hdc, HGLRC hglrc, const int *attribList);
7215PFNWGLCREATECONTEXTATTRIBSARBPROC wglCreateContextAttribsARB = NULL;
7216
7217HMODULE RGFW_wgl_dll = NULL;
7218
7219#ifndef RGFW_NO_LOAD_WGL
7220 typedef HGLRC(WINAPI* PFN_wglCreateContext)(HDC);
7221 typedef BOOL(WINAPI* PFN_wglDeleteContext)(HGLRC);
7222 typedef PROC(WINAPI* PFN_wglGetProcAddress)(LPCSTR);
7223 typedef BOOL(WINAPI* PFN_wglMakeCurrent)(HDC, HGLRC);
7224 typedef HDC(WINAPI* PFN_wglGetCurrentDC)(void);
7225 typedef HGLRC(WINAPI* PFN_wglGetCurrentContext)(void);
7226 typedef BOOL(WINAPI* PFN_wglShareLists)(HGLRC, HGLRC);
7227
7228 PFN_wglCreateContext wglCreateContextSRC;
7229 PFN_wglDeleteContext wglDeleteContextSRC;
7230 PFN_wglGetProcAddress wglGetProcAddressSRC;
7231 PFN_wglMakeCurrent wglMakeCurrentSRC;
7232 PFN_wglGetCurrentDC wglGetCurrentDCSRC;
7233 PFN_wglGetCurrentContext wglGetCurrentContextSRC;
7234 PFN_wglShareLists wglShareListsSRC;
7235
7236 #define wglCreateContext wglCreateContextSRC
7237 #define wglDeleteContext wglDeleteContextSRC
7238 #define wglGetProcAddress wglGetProcAddressSRC
7239 #define wglMakeCurrent wglMakeCurrentSRC
7240 #define wglGetCurrentDC wglGetCurrentDCSRC
7241 #define wglGetCurrentContext wglGetCurrentContextSRC
7242 #define wglShareLists wglShareListsSRC
7243#endif
7244
7245void* RGFW_window_getHWND(RGFW_window* win) { return win->src.window; }
7246void* RGFW_window_getHDC(RGFW_window* win) { return win->src.hdc; }
7247
7248#ifdef RGFW_OPENGL
7249RGFWDEF void RGFW_win32_loadOpenGLFuncs(HWND dummyWin);
7250
7251typedef HRESULT (APIENTRY* PFNWGLCHOOSEPIXELFORMATARBPROC)(HDC hdc, const int* piAttribIList, const FLOAT* pfAttribFList, UINT nMaxFormats, int* piFormats, UINT* nNumFormats);
7252PFNWGLCHOOSEPIXELFORMATARBPROC wglChoosePixelFormatARB = NULL;
7253
7254typedef BOOL(APIENTRY* PFNWGLSWAPINTERVALEXTPROC)(int interval);
7255PFNWGLSWAPINTERVALEXTPROC wglSwapIntervalEXT = NULL;
7256#endif
7257
7258#ifndef RGFW_NO_DWM
7259HMODULE RGFW_dwm_dll = NULL;
7260#ifndef _DWMAPI_H_
7261typedef struct { DWORD dwFlags; int fEnable; HRGN hRgnBlur; int fTransitionOnMaximized;} DWM_BLURBEHIND;
7262#endif
7263typedef HRESULT (WINAPI * PFN_DwmEnableBlurBehindWindow)(HWND, const DWM_BLURBEHIND*);
7264PFN_DwmEnableBlurBehindWindow DwmEnableBlurBehindWindowSRC = NULL;
7265#endif
7266void RGFW_win32_makeWindowTransparent(RGFW_window* win);
7267void RGFW_win32_makeWindowTransparent(RGFW_window* win) {
7268 if (!(win->internal.flags & RGFW_windowTransparent)) return;
7269
7270 #ifndef RGFW_NO_DWM
7271 if (DwmEnableBlurBehindWindowSRC != NULL) {
7272 DWM_BLURBEHIND bb = {0, 0, 0, 0};
7273 bb.dwFlags = 0x1;
7274 bb.fEnable = TRUE;
7275 bb.hRgnBlur = NULL;
7276 DwmEnableBlurBehindWindowSRC(win->src.window, &bb);
7277
7278 } else
7279 #endif
7280 {
7281 SetWindowLong(win->src.window, GWL_EXSTYLE, WS_EX_LAYERED);
7282 SetLayeredWindowAttributes(win->src.window, 0, 128, LWA_ALPHA);
7283 }
7284}
7285
7286LRESULT CALLBACK WndProcW(HWND hWnd, UINT message, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM lParam);
7287LRESULT CALLBACK WndProcW(HWND hWnd, UINT message, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM lParam) {
7288 RGFW_window* win = (RGFW_window*)GetPropW(hWnd, L"RGFW");
7289 if (win == NULL) return DefWindowProcW(hWnd, message, wParam, lParam);
7290
7291 static BYTE keyboardState[256];
7292 GetKeyboardState(keyboardState);
7293
7294 RGFW_event event;
7295 RGFW_MEMSET(&event, 0, sizeof(event));
7296 event.common.win = win;
7297
7298 RECT windowRect;
7299 GetWindowRect(hWnd, &windowRect);
7300
7301 switch (message) {
7302 case WM_CLOSE:
7303 case WM_QUIT:
7304 RGFW_window_setShouldClose(win, RGFW_TRUE);
7305 RGFW_windowQuitCallback(win);
7306 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_quit; e.common.win = win);
7307 return 0;
7308 case WM_ACTIVATE: {
7309 RGFW_bool inFocus = RGFW_BOOL(LOWORD(wParam) != WA_INACTIVE);
7310
7311 win->internal.inFocus = RGFW_BOOL(inFocus);
7312 if ((win->internal.enabledEvents & (RGFW_BIT(RGFW_focusIn - inFocus)))) {
7313 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = (RGFW_eventType)((u8)RGFW_focusOut - inFocus); e.common.win = win);
7314 RGFW_focusCallback(win, inFocus);
7315 }
7316 if (inFocus == RGFW_FALSE) RGFW_window_focusLost(win);
7317 if ((win->internal.flags & RGFW_windowFullscreen) && inFocus == RGFW_TRUE)
7318 RGFW_window_setFullscreen(win, 1);
7319 return DefWindowProcW(hWnd, message, wParam, lParam);
7320 }
7321 case WM_MOVE:
7322 win->x = windowRect.left;
7323 win->y = windowRect.top;
7324
7325 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_windowMovedFlag)) return DefWindowProcW(hWnd, message, wParam, lParam);;
7326 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_windowMoved; e.common.win = win);
7327 RGFW_windowMovedCallback(win, win->x, win->y);
7328 return DefWindowProcW(hWnd, message, wParam, lParam);
7329 case WM_SIZE: {
7330 if (win->src.aspectRatioW != 0 && win->src.aspectRatioH != 0) {
7331 double aspectRatio = (double)win->src.aspectRatioW / win->src.aspectRatioH;
7332
7333 int width = windowRect.right - windowRect.left;
7334 int height = windowRect.bottom - windowRect.top;
7335 int newHeight = (int)(width / aspectRatio);
7336 int newWidth = (int)(height * aspectRatio);
7337
7338 if (win->w > (i32)((windowRect.right - windowRect.left) - win->src.offsetW) ||
7339 win->h > (i32)((windowRect.bottom - windowRect.top) - win->src.offsetH))
7340 {
7341 if (newHeight > height) windowRect.right = windowRect.left + newWidth;
7342 else windowRect.bottom = windowRect.top + newHeight;
7343 } else {
7344 if (newHeight < height) windowRect.right = windowRect.left + newWidth;
7345 else windowRect.bottom = windowRect.top + newHeight;
7346 }
7347
7348 RGFW_window_resize(win, (windowRect.right - windowRect.left) - win->src.offsetW,
7349 (windowRect.bottom - windowRect.top) - win->src.offsetH);
7350 }
7351
7352 win->w = (windowRect.right - windowRect.left) - (i32)win->src.offsetW;
7353 win->h = (windowRect.bottom - windowRect.top) - (i32)win->src.offsetH;
7354 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_windowResizedFlag)) return DefWindowProcW(hWnd, message, wParam, lParam);;
7355 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_windowResized; e.common.win = win);
7356 RGFW_windowResizedCallback(win, win->w, win->h);
7357 RGFW_window_checkMode(win);
7358 return DefWindowProcW(hWnd, message, wParam, lParam);
7359 }
7360 #ifndef RGFW_NO_MONITOR
7361 case WM_DPICHANGED: {
7362 if (win->internal.flags & RGFW_windowScaleToMonitor) RGFW_window_scaleToMonitor(win);
7363
7364 const float scaleX = HIWORD(wParam) / (float) 96;
7365 const float scaleY = LOWORD(wParam) / (float) 96;
7366
7367 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_scaleUpdatedFlag)) return DefWindowProcW(hWnd, message, wParam, lParam);;
7368 RGFW_scaleUpdatedCallback(win, scaleX, scaleY);
7369 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_scaleUpdated; e.scale.x = scaleX; e.scale.y = scaleY; e.common.win = win);
7370 return DefWindowProcW(hWnd, message, wParam, lParam);
7371 }
7372 #endif
7373 case WM_GETMINMAXINFO: {
7374 MINMAXINFO* mmi = (MINMAXINFO*) lParam;
7375 mmi->ptMinTrackSize.x = (LONG)(win->src.minSizeW + win->src.offsetW);
7376 mmi->ptMinTrackSize.y = (LONG)(win->src.minSizeH + win->src.offsetH);
7377 if (win->src.maxSizeW == 0 && win->src.maxSizeH == 0)
7378 return DefWindowProcW(hWnd, message, wParam, lParam);
7379
7380 mmi->ptMaxTrackSize.x = (LONG)(win->src.maxSizeW + win->src.offsetW);
7381 mmi->ptMaxTrackSize.y = (LONG)(win->src.maxSizeH + win->src.offsetH);
7382 return DefWindowProcW(hWnd, message, wParam, lParam);
7383 }
7384 case WM_PAINT: {
7385 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_windowRefreshFlag)) return DefWindowProcW(hWnd, message, wParam, lParam);
7386 PAINTSTRUCT ps;
7387 BeginPaint(hWnd, &ps);
7388 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_windowRefresh; e.common.win = win);
7389 RGFW_windowRefreshCallback(win);
7390 EndPaint(hWnd, &ps);
7391
7392 return DefWindowProcW(hWnd, message, wParam, lParam);
7393 }
7394 #if(_WIN32_WINNT >= 0x0600)
7395 case WM_DWMCOMPOSITIONCHANGED:
7396 case WM_DWMCOLORIZATIONCOLORCHANGED:
7397 RGFW_win32_makeWindowTransparent(win);
7398 break;
7399 #endif
7400/* based on sokol_app.h */
7401#ifdef RGFW_ADVANCED_SMOOTH_RESIZE
7402 case WM_ENTERSIZEMOVE: SetTimer(win->src.window, 1, USER_TIMER_MINIMUM, NULL); break;
7403 case WM_EXITSIZEMOVE: KillTimer(win->src.window, 1); break;
7404 case WM_TIMER:
7405 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_windowRefreshFlag)) return DefWindowProcW(hWnd, message, wParam, lParam);
7406 RGFW_windowRefreshCallback(win); break;
7407#endif
7408 case WM_NCLBUTTONDOWN: {
7409 /* workaround for half-second pause when starting to move window
7410 see: https://gamedev.net/forums/topic/672094-keeping-things-moving-during-win32-moveresize-events/5254386/
7411 */
7412 POINT point = { 0, 0 };
7413 if (SendMessage(win->src.window, WM_NCHITTEST, wParam, lParam) != HTCAPTION || GetCursorPos(&point) == FALSE)
7414 break;
7415
7416 ScreenToClient(win->src.window, &point);
7417 PostMessage(win->src.window, WM_MOUSEMOVE, 0, (u32)(point.x)|((u32)(point.y) << 16));
7418 break;
7419 }
7420 case WM_MOUSELEAVE:
7421 win->internal.mouseInside = RGFW_FALSE;
7422 _RGFW->windowState.winLeave = win;
7423 _RGFW->windowState.mouseLeave = RGFW_TRUE;
7424 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_mouseLeaveFlag)) return DefWindowProcW(hWnd, message, wParam, lParam);
7425 event.type = RGFW_mouseLeave;
7426 RGFW_window_getMouse(win, &event.mouse.x, &event.mouse.y);
7427 RGFW_mouseNotifyCallback(win, event.mouse.x, event.mouse.y, 0);
7428 break;
7429 case WM_SYSKEYUP: case WM_KEYUP: {
7430 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_keyReleasedFlag)) return DefWindowProcW(hWnd, message, wParam, lParam);
7431 i32 scancode = (HIWORD(lParam) & (KF_EXTENDED | 0xff));
7432 if (scancode == 0)
7433 scancode = (i32)MapVirtualKeyW((UINT)wParam, MAPVK_VK_TO_VSC);
7434
7435 switch (scancode) {
7436 case 0x54: scancode = 0x137; break; /* Alt+PrtS */
7437 case 0x146: scancode = 0x45; break; /* Ctrl+Pause */
7438 case 0x136: scancode = 0x36; break; /* CJK IME sets the extended bit for right Shift */
7439 default: break;
7440 }
7441
7442 event.key.value = (u8)RGFW_apiKeyToRGFW((u32) scancode);
7443
7444 if (wParam == VK_CONTROL) {
7445 if (HIWORD(lParam) & KF_EXTENDED)
7446 event.key.value = RGFW_controlR;
7447 else event.key.value = RGFW_controlL;
7448 }
7449
7450 wchar_t charBuffer;
7451 ToUnicodeEx((UINT)wParam, (UINT)scancode, keyboardState, (wchar_t*)&charBuffer, 1, 0, NULL);
7452
7453 event.key.sym = (u8)charBuffer;
7454
7455 _RGFW->keyboard[event.key.value].prev = _RGFW->keyboard[event.key.value].current;
7456 event.type = RGFW_keyReleased;
7457 event.key.repeat = RGFW_window_isKeyPressed(win, event.key.value);
7458 _RGFW->keyboard[event.key.value].current = 0;
7459
7460 RGFW_updateKeyMods(win, (GetKeyState(VK_CAPITAL) & 0x0001), (GetKeyState(VK_NUMLOCK) & 0x0001), (GetKeyState(VK_SCROLL) & 0x0001));
7461
7462 RGFW_keyCallback(win, event.key.value, event.key.sym, event.key.repeat, win->internal.mod, 0);
7463 break;
7464 }
7465 case WM_SYSKEYDOWN: case WM_KEYDOWN: {
7466 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_keyPressedFlag)) return DefWindowProcW(hWnd, message, wParam, lParam);
7467 i32 scancode = (HIWORD(lParam) & (KF_EXTENDED | 0xff));
7468 if (scancode == 0)
7469 scancode = (i32)MapVirtualKeyW((u32)wParam, MAPVK_VK_TO_VSC);
7470
7471 switch (scancode) {
7472 case 0x54: scancode = 0x137; break; /* Alt+PrtS */
7473 case 0x146: scancode = 0x45; break; /* Ctrl+Pause */
7474 case 0x136: scancode = 0x36; break; /* CJK IME sets the extended bit for right Shift */
7475 default: break;
7476 }
7477
7478 event.key.value = (u8)RGFW_apiKeyToRGFW((u32) scancode);
7479 if (wParam == VK_CONTROL) {
7480 if (HIWORD(lParam) & KF_EXTENDED)
7481 event.key.value = RGFW_controlR;
7482 else event.key.value = RGFW_controlL;
7483 }
7484
7485 wchar_t charBuffer;
7486 ToUnicodeEx((UINT)wParam, (UINT)scancode, keyboardState, &charBuffer, 1, 0, NULL);
7487 event.key.sym = (u8)charBuffer;
7488
7489 _RGFW->keyboard[event.key.value].prev = _RGFW->keyboard[event.key.value].current;
7490 event.type = RGFW_keyPressed;
7491 event.key.repeat = RGFW_window_isKeyPressed(win, event.key.value);
7492 _RGFW->keyboard[event.key.value].current = 1;
7493 RGFW_updateKeyMods(win, (GetKeyState(VK_CAPITAL) & 0x0001), (GetKeyState(VK_NUMLOCK) & 0x0001), (GetKeyState(VK_SCROLL) & 0x0001));
7494
7495 RGFW_keyCallback(win, event.key.value, event.key.sym, win->internal.mod, event.key.repeat, 1);
7496 break;
7497 }
7498 case WM_MOUSEMOVE: {
7499 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_mousePosChangedFlag)) return DefWindowProcW(hWnd, message, wParam, lParam);
7500 if ((win->internal.holdMouse))
7501 break;
7502
7503
7504 event.mouse.x = GET_X_LPARAM(lParam);
7505 event.mouse.y = GET_Y_LPARAM(lParam);
7506 event.mouse.vecX = (float)(event.mouse.x - win->internal.lastMouseX);
7507 event.mouse.vecY = (float)(event.mouse.y - win->internal.lastMouseY);
7508 _RGFW->vectorX = event.mouse.vecX;
7509 _RGFW->vectorY = event.mouse.vecY;
7510
7511 RGFW_mousePosCallback(win, event.mouse.x, event.mouse.y, event.mouse.vecX, event.mouse.vecY);
7512
7513 if (win->internal.mouseInside == RGFW_FALSE) {
7514 win->internal.mouseInside = RGFW_TRUE;
7515 _RGFW->windowState.win = win;
7516 _RGFW->windowState.mouseEnter = RGFW_TRUE;
7517 event.type = RGFW_mouseEnter;
7518 RGFW_mouseNotifyCallback(win, event.mouse.x, event.mouse.y, 1);
7519 RGFW_eventQueuePush(&event);
7520 }
7521
7522 event.type = RGFW_mousePosChanged;
7523 win->internal.lastMouseX = event.mouse.x;
7524 win->internal.lastMouseY = event.mouse.y;
7525 break;
7526 }
7527 case WM_INPUT: {
7528 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_mousePosChangedFlag) || !(win->internal.holdMouse)) return DefWindowProcW(hWnd, message, wParam, lParam);
7529 unsigned size = sizeof(RAWINPUT);
7530 static RAWINPUT raw;
7531
7532 GetRawInputData((HRAWINPUT)lParam, RID_INPUT, &raw, &size, sizeof(RAWINPUTHEADER));
7533
7534 if (raw.header.dwType != RIM_TYPEMOUSE || (raw.data.mouse.lLastX == 0 && raw.data.mouse.lLastY == 0) )
7535 break;
7536
7537 if (raw.data.mouse.usFlags & MOUSE_MOVE_ABSOLUTE) {
7538 POINT pos = {0, 0};
7539 int width, height;
7540
7541 if (raw.data.mouse.usFlags & MOUSE_VIRTUAL_DESKTOP) {
7542 pos.x += GetSystemMetrics(SM_XVIRTUALSCREEN);
7543 pos.y += GetSystemMetrics(SM_YVIRTUALSCREEN);
7544 width = GetSystemMetrics(SM_CXVIRTUALSCREEN);
7545 height = GetSystemMetrics(SM_CYVIRTUALSCREEN);
7546 }
7547 else {
7548 width = GetSystemMetrics(SM_CXSCREEN);
7549 height = GetSystemMetrics(SM_CYSCREEN);
7550 }
7551
7552 pos.x += (int) (((float)raw.data.mouse.lLastX / 65535.f) * (float)width);
7553 pos.y += (int) (((float)raw.data.mouse.lLastY / 65535.f) * (float)height);
7554 ScreenToClient(win->src.window, &pos);
7555
7556 event.mouse.vecX = (float)(pos.x - win->internal.lastMouseX);
7557 event.mouse.vecY = (float)(pos.y - win->internal.lastMouseY);
7558 } else {
7559 event.mouse.vecX = (float)(raw.data.mouse.lLastX);
7560 event.mouse.vecY = (float)(raw.data.mouse.lLastY);
7561 }
7562
7563 event.type = RGFW_mousePosChanged;
7564 win->internal.lastMouseX += (i32)event.mouse.vecX;
7565 win->internal.lastMouseY += (i32)event.mouse.vecY;
7566 _RGFW->vectorX = event.mouse.vecX;
7567 _RGFW->vectorY = event.mouse.vecY;
7568 event.mouse.x = win->internal.lastMouseX;
7569 event.mouse.y = win->internal.lastMouseY;
7570 RGFW_mousePosCallback(win, event.mouse.x, event.mouse.y, event.mouse.vecX, event.mouse.vecY);
7571 break;
7572 }
7573 case WM_LBUTTONDOWN: case WM_RBUTTONDOWN: case WM_MBUTTONDOWN: case WM_XBUTTONDOWN:
7574 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_mouseButtonPressedFlag)) return DefWindowProcW(hWnd, message, wParam, lParam);
7575 if (message == WM_XBUTTONDOWN)
7576 event.button.value = RGFW_mouseMisc1 + (GET_XBUTTON_WPARAM(wParam) == XBUTTON2);
7577 else event.button.value = (message == WM_LBUTTONDOWN) ? (u8)RGFW_mouseLeft :
7578 (message == WM_RBUTTONDOWN) ? (u8)RGFW_mouseRight : (u8)RGFW_mouseMiddle;
7579
7580 event.type = RGFW_mouseButtonPressed;
7581 _RGFW->mouseButtons[event.button.value].prev = _RGFW->mouseButtons[event.button.value].current;
7582 _RGFW->mouseButtons[event.button.value].current = 1;
7583 RGFW_mouseButtonCallback(win, event.button.value, 1);
7584 break;
7585 case WM_LBUTTONUP: case WM_RBUTTONUP: case WM_MBUTTONUP: case WM_XBUTTONUP:
7586 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_mouseButtonReleasedFlag)) return DefWindowProcW(hWnd, message, wParam, lParam);
7587 if (message == WM_XBUTTONUP)
7588 event.button.value = RGFW_mouseMisc1 + (GET_XBUTTON_WPARAM(wParam) == XBUTTON2);
7589 else event.button.value = (message == WM_LBUTTONUP) ? (u8)RGFW_mouseLeft :
7590 (message == WM_RBUTTONUP) ? (u8)RGFW_mouseRight : (u8)RGFW_mouseMiddle;
7591 event.type = RGFW_mouseButtonReleased;
7592 _RGFW->mouseButtons[event.button.value].prev = _RGFW->mouseButtons[event.button.value].current;
7593 _RGFW->mouseButtons[event.button.value].current = 0;
7594 RGFW_mouseButtonCallback(win, event.button.value, 0);
7595 break;
7596 case WM_MOUSEWHEEL:
7597 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_mouseScrollFlag)) return DefWindowProcW(hWnd, message, wParam, lParam);
7598
7599 event.type = RGFW_mouseScroll;
7600 event.scroll.x = 0.0f;
7601 event.scroll.y = (float)((double) HIWORD(wParam) / (double) WHEEL_DELTA);
7602 _RGFW->scrollX = event.scroll.x;
7603 _RGFW->scrollY = event.scroll.y;
7604
7605 RGFW_mouseScrollCallback(win, event.scroll.x, event.scroll.y);
7606 break;
7607 case 0x020E: /* WM_MOUSEHWHEEL */
7608 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_mouseScrollFlag)) return DefWindowProcW(hWnd, message, wParam, lParam);
7609
7610 event.type = RGFW_mouseScroll;
7611 event.scroll.x = -(float)((double) HIWORD(wParam) / (double) WHEEL_DELTA);
7612 event.scroll.y = (float)0.0f;
7613 _RGFW->scrollX = event.scroll.x;
7614 _RGFW->scrollY = event.scroll.y;
7615
7616 RGFW_mouseScrollCallback(win, event.scroll.x, event.scroll.y);
7617 break;
7618 case WM_DROPFILES: {
7619 event.type = RGFW_dataDrag;
7620
7621 HDROP drop = (HDROP) wParam;
7622 POINT pt;
7623
7624 /* Move the mouse to the position of the drop */
7625 DragQueryPoint(drop, &pt);
7626
7627 event.drag.x = pt.x;
7628 event.drag.y = pt.y;
7629
7630 _RGFW->windowState.win = win;
7631 _RGFW->windowState.dataDragging = RGFW_TRUE;
7632 _RGFW->windowState.dropX = event.drag.x;
7633 _RGFW->windowState.dropY = event.drag.y;
7634
7635 if ((win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_dataDrag)) {
7636 RGFW_dataDragCallback(win, event.drag.x, event.drag.y);
7637 RGFW_eventQueuePush(&event);
7638 }
7639
7640 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_dataDrop)) return DefWindowProcW(hWnd, message, wParam, lParam);
7641 event.type = 0;
7642 event.type = RGFW_dataDrop;
7643 event.drop.files = _RGFW->files;
7644 event.drop.count = 0;
7645 event.drop.count = DragQueryFileW(drop, 0xffffffff, NULL, 0);
7646
7647 u32 i;
7648 for (i = 0; i < event.drop.count; i++) {
7649 UINT length = DragQueryFileW(drop, i, NULL, 0);
7650 if (length == 0)
7651 continue;
7652
7653 WCHAR buffer[RGFW_MAX_PATH * 2];
7654 if (length > (RGFW_MAX_PATH * 2) - 1)
7655 length = RGFW_MAX_PATH * 2;
7656
7657 DragQueryFileW(drop, i, buffer, length + 1);
7658
7659 char* str = RGFW_createUTF8FromWideStringWin32(buffer);
7660 if (str != NULL)
7661 RGFW_MEMCPY(event.drop.files[i], str, length + 1);
7662
7663
7664 event.drop.files[i][RGFW_MAX_PATH - 1] = '\0';
7665 event.common.win = win;
7666 }
7667
7668 DragFinish(drop);
7669
7670 _RGFW->windowState.win = win;
7671 _RGFW->windowState.dataDrop = RGFW_TRUE;
7672 _RGFW->windowState.filesCount = event.drop.count;
7673 RGFW_dataDropCallback(win, event.drop.files, event.drop.count);
7674 break;
7675 }
7676 default: break;
7677 }
7678
7679 if (event.type) {
7680 RGFW_eventQueuePush(&event);
7681 }
7682
7683 return DefWindowProcW(hWnd, message, wParam, lParam);
7684}
7685
7686#ifndef RGFW_NO_DPI
7687 HMODULE RGFW_Shcore_dll = NULL;
7688 typedef HRESULT (WINAPI *PFN_GetDpiForMonitor)(HMONITOR,MONITOR_DPI_TYPE,UINT*,UINT*);
7689 PFN_GetDpiForMonitor GetDpiForMonitorSRC = NULL;
7690 #define GetDpiForMonitor GetDpiForMonitorSRC
7691#endif
7692
7693#if !defined(RGFW_NO_LOAD_WINMM) && !defined(RGFW_NO_WINMM)
7694 HMODULE RGFW_winmm_dll = NULL;
7695 typedef u32 (WINAPI * PFN_timeBeginPeriod)(u32);
7696 typedef PFN_timeBeginPeriod PFN_timeEndPeriod;
7697 PFN_timeBeginPeriod timeBeginPeriodSRC, timeEndPeriodSRC;
7698 #define timeBeginPeriod timeBeginPeriodSRC
7699 #define timeEndPeriod timeEndPeriodSRC
7700#elif !defined(RGFW_NO_WINMM)
7701 __declspec(dllimport) u32 __stdcall timeBeginPeriod(u32 uPeriod);
7702 __declspec(dllimport) u32 __stdcall timeEndPeriod(u32 uPeriod);
7703#endif
7704#define RGFW_PROC_DEF(proc, name) if (name##SRC == NULL && proc != NULL) { \
7705 name##SRC = (PFN_##name)(RGFW_proc)GetProcAddress((proc), (#name)); \
7706 RGFW_ASSERT(name##SRC != NULL); \
7707 }
7708
7709RGFW_bool RGFW_createSurfacePtr(u8* data, i32 w, i32 h, RGFW_format format, RGFW_surface* surface) {
7710 RGFW_ASSERT(surface != NULL);
7711 surface->data = data;
7712 surface->w = w;
7713 surface->h = h;
7714 surface->format = format;
7715
7716 BITMAPV5HEADER bi;
7717 ZeroMemory(&bi, sizeof(bi));
7718 bi.bV5Size = sizeof(bi);
7719 bi.bV5Width = (i32)w;
7720 bi.bV5Height = -((LONG) h);
7721 bi.bV5Planes = 1;
7722 bi.bV5BitCount = (format >= RGFW_formatRGBA8) ? 32 : 24;
7723 bi.bV5Compression = BI_RGB;
7724
7725 surface->native.bitmap = CreateDIBSection(_RGFW->root->src.hdc,
7726 (BITMAPINFO*) &bi, DIB_RGB_COLORS,
7727 (void**) &surface->native.bitmapBits,
7728 NULL, (DWORD) 0);
7729
7730 surface->native.format = (format >= RGFW_formatRGBA8) ? RGFW_formatBGRA8 : RGFW_formatBGR8;
7731
7732 if (surface->native.bitmap == NULL) {
7733 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeError, RGFW_errBuffer, "Failed to create DIB section.");
7734 return RGFW_FALSE;
7735 }
7736
7737 surface->native.hdcMem = CreateCompatibleDC(_RGFW->root->src.hdc);
7738 SelectObject(surface->native.hdcMem, surface->native.bitmap);
7739
7740 return RGFW_TRUE;
7741}
7742
7743void RGFW_surface_freePtr(RGFW_surface* surface) {
7744 RGFW_ASSERT(surface != NULL);
7745
7746 DeleteDC(surface->native.hdcMem);
7747 DeleteObject(surface->native.bitmap);
7748}
7749
7750void RGFW_window_blitSurface(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_surface* surface) {
7751 RGFW_copyImageData(surface->native.bitmapBits, surface->w, RGFW_MIN(win->h, surface->h), surface->native.format, surface->data, surface->format);
7752 BitBlt(win->src.hdc, 0, 0, RGFW_MIN(win->w, surface->w), RGFW_MIN(win->h, surface->h), surface->native.hdcMem, 0, 0, SRCCOPY);
7753}
7754
7755void RGFW_releaseCursor(RGFW_window* win) {
7756 RGFW_UNUSED(win);
7757 ClipCursor(NULL);
7758 const RAWINPUTDEVICE id = { 0x01, 0x02, RIDEV_REMOVE, NULL };
7759 RegisterRawInputDevices(&id, 1, sizeof(id));
7760}
7761
7762void RGFW_captureCursor(RGFW_window* win) {
7763 RGFW_UNUSED(win);
7764
7765 RECT clipRect;
7766 GetClientRect(win->src.window, &clipRect);
7767 ClientToScreen(win->src.window, (POINT*) &clipRect.left);
7768 ClientToScreen(win->src.window, (POINT*) &clipRect.right);
7769 ClipCursor(&clipRect);
7770
7771 const RAWINPUTDEVICE id = { 0x01, 0x02, 0, win->src.window };
7772 RegisterRawInputDevices(&id, 1, sizeof(id));
7773}
7774
7775#define RGFW_LOAD_LIBRARY(x, lib) if (x == NULL) { x = LoadLibraryA(lib); RGFW_ASSERT(x != NULL); }
7776
7777#ifdef RGFW_DIRECTX
7778int RGFW_window_createSwapChain_DirectX(RGFW_window* win, IDXGIFactory* pFactory, IUnknown* pDevice, IDXGISwapChain** swapchain) {
7779 RGFW_ASSERT(win && pFactory && pDevice && swapchain);
7780
7781 static DXGI_SWAP_CHAIN_DESC swapChainDesc = { 0 };
7782 swapChainDesc.BufferCount = 2;
7783 swapChainDesc.BufferDesc.Width = win->w;
7784 swapChainDesc.BufferDesc.Height = win->h;
7785 swapChainDesc.BufferDesc.Format = DXGI_FORMAT_R8G8B8A8_UNORM;
7786 swapChainDesc.BufferUsage = DXGI_USAGE_RENDER_TARGET_OUTPUT;
7787 swapChainDesc.OutputWindow = (HWND)win->src.window;
7788 swapChainDesc.SampleDesc.Count = 1;
7789 swapChainDesc.SampleDesc.Quality = 0;
7790 swapChainDesc.Windowed = TRUE;
7791 swapChainDesc.Flags = DXGI_SWAP_CHAIN_FLAG_ALLOW_MODE_SWITCH;
7792
7793 HRESULT hr = pFactory->lpVtbl->CreateSwapChain(pFactory, (IUnknown*)pDevice, &swapChainDesc, swapchain);
7794 if (FAILED(hr)) {
7795 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeError, RGFW_errDirectXContext, "Failed to create DirectX swap chain!");
7796 return -2;
7797 }
7798
7799 return 0;
7800}
7801#endif
7802
7803/* we're doing it with magic numbers because some keys are missing */
7804void RGFW_initKeycodesPlatform(void) {
7805 _RGFW->keycodes[0x00B] = RGFW_0;
7806 _RGFW->keycodes[0x002] = RGFW_1;
7807 _RGFW->keycodes[0x003] = RGFW_2;
7808 _RGFW->keycodes[0x004] = RGFW_3;
7809 _RGFW->keycodes[0x005] = RGFW_4;
7810 _RGFW->keycodes[0x006] = RGFW_5;
7811 _RGFW->keycodes[0x007] = RGFW_6;
7812 _RGFW->keycodes[0x008] = RGFW_7;
7813 _RGFW->keycodes[0x009] = RGFW_8;
7814 _RGFW->keycodes[0x00A] = RGFW_9;
7815 _RGFW->keycodes[0x01E] = RGFW_a;
7816 _RGFW->keycodes[0x030] = RGFW_b;
7817 _RGFW->keycodes[0x02E] = RGFW_c;
7818 _RGFW->keycodes[0x020] = RGFW_d;
7819 _RGFW->keycodes[0x012] = RGFW_e;
7820 _RGFW->keycodes[0x021] = RGFW_f;
7821 _RGFW->keycodes[0x022] = RGFW_g;
7822 _RGFW->keycodes[0x023] = RGFW_h;
7823 _RGFW->keycodes[0x017] = RGFW_i;
7824 _RGFW->keycodes[0x024] = RGFW_j;
7825 _RGFW->keycodes[0x025] = RGFW_k;
7826 _RGFW->keycodes[0x026] = RGFW_l;
7827 _RGFW->keycodes[0x032] = RGFW_m;
7828 _RGFW->keycodes[0x031] = RGFW_n;
7829 _RGFW->keycodes[0x018] = RGFW_o;
7830 _RGFW->keycodes[0x019] = RGFW_p;
7831 _RGFW->keycodes[0x010] = RGFW_q;
7832 _RGFW->keycodes[0x013] = RGFW_r;
7833 _RGFW->keycodes[0x01F] = RGFW_s;
7834 _RGFW->keycodes[0x014] = RGFW_t;
7835 _RGFW->keycodes[0x016] = RGFW_u;
7836 _RGFW->keycodes[0x02F] = RGFW_v;
7837 _RGFW->keycodes[0x011] = RGFW_w;
7838 _RGFW->keycodes[0x02D] = RGFW_x;
7839 _RGFW->keycodes[0x015] = RGFW_y;
7840 _RGFW->keycodes[0x02C] = RGFW_z;
7841 _RGFW->keycodes[0x028] = RGFW_apostrophe;
7842 _RGFW->keycodes[0x02B] = RGFW_backSlash;
7843 _RGFW->keycodes[0x033] = RGFW_comma;
7844 _RGFW->keycodes[0x00D] = RGFW_equals;
7845 _RGFW->keycodes[0x029] = RGFW_backtick;
7846 _RGFW->keycodes[0x01A] = RGFW_bracket;
7847 _RGFW->keycodes[0x00C] = RGFW_minus;
7848 _RGFW->keycodes[0x034] = RGFW_period;
7849 _RGFW->keycodes[0x01B] = RGFW_closeBracket;
7850 _RGFW->keycodes[0x027] = RGFW_semicolon;
7851 _RGFW->keycodes[0x035] = RGFW_slash;
7852 _RGFW->keycodes[0x056] = RGFW_world2;
7853 _RGFW->keycodes[0x00E] = RGFW_backSpace;
7854 _RGFW->keycodes[0x153] = RGFW_delete;
7855 _RGFW->keycodes[0x14F] = RGFW_end;
7856 _RGFW->keycodes[0x01C] = RGFW_enter;
7857 _RGFW->keycodes[0x001] = RGFW_escape;
7858 _RGFW->keycodes[0x147] = RGFW_home;
7859 _RGFW->keycodes[0x152] = RGFW_insert;
7860 _RGFW->keycodes[0x15D] = RGFW_menu;
7861 _RGFW->keycodes[0x151] = RGFW_pageDown;
7862 _RGFW->keycodes[0x149] = RGFW_pageUp;
7863 _RGFW->keycodes[0x045] = RGFW_pause;
7864 _RGFW->keycodes[0x039] = RGFW_space;
7865 _RGFW->keycodes[0x00F] = RGFW_tab;
7866 _RGFW->keycodes[0x03A] = RGFW_capsLock;
7867 _RGFW->keycodes[0x145] = RGFW_numLock;
7868 _RGFW->keycodes[0x046] = RGFW_scrollLock;
7869 _RGFW->keycodes[0x03B] = RGFW_F1;
7870 _RGFW->keycodes[0x03C] = RGFW_F2;
7871 _RGFW->keycodes[0x03D] = RGFW_F3;
7872 _RGFW->keycodes[0x03E] = RGFW_F4;
7873 _RGFW->keycodes[0x03F] = RGFW_F5;
7874 _RGFW->keycodes[0x040] = RGFW_F6;
7875 _RGFW->keycodes[0x041] = RGFW_F7;
7876 _RGFW->keycodes[0x042] = RGFW_F8;
7877 _RGFW->keycodes[0x043] = RGFW_F9;
7878 _RGFW->keycodes[0x044] = RGFW_F10;
7879 _RGFW->keycodes[0x057] = RGFW_F11;
7880 _RGFW->keycodes[0x058] = RGFW_F12;
7881 _RGFW->keycodes[0x064] = RGFW_F13;
7882 _RGFW->keycodes[0x065] = RGFW_F14;
7883 _RGFW->keycodes[0x066] = RGFW_F15;
7884 _RGFW->keycodes[0x067] = RGFW_F16;
7885 _RGFW->keycodes[0x068] = RGFW_F17;
7886 _RGFW->keycodes[0x069] = RGFW_F18;
7887 _RGFW->keycodes[0x06A] = RGFW_F19;
7888 _RGFW->keycodes[0x06B] = RGFW_F20;
7889 _RGFW->keycodes[0x06C] = RGFW_F21;
7890 _RGFW->keycodes[0x06D] = RGFW_F22;
7891 _RGFW->keycodes[0x06E] = RGFW_F23;
7892 _RGFW->keycodes[0x076] = RGFW_F24;
7893 _RGFW->keycodes[0x038] = RGFW_altL;
7894 _RGFW->keycodes[0x01D] = RGFW_controlL;
7895 _RGFW->keycodes[0x02A] = RGFW_shiftL;
7896 _RGFW->keycodes[0x15B] = RGFW_superL;
7897 _RGFW->keycodes[0x137] = RGFW_printScreen;
7898 _RGFW->keycodes[0x138] = RGFW_altR;
7899 _RGFW->keycodes[0x11D] = RGFW_controlR;
7900 _RGFW->keycodes[0x036] = RGFW_shiftR;
7901 _RGFW->keycodes[0x15C] = RGFW_superR;
7902 _RGFW->keycodes[0x150] = RGFW_down;
7903 _RGFW->keycodes[0x14B] = RGFW_left;
7904 _RGFW->keycodes[0x14D] = RGFW_right;
7905 _RGFW->keycodes[0x148] = RGFW_up;
7906 _RGFW->keycodes[0x052] = RGFW_kp0;
7907 _RGFW->keycodes[0x04F] = RGFW_kp1;
7908 _RGFW->keycodes[0x050] = RGFW_kp2;
7909 _RGFW->keycodes[0x051] = RGFW_kp3;
7910 _RGFW->keycodes[0x04B] = RGFW_kp4;
7911 _RGFW->keycodes[0x04C] = RGFW_kp5;
7912 _RGFW->keycodes[0x04D] = RGFW_kp6;
7913 _RGFW->keycodes[0x047] = RGFW_kp7;
7914 _RGFW->keycodes[0x048] = RGFW_kp8;
7915 _RGFW->keycodes[0x049] = RGFW_kp9;
7916 _RGFW->keycodes[0x04E] = RGFW_kpPlus;
7917 _RGFW->keycodes[0x053] = RGFW_kpPeriod;
7918 _RGFW->keycodes[0x135] = RGFW_kpSlash;
7919 _RGFW->keycodes[0x11C] = RGFW_kpReturn;
7920 _RGFW->keycodes[0x059] = RGFW_kpEqual;
7921 _RGFW->keycodes[0x037] = RGFW_kpMultiply;
7922 _RGFW->keycodes[0x04A] = RGFW_kpMinus;
7923}
7924
7925
7926i32 RGFW_initPlatform(void) {
7927#ifndef RGFW_NO_DPI
7928 #if (_WIN32_WINNT >= 0x0600)
7929 SetProcessDPIAware();
7930 #endif
7931#endif
7932
7933 #ifndef RGFW_NO_WINMM
7934 #ifndef RGFW_NO_LOAD_WINMM
7935 RGFW_LOAD_LIBRARY(RGFW_winmm_dll, "winmm.dll");
7936 RGFW_PROC_DEF(RGFW_winmm_dll, timeBeginPeriod);
7937 RGFW_PROC_DEF(RGFW_winmm_dll, timeEndPeriod);
7938 #endif
7939 timeBeginPeriod(1);
7940 #endif
7941
7942 #ifndef RGFW_NO_DWM
7943 RGFW_LOAD_LIBRARY(RGFW_dwm_dll, "dwmapi.dll");
7944 RGFW_PROC_DEF(RGFW_dwm_dll, DwmEnableBlurBehindWindow);
7945 #endif
7946
7947 RGFW_LOAD_LIBRARY(RGFW_wgl_dll, "opengl32.dll");
7948 #ifndef RGFW_NO_LOAD_WGL
7949 RGFW_PROC_DEF(RGFW_wgl_dll, wglCreateContext);
7950 RGFW_PROC_DEF(RGFW_wgl_dll, wglDeleteContext);
7951 RGFW_PROC_DEF(RGFW_wgl_dll, wglGetProcAddress);
7952 RGFW_PROC_DEF(RGFW_wgl_dll, wglMakeCurrent);
7953 RGFW_PROC_DEF(RGFW_wgl_dll, wglGetCurrentDC);
7954 RGFW_PROC_DEF(RGFW_wgl_dll, wglGetCurrentContext);
7955 RGFW_PROC_DEF(RGFW_wgl_dll, wglShareLists);
7956 #endif
7957
7958 u8 RGFW_blk[] = { 0, 0, 0, 0 };
7959 _RGFW->hiddenMouse = RGFW_loadMouse(RGFW_blk, 1, 1, RGFW_formatRGBA8);
7960 return 1;
7961}
7962
7963RGFW_window* RGFW_createWindowPlatform(const char* name, RGFW_windowFlags flags, RGFW_window* win) {
7964 if (name[0] == 0) name = (char*) " ";
7965 win->src.hIconSmall = win->src.hIconBig = NULL;
7966 win->src.maxSizeW = 0;
7967 win->src.maxSizeH = 0;
7968 win->src.minSizeW = 0;
7969 win->src.minSizeH = 0;
7970 win->src.aspectRatioW = 0;
7971 win->src.aspectRatioH = 0;
7972
7973 HINSTANCE inh = GetModuleHandleA(NULL);
7974
7975 #ifndef __cplusplus
7976 WNDCLASSW Class = {0};
7977 #else
7978 WNDCLASSW Class = {};
7979 #endif
7980
7981 if (_RGFW->className == NULL)
7982 _RGFW->className = (char*)name;
7983
7984 wchar_t wide_class[256];
7985 MultiByteToWideChar(CP_UTF8, 0, _RGFW->className, -1, wide_class, 255);
7986
7987 Class.lpszClassName = wide_class;
7988 Class.hInstance = inh;
7989 Class.hCursor = LoadCursor(NULL, IDC_ARROW);
7990 Class.lpfnWndProc = WndProcW;
7991 Class.cbClsExtra = sizeof(RGFW_window*);
7992
7993 Class.hIcon = (HICON)LoadImageA(GetModuleHandleW(NULL), "RGFW_ICON", IMAGE_ICON, 0, 0, LR_DEFAULTSIZE | LR_SHARED);
7994 if (Class.hIcon == NULL)
7995 Class.hIcon = (HICON)LoadImageA(NULL, (LPCSTR)IDI_APPLICATION, IMAGE_ICON, 0, 0, LR_DEFAULTSIZE | LR_SHARED);
7996
7997 RegisterClassW(&Class);
7998
7999 DWORD window_style = WS_CLIPSIBLINGS | WS_CLIPCHILDREN;
8000
8001 RECT windowRect, clientRect;
8002
8003 if (!(flags & RGFW_windowNoBorder)) {
8004 window_style |= WS_CAPTION | WS_SYSMENU | WS_BORDER | WS_MINIMIZEBOX;
8005
8006 if (!(flags & RGFW_windowNoResize))
8007 window_style |= WS_SIZEBOX | WS_MAXIMIZEBOX;
8008 } else
8009 window_style |= WS_POPUP | WS_VISIBLE | WS_SYSMENU;
8010
8011 wchar_t wide_name[256];
8012 MultiByteToWideChar(CP_UTF8, 0, name, -1, wide_name, 255);
8013 HWND dummyWin = CreateWindowW(Class.lpszClassName, (wchar_t*)wide_name, window_style, win->x, win->y, win->w, win->h, 0, 0, inh, 0);
8014
8015 GetWindowRect(dummyWin, &windowRect);
8016 GetClientRect(dummyWin, &clientRect);
8017
8018#ifdef RGFW_OPENGL
8019 RGFW_win32_loadOpenGLFuncs(dummyWin);
8020#endif
8021
8022 DestroyWindow(dummyWin);
8023
8024 win->src.offsetW = (i32)(windowRect.right - windowRect.left) - (i32)(clientRect.right - clientRect.left);
8025 win->src.offsetH = (i32)(windowRect.bottom - windowRect.top) - (i32)(clientRect.bottom - clientRect.top);
8026 win->src.window = CreateWindowW(Class.lpszClassName, (wchar_t*)wide_name, window_style, win->x, win->y, win->w + (i32)win->src.offsetW, win->h + (i32)win->src.offsetH, 0, 0, inh, 0);
8027 SetPropW(win->src.window, L"RGFW", win);
8028 RGFW_window_resize(win, win->w, win->h); /* so WM_GETMINMAXINFO gets called again */
8029
8030 if (flags & RGFW_windowAllowDND) {
8031 win->internal.flags |= RGFW_windowAllowDND;
8032 RGFW_window_setDND(win, 1);
8033 }
8034 win->src.hdc = GetDC(win->src.window);
8035
8036 RGFW_win32_makeWindowTransparent(win);
8037 return win;
8038}
8039
8040void RGFW_window_setBorder(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_bool border) {
8041 RGFW_setBit(&win->internal.flags, RGFW_windowNoBorder, !border);
8042 LONG style = GetWindowLong(win->src.window, GWL_STYLE);
8043
8044
8045 if (border == 0) {
8046 SetWindowLong(win->src.window, GWL_STYLE, style & ~WS_OVERLAPPEDWINDOW);
8047 SetWindowPos(
8048 win->src.window, HWND_TOP, 0, 0, 0, 0,
8049 SWP_NOZORDER | SWP_FRAMECHANGED | SWP_SHOWWINDOW | SWP_NOMOVE | SWP_NOSIZE
8050 );
8051 }
8052 else {
8053 style |= WS_OVERLAPPEDWINDOW;
8054 if (win->internal.flags & RGFW_windowNoResize) style &= ~WS_MAXIMIZEBOX;
8055 SetWindowPos(
8056 win->src.window, HWND_TOP, 0, 0, 0, 0,
8057 SWP_NOZORDER | SWP_FRAMECHANGED | SWP_SHOWWINDOW | SWP_NOMOVE | SWP_NOSIZE
8058 );
8059 }
8060}
8061
8062void RGFW_window_setDND(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_bool allow) {
8063 RGFW_setBit(&win->internal.flags, RGFW_windowAllowDND, allow);
8064 DragAcceptFiles(win->src.window, allow);
8065}
8066
8067RGFW_bool RGFW_getGlobalMouse(i32* x, i32* y) {
8068 POINT p;
8069 GetCursorPos(&p);
8070 if (x) *x = p.x;
8071 if (y) *y = p.y;
8072 return RGFW_TRUE;
8073}
8074
8075void RGFW_window_setAspectRatio(RGFW_window* win, i32 w, i32 h) {
8076 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
8077 win->src.aspectRatioW = w;
8078 win->src.aspectRatioH = h;
8079}
8080
8081void RGFW_window_setMinSize(RGFW_window* win, i32 w, i32 h) {
8082 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
8083 win->src.minSizeW = w;
8084 win->src.minSizeH = h;
8085}
8086
8087void RGFW_window_setMaxSize(RGFW_window* win, i32 w, i32 h) {
8088 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
8089 win->src.maxSizeW = w;
8090 win->src.maxSizeH = h;
8091}
8092
8093void RGFW_window_focus(RGFW_window* win) {
8094 RGFW_ASSERT(win);
8095 SetForegroundWindow(win->src.window);
8096 SetFocus(win->src.window);
8097}
8098
8099void RGFW_window_raise(RGFW_window* win) {
8100 RGFW_ASSERT(win);
8101 BringWindowToTop(win->src.window);
8102 SetWindowPos(win->src.window, HWND_TOP, win->x, win->y, win->w, win->h, SWP_NOSIZE | SWP_NOMOVE | SWP_NOOWNERZORDER | SWP_FRAMECHANGED);
8103}
8104
8105void RGFW_window_setFullscreen(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_bool fullscreen) {
8106 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
8107
8108 if (fullscreen == RGFW_FALSE) {
8109 RGFW_window_setBorder(win, 1);
8110 SetWindowPos(win->src.window, HWND_NOTOPMOST, win->internal.oldX, win->internal.oldY, win->internal.oldW + (i32)win->src.offsetW, win->internal.oldH + (i32)win->src.offsetH,
8111 SWP_NOOWNERZORDER | SWP_FRAMECHANGED);
8112
8113 win->internal.flags &= ~(u32)RGFW_windowFullscreen;
8114 win->x = win->internal.oldX;
8115 win->y = win->internal.oldY;
8116 win->w = win->internal.oldW;
8117 win->h = win->internal.oldH;
8118 return;
8119 }
8120
8121 win->internal.oldX = win->x;
8122 win->internal.oldY = win->y;
8123 win->internal.oldW = win->w;
8124 win->internal.oldH = win->h;
8125 win->internal.flags |= RGFW_windowFullscreen;
8126
8127 RGFW_monitor mon = RGFW_window_getMonitor(win);
8128 RGFW_window_setBorder(win, 0);
8129
8130 SetWindowPos(win->src.window, HWND_TOPMOST, 0, 0, (i32)mon.mode.w, (i32)mon.mode.h, SWP_NOOWNERZORDER | SWP_FRAMECHANGED | SWP_SHOWWINDOW);
8131 RGFW_monitor_scaleToWindow(mon, win);
8132
8133 win->x = 0; win->y = 0;
8134 win->w = mon.mode.w;
8135 win->h = mon.mode.h;
8136}
8137
8138void RGFW_window_maximize(RGFW_window* win) {
8139 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
8140 RGFW_window_hide(win);
8141 ShowWindow(win->src.window, SW_MAXIMIZE);
8142}
8143
8144void RGFW_window_minimize(RGFW_window* win) {
8145 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
8146 ShowWindow(win->src.window, SW_MINIMIZE);
8147}
8148
8149void RGFW_window_setFloating(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_bool floating) {
8150 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
8151 if (floating) SetWindowPos(win->src.window, HWND_TOPMOST, 0, 0, 0, 0, SWP_NOMOVE | SWP_NOSIZE | SWP_SHOWWINDOW);
8152 else SetWindowPos(win->src.window, HWND_NOTOPMOST, 0, 0, 0, 0, SWP_NOMOVE | SWP_NOSIZE | SWP_SHOWWINDOW);
8153}
8154
8155void RGFW_window_setOpacity(RGFW_window* win, u8 opacity) {
8156 SetWindowLong(win->src.window, GWL_EXSTYLE, WS_EX_LAYERED);
8157 SetLayeredWindowAttributes(win->src.window, 0, opacity, LWA_ALPHA);
8158}
8159
8160void RGFW_window_restore(RGFW_window* win) { RGFW_window_show(win); }
8161
8162RGFW_bool RGFW_window_isFloating(RGFW_window* win) {
8163 return (GetWindowLongPtr(win->src.window, GWL_EXSTYLE) & WS_EX_TOPMOST) != 0;
8164}
8165
8166void RGFW_stopCheckEvents(void) {
8167 PostMessageW(_RGFW->root->src.window, WM_NULL, 0, 0);
8168}
8169
8170void RGFW_waitForEvent(i32 waitMS) {
8171 MsgWaitForMultipleObjects(0, NULL, FALSE, (DWORD)waitMS, QS_ALLINPUT);
8172}
8173
8174u8 RGFW_rgfwToKeyChar(u32 rgfw_keycode) {
8175 UINT vsc = RGFW_rgfwToApiKey(rgfw_keycode); /* Should return a Windows VK_* code */
8176 BYTE keyboardState[256] = {0};
8177
8178 if (!GetKeyboardState(keyboardState))
8179 return (u8)rgfw_keycode;
8180
8181 UINT vk = MapVirtualKeyW(vsc, MAPVK_VSC_TO_VK);
8182 HKL layout = GetKeyboardLayout(0);
8183
8184 wchar_t charBuffer[2] = {0};
8185 int result = ToUnicodeEx(vk, vsc, keyboardState, charBuffer, 1, 0, layout);
8186
8187 if (result <= 0)
8188 return (u8)rgfw_keycode;
8189
8190 return (u8)charBuffer[0];
8191}
8192
8193void RGFW_pollEvents(void) {
8194 RGFW_resetPrevState();
8195 MSG msg;
8196 while (PeekMessageA(&msg, NULL, 0u, 0u, PM_REMOVE)) {
8197 TranslateMessage(&msg);
8198 DispatchMessageA(&msg);
8199 }
8200}
8201
8202RGFW_bool RGFW_window_isHidden(RGFW_window* win) {
8203 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
8204 return IsWindowVisible(win->src.window) == 0 && !RGFW_window_isMinimized(win);
8205}
8206
8207RGFW_bool RGFW_window_isMinimized(RGFW_window* win) {
8208 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
8209
8210 #ifndef __cplusplus
8211 WINDOWPLACEMENT placement = {0};
8212 #else
8213 WINDOWPLACEMENT placement = {};
8214 #endif
8215 GetWindowPlacement(win->src.window, &placement);
8216 return placement.showCmd == SW_SHOWMINIMIZED;
8217}
8218
8219RGFW_bool RGFW_window_isMaximized(RGFW_window* win) {
8220 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
8221
8222 #ifndef __cplusplus
8223 WINDOWPLACEMENT placement = {0};
8224 #else
8225 WINDOWPLACEMENT placement = {};
8226 #endif
8227 GetWindowPlacement(win->src.window, &placement);
8228 return placement.showCmd == SW_SHOWMAXIMIZED || IsZoomed(win->src.window);
8229}
8230
8231typedef struct { int iIndex; HMONITOR hMonitor; RGFW_monitor* monitors; } RGFW_mInfo;
8232#ifndef RGFW_NO_MONITOR
8233RGFW_monitor win32CreateMonitor(HMONITOR src);
8234RGFW_monitor win32CreateMonitor(HMONITOR src) {
8235 RGFW_monitor monitor;
8236 MONITORINFOEX monitorInfo;
8237
8238 monitorInfo.cbSize = sizeof(MONITORINFOEX);
8239 GetMonitorInfoA(src, (LPMONITORINFO)&monitorInfo);
8240
8241 /* get the monitor's index */
8242 DISPLAY_DEVICEA dd;
8243 dd.cb = sizeof(dd);
8244
8245 DWORD deviceNum;
8246 for (deviceNum = 0; EnumDisplayDevicesA(NULL, deviceNum, &dd, 0); deviceNum++) {
8247 if (!(dd.StateFlags & DISPLAY_DEVICE_ACTIVE))
8248 continue;
8249
8250 DEVMODEA dm;
8251 ZeroMemory(&dm, sizeof(dm));
8252 dm.dmSize = sizeof(dm);
8253
8254 if (EnumDisplaySettingsA(dd.DeviceName, ENUM_CURRENT_SETTINGS, &dm)) {
8255 monitor.mode.refreshRate = dm.dmDisplayFrequency;
8256 RGFW_splitBPP(dm.dmBitsPerPel, &monitor.mode);
8257 }
8258
8259 DISPLAY_DEVICEA mdd;
8260 mdd.cb = sizeof(mdd);
8261
8262 if (EnumDisplayDevicesA(dd.DeviceName, (DWORD)deviceNum, &mdd, 0)) {
8263 RGFW_STRNCPY(monitor.name, mdd.DeviceString, sizeof(monitor.name) - 1);
8264 monitor.name[sizeof(monitor.name) - 1] = '\0';
8265 break;
8266 }
8267 }
8268
8269
8270
8271
8272 monitor.x = monitorInfo.rcWork.left;
8273 monitor.y = monitorInfo.rcWork.top;
8274 monitor.mode.w = (i32)(monitorInfo.rcMonitor.right - monitorInfo.rcMonitor.left);
8275 monitor.mode.h = (i32)(monitorInfo.rcMonitor.bottom - monitorInfo.rcMonitor.top);
8276
8277 HDC hdc = CreateDC(monitorInfo.szDevice, NULL, NULL, NULL);
8278 /* get pixels per inch */
8279 float dpiX = (float)GetDeviceCaps(hdc, LOGPIXELSX);
8280 float dpiY = (float)GetDeviceCaps(hdc, LOGPIXELSX);
8281
8282 monitor.scaleX = dpiX / 96.0f;
8283 monitor.scaleY = dpiY / 96.0f;
8284 monitor.pixelRatio = dpiX >= 192.0f ? 2.0f : 1.0f;
8285
8286 monitor.physW = (float)GetDeviceCaps(hdc, HORZSIZE) / 25.4f;
8287 monitor.physH = (float)GetDeviceCaps(hdc, VERTSIZE) / 25.4f;
8288 DeleteDC(hdc);
8289
8290 #ifndef RGFW_NO_DPI
8291 RGFW_LOAD_LIBRARY(RGFW_Shcore_dll, "shcore.dll");
8292 RGFW_PROC_DEF(RGFW_Shcore_dll, GetDpiForMonitor);
8293
8294 if (GetDpiForMonitor != NULL) {
8295 u32 x, y;
8296 GetDpiForMonitor(src, MDT_EFFECTIVE_DPI, &x, &y);
8297 monitor.scaleX = (float) (x) / (float) 96.0f;
8298 monitor.scaleY = (float) (y) / (float) 96.0f;
8299 monitor.pixelRatio = dpiX >= 192.0f ? 2.0f : 1.0f;
8300 }
8301 #endif
8302
8303 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeInfo, RGFW_infoMonitor, "monitor found");
8304 return monitor;
8305}
8306#endif /* RGFW_NO_MONITOR */
8307
8308#ifndef RGFW_NO_MONITOR
8309BOOL CALLBACK GetMonitorHandle(HMONITOR hMonitor, HDC hdcMonitor, LPRECT lprcMonitor, LPARAM dwData);
8310BOOL CALLBACK GetMonitorHandle(HMONITOR hMonitor, HDC hdcMonitor, LPRECT lprcMonitor, LPARAM dwData) {
8311 RGFW_UNUSED(hdcMonitor);
8312 RGFW_UNUSED(lprcMonitor);
8313
8314 RGFW_mInfo* info = (RGFW_mInfo*) dwData;
8315
8316
8317 if (info->iIndex >= 6)
8318 return FALSE;
8319
8320 info->monitors[info->iIndex] = win32CreateMonitor(hMonitor);
8321 info->iIndex++;
8322
8323 return TRUE;
8324}
8325
8326RGFW_monitor RGFW_getPrimaryMonitor(void) {
8327 #ifdef __cplusplus
8328 return win32CreateMonitor(MonitorFromPoint({0, 0}, MONITOR_DEFAULTTOPRIMARY));
8329 #else
8330 return win32CreateMonitor(MonitorFromPoint((POINT){0, 0}, MONITOR_DEFAULTTOPRIMARY));
8331 #endif
8332}
8333
8334RGFW_monitor* RGFW_getMonitors(size_t* len) {
8335 static RGFW_monitor monitors[6];
8336 RGFW_mInfo info;
8337 info.iIndex = 0;
8338 info.monitors = monitors;
8339
8340 EnumDisplayMonitors(NULL, NULL, GetMonitorHandle, (LPARAM) &info);
8341
8342 if (len != NULL) *len = (size_t)info.iIndex;
8343 return monitors;
8344}
8345
8346RGFW_monitor RGFW_window_getMonitor(RGFW_window* win) {
8347 HMONITOR src = MonitorFromWindow(win->src.window, MONITOR_DEFAULTTOPRIMARY);
8348 return win32CreateMonitor(src);
8349}
8350
8351RGFW_bool RGFW_monitor_requestMode(RGFW_monitor mon, RGFW_monitorMode mode, RGFW_modeRequest request) {
8352 POINT p = { mon.x, mon.y };
8353 HMONITOR src = MonitorFromPoint(p, MONITOR_DEFAULTTOPRIMARY);
8354
8355 MONITORINFOEX monitorInfo;
8356 monitorInfo.cbSize = sizeof(MONITORINFOEX);
8357 GetMonitorInfoA(src, (LPMONITORINFO)&monitorInfo);
8358
8359 DISPLAY_DEVICEA dd;
8360 dd.cb = sizeof(dd);
8361
8362 /* Enumerate display devices */
8363 DWORD deviceNum;
8364 for (deviceNum = 0; EnumDisplayDevicesA(NULL, deviceNum, &dd, 0); deviceNum++) {
8365 if (!(dd.StateFlags & DISPLAY_DEVICE_ACTIVE))
8366 continue;
8367
8368 if (strcmp(dd.DeviceName, (const char*)monitorInfo.szDevice) != 0)
8369 continue;
8370
8371 DEVMODEA dm;
8372 ZeroMemory(&dm, sizeof(dm));
8373 dm.dmSize = sizeof(dm);
8374
8375 if (EnumDisplaySettingsA(dd.DeviceName, ENUM_CURRENT_SETTINGS, &dm)) {
8376 if (request & RGFW_monitorScale) {
8377 dm.dmFields |= DM_PELSWIDTH | DM_PELSHEIGHT;
8378 dm.dmPelsWidth = (u32)mode.w;
8379 dm.dmPelsHeight = (u32)mode.h;
8380 }
8381
8382 if (request & RGFW_monitorRefresh) {
8383 dm.dmFields |= DM_DISPLAYFREQUENCY;
8384 dm.dmDisplayFrequency = mode.refreshRate;
8385 }
8386
8387 if (request & RGFW_monitorRGB) {
8388 dm.dmFields |= DM_BITSPERPEL;
8389 dm.dmBitsPerPel = (DWORD)(mode.red + mode.green + mode.blue);
8390 }
8391
8392 if (ChangeDisplaySettingsExA(dd.DeviceName, &dm, NULL, CDS_TEST, NULL) == DISP_CHANGE_SUCCESSFUL) {
8393 if (ChangeDisplaySettingsExA(dd.DeviceName, &dm, NULL, CDS_UPDATEREGISTRY, NULL) == DISP_CHANGE_SUCCESSFUL)
8394 return RGFW_TRUE;
8395 return RGFW_FALSE;
8396 } else return RGFW_FALSE;
8397 }
8398 }
8399
8400 return RGFW_FALSE;
8401}
8402
8403#endif
8404HICON RGFW_loadHandleImage(u8* data, i32 w, i32 h, RGFW_format format, BOOL icon);
8405HICON RGFW_loadHandleImage(u8* data, i32 w, i32 h, RGFW_format format, BOOL icon) {
8406 BITMAPV5HEADER bi;
8407 ZeroMemory(&bi, sizeof(bi));
8408 bi.bV5Size = sizeof(bi);
8409 bi.bV5Width = (i32)w;
8410 bi.bV5Height = -((LONG) h);
8411 bi.bV5Planes = 1;
8412 bi.bV5BitCount = (WORD)32;
8413 bi.bV5Compression = BI_RGB;
8414 HDC dc = GetDC(NULL);
8415 u8* target = NULL;
8416
8417 HBITMAP color = CreateDIBSection(dc,
8418 (BITMAPINFO*) &bi, DIB_RGB_COLORS, (void**) &target,
8419 NULL, (DWORD) 0);
8420
8421 RGFW_copyImageData(target, w, h, RGFW_formatBGRA8, data, format);
8422 ReleaseDC(NULL, dc);
8423
8424 HBITMAP mask = CreateBitmap((i32)w, (i32)h, 1, 1, NULL);
8425
8426 ICONINFO ii;
8427 ZeroMemory(&ii, sizeof(ii));
8428 ii.fIcon = icon;
8429 ii.xHotspot = (u32)w / 2;
8430 ii.yHotspot = (u32)h / 2;
8431 ii.hbmMask = mask;
8432 ii.hbmColor = color;
8433
8434 HICON handle = CreateIconIndirect(&ii);
8435
8436 DeleteObject(color);
8437 DeleteObject(mask);
8438
8439 return handle;
8440}
8441RGFW_mouse* RGFW_loadMouse(u8* data, i32 w, i32 h, RGFW_format format) {
8442 HCURSOR cursor = (HCURSOR) RGFW_loadHandleImage(data, w, h, format, FALSE);
8443 return cursor;
8444}
8445
8446void RGFW_window_setMouse(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_mouse* mouse) {
8447 RGFW_ASSERT(win && mouse);
8448 SetClassLongPtrA(win->src.window, GCLP_HCURSOR, (LPARAM) mouse);
8449 SetCursor((HCURSOR)mouse);
8450}
8451
8452void RGFW_freeMouse(RGFW_mouse* mouse) {
8453 RGFW_ASSERT(mouse);
8454 DestroyCursor((HCURSOR)mouse);
8455}
8456
8457RGFW_bool RGFW_window_setMouseDefault(RGFW_window* win) {
8458 return RGFW_window_setMouseStandard(win, RGFW_mouseArrow);
8459}
8460
8461RGFW_bool RGFW_window_setMouseStandard(RGFW_window* win, u8 mouse) {
8462 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
8463
8464 static const u32 mouseIconSrc[16] = {OCR_NORMAL, OCR_NORMAL, OCR_IBEAM, OCR_CROSS, OCR_HAND, OCR_SIZEWE, OCR_SIZENS, OCR_SIZENWSE, OCR_SIZENESW, OCR_SIZEALL, OCR_NO};
8465 if (mouse > (sizeof(mouseIconSrc) / sizeof(u32)))
8466 return RGFW_FALSE;
8467
8468 char* icon = MAKEINTRESOURCEA(mouseIconSrc[mouse]);
8469
8470 SetClassLongPtrA(win->src.window, GCLP_HCURSOR, (LPARAM) LoadCursorA(NULL, icon));
8471 SetCursor(LoadCursorA(NULL, icon));
8472 return RGFW_TRUE;
8473}
8474
8475void RGFW_window_hide(RGFW_window* win) {
8476 ShowWindow(win->src.window, SW_HIDE);
8477}
8478
8479void RGFW_window_show(RGFW_window* win) {
8480 if (win->internal.flags & RGFW_windowFocusOnShow) RGFW_window_focus(win);
8481 ShowWindow(win->src.window, SW_RESTORE);
8482}
8483
8484#define RGFW_FREE_LIBRARY(x) if (x != NULL) FreeLibrary(x); x = NULL;
8485void RGFW_deinitPlatform(void) {
8486 #ifndef RGFW_NO_DPI
8487 RGFW_FREE_LIBRARY(RGFW_Shcore_dll);
8488 #endif
8489
8490 #ifndef RGFW_NO_WINMM
8491 timeEndPeriod(1);
8492 #ifndef RGFW_NO_LOAD_WINMM
8493 RGFW_FREE_LIBRARY(RGFW_winmm_dll);
8494 #endif
8495 #endif
8496
8497 RGFW_FREE_LIBRARY(RGFW_wgl_dll);
8498
8499 RGFW_freeMouse(_RGFW->hiddenMouse);
8500 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeInfo, RGFW_infoGlobal, "global context deinitialized");
8501}
8502
8503
8504void RGFW_window_closePlatform(RGFW_window* win) {
8505 RemovePropW(win->src.window, L"RGFW");
8506 ReleaseDC(win->src.window, win->src.hdc);
8507 DestroyWindow(win->src.window);
8509 if (win->src.hIconSmall) DestroyIcon(win->src.hIconSmall);
8510 if (win->src.hIconBig) DestroyIcon(win->src.hIconBig);
8511}
8512
8513void RGFW_window_move(RGFW_window* win, i32 x, i32 y) {
8514 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
8515
8516 win->x = x;
8517 win->y = y;
8518 SetWindowPos(win->src.window, HWND_TOP, win->x, win->y, 0, 0, SWP_NOSIZE);
8519}
8520
8521void RGFW_window_resize(RGFW_window* win, i32 w, i32 h) {
8522 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
8523
8524 win->w = w;
8525 win->h = h;
8526 SetWindowPos(win->src.window, HWND_TOP, 0, 0, win->w + (i32)win->src.offsetW, win->h + (i32)win->src.offsetH, SWP_NOMOVE);
8527}
8528
8529
8530void RGFW_window_setName(RGFW_window* win, const char* name) {
8531 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
8532
8533 wchar_t wide_name[256];
8534 MultiByteToWideChar(CP_UTF8, 0, name, -1, wide_name, 256);
8535 SetWindowTextW(win->src.window, wide_name);
8536}
8537
8538#ifndef RGFW_NO_PASSTHROUGH
8539void RGFW_window_setMousePassthrough(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_bool passthrough) {
8540 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
8541 COLORREF key = 0;
8542 BYTE alpha = 0;
8543 DWORD flags = 0;
8544 i32 exStyle = GetWindowLongW(win->src.window, GWL_EXSTYLE);
8545
8546 if (exStyle & WS_EX_LAYERED)
8547 GetLayeredWindowAttributes(win->src.window, &key, &alpha, &flags);
8548
8549 if (passthrough)
8550 exStyle |= (WS_EX_TRANSPARENT | WS_EX_LAYERED);
8551 else {
8552 exStyle &= ~WS_EX_TRANSPARENT;
8553 if (exStyle & WS_EX_LAYERED && !(flags & LWA_ALPHA))
8554 exStyle &= ~WS_EX_LAYERED;
8555 }
8556
8557 SetWindowLongW(win->src.window, GWL_EXSTYLE, exStyle);
8558
8559 if (passthrough)
8560 SetLayeredWindowAttributes(win->src.window, key, alpha, flags);
8561}
8562#endif
8563
8564RGFW_bool RGFW_window_setIconEx(RGFW_window* win, u8* data, i32 w, i32 h, RGFW_format format, RGFW_icon type) {
8565 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
8566 #ifndef RGFW_WIN95
8567 if (win->src.hIconSmall && (type & RGFW_iconWindow)) DestroyIcon(win->src.hIconSmall);
8568 if (win->src.hIconBig && (type & RGFW_iconTaskbar)) DestroyIcon(win->src.hIconBig);
8569
8570 if (data == NULL) {
8571 HICON defaultIcon = LoadIcon(NULL, IDI_APPLICATION);
8572 if (type & RGFW_iconWindow)
8573 SendMessage(win->src.window, WM_SETICON, (WPARAM)ICON_SMALL, (LPARAM)defaultIcon);
8574 if (type & RGFW_iconTaskbar)
8575 SendMessage(win->src.window, WM_SETICON, (WPARAM)ICON_BIG, (LPARAM)defaultIcon);
8576 return RGFW_TRUE;
8577 }
8578
8579 if (type & RGFW_iconWindow) {
8580 win->src.hIconSmall = RGFW_loadHandleImage(data, w, h, format, TRUE);
8581 SendMessage(win->src.window, WM_SETICON, (WPARAM)ICON_SMALL, (LPARAM)win->src.hIconSmall);
8582 }
8583 if (type & RGFW_iconTaskbar) {
8584 win->src.hIconBig = RGFW_loadHandleImage(data, w, h, format, TRUE);
8585 SendMessage(win->src.window, WM_SETICON, (WPARAM)ICON_BIG, (LPARAM)win->src.hIconBig);
8586 }
8587 return RGFW_TRUE;
8588 #else
8589 RGFW_UNUSED(img);
8590 RGFW_UNUSED(type);
8591 return RGFW_FALSE;
8592 #endif
8593}
8594
8595RGFW_ssize_t RGFW_readClipboardPtr(char* str, size_t strCapacity) {
8596 /* Open the clipboard */
8597 if (OpenClipboard(NULL) == 0)
8598 return -1;
8599
8600 /* Get the clipboard data as a Unicode string */
8601 HANDLE hData = GetClipboardData(CF_UNICODETEXT);
8602 if (hData == NULL) {
8603 CloseClipboard();
8604 return -1;
8605 }
8606
8607 wchar_t* wstr = (wchar_t*) GlobalLock(hData);
8608
8609 RGFW_ssize_t textLen = 0;
8610
8611 {
8612 setlocale(LC_ALL, "en_US.UTF-8");
8613
8614 textLen = (RGFW_ssize_t)wcstombs(NULL, wstr, 0) + 1;
8615 if (str != NULL && (RGFW_ssize_t)strCapacity <= textLen - 1)
8616 textLen = 0;
8617
8618 if (str != NULL && textLen) {
8619 if (textLen > 1)
8620 wcstombs(str, wstr, (size_t)(textLen));
8621
8622 str[textLen] = '\0';
8623 }
8624 }
8625
8626 /* Release the clipboard data */
8627 GlobalUnlock(hData);
8628 CloseClipboard();
8629
8630 return textLen;
8631}
8632
8633void RGFW_writeClipboard(const char* text, u32 textLen) {
8634 HANDLE object;
8635 WCHAR* buffer;
8636
8637 object = GlobalAlloc(GMEM_MOVEABLE, (1 + textLen) * sizeof(WCHAR));
8638 if (!object)
8639 return;
8640
8641 buffer = (WCHAR*) GlobalLock(object);
8642 if (!buffer) {
8643 GlobalFree(object);
8644 return;
8645 }
8646
8647 MultiByteToWideChar(CP_UTF8, 0, text, -1, buffer, (i32)textLen);
8648 GlobalUnlock(object);
8649
8650 if (!OpenClipboard(_RGFW->root->src.window)) {
8651 GlobalFree(object);
8652 return;
8653 }
8654
8655 EmptyClipboard();
8656 SetClipboardData(CF_UNICODETEXT, object);
8657 CloseClipboard();
8658}
8659
8660void RGFW_window_moveMouse(RGFW_window* win, i32 x, i32 y) {
8661 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
8662 win->internal.lastMouseX = x - win->x;
8663 win->internal.lastMouseX = y - win->y;
8664 SetCursorPos(x, y);
8665}
8666
8667#ifdef RGFW_OPENGL
8668RGFW_bool RGFW_extensionSupportedPlatform_OpenGL(const char * extension, size_t len) {
8669 const char* extensions = NULL;
8670
8671 RGFW_proc proc = RGFW_getProcAddress_OpenGL("wglGetExtensionsStringARB");
8672 RGFW_proc proc2 = RGFW_getProcAddress_OpenGL("wglGetExtensionsStringEXT");
8673
8674 if (proc)
8675 extensions = ((const char* (*)(HDC))proc)(wglGetCurrentDC());
8676 else if (proc2)
8677 extensions = ((const char*(*)(void))proc2)();
8678 return extensions != NULL && RGFW_extensionSupportedStr(extensions, extension, len);
8679}
8680
8681RGFW_proc RGFW_getProcAddress_OpenGL(const char* procname) {
8682 RGFW_proc proc = (RGFW_proc)wglGetProcAddress(procname);
8683 if (proc)
8684 return proc;
8685
8686 return (RGFW_proc) GetProcAddress(RGFW_wgl_dll, procname);
8687}
8688
8689void RGFW_win32_loadOpenGLFuncs(HWND dummyWin) {
8690 if (wglSwapIntervalEXT != NULL && wglChoosePixelFormatARB != NULL && wglChoosePixelFormatARB != NULL)
8691 return;
8692
8693 HDC dummy_dc = GetDC(dummyWin);
8694 u32 pfd_flags = PFD_DRAW_TO_WINDOW | PFD_SUPPORT_OPENGL | PFD_DOUBLEBUFFER;
8695
8696 PIXELFORMATDESCRIPTOR pfd = {sizeof(pfd), 1, pfd_flags, PFD_TYPE_RGBA, 32, 8, PFD_MAIN_PLANE, 32, 8, 8, 8, 8, 8, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 32, 8, 0, PFD_MAIN_PLANE, 0, 0, 0, 0};
8697
8698 int dummy_pixel_format = ChoosePixelFormat(dummy_dc, &pfd);
8699 SetPixelFormat(dummy_dc, dummy_pixel_format, &pfd);
8700
8701 HGLRC dummy_context = wglCreateContext(dummy_dc);
8702
8703 HGLRC cur = wglGetCurrentContext();
8704 wglMakeCurrent(dummy_dc, dummy_context);
8705
8706 wglCreateContextAttribsARB = ((PFNWGLCREATECONTEXTATTRIBSARBPROC(WINAPI *)(const char*)) wglGetProcAddress)("wglCreateContextAttribsARB");
8707 wglChoosePixelFormatARB = ((PFNWGLCHOOSEPIXELFORMATARBPROC(WINAPI *)(const char*)) wglGetProcAddress)("wglChoosePixelFormatARB");
8708
8709 wglSwapIntervalEXT = (PFNWGLSWAPINTERVALEXTPROC)(RGFW_proc)wglGetProcAddress("wglSwapIntervalEXT");
8710 if (wglSwapIntervalEXT == NULL) {
8711 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeError, RGFW_errOpenGLContext, "Failed to load swap interval function");
8712 }
8713
8714 wglMakeCurrent(dummy_dc, cur);
8715 wglDeleteContext(dummy_context);
8716 ReleaseDC(dummyWin, dummy_dc);
8717}
8718
8719#define WGL_ACCELERATION_ARB 0x2003
8720#define WGL_FULL_ACCELERATION_ARB 0x2027
8721#define WGL_DRAW_TO_WINDOW_ARB 0x2001
8722#define WGL_PIXEL_TYPE_ARB 0x2013
8723#define WGL_TYPE_RGBA_ARB 0x202b
8724#define WGL_SUPPORT_OPENGL_ARB 0x2010
8725#define WGL_COLOR_BITS_ARB 0x2014
8726#define WGL_DOUBLE_BUFFER_ARB 0x2011
8727#define WGL_ALPHA_BITS_ARB 0x201b
8728#define WGL_DEPTH_BITS_ARB 0x2022
8729#define WGL_STENCIL_BITS_ARB 0x2023
8730#define WGL_STEREO_ARB 0x2012
8731#define WGL_AUX_BUFFERS_ARB 0x2024
8732#define WGL_RED_BITS_ARB 0x2015
8733#define WGL_GREEN_BITS_ARB 0x2017
8734#define WGL_BLUE_BITS_ARB 0x2019
8735#define WGL_ACCUM_RED_BITS_ARB 0x201e
8736#define WGL_ACCUM_GREEN_BITS_ARB 0x201f
8737#define WGL_ACCUM_BLUE_BITS_ARB 0x2020
8738#define WGL_ACCUM_ALPHA_BITS_ARB 0x2021
8739#define WGL_COLORSPACE_SRGB_EXT 0x3089
8740#define WGL_CONTEXT_OPENGL_NO_ERROR_ARB 0x31b3
8741#define WGL_CONTEXT_RELEASE_BEHAVIOR_ARB 0x2097
8742#define WGL_CONTEXT_RELEASE_BEHAVIOR_NONE_ARB 0x0000
8743#define WGL_CONTEXT_RELEASE_BEHAVIOR_FLUSH_ARB 0x2098
8744#define WGL_CONTEXT_FLAGS_ARB 0x2094
8745#define WGL_ACCESS_READ_WRITE_NV 0x00000001
8746#define WGL_COVERAGE_SAMPLES_NV 0x2042
8747#define WGL_CONTEXT_ES_PROFILE_BIT_EXT 0x00000004
8748#define WGL_CONTEXT_PROFILE_MASK_ARB 0x9126
8749#define WGL_CONTEXT_CORE_PROFILE_BIT_ARB 0x00000001
8750#define WGL_CONTEXT_COMPATIBILITY_PROFILE_BIT_ARB 0x00000002
8751#define WGL_CONTEXT_MAJOR_VERSION_ARB 0x2091
8752#define WGL_CONTEXT_MINOR_VERSION_ARB 0x2092
8753#define WGL_FRAMEBUFFER_SRGB_CAPABLE_ARB 0x20A9
8754
8755RGFW_bool RGFW_window_createContextPtr_OpenGL(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_glContext* ctx, RGFW_glHints* hints) {
8756 win->src.ctx.native = ctx;
8757 win->src.gfxType = RGFW_gfxNativeOpenGL;
8758
8759 PIXELFORMATDESCRIPTOR pfd;
8760 pfd.nSize = sizeof(PIXELFORMATDESCRIPTOR);
8761 pfd.nVersion = 1;
8762 pfd.dwFlags = PFD_DRAW_TO_WINDOW | PFD_SUPPORT_OPENGL | PFD_DOUBLEBUFFER;
8763 pfd.iPixelType = PFD_TYPE_RGBA;
8764 pfd.iLayerType = PFD_MAIN_PLANE;
8765 pfd.cColorBits = 32;
8766 pfd.cAlphaBits = 8;
8767 pfd.cDepthBits = 24;
8768 pfd.cStencilBits = (BYTE)hints->stencil;
8769 pfd.cAuxBuffers = (BYTE)hints->auxBuffers;
8770 if (hints->stereo) pfd.dwFlags |= PFD_STEREO;
8771
8772 /* try to create the pixel format we want for OpenGL and then try to create an OpenGL context for the specified version */
8773 if (hints->renderer == RGFW_glSoftware)
8774 pfd.dwFlags |= PFD_GENERIC_FORMAT | PFD_GENERIC_ACCELERATED;
8775
8776 /* get pixel format, default to a basic pixel format */
8777 int pixel_format = ChoosePixelFormat(win->src.hdc, &pfd);
8778 if (wglChoosePixelFormatARB != NULL) {
8779 i32 pixel_format_attribs[50];
8780 RGFW_attribStack stack;
8781 RGFW_attribStack_init(&stack, pixel_format_attribs, 50);
8782
8783 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, WGL_ACCELERATION_ARB, WGL_FULL_ACCELERATION_ARB);
8784 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, WGL_DRAW_TO_WINDOW_ARB, 1);
8785 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, WGL_PIXEL_TYPE_ARB, WGL_TYPE_RGBA_ARB);
8786 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, WGL_SUPPORT_OPENGL_ARB, 1);
8787 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, WGL_COLOR_BITS_ARB, 32);
8788 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, WGL_DOUBLE_BUFFER_ARB, 1);
8789 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, WGL_ALPHA_BITS_ARB, hints->alpha);
8790 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, WGL_DEPTH_BITS_ARB, hints->depth);
8791 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, WGL_STENCIL_BITS_ARB, hints->stencil);
8792 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, WGL_STEREO_ARB, hints->stereo);
8793 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, WGL_AUX_BUFFERS_ARB, hints->auxBuffers);
8794 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, WGL_RED_BITS_ARB, hints->red);
8795 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, WGL_GREEN_BITS_ARB, hints->blue);
8796 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, WGL_BLUE_BITS_ARB, hints->green);
8797 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, WGL_ACCUM_RED_BITS_ARB, hints->accumRed);
8798 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, WGL_ACCUM_GREEN_BITS_ARB, hints->accumBlue);
8799 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, WGL_ACCUM_BLUE_BITS_ARB, hints->accumGreen);
8800 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, WGL_ACCUM_ALPHA_BITS_ARB, hints->accumAlpha);
8801
8802 if(hints->sRGB) {
8803 if (hints->profile != RGFW_glES)
8804 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, WGL_FRAMEBUFFER_SRGB_CAPABLE_ARB, 1);
8805 else
8806 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, WGL_COLORSPACE_SRGB_EXT, hints->sRGB);
8807 }
8808
8809 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, WGL_COVERAGE_SAMPLES_NV, hints->samples);
8810
8811 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, 0, 0);
8812
8813 int new_pixel_format;
8814 UINT num_formats;
8815 wglChoosePixelFormatARB(win->src.hdc, pixel_format_attribs, 0, 1, &new_pixel_format, &num_formats);
8816 if (!num_formats)
8817 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeError, RGFW_errOpenGLContext, "Failed to create a pixel format for WGL");
8818 else pixel_format = new_pixel_format;
8819 }
8820
8821 PIXELFORMATDESCRIPTOR suggested;
8822 if (!DescribePixelFormat(win->src.hdc, pixel_format, sizeof(suggested), &suggested) ||
8823 !SetPixelFormat(win->src.hdc, pixel_format, &pfd))
8824 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeError, RGFW_errOpenGLContext, "Failed to set the WGL pixel format");
8825
8826 if (wglCreateContextAttribsARB != NULL) {
8827 /* create OpenGL/WGL context for the specified version */
8828 u32 index = 0;
8829 i32 attribs[40];
8830
8831 i32 mask = 0;
8832 switch (hints->profile) {
8833 case RGFW_glES: mask |= WGL_CONTEXT_ES_PROFILE_BIT_EXT; break;
8834 case RGFW_glCompatibility: mask |= WGL_CONTEXT_COMPATIBILITY_PROFILE_BIT_ARB; break;
8835 case RGFW_glCore: mask |= WGL_CONTEXT_CORE_PROFILE_BIT_ARB; break;
8836 default: mask |= WGL_CONTEXT_CORE_PROFILE_BIT_ARB; break;
8837 }
8838
8839 SET_ATTRIB(WGL_CONTEXT_PROFILE_MASK_ARB, mask);
8840
8841 if (hints->minor || hints->major) {
8842 SET_ATTRIB(WGL_CONTEXT_MAJOR_VERSION_ARB, hints->major);
8843 SET_ATTRIB(WGL_CONTEXT_MINOR_VERSION_ARB, hints->minor);
8844 }
8845
8846 SET_ATTRIB(WGL_CONTEXT_OPENGL_NO_ERROR_ARB, hints->noError);
8847
8848 if (hints->releaseBehavior == RGFW_glReleaseFlush) {
8849 SET_ATTRIB(0x2097, WGL_CONTEXT_RELEASE_BEHAVIOR_FLUSH_ARB); // WGL_CONTEXT_RELEASE_BEHAVIOR_ARB
8850 } else if (hints->releaseBehavior == RGFW_glReleaseNone) {
8851 SET_ATTRIB(0x2097, 0x0000); // WGL_CONTEXT_RELEASE_BEHAVIOR_NONE_ARB
8852 }
8853
8854 i32 flags = 0;
8855 if (hints->debug) flags |= WGL_ACCESS_READ_WRITE_NV; // substitute for debug bit, not exact
8856 if (hints->robustness) flags |= WGL_CONTEXT_ES_PROFILE_BIT_EXT; // robustness placeholder
8857 SET_ATTRIB(WGL_CONTEXT_FLAGS_ARB, flags);
8858
8859
8860 SET_ATTRIB(0, 0);
8861
8862 win->src.ctx.native->ctx = (HGLRC)wglCreateContextAttribsARB(win->src.hdc, NULL, attribs);
8863 } else { /* fall back to a default context (probably OpenGL 2 or something) */
8864 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeError, RGFW_errOpenGLContext, "Failed to create an accelerated OpenGL Context.");
8865 win->src.ctx.native->ctx = wglCreateContext(win->src.hdc);
8866 }
8867
8868 ReleaseDC(win->src.window, win->src.hdc);
8869 win->src.hdc = GetDC(win->src.window);
8870
8871 if (hints->share) {
8872 wglShareLists((HGLRC)RGFW_getCurrentContext_OpenGL(), hints->share->ctx);
8873 }
8874
8875 wglMakeCurrent(win->src.hdc, win->src.ctx.native->ctx);
8876 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeInfo, RGFW_infoOpenGL, "OpenGL context initalized.");
8877 return RGFW_TRUE;
8878}
8879
8880void RGFW_window_deleteContextPtr_OpenGL(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_glContext* ctx) {
8881 wglDeleteContext((HGLRC) ctx->ctx);
8882 win->src.ctx.native->ctx = NULL;
8883 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeInfo, RGFW_infoOpenGL, "OpenGL context freed.");
8884}
8885
8886void RGFW_window_makeCurrentContext_OpenGL(RGFW_window* win) {
8887 RGFW_ASSERT(win->src.ctx.native);
8888 if (win == NULL)
8889 wglMakeCurrent(NULL, NULL);
8890 else
8891 wglMakeCurrent(win->src.hdc, (HGLRC) win->src.ctx.native->ctx);
8892}
8893void* RGFW_getCurrentContext_OpenGL(void) {
8894 return wglGetCurrentContext();
8895}
8896void RGFW_window_swapBuffers_OpenGL(RGFW_window* win) {
8897 RGFW_ASSERT(win->src.ctx.native);
8898 SwapBuffers(win->src.hdc);
8899}
8900
8901void RGFW_window_swapInterval_OpenGL(RGFW_window* win, i32 swapInterval) {
8902 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
8903 if (wglSwapIntervalEXT == NULL || wglSwapIntervalEXT(swapInterval) == FALSE)
8904 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeError, RGFW_errOpenGLContext, "Failed to set swap interval");
8905}
8906#endif
8907
8908char* RGFW_createUTF8FromWideStringWin32(const WCHAR* source) {
8909 static char target[RGFW_MAX_PATH * 2];
8910 i32 size = 0;
8911 if (source == NULL) {
8912 return NULL;
8913 }
8914 size = WideCharToMultiByte(CP_UTF8, 0, source, -1, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL);
8915 if (!size) {
8916 return NULL;
8917 }
8918
8919 if (size > RGFW_MAX_PATH * 2)
8920 size = RGFW_MAX_PATH * 2;
8921
8922 target[size] = 0;
8923
8924 if (!WideCharToMultiByte(CP_UTF8, 0, source, -1, target, size, NULL, NULL)) {
8925 return NULL;
8926 }
8927
8928 return target;
8929}
8930
8931#ifdef RGFW_WEBGPU
8932WGPUSurface RGFW_window_createSurface_WebGPU(RGFW_window* window, WGPUInstance instance) {
8933 WGPUSurfaceDescriptor surfaceDesc = {0};
8934 WGPUSurfaceSourceWindowsHWND fromHwnd = {0};
8935 fromHwnd.chain.sType = WGPUSType_SurfaceSourceWindowsHWND;
8936 fromHwnd.hwnd = window->src.window; // Get HWND from RGFW window source
8937 if (!fromHwnd.hwnd) {
8938 fprintf(stderr, "RGFW Error: HWND is NULL for Windows window.\n");
8939 return NULL;
8940 }
8941 fromHwnd.hinstance = GetModuleHandle(NULL); // Get current process HINSTANCE
8942
8943 surfaceDesc.nextInChain = (WGPUChainedStruct*)&fromHwnd.chain;
8944 return wgpuInstanceCreateSurface(instance, &surfaceDesc);
8945}
8946#endif
8947
8948#endif /* RGFW_WINDOWS */

9029 NSOpenGLContextParametectxaceOrder = 235, /* 1 param. 1 -> Above Window (default), -1 -> Below Window */
9030 NSOpenGLContextParametectxaceOpacity = 236, /* 1 param. 1-> Surface is opaque (default), 0 -> non-opaque */
9031 NSOpenGLContextParametectxaceBackingSize = 304, /* 2 params. Width/height of surface backing size */
9032 NSOpenGLContextParameterReclaimResources = 308, /* 0 params. */
9033 NSOpenGLContextParameterCurrentRendererID = 309, /* 1 param. Retrieves the current renderer ID */
9034 NSOpenGLContextParameterGPUVertexProcessing = 310, /* 1 param. Currently processing vertices with GPU (get) */
9035 NSOpenGLContextParameterGPUFragmentProcessing = 311, /* 1 param. Currently processing fragments with GPU (get) */
9036 NSOpenGLContextParameterHasDrawable = 314, /* 1 param. Boolean returned if drawable is attached */
9037 NSOpenGLContextParameterMPSwapsInFlight = 315, /* 1 param. Max number of swaps queued by the MP GL engine */
9038

9040 NSOpenGLContextParameterSwapRectangleEnable API_DEPRECATED("", macos(10.0, 10.14)) = 201, /* Enable or disable the swap rectangle */
9041 NSOpenGLContextParameterRasterizationEnable API_DEPRECATED("", macos(10.0, 10.14)) = 221, /* Enable or disable all rasterization */
9042 NSOpenGLContextParameterStateValidation API_DEPRECATED("", macos(10.0, 10.14)) = 301, /* Validate state for multi-screen functionality */
9043 NSOpenGLContextParametectxaceSurfaceVolatile API_DEPRECATED("", macos(10.0, 10.14)) = 306, /* 1 param. Surface volatile state */
9044};

9068enum {
9069 NSOpenGLPFAAllRenderers = 1, /* choose from all available renderers */
9070 NSOpenGLPFATripleBuffer = 3, /* choose a triple buffered pixel format */
9071 NSOpenGLPFADoubleBuffer = 5, /* choose a double buffered pixel format */
9072 NSOpenGLPFAAuxBuffers = 7, /* number of aux buffers */
9073 NSOpenGLPFAColorSize = 8, /* number of color buffer bits */
9074 NSOpenGLPFAAlphaSize = 11, /* number of alpha component bits */
9075 NSOpenGLPFADepthSize = 12, /* number of depth buffer bits */
9076 NSOpenGLPFAStencilSize = 13, /* number of stencil buffer bits */
9077 NSOpenGLPFAAccumSize = 14, /* number of accum buffer bits */
9078 NSOpenGLPFAMinimumPolicy = 51, /* never choose smaller buffers than requested */
9079 NSOpenGLPFAMaximumPolicy = 52, /* choose largest buffers of type requested */
9080 NSOpenGLPFASampleBuffers = 55, /* number of multi sample buffers */
9081 NSOpenGLPFASamples = 56, /* number of samples per multi sample buffer */
9082 NSOpenGLPFAAuxDepthStencil = 57, /* each aux buffer has its own depth stencil */
9083 NSOpenGLPFAColorFloat = 58, /* color buffers store floating point pixels */
9084 NSOpenGLPFAMultisample = 59, /* choose multisampling */
9085 NSOpenGLPFASupersample = 60, /* choose supersampling */
9086 NSOpenGLPFASampleAlpha = 61, /* request alpha filtering */
9087 NSOpenGLPFARendererID = 70, /* request renderer by ID */
9088 NSOpenGLPFANoRecovery = 72, /* disable all failure recovery systems */
9089 NSOpenGLPFAAccelerated = 73, /* choose a hardware accelerated renderer */
9090 NSOpenGLPFAClosestPolicy = 74, /* choose the closest color buffer to request */
9091 NSOpenGLPFABackingStore = 76, /* back buffer contents are valid after swap */
9092 NSOpenGLPFAScreenMask = 84, /* bit mask of supported physical screens */
9093 NSOpenGLPFAAllowOfflineRenderers = 96, /* allow use of offline renderers */
9094 NSOpenGLPFAAcceleratedCompute = 97, /* choose a hardware accelerated compute device */
9095 NSOpenGLPFAOpenGLProfile = 99, /* specify an OpenGL Profile to use */
9096 NSOpenGLProfileVersionLegacy = 0x1000, /* The requested profile is a legacy (pre-OpenGL 3.0) profile. */
9097 NSOpenGLProfileVersion3_2Core = 0x3200, /* The 3.2 Profile of OpenGL */
9098 NSOpenGLProfileVersion4_1Core = 0x3200, /* The 4.1 profile of OpenGL */
9099 NSOpenGLPFAVirtualScreenCount = 128, /* number of virtual screens in this format */
9100 NSOpenGLPFAStereo = 6,
9101 NSOpenGLPFAOffScreen = 53,
9102 NSOpenGLPFAFullScreen = 54,
9103 NSOpenGLPFASingleRenderer = 71,
9104 NSOpenGLPFARobust = 75,
9105 NSOpenGLPFAMPSafe = 78,
9106 NSOpenGLPFAWindow = 80,
9107 NSOpenGLPFAMultiScreen = 81,
9108 NSOpenGLPFACompliant = 83,
9109 NSOpenGLPFAPixelBuffer = 90,
9110 NSOpenGLPFARemotePixelBuffer = 91,
9111};

9143#ifdef __arm64__
9144 /* ARM just uses objc_msgSend */
9145#define abi_objc_msgSend_stret objc_msgSend
9146#define abi_objc_msgSend_fpret objc_msgSend
9147#else /* __i386__ */
9148 /* x86 just uses abi_objc_msgSend_fpret and (NSColor *)objc_msgSend_id respectively */
9149#define abi_objc_msgSend_stret objc_msgSend_stret
9150#define abi_objc_msgSend_fpret objc_msgSend_fpret
9151#endif
9152
9153#define NSAlloc(nsclass) objc_msgSend_id((id)nsclass, sel_registerName("alloc"))
9154#define objc_msgSend_bool(x, y) ((BOOL (*)(id, SEL))objc_msgSend) ((id)(x), (SEL)y)
9155#define objc_msgSend_void(x, y) ((void (*)(id, SEL))objc_msgSend) ((id)(x), (SEL)y)
9156#define objc_msgSend_void_id(x, y, z) ((void (*)(id, SEL, id))objc_msgSend) ((id)x, (SEL)y, (id)z)
9157#define objc_msgSend_uint(x, y) ((NSUInteger (*)(id, SEL))objc_msgSend) ((id)(x), (SEL)y)
9158#define objc_msgSend_void_bool(x, y, z) ((void (*)(id, SEL, BOOL))objc_msgSend) ((id)(x), (SEL)y, (BOOL)z)
9159#define objc_msgSend_bool_void(x, y) ((BOOL (*)(id, SEL))objc_msgSend) ((id)(x), (SEL)y)
9160#define objc_msgSend_void_SEL(x, y, z) ((void (*)(id, SEL, SEL))objc_msgSend) ((id)(x), (SEL)y, (SEL)z)
9161#define objc_msgSend_id(x, y) ((id (*)(id, SEL))objc_msgSend) ((id)(x), (SEL)y)
9162#define objc_msgSend_id_id(x, y, z) ((id (*)(id, SEL, id))objc_msgSend) ((id)(x), (SEL)y, (id)z)
9163#define objc_msgSend_id_bool(x, y, z) ((BOOL (*)(id, SEL, id))objc_msgSend) ((id)(x), (SEL)y, (id)z)
9164#define objc_msgSend_int(x, y, z) ((id (*)(id, SEL, int))objc_msgSend) ((id)(x), (SEL)y, (int)z)
9165#define objc_msgSend_arr(x, y, z) ((id (*)(id, SEL, int))objc_msgSend) ((id)(x), (SEL)y, (int)z)
9166#define objc_msgSend_ptr(x, y, z) ((id (*)(id, SEL, void*))objc_msgSend) ((id)(x), (SEL)y, (void*)z)
9167#define objc_msgSend_class(x, y) ((id (*)(Class, SEL))objc_msgSend) ((Class)(x), (SEL)y)
9168#define objc_msgSend_class_char(x, y, z) ((id (*)(Class, SEL, char*))objc_msgSend) ((Class)(x), (SEL)y, (char*)z)
9169
9170#define NSRelease(obj) objc_msgSend_void((id)obj, sel_registerName("release"))
9171RGFWDEF id NSString_stringWithUTF8String(const char* str);
9172id NSString_stringWithUTF8String(const char* str) {
9173 return ((id(*)(id, SEL, const char*))objc_msgSend) ((id)objc_getClass("NSString"), sel_registerName("stringWithUTF8String:"), str);
9174}
9175
9176const char* NSString_to_char(id str);
9177const char* NSString_to_char(id str) {
9178 return ((const char* (*)(id, SEL)) objc_msgSend) ((id)(id)str, sel_registerName("UTF8String"));
9179}

9181unsigned char* NSBitmapImageRep_bitmapData(id imageRep);
9182unsigned char* NSBitmapImageRep_bitmapData(id imageRep) {
9183 return ((unsigned char* (*)(id, SEL))objc_msgSend) ((id)imageRep, sel_registerName("bitmapData"));
9184}

9186id NSBitmapImageRep_initWithBitmapData(unsigned char** planes, NSInteger width, NSInteger height, NSInteger bps, NSInteger spp, bool alpha, bool isPlanar, const char* colorSpaceName, NSBitmapFormat bitmapFormat, NSInteger rowBytes, NSInteger pixelBits);
9187id NSBitmapImageRep_initWithBitmapData(unsigned char** planes, NSInteger width, NSInteger height, NSInteger bps, NSInteger spp, bool alpha, bool isPlanar, const char* colorSpaceName, NSBitmapFormat bitmapFormat, NSInteger rowBytes, NSInteger pixelBits) {
9188 SEL func = sel_registerName("initWithBitmapDataPlanes:pixelsWide:pixelsHigh:bitsPerSample:samplesPerPixel:hasAlpha:isPlanar:colorSpaceName:bitmapFormat:bytesPerRow:bitsPerPixel:");
9189
9190 return (id) ((id(*)(id, SEL, unsigned char**, NSInteger, NSInteger, NSInteger, NSInteger, bool, bool, id, NSBitmapFormat, NSInteger, NSInteger))objc_msgSend)
9191 (NSAlloc((id)objc_getClass("NSBitmapImageRep")), func, planes, width, height, bps, spp, alpha, isPlanar, NSString_stringWithUTF8String(colorSpaceName), bitmapFormat, rowBytes, pixelBits);
9192}
