9194id NSColor_colorWithSRGB(CGFloat red, CGFloat green, CGFloat blue, CGFloat alpha);
9195id NSColor_colorWithSRGB(CGFloat red, CGFloat green, CGFloat blue, CGFloat alpha) {
9196 Class nsclass = objc_getClass("NSColor");

9199 ((id)nsclass, func, red, green, blue, alpha);
9200}

9206
9207id* cstrToNSStringArray(char** strs, size_t len);
9208id* cstrToNSStringArray(char** strs, size_t len) {
9209 static id nstrs[6];
9210 size_t i;
9211 for (i = 0; i < len; i++)
9212 nstrs[i] = NSString_stringWithUTF8String(strs[i]);
9213
9214 return nstrs;
9215}
9216
9217const char* NSPasteboard_stringForType(id pasteboard, NSPasteboardType dataType, size_t* len);
9218const char* NSPasteboard_stringForType(id pasteboard, NSPasteboardType dataType, size_t* len) {
9219 SEL func = sel_registerName("stringForType:");
9220 id nsstr = NSString_stringWithUTF8String((const char*)dataType);
9221 id nsString = ((id(*)(id, SEL, id))objc_msgSend)(pasteboard, func, nsstr);
9222 const char* str = NSString_to_char(nsString);
9223 if (len != NULL)
9224 *len = (size_t)((NSUInteger(*)(id, SEL, int))objc_msgSend)(nsString, sel_registerName("maximumLengthOfBytesUsingEncoding:"), 4);
9225 return str;
9226}
9227
9228id c_array_to_NSArray(void* array, size_t len);
9229id c_array_to_NSArray(void* array, size_t len) {
9230 return ((id (*)(id, SEL, void*, NSUInteger))objc_msgSend) (NSAlloc(objc_getClass("NSArray")), sel_registerName("initWithObjects:count:"), array, len);
9231}
9232
9233
9234void NSregisterForDraggedTypes(id view, NSPasteboardType* newTypes, size_t len);
9235void NSregisterForDraggedTypes(id view, NSPasteboardType* newTypes, size_t len) {
9236 id* ntypes = cstrToNSStringArray((char**)newTypes, len);
9237
9238 id array = c_array_to_NSArray(ntypes, len);
9239 objc_msgSend_void_id(view, sel_registerName("registerForDraggedTypes:"), array);
9240 NSRelease(array);
9241}
9242
9243NSInteger NSPasteBoard_declareTypes(id pasteboard, NSPasteboardType* newTypes, size_t len, void* owner);
9244NSInteger NSPasteBoard_declareTypes(id pasteboard, NSPasteboardType* newTypes, size_t len, void* owner) {
9245 id* ntypes = cstrToNSStringArray((char**)newTypes, len);
9246
9247 SEL func = sel_registerName("declareTypes:owner:");
9248
9249 id array = c_array_to_NSArray(ntypes, len);
9250
9251 NSInteger output = ((NSInteger(*)(id, SEL, id, void*))objc_msgSend)
9252 (pasteboard, func, array, owner);
9253 NSRelease(array);
9254
9255 return output;
9256}
9257
9258#define NSRetain(obj) objc_msgSend_void((id)obj, sel_registerName("retain"))
9259
9260void* NSArray_objectAtIndex(id array, NSUInteger index) {
9261 SEL func = sel_registerName("objectAtIndex:");
9262 return ((id(*)(id, SEL, NSUInteger))objc_msgSend)(array, func, index);
9263}
9264
9265id NSWindow_contentView(id window) {
9266 SEL func = sel_registerName("contentView");
9267 return objc_msgSend_id(window, func);
9268}

9270/*
9271 End of cocoa wrapper
9272*/
9273
9274id NSWindow_delegate(RGFW_window* win) {
9275 return (id) objc_msgSend_id((id)win->src.window, sel_registerName("delegate"));
9276}
9277
9278id RGFW__osxCustomInitWithRGFWWindow(id self, SEL _cmd, RGFW_window* win) {
9279 RGFW_UNUSED(_cmd);
9280 struct objc_super s = { self, class_getSuperclass(object_getClass(self)) };
9281 self = ((id (*)(struct objc_super*, SEL))objc_msgSendSuper)(&s, sel_registerName("init"));
9282
9283 if (self != nil) {
9284 object_setInstanceVariable(self, "RGFW_window", win);
9285 object_setInstanceVariable(self, "trackingArea", nil);
9286
9287 object_setInstanceVariable(
9288 self, "markedText",
9289 ((id (*)(id, SEL))objc_msgSend)(
9290 ((id (*)(Class, SEL))objc_msgSend)(objc_getClass("NSMutableAttributedString"), sel_registerName("alloc")),
9291 sel_registerName("init")
9292 )
9293 );
9294
9295 ((void (*)(id, SEL))objc_msgSend)(self, sel_registerName("updateTrackingAreas"));
9296
9297 ((void (*)(id, SEL, id))objc_msgSend)(
9298 self, sel_registerName("registerForDraggedTypes:"),
9299 ((id (*)(Class, SEL, id))objc_msgSend)(
9300 objc_getClass("NSArray"),
9301 sel_registerName("arrayWithObject:"),
9302 ((id (*)(Class, SEL, const char*))objc_msgSend)(
9303 objc_getClass("NSString"),
9304 sel_registerName("stringWithUTF8String:"),
9305 "public.url"
9306 )
9307 )
9308 );
9309 }
9310
9311 return self;
9312}
9313
9314u32 RGFW_OnClose(id self) {
9315 RGFW_window* win = NULL;
9316 object_getInstanceVariable(self, (const char*)"RGFW_window", (void**)&win);
9317 if (win == NULL)
9318 return true;
9319
9320 RGFW_window_setShouldClose(win, RGFW_TRUE);
9321 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_quit; e.common.win = win);
9322 RGFW_windowQuitCallback(win);
9323
9324 return false;
9325}
9326
9327/* NOTE(EimaMei): Fixes the constant clicking when the app is running under a terminal. */
9328bool acceptsFirstResponder(void) { return true; }
9329bool performKeyEquivalent(id event) { RGFW_UNUSED(event); return true; }
9330
9331NSDragOperation draggingEntered(id self, SEL sel, id sender) {
9332 RGFW_UNUSED(sender); RGFW_UNUSED(self); RGFW_UNUSED(sel);
9333
9334 return NSDragOperationCopy;
9335}
9336NSDragOperation draggingUpdated(id self, SEL sel, id sender) {
9337 RGFW_UNUSED(sel);
9338
9339 RGFW_window* win = NULL;
9340
9341 object_getInstanceVariable(self, "RGFW_window", (void**)&win);
9342 if (win == NULL || (!(win->internal.flags & RGFW_windowAllowDND)))
9343 return 0;
9344 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_dataDragFlag)) return NSDragOperationCopy;
9345
9346 NSPoint p = ((NSPoint(*)(id, SEL)) objc_msgSend)(sender, sel_registerName("draggingLocation"));
9347 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_dataDrag;
9348 e.mouse.x = (i32)p.x; e.mouse.y = (i32)(win->h - p.y);
9349 e.common.win = win);
9350
9351 _RGFW->windowState.win = win;
9352 _RGFW->windowState.dataDragging = RGFW_TRUE;
9353 _RGFW->windowState.dropX = (i32)p.x;
9354 _RGFW->windowState.dropY = (i32)(win->h - p.y);
9355
9356 RGFW_dataDragCallback(win, (i32) p.x, (i32) (win->h - p.y));
9357 return NSDragOperationCopy;
9358}
9359bool prepareForDragOperation(id self) {
9360 RGFW_window* win = NULL;
9361 object_getInstanceVariable(self, "RGFW_window", (void**)&win);
9362 if (win == NULL || (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_dataDropFlag)))
9363 return true;
9364
9365 if (!(win->internal.flags & RGFW_windowAllowDND)) {
9366 return false;
9367 }
9368
9369 return true;
9370}
9371
9372void RGFW__osxDraggingEnded(id self, SEL sel, id sender);
9373void RGFW__osxDraggingEnded(id self, SEL sel, id sender) { RGFW_UNUSED(sender); RGFW_UNUSED(self); RGFW_UNUSED(sel); return; }
9374
9375bool performDragOperation(id self, SEL sel, id sender) {
9376 RGFW_UNUSED(sender); RGFW_UNUSED(self); RGFW_UNUSED(sel);
9377
9378 RGFW_window* win = NULL;
9379 object_getInstanceVariable(self, "RGFW_window", (void**)&win);
9380
9381 if (win == NULL || (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_dataDropFlag)))
9382 return false;
9383
9384 /* id pasteBoard = objc_msgSend_id(sender, sel_registerName("draggingPasteboard")); */
9385
9386 id pasteBoard = objc_msgSend_id(sender, sel_registerName("draggingPasteboard"));
9387
9388 /* Get the types of data available on the pasteboard */
9389 id types = objc_msgSend_id(pasteBoard, sel_registerName("types"));
9390
9391 /* Get the string type for file URLs */
9392 id fileURLsType = objc_msgSend_class_char(objc_getClass("NSString"), sel_registerName("stringWithUTF8String:"), "NSFilenamesPboardType");
9393
9394 /* Check if the pasteboard contains file URLs */
9395 if (objc_msgSend_id_bool(types, sel_registerName("containsObject:"), fileURLsType) == 0) {
9396 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeError, RGFW_errClipboard, "No files found on the pasteboard.");
9397 return 0;
9398 }
9399
9400 id fileURLs = objc_msgSend_id_id(pasteBoard, sel_registerName("propertyListForType:"), fileURLsType);
9401 int count = ((int (*)(id, SEL))objc_msgSend)(fileURLs, sel_registerName("count"));
9402
9403 if (count == 0)
9404 return 0;
9405
9406 RGFW_event event;
9407 event.drop.files = (char**)(void*)_RGFW->files;
9408
9409 u32 i;
9410 for (i = 0; i < (u32)count; i++) {
9411 id fileURL = objc_msgSend_arr(fileURLs, sel_registerName("objectAtIndex:"), i);
9412 const char *filePath = ((const char* (*)(id, SEL))objc_msgSend)(fileURL, sel_registerName("UTF8String"));
9413 RGFW_STRNCPY(event.drop.files[i], filePath, RGFW_MAX_PATH - 1);
9414 event.drop.files[i][RGFW_MAX_PATH - 1] = '\0';
9415 }
9416
9417 event.drop.count = (size_t)count;
9418 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_dataDrop;
9419 e.drop.count = (size_t)count;
9420 e.drop.files = event.drop.files;
9421 e.common.win = win);
9422
9423 _RGFW->windowState.win = win;
9424 _RGFW->windowState.dataDrop = RGFW_TRUE;
9425 _RGFW->windowState.filesCount = event.drop.count;
9426 RGFW_dataDropCallback(win, event.drop.files, event.drop.count);
9427
9428 return false;
9429}
9430
9431#ifndef RGFW_NO_IOKIT
9432#include <IOKit/IOKitLib.h>
9433
9434u32 RGFW_osx_getFallbackRefreshRate(CGDirectDisplayID displayID) {
9435 u32 refreshRate = 0;
9436 io_iterator_t it;
9437 io_service_t service;
9438 CFNumberRef indexRef, clockRef, countRef;
9439 u32 clock, count;
9440
9441#ifdef kIOMainPortDefault
9442 if (IOServiceGetMatchingServices(kIOMainPortDefault, IOServiceMatching("IOFramebuffer"), &it) != 0)
9443#elif defined(kIOMasterPortDefault)
9444 if (IOServiceGetMatchingServices(kIOMainPortDefault, IOServiceMatching("IOFramebuffer"), &it) != 0)
9445#endif
9446 return RGFW_FALSE;
9447
9448 while ((service = IOIteratorNext(it)) != 0) {
9449 u32 index;
9450 indexRef = (CFNumberRef)IORegistryEntryCreateCFProperty(service, CFSTR("IOFramebufferOpenGLIndex"), kCFAllocatorDefault, kNilOptions);
9451 if (indexRef == 0) continue;
9452
9453 if (CFNumberGetValue(indexRef, kCFNumberIntType, &index) && CGOpenGLDisplayMaskToDisplayID(1 << index) == displayID) {
9454 CFRelease(indexRef);
9455 break;
9456 }
9457
9458 CFRelease(indexRef);
9459 }
9460
9461 if (service) {
9462 clockRef = (CFNumberRef)IORegistryEntryCreateCFProperty(service, CFSTR("IOFBCurrentPixelClock"), kCFAllocatorDefault, kNilOptions);
9463 if (clockRef) {
9464 if (CFNumberGetValue(clockRef, kCFNumberIntType, &clock) && clock) {
9465 countRef = (CFNumberRef)IORegistryEntryCreateCFProperty(service, CFSTR("IOFBCurrentPixelCount"), kCFAllocatorDefault, kNilOptions);
9466 if (countRef && CFNumberGetValue(countRef, kCFNumberIntType, &count) && count) {
9467 float rate = (float)((double)clock / (double) count);
9468 refreshRate = (u32)RGFW_ROUND(rate);
9469 CFRelease(countRef);
9470 }
9471 }
9472 CFRelease(clockRef);
9473 }
9474 }
9475
9476 IOObjectRelease(it);
9477 return refreshRate;
9478}
9479#endif
9480
9481void RGFW_moveToMacOSResourceDir(void) {
9482 char resourcesPath[256];
9483
9484 CFBundleRef bundle = CFBundleGetMainBundle();
9485 if (!bundle)
9486 return;
9487
9488 CFURLRef resourcesURL = CFBundleCopyResourcesDirectoryURL(bundle);
9489 CFStringRef last = CFURLCopyLastPathComponent(resourcesURL);
9490
9491 if (
9492 CFStringCompare(CFSTR("Resources"), last, 0) != kCFCompareEqualTo ||
9493 CFURLGetFileSystemRepresentation(resourcesURL, true, (u8*) resourcesPath, 255) == 0
9494 ) {
9495 CFRelease(last);
9496 CFRelease(resourcesURL);
9497 return;
9498 }
9499
9500 CFRelease(last);
9501 CFRelease(resourcesURL);
9502
9503 chdir(resourcesPath);
9504}
9505
9506
9507static void RGFW__osxWindowDeminiaturize(id self, SEL sel) {
9508 RGFW_UNUSED(sel);
9509 RGFW_window* win = NULL;
9510 object_getInstanceVariable(self, "RGFW_window", (void**)&win);
9511 if (win == NULL) return;
9512
9513 win->internal.flags |= RGFW_windowMinimize;
9514 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_windowMinimizedFlag)) return;
9515 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_windowRestored; e.common.win = win);
9516 RGFW_windowRestoredCallback(win, win->x, win->y, win->w, win->h);
9517
9518}
9519static void RGFW__osxWindowMiniaturize(id self, SEL sel) {
9520 RGFW_UNUSED(sel);
9521 RGFW_window* win = NULL;
9522 object_getInstanceVariable(self, "RGFW_window", (void**)&win);
9523 if (win == NULL) return;
9524
9525 win->internal.flags &= ~(u32)RGFW_windowMinimize;
9526 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_windowMinimizedFlag)) return;
9527 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_windowMinimized; e.common.win = win);
9528 RGFW_windowMinimizedCallback(win);
9529
9530}
9531
9532static void RGFW__osxWindowBecameKey(id self, SEL sel) {
9533 RGFW_UNUSED(sel);
9534 RGFW_window* win = NULL;
9535 object_getInstanceVariable(self, "RGFW_window", (void**)&win);
9536 if (win == NULL) return;
9537
9538
9539 win->internal.inFocus = RGFW_TRUE;
9540 if ((win->internal.holdMouse)) RGFW_window_holdMouse(win);
9541 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_focusInFlag)) return;
9542
9543 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_focusIn; e.common.win = win);
9544 RGFW_focusCallback(win, RGFW_TRUE);
9545}
9546
9547static void RGFW__osxWindowResignKey(id self, SEL sel) {
9548 RGFW_UNUSED(sel);
9549 RGFW_window* win = NULL;
9550 object_getInstanceVariable(self, "RGFW_window", (void**)&win);
9551 if (win == NULL) return;
9552
9553 RGFW_window_focusLost(win);
9554 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_focusOutFlag)) return;
9555
9556 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_focusOut; e.common.win = win);
9557 RGFW_focusCallback(win, RGFW_FALSE);
9558}
9559
9560static void RGFW__osxDidWindowResize(id self, SEL _cmd, id notification) {
9561 RGFW_UNUSED(_cmd); RGFW_UNUSED(notification);
9562 RGFW_window* win = NULL;
9563 object_getInstanceVariable(self, "RGFW_window", (void**)&win);
9564 if (win == NULL) return;
9565
9566 NSRect frame;
9567 if (win->src.view) frame = ((NSRect(*)(id, SEL))abi_objc_msgSend_stret)((id)win->src.view, sel_registerName("frame"));
9568 else return;
9569
9570 if (frame.size.width == 0 || frame.size.height == 0) return;
9571 win->w = (i32)frame.size.width;
9572 win->h = (i32)frame.size.height;
9573
9574 RGFW_monitor mon = RGFW_window_getMonitor(win);
9575 if ((i32)mon.mode.w == win->w && (i32)mon.mode.h - 102 <= win->h) {
9576 win->internal.flags |= RGFW_windowMaximize;
9577 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_windowMaximizedFlag)) return;
9578 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_windowMaximized; e.common.win = win);
9579 RGFW_windowMaximizedCallback(win, 0, 0, win->w, win->h);
9580 } else if (win->internal.flags & RGFW_windowMaximize) {
9581 win->internal.flags &= ~(u32)RGFW_windowMaximize;
9582 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_windowRestoredFlag)) return;
9583 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_windowRestored; e.common.win = win);
9584 RGFW_windowRestoredCallback(win, win->x, win->y, win->w, win->h);
9585
9586 }
9587
9588 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_windowResizedFlag)) return;
9589
9590 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_windowResized; e.common.win = win);
9591 RGFW_windowResizedCallback(win, win->w, win->h);
9592}
9593
9594static void RGFW__osxWindowMove(id self, SEL sel) {
9595 RGFW_UNUSED(sel);
9596
9597 RGFW_window* win = NULL;
9598 object_getInstanceVariable(self, "RGFW_window", (void**)&win);
9599 if (win == NULL) return;
9600
9601 NSRect frame = ((NSRect(*)(id, SEL))abi_objc_msgSend_stret)((id)win->src.window, sel_registerName("frame"));
9602 win->x = (i32) frame.origin.x;
9603 win->y = (i32) frame.origin.y;
9604
9605 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_windowMovedFlag)) return;
9606 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_windowMoved; e.common.win = win);
9607 RGFW_windowMovedCallback(win, win->x, win->y);
9608}

9610static void RGFW__osxViewDidChangeBackingProperties(id self, SEL _cmd) {
9611 RGFW_UNUSED(_cmd);
9612 RGFW_window* win = NULL;
9613 object_getInstanceVariable(self, "RGFW_window", (void**)&win);
9614 if (win == NULL || !(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_scaleUpdatedFlag)) return;
9615
9616 RGFW_monitor mon = RGFW_window_getMonitor(win);
9617 RGFW_scaleUpdatedCallback(win, mon.scaleX, mon.scaleY);
9618 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_scaleUpdated; e.scale.x = mon.scaleX; e.scale.y = mon.scaleY ; e.common.win = win);
9619}

9626 object_getInstanceVariable(self, "RGFW_window", (void**)&win);
9627 if (win == NULL || !(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_windowRefreshFlag)) return;
9628 RGFW_windowRefreshCallback(win);
9629}

9636

9641static void RGFW__osxMouseEntered(id self, SEL _cmd, id event) {
9642 RGFW_UNUSED(_cmd);
9643 RGFW_window* win = NULL;
9644 object_getInstanceVariable(self, "RGFW_window", (void**)&win);
9645 if (win == NULL || !(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_mouseEnterFlag)) return;
9646
9647 win->internal.mouseInside = RGFW_TRUE;
9648 _RGFW->windowState.win = win;
9649 _RGFW->windowState.mouseEnter = RGFW_TRUE;
9650
9651 RGFW_event e;
9652 e.type = RGFW_mouseEnter;
9653 NSPoint p = ((NSPoint(*)(id, SEL))objc_msgSend)(event, sel_registerName("locationInWindow"));
9654 e.mouse.x = (i32)p.x;
9655 e.mouse.y = (i32)(win->h - p.y);
9656 e.common.win = win;
9657
9658 RGFW_eventQueuePush(&e);
9659 RGFW_mouseNotifyCallback(win, e.mouse.x, e.mouse.y, 1);
9660}
9661
9662void RGFW__osxMouseExited(id self, SEL _cmd, id event) {
9663 RGFW_UNUSED(_cmd); RGFW_UNUSED(event);
9664 RGFW_window* win = NULL;
9665 object_getInstanceVariable(self, "RGFW_window", (void**)&win);
9666 if (win == NULL || !(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_mouseLeaveFlag)) return;
9667
9668
9669 win->internal.mouseInside = RGFW_FALSE;
9670 _RGFW->windowState.winLeave = win;
9671 _RGFW->windowState.mouseLeave = RGFW_TRUE;
9672
9673 RGFW_event e;
9674 e.type = RGFW_mouseLeave;
9675 e.mouse.x = 0;
9676 e.mouse.y = 0;
9677 e.common.win = win;
9678
9679 RGFW_eventQueuePush(&e);
9680 RGFW_mouseNotifyCallback(win, e.mouse.x, e.mouse.y, 0);
9681}
9682
9683void RGFW__osxKeyDown(id self, SEL _cmd, id event) {
9684 RGFW_UNUSED(_cmd);
9685 RGFW_window* win = NULL;
9686 object_getInstanceVariable(self, "RGFW_window", (void**)&win);
9687 if (win == NULL || !(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_keyPressedFlag)) return;
9688
9689 RGFW_event e;
9690 u32 key = (u16)((u32(*)(id, SEL))objc_msgSend)(event, sel_registerName("keyCode"));
9691 u32 mappedKey = (u32)*(((char*)(const char*)NSString_to_char(((id(*)(id, SEL))objc_msgSend)(event, sel_registerName("charactersIgnoringModifiers")))));
9692 if ((u8)mappedKey == 239) mappedKey = 0;
9693
9694 e.key.sym = (u8)mappedKey;
9695 e.key.value = (u8)RGFW_apiKeyToRGFW(key);
9696 _RGFW->keyboard[e.key.value].prev = _RGFW->keyboard[e.key.value].current;
9697 e.type = RGFW_keyPressed;
9698 e.key.repeat = RGFW_window_isKeyPressed(win, e.key.value);
9699 _RGFW->keyboard[e.key.value].current = 1;
9700 e.common.win = win;
9701
9702 RGFW_eventQueuePush(&e);
9703 RGFW_keyCallback(win, e.key.value, e.key.sym, win->internal.mod, e.key.repeat, 1);
9704}
9705
9706void RGFW__osxKeyUp(id self, SEL _cmd, id event) {
9707 RGFW_UNUSED(_cmd);
9708 RGFW_window* win = NULL;
9709 object_getInstanceVariable(self, "RGFW_window", (void**)&win);
9710 if (win == NULL || !(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_keyReleasedFlag)) return;
9711
9712 RGFW_event e;
9713 u32 key = (u16)((u32(*)(id, SEL))objc_msgSend)(event, sel_registerName("keyCode"));
9714 u32 mappedKey = (u32)*(((char*)(const char*)NSString_to_char(((id(*)(id, SEL))objc_msgSend)(event, sel_registerName("charactersIgnoringModifiers")))));
9715 if ((u8)mappedKey == 239) mappedKey = 0;
9716
9717 e.key.sym = (u8)mappedKey;
9718 e.key.value = (u8)RGFW_apiKeyToRGFW(key);
9719 _RGFW->keyboard[e.key.value].prev = _RGFW->keyboard[e.key.value].current;
9720 e.type = RGFW_keyReleased;
9721 e.key.repeat = RGFW_window_isKeyDown(win, (u8)e.key.value);
9722 _RGFW->keyboard[e.key.value].current = 0;
9723 e.common.win = win;
9724
9725 RGFW_eventQueuePush(&e);
9726 RGFW_keyCallback(win, e.key.value, e.key.sym, win->internal.mod, e.key.repeat, 0);
9727}
9728
9729void RGFW__osxFlagsChanged(id self, SEL _cmd, id event) {
9730 RGFW_UNUSED(_cmd);
9731 RGFW_window* win = NULL;
9732 object_getInstanceVariable(self, "RGFW_window", (void**)&win);
9733 if (win == NULL) return;
9734
9735 RGFW_event e;
9736 u32 flags = (u32)((u32(*)(id, SEL))objc_msgSend)(event, sel_registerName("modifierFlags"));
9737 RGFW_updateKeyModsEx(win,
9738 ((u32)(flags & NSEventModifierFlagCapsLock) % 255),
9739 ((flags & NSEventModifierFlagNumericPad) % 255),
9740 ((flags & NSEventModifierFlagControl) % 255),
9741 ((flags & NSEventModifierFlagOption) % 255),
9742 ((flags & NSEventModifierFlagShift) % 255),
9743 ((flags & NSEventModifierFlagCommand) % 255), 0);
9744 u8 i;
9745 for (i = 0; i < 9; i++)
9746 _RGFW->keyboard[i + RGFW_capsLock].prev = _RGFW->keyboard[i + RGFW_capsLock].current;
9747
9748 for (i = 0; i < 5; i++) {
9749 u32 shift = (1 << (i + 16));
9750 u32 key = i + RGFW_capsLock;
9751 if ((flags & shift) && !RGFW_window_isKeyDown(win, (u8)key)) {
9752 _RGFW->keyboard[key].current = 1;
9753 if (key != RGFW_capsLock)
9754 _RGFW->keyboard[key + 4].current = 1;
9755 e.type = RGFW_keyPressed;
9756 e.key.value = (u8)key;
9757 break;
9758 }
9759 if (!(flags & shift) && RGFW_window_isKeyDown(win, (u8)key)) {
9760 _RGFW->keyboard[key].current = 0;
9761 if (key != RGFW_capsLock)
9762 _RGFW->keyboard[key + 4].current = 0;
9763 e.type = RGFW_keyReleased;
9764 e.key.value = (u8)key;
9765 break;
9766 }
9767 }
9768 e.key.repeat = RGFW_window_isKeyDown(win, (u8)e.key.value);
9769 e.common.win = win;
9770
9771 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & (RGFW_BIT(e.type)))) return;
9772 RGFW_eventQueuePush(&e);
9773 RGFW_keyCallback(win, e.key.value, e.key.sym, win->internal.mod, e.key.repeat, e.type == RGFW_keyPressed);
9774}
9775
9776void RGFW__osxMouseMoved(id self, SEL _cmd, id event) {
9777 RGFW_UNUSED(_cmd);
9778 RGFW_window* win = NULL;
9779 object_getInstanceVariable(self, "RGFW_window", (void**)&win);
9780 if (win == NULL || !(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_windowMovedFlag)) return;
9781
9782 RGFW_event e;
9783 e.type = RGFW_mousePosChanged;
9784 NSPoint p = ((NSPoint(*)(id, SEL))objc_msgSend)(event, sel_registerName("locationInWindow"));
9785 e.mouse.x = (i32)p.x;
9786 e.mouse.y = (i32)(win->h - p.y);
9787 p.x = ((CGFloat(*)(id, SEL))abi_objc_msgSend_fpret)(event, sel_registerName("deltaX"));
9788 p.y = ((CGFloat(*)(id, SEL))abi_objc_msgSend_fpret)(event, sel_registerName("deltaY"));
9789 e.mouse.vecX = (float)p.x;
9790 e.mouse.vecY = (float)p.y;
9791 _RGFW->vectorX = e.mouse.vecX;
9792 _RGFW->vectorY = e.mouse.vecY;
9793 win->internal.lastMouseX = e.mouse.x;
9794 win->internal.lastMouseY = e.mouse.y;
9795 e.common.win = win;
9796
9797 RGFW_eventQueuePush(&e);
9798 RGFW_mousePosCallback(win, e.mouse.x, e.mouse.y, e.mouse.vecX, e.mouse.vecY);
9799}
9800
9801void RGFW__osxMouseDown(id self, SEL _cmd, id event) {
9802 RGFW_UNUSED(_cmd);
9803 RGFW_window* win = NULL;
9804 object_getInstanceVariable(self, "RGFW_window", (void**)&win);
9805 if (win == NULL || !(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_mouseButtonPressedFlag)) return;
9806
9807 RGFW_event e;
9808 u32 buttonNumber = (u32)((u32(*)(id, SEL))objc_msgSend)(event, sel_registerName("buttonNumber"));
9809 switch (buttonNumber) {
9810 case 0: e.button.value = RGFW_mouseLeft; break;
9811 case 1: e.button.value = RGFW_mouseRight; break;
9812 case 2: e.button.value = RGFW_mouseMiddle; break;
9813 default: e.button.value = (u8)buttonNumber;
9814 }
9815 e.type = RGFW_mouseButtonPressed;
9816 _RGFW->mouseButtons[e.button.value].prev = _RGFW->mouseButtons[e.button.value].current;
9817 _RGFW->mouseButtons[e.button.value].current = 1;
9818 e.common.win = win;
9819
9820 RGFW_eventQueuePush(&e);
9821 RGFW_mouseButtonCallback(win, e.button.value, 1);
9822}
9823
9824void RGFW__osxMouseUp(id self, SEL _cmd, id event) {
9825 RGFW_UNUSED(_cmd);
9826 RGFW_window* win = NULL;
9827 object_getInstanceVariable(self, "RGFW_window", (void**)&win);
9828 if (win == NULL|| !(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_mouseButtonReleasedFlag)) return;
9829
9830 RGFW_event e;
9831 u32 buttonNumber = (u32)((u32(*)(id, SEL))objc_msgSend)(event, sel_registerName("buttonNumber"));
9832 switch (buttonNumber) {
9833 case 0: e.button.value = RGFW_mouseLeft; break;
9834 case 1: e.button.value = RGFW_mouseRight; break;
9835 case 2: e.button.value = RGFW_mouseMiddle; break;
9836 default: e.button.value = (u8)buttonNumber;
9837 }
9838 e.type = RGFW_mouseButtonReleased;
9839 _RGFW->mouseButtons[e.button.value].prev = _RGFW->mouseButtons[e.button.value].current;
9840 _RGFW->mouseButtons[e.button.value].current = 0;
9841 e.common.win = win;
9842
9843 RGFW_eventQueuePush(&e);
9844 RGFW_mouseButtonCallback(win, e.button.value, 0);
9845}
9846
9847void RGFW__osxScrollWheel(id self, SEL _cmd, id event) {
9848 RGFW_UNUSED(_cmd);
9849 RGFW_window* win = NULL;
9850 object_getInstanceVariable(self, "RGFW_window", (void**)&win);
9851 if (win == NULL|| !(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_mouseScroll)) return;
9852
9853 RGFW_event e;
9854 float deltaX = (float)((CGFloat(*)(id, SEL))abi_objc_msgSend_fpret)(event, sel_registerName("deltaX"));
9855 float deltaY = (float)((CGFloat(*)(id, SEL))abi_objc_msgSend_fpret)(event, sel_registerName("deltaY"));
9856
9857 e.type = RGFW_mouseScroll;
9858 e.scroll.x = deltaX;
9859 e.scroll.y = deltaY;
9860 e.common.win = win;
9861 _RGFW->scrollX = e.scroll.x;
9862 _RGFW->scrollY = e.scroll.y;
9863
9864 RGFW_eventQueuePush(&e);
9865 RGFW_mouseScrollCallback(win, deltaX, deltaY);
9866}
9867
9868RGFW_bool RGFW_createSurfacePtr(u8* data, i32 w, i32 h, RGFW_format format, RGFW_surface* surface) {
9869 surface->data = data;
9870 surface->w = w;
9871 surface->h = h;
9872 surface->format = format;
9873 surface->native.format = RGFW_formatRGBA8;
9874 return RGFW_TRUE;
9875}
9876
9877void RGFW_surface_freePtr(RGFW_surface* surface) { RGFW_UNUSED(surface); }
9878
9879void RGFW_window_blitSurface(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_surface* surface) {
9880 RGFW_copyImageData(surface->data, surface->w, RGFW_MIN(win->h, surface->h), surface->native.format, surface->data, surface->format);
9881
9882 size_t depth = (surface->format >= RGFW_formatRGBA8) ? 4 : 3;
9883 id image = ((id (*)(Class, SEL))objc_msgSend)(objc_getClass("NSImage"), sel_getUid("alloc"));
9884 NSSize size = (NSSize){(double)surface->w, (double)surface->h};
9885 image = ((id (*)(id, SEL, NSSize))objc_msgSend)((id)image, sel_getUid("initWithSize:"), size);
9886
9887 int minX = RGFW_MIN(win->w, surface->w);
9888 int minY = RGFW_MIN(win->h, surface->h);
9889
9890 id rep = NSBitmapImageRep_initWithBitmapData(&surface->data, minX, minY, 8, (i32)depth, (depth == 4), false, "NSDeviceRGBColorSpace", 1 << 1, (u32)surface->w * (u32)depth, 8 * (u32)depth);
9891 RGFW_copyImageData(NSBitmapImageRep_bitmapData(rep), minX, minY , RGFW_formatRGBA8, surface->data, surface->format);
9892 ((void (*)(id, SEL, id))objc_msgSend)((id)image, sel_getUid("addRepresentation:"), rep);
9893
9894 id contentView = ((id (*)(id, SEL))objc_msgSend)((id)win->src.window, sel_getUid("contentView"));
9895 ((void (*)(id, SEL, BOOL))objc_msgSend)(contentView, sel_getUid("setWantsLayer:"), YES);
9896 id layer = ((id (*)(id, SEL))objc_msgSend)(contentView, sel_getUid("layer"));
9897
9898 ((void (*)(id, SEL, id))objc_msgSend)(layer, sel_getUid("setContents:"), (id)image);
9899 ((void (*)(id, SEL, BOOL))objc_msgSend)(contentView, sel_getUid("setNeedsDisplay:"), YES);
9900
9901 NSRelease(rep);
9902 NSRelease(image);
9903}
9904
9905void* RGFW_window_getView_OSX(RGFW_window* win) { return win->src.view; }
9906
9907void RGFW_window_setLayer_OSX(RGFW_window* win, void* layer) {
9908 objc_msgSend_void_id((id)win->src.view, sel_registerName("setLayer"), (id)layer);
9909}
9910
9911void* RGFW_getLayer_OSX(void) {
9912 return objc_msgSend_class((id)objc_getClass("CAMetalLayer"), (SEL)sel_registerName("layer"));
9913}
9914void* RGFW_window_getWindow_OSX(RGFW_window* win) { return win->src.window; }
9915
9916void RGFW_initKeycodesPlatform(void) {
9917 _RGFW->keycodes[0x1D] = RGFW_0;
9918 _RGFW->keycodes[0x12] = RGFW_1;
9919 _RGFW->keycodes[0x13] = RGFW_2;
9920 _RGFW->keycodes[0x14] = RGFW_3;
9921 _RGFW->keycodes[0x15] = RGFW_4;
9922 _RGFW->keycodes[0x17] = RGFW_5;
9923 _RGFW->keycodes[0x16] = RGFW_6;
9924 _RGFW->keycodes[0x1A] = RGFW_7;
9925 _RGFW->keycodes[0x1C] = RGFW_8;
9926 _RGFW->keycodes[0x19] = RGFW_9;
9927 _RGFW->keycodes[0x00] = RGFW_a;
9928 _RGFW->keycodes[0x0B] = RGFW_b;
9929 _RGFW->keycodes[0x08] = RGFW_c;
9930 _RGFW->keycodes[0x02] = RGFW_d;
9931 _RGFW->keycodes[0x0E] = RGFW_e;
9932 _RGFW->keycodes[0x03] = RGFW_f;
9933 _RGFW->keycodes[0x05] = RGFW_g;
9934 _RGFW->keycodes[0x04] = RGFW_h;
9935 _RGFW->keycodes[0x22] = RGFW_i;
9936 _RGFW->keycodes[0x26] = RGFW_j;
9937 _RGFW->keycodes[0x28] = RGFW_k;
9938 _RGFW->keycodes[0x25] = RGFW_l;
9939 _RGFW->keycodes[0x2E] = RGFW_m;
9940 _RGFW->keycodes[0x2D] = RGFW_n;
9941 _RGFW->keycodes[0x1F] = RGFW_o;
9942 _RGFW->keycodes[0x23] = RGFW_p;
9943 _RGFW->keycodes[0x0C] = RGFW_q;
9944 _RGFW->keycodes[0x0F] = RGFW_r;
9945 _RGFW->keycodes[0x01] = RGFW_s;
9946 _RGFW->keycodes[0x11] = RGFW_t;
9947 _RGFW->keycodes[0x20] = RGFW_u;
9948 _RGFW->keycodes[0x09] = RGFW_v;
9949 _RGFW->keycodes[0x0D] = RGFW_w;
9950 _RGFW->keycodes[0x07] = RGFW_x;
9951 _RGFW->keycodes[0x10] = RGFW_y;
9952 _RGFW->keycodes[0x06] = RGFW_z;
9953 _RGFW->keycodes[0x27] = RGFW_apostrophe;
9954 _RGFW->keycodes[0x2A] = RGFW_backSlash;
9955 _RGFW->keycodes[0x2B] = RGFW_comma;
9956 _RGFW->keycodes[0x18] = RGFW_equals;
9957 _RGFW->keycodes[0x32] = RGFW_backtick;
9958 _RGFW->keycodes[0x21] = RGFW_bracket;
9959 _RGFW->keycodes[0x1B] = RGFW_minus;
9960 _RGFW->keycodes[0x2F] = RGFW_period;
9961 _RGFW->keycodes[0x1E] = RGFW_closeBracket;
9962 _RGFW->keycodes[0x29] = RGFW_semicolon;
9963 _RGFW->keycodes[0x2C] = RGFW_slash;
9964 _RGFW->keycodes[0x0A] = RGFW_world1;
9965 _RGFW->keycodes[0x33] = RGFW_backSpace;
9966 _RGFW->keycodes[0x39] = RGFW_capsLock;
9967 _RGFW->keycodes[0x75] = RGFW_delete;
9968 _RGFW->keycodes[0x7D] = RGFW_down;
9969 _RGFW->keycodes[0x77] = RGFW_end;
9970 _RGFW->keycodes[0x24] = RGFW_enter;
9971 _RGFW->keycodes[0x35] = RGFW_escape;
9972 _RGFW->keycodes[0x7A] = RGFW_F1;
9973 _RGFW->keycodes[0x78] = RGFW_F2;
9974 _RGFW->keycodes[0x63] = RGFW_F3;
9975 _RGFW->keycodes[0x76] = RGFW_F4;
9976 _RGFW->keycodes[0x60] = RGFW_F5;
9977 _RGFW->keycodes[0x61] = RGFW_F6;
9978 _RGFW->keycodes[0x62] = RGFW_F7;
9979 _RGFW->keycodes[0x64] = RGFW_F8;
9980 _RGFW->keycodes[0x65] = RGFW_F9;
9981 _RGFW->keycodes[0x6D] = RGFW_F10;
9982 _RGFW->keycodes[0x67] = RGFW_F11;
9983 _RGFW->keycodes[0x6F] = RGFW_F12;
9984 _RGFW->keycodes[0x69] = RGFW_printScreen;
9985 _RGFW->keycodes[0x6B] = RGFW_F14;
9986 _RGFW->keycodes[0x71] = RGFW_F15;
9987 _RGFW->keycodes[0x6A] = RGFW_F16;
9988 _RGFW->keycodes[0x40] = RGFW_F17;
9989 _RGFW->keycodes[0x4F] = RGFW_F18;
9990 _RGFW->keycodes[0x50] = RGFW_F19;
9991 _RGFW->keycodes[0x5A] = RGFW_F20;
9992 _RGFW->keycodes[0x73] = RGFW_home;
9993 _RGFW->keycodes[0x72] = RGFW_insert;
9994 _RGFW->keycodes[0x7B] = RGFW_left;
9995 _RGFW->keycodes[0x3A] = RGFW_altL;
9996 _RGFW->keycodes[0x3B] = RGFW_controlL;
9997 _RGFW->keycodes[0x38] = RGFW_shiftL;
9998 _RGFW->keycodes[0x37] = RGFW_superL;
9999 _RGFW->keycodes[0x6E] = RGFW_menu;
10000 _RGFW->keycodes[0x47] = RGFW_numLock;
10001 _RGFW->keycodes[0x79] = RGFW_pageDown;
10002 _RGFW->keycodes[0x74] = RGFW_pageUp;
10003 _RGFW->keycodes[0x7C] = RGFW_right;
10004 _RGFW->keycodes[0x3D] = RGFW_altR;
10005 _RGFW->keycodes[0x3E] = RGFW_controlR;
10006 _RGFW->keycodes[0x3C] = RGFW_shiftR;
10007 _RGFW->keycodes[0x36] = RGFW_superR;
10008 _RGFW->keycodes[0x31] = RGFW_space;
10009 _RGFW->keycodes[0x30] = RGFW_tab;
10010 _RGFW->keycodes[0x7E] = RGFW_up;
10011 _RGFW->keycodes[0x52] = RGFW_kp0;
10012 _RGFW->keycodes[0x53] = RGFW_kp1;
10013 _RGFW->keycodes[0x54] = RGFW_kp2;
10014 _RGFW->keycodes[0x55] = RGFW_kp3;
10015 _RGFW->keycodes[0x56] = RGFW_kp4;
10016 _RGFW->keycodes[0x57] = RGFW_kp5;
10017 _RGFW->keycodes[0x58] = RGFW_kp6;
10018 _RGFW->keycodes[0x59] = RGFW_kp7;
10019 _RGFW->keycodes[0x5B] = RGFW_kp8;
10020 _RGFW->keycodes[0x5C] = RGFW_kp9;
10021 _RGFW->keycodes[0x45] = RGFW_kpSlash;
10022 _RGFW->keycodes[0x41] = RGFW_kpPeriod;
10023 _RGFW->keycodes[0x4B] = RGFW_kpSlash;
10024 _RGFW->keycodes[0x4C] = RGFW_kpReturn;
10025 _RGFW->keycodes[0x51] = RGFW_kpEqual;
10026 _RGFW->keycodes[0x43] = RGFW_kpMultiply;
10027 _RGFW->keycodes[0x4E] = RGFW_kpMinus;
10028}
10029
10030i32 RGFW_initPlatform(void) {
10031 class_addMethod(objc_getClass("NSObject"), sel_registerName("windowShouldClose:"), (IMP)(void*)RGFW_OnClose, 0);
10032
10033 /* NOTE(EimaMei): Fixes the 'Boop' sfx from constantly playing each time you click a key. Only a problem when running in the terminal. */
10034 class_addMethod(objc_getClass("NSWindowClass"), sel_registerName("acceptsFirstResponder:"), (IMP)(void*)acceptsFirstResponder, 0);
10035 class_addMethod(objc_getClass("NSWindowClass"), sel_registerName("performKeyEquivalent:"), (IMP)(void*)performKeyEquivalent, 0);
10036
10037 _RGFW->NSApp = objc_msgSend_id((id)objc_getClass("NSApplication"), sel_registerName("sharedApplication"));
10038
10039 ((void (*)(id, SEL, NSUInteger))objc_msgSend)
10040 ((id)_RGFW->NSApp, sel_registerName("setActivationPolicy:"), NSApplicationActivationPolicyRegular);
10041
10042 _RGFW->customViewClasses[0] = objc_allocateClassPair(objc_getClass("NSView"), "RGFWCustomView", 0);
10043 _RGFW->customViewClasses[1] = objc_allocateClassPair(objc_getClass("NSOpenGLView"), "RGFWOpenGLCustomView", 0);
10044 for (size_t i = 0; i < 2; i++) {
10045 class_addIvar((Class)_RGFW->customViewClasses[i], "RGFW_window", sizeof(RGFW_window*), sizeof(RGFW_window*), "L");
10046 class_addMethod((Class)_RGFW->customViewClasses[i], sel_registerName("drawRect:"), (IMP)RGFW__osxDrawRect, "v@:{CGRect=ffff}");
10047 class_addMethod((Class)_RGFW->customViewClasses[i], sel_registerName("viewDidChangeBackingProperties"), (IMP)RGFW__osxViewDidChangeBackingProperties, "v@:");
10048 class_addMethod((Class)_RGFW->customViewClasses[i], sel_registerName("mouseDown:"), (IMP)RGFW__osxMouseDown, "v@:@");
10049 class_addMethod((Class)_RGFW->customViewClasses[i], sel_registerName("rightMouseDown:"), (IMP)RGFW__osxMouseDown, "v@:@");
10050 class_addMethod((Class)_RGFW->customViewClasses[i], sel_registerName("otherMouseDown:"), (IMP)RGFW__osxMouseDown, "v@:@");
10051 class_addMethod((Class)_RGFW->customViewClasses[i], sel_registerName("mouseUp:"), (IMP)RGFW__osxMouseUp, "v@:@");
10052 class_addMethod((Class)_RGFW->customViewClasses[i], sel_registerName("rightMouseUp:"), (IMP)RGFW__osxMouseUp, "v@:@");
10053 class_addMethod((Class)_RGFW->customViewClasses[i], sel_registerName("otherMouseUp:"), (IMP)RGFW__osxMouseUp, "v@:@");
10054 class_addMethod((Class)_RGFW->customViewClasses[i], sel_registerName("scrollWheel:"), (IMP)RGFW__osxScrollWheel, "v@:@");
10055 class_addMethod((Class)_RGFW->customViewClasses[i], sel_registerName("mouseDragged:"), (IMP)RGFW__osxMouseMoved, "v@:@");
10056 class_addMethod((Class)_RGFW->customViewClasses[i], sel_registerName("rightMouseDragged:"), (IMP)RGFW__osxMouseMoved, "v@:@");
10057 class_addMethod((Class)_RGFW->customViewClasses[i], sel_registerName("otherMouseDragged:"), (IMP)RGFW__osxMouseMoved, "v@:@");
10058 class_addMethod((Class)_RGFW->customViewClasses[i], sel_registerName("keyDown:"), (IMP)RGFW__osxKeyDown, "v@:@");
10059 class_addMethod((Class)_RGFW->customViewClasses[i], sel_registerName("keyUp:"), (IMP)RGFW__osxKeyUp, "v@:@");
10060 class_addMethod((Class)_RGFW->customViewClasses[i], sel_registerName("mouseMoved:"), (IMP)RGFW__osxMouseMoved, "v@:@");
10061 class_addMethod((Class)_RGFW->customViewClasses[i], sel_registerName("mouseEntered:"), (IMP)RGFW__osxMouseEntered, "v@:@");
10062 class_addMethod((Class)_RGFW->customViewClasses[i], sel_registerName("mouseExited:"), (IMP)RGFW__osxMouseExited, "v@:@");
10063 class_addMethod((Class)_RGFW->customViewClasses[i], sel_registerName("flagsChanged:"), (IMP)RGFW__osxFlagsChanged, "v@:@");
10064 class_addMethod((Class)_RGFW->customViewClasses[i], sel_getUid("acceptsFirstResponder"), (IMP)acceptsFirstResponder, "B@:");
10065 class_addMethod((Class)_RGFW->customViewClasses[i], sel_registerName("initWithRGFWWindow:"), (IMP)RGFW__osxCustomInitWithRGFWWindow, "@@:{CGRect={CGPoint=dd}{CGSize=dd}}");
10066 class_addMethod((Class)_RGFW->customViewClasses[i], sel_registerName("wantsUpdateLayer"), (IMP)RGFW__osxWantsUpdateLayer, "B@:");
10067 class_addMethod((Class)_RGFW->customViewClasses[i], sel_registerName("updateLayer"), (IMP)RGFW__osxUpdateLayer, "v@:");
10068 objc_registerClassPair((Class)_RGFW->customViewClasses[i]);
10069 }
10070 _RGFW->customWindowDelegateClass = objc_allocateClassPair(objc_getClass("NSObject"), "RGFWWindowDelegate", 0);
10071 class_addIvar((Class)_RGFW->customWindowDelegateClass, "RGFW_window", sizeof(RGFW_window*), sizeof(RGFW_window*), "L");
10072 class_addMethod((Class)_RGFW->customWindowDelegateClass, sel_registerName("windowDidResize:"), (IMP)RGFW__osxDidWindowResize, "v@:@");
10073 class_addMethod((Class)_RGFW->customWindowDelegateClass, sel_registerName("windowDidMove:"), (IMP) RGFW__osxWindowMove, "");
10074 class_addMethod((Class)_RGFW->customWindowDelegateClass, sel_registerName("windowDidMiniaturize:"), (IMP) RGFW__osxWindowMiniaturize, "");
10075 class_addMethod((Class)_RGFW->customWindowDelegateClass, sel_registerName("windowDidDeminiaturize:"), (IMP) RGFW__osxWindowDeminiaturize, "");
10076 class_addMethod((Class)_RGFW->customWindowDelegateClass, sel_registerName("windowDidBecomeKey:"), (IMP) RGFW__osxWindowBecameKey, "");
10077 class_addMethod((Class)_RGFW->customWindowDelegateClass, sel_registerName("windowDidResignKey:"), (IMP) RGFW__osxWindowResignKey, "");
10078 class_addMethod((Class)_RGFW->customWindowDelegateClass, sel_registerName("draggingEntered:"), (IMP)draggingEntered, "l@:@");
10079 class_addMethod((Class)_RGFW->customWindowDelegateClass, sel_registerName("draggingUpdated:"), (IMP)draggingUpdated, "l@:@");
10080 class_addMethod((Class)_RGFW->customWindowDelegateClass, sel_registerName("draggingExited:"), (IMP)RGFW__osxDraggingEnded, "v@:@");
10081 class_addMethod((Class)_RGFW->customWindowDelegateClass, sel_registerName("draggingEnded:"), (IMP)RGFW__osxDraggingEnded, "v@:@");
10082 class_addMethod((Class)_RGFW->customWindowDelegateClass, sel_registerName("prepareForDragOperation:"), (IMP)prepareForDragOperation, "B@:@");
10083 class_addMethod((Class)_RGFW->customWindowDelegateClass, sel_registerName("performDragOperation:"), (IMP)performDragOperation, "B@:@");
10084 objc_registerClassPair((Class)_RGFW->customWindowDelegateClass);
10085 return 0;
10086}
10087
10088void RGFW_osx_initView(RGFW_window* win) {
10089 NSRect contentRect;
10090 contentRect.origin.x = 0;
10091 contentRect.origin.y = 0;
10092 contentRect.size.width = (double)win->w;
10093 contentRect.size.height = (double)win->h;
10094 ((void(*)(id, SEL, CGRect))objc_msgSend)((id)win->src.view, sel_registerName("setFrame:"), contentRect);
10095
10096
10097 if (RGFW_COCOA_FRAME_NAME)
10098 objc_msgSend_ptr(win->src.view, sel_registerName("setFrameAutosaveName:"), RGFW_COCOA_FRAME_NAME);
10099
10100 object_setInstanceVariable((id)win->src.view, "RGFW_window", win);
10101 objc_msgSend_void_id((id)win->src.window, sel_registerName("setContentView:"), win->src.view);
10102 objc_msgSend_void_bool(win->src.view, sel_registerName("setWantsLayer:"), true);
10103 objc_msgSend_int((id)win->src.view, sel_registerName("setLayerContentsPlacement:"), 4);
10104
10105 id trackingArea = objc_msgSend_id(objc_getClass("NSTrackingArea"), sel_registerName("alloc"));
10106 trackingArea = ((id (*)(id, SEL, NSRect, NSUInteger, id, id))objc_msgSend)(
10107 trackingArea,
10108 sel_registerName("initWithRect:options:owner:userInfo:"),
10109 contentRect,
10110 NSTrackingMouseEnteredAndExited | NSTrackingActiveAlways | NSTrackingInVisibleRect,
10111 (id)win->src.view,
10112 nil
10113 );
10114
10115 ((void (*)(id, SEL, id))objc_msgSend)((id)win->src.view, sel_registerName("addTrackingArea:"), trackingArea);
10116 ((void (*)(id, SEL))objc_msgSend)(trackingArea, sel_registerName("release"));
10117}
10118
10119RGFW_window* RGFW_createWindowPlatform(const char* name, RGFW_windowFlags flags, RGFW_window* win) {
10120 /* RR Create an autorelease pool */
10121 id pool = objc_msgSend_class(objc_getClass("NSAutoreleasePool"), sel_registerName("alloc"));
10122 pool = objc_msgSend_id(pool, sel_registerName("init"));
10123
10124 RGFW_window_setMouseDefault(win);
10125
10126 NSRect windowRect;
10127 windowRect.origin.x = (double)win->x;
10128 windowRect.origin.y = (double)win->y;
10129 windowRect.size.width = (double)win->w;
10130 windowRect.size.height = (double)win->h;
10131 NSBackingStoreType macArgs = (NSBackingStoreType)(NSWindowStyleMaskClosable | NSWindowStyleMaskMiniaturizable | NSBackingStoreBuffered | NSWindowStyleMaskTitled);
10132
10133 if (!(flags & RGFW_windowNoResize))
10134 macArgs = (NSBackingStoreType)(macArgs | (NSBackingStoreType)NSWindowStyleMaskResizable);
10135 if (!(flags & RGFW_windowNoBorder))
10136 macArgs = (NSBackingStoreType)(macArgs | (NSBackingStoreType)NSWindowStyleMaskTitled);
10137 {
10138 void* nsclass = objc_getClass("NSWindow");
10139 SEL func = sel_registerName("initWithContentRect:styleMask:backing:defer:");
10140
10141 win->src.window = ((id(*)(id, SEL, NSRect, NSWindowStyleMask, NSBackingStoreType, bool))objc_msgSend)
10142 (NSAlloc(nsclass), func, windowRect, (NSWindowStyleMask)macArgs, macArgs, false);
10143 }
10144
10145 id str = NSString_stringWithUTF8String(name);
10146 objc_msgSend_void_id((id)win->src.window, sel_registerName("setTitle:"), str);
10147
10148 id delegate = objc_msgSend_id(NSAlloc((Class)_RGFW->customWindowDelegateClass), sel_registerName("init"));
10149 object_setInstanceVariable(delegate, "RGFW_window", win);
10150
10151 objc_msgSend_void_id((id)win->src.window, sel_registerName("setDelegate:"), delegate);
10152
10153 if (flags & RGFW_windowAllowDND) {
10154 win->internal.flags |= RGFW_windowAllowDND;
10155
10156 NSPasteboardType types[] = {NSPasteboardTypeURL, NSPasteboardTypeFileURL, NSPasteboardTypeString};
10157 NSregisterForDraggedTypes((id)win->src.window, types, 3);
10158 }
10159
10160 objc_msgSend_void_bool((id)win->src.window, sel_registerName("setAcceptsMouseMovedEvents:"), true);
10161
10162 if (flags & RGFW_windowTransparent) {
10163 objc_msgSend_void_bool(win->src.window, sel_registerName("setOpaque:"), false);
10164
10165 objc_msgSend_void_id((id)win->src.window, sel_registerName("setBackgroundColor:"),
10166 NSColor_colorWithSRGB(0, 0, 0, 0));
10167 }
10168
10169 /* Show the window */
10170 objc_msgSend_void_bool((id)_RGFW->NSApp, sel_registerName("activateIgnoringOtherApps:"), true);
10171
10172 if (_RGFW->root == NULL) {
10173 objc_msgSend_void(win->src.window, sel_registerName("makeMainWindow"));
10174 }
10175
10176 objc_msgSend_void(win->src.window, sel_registerName("makeKeyWindow"));
10177
10178 objc_msgSend_void((id)_RGFW->NSApp, sel_registerName("finishLaunching"));
10179 NSRetain(win->src.window);
10180 NSRetain(_RGFW->NSApp);
10181
10182 win->src.view = ((id(*)(id, SEL, RGFW_window*))objc_msgSend) (NSAlloc((Class)_RGFW->customViewClasses[0]), sel_registerName("initWithRGFWWindow:"), win);
10183 return win;
10184}
10185
10186void RGFW_window_setBorder(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_bool border) {
10187 NSRect frame = ((NSRect(*)(id, SEL))abi_objc_msgSend_stret)((id)win->src.window, sel_registerName("frame"));
10188 NSRect content = ((NSRect(*)(id, SEL))abi_objc_msgSend_stret)((id)win->src.view, sel_registerName("frame"));
10189 double offset = 0;
10190
10191 RGFW_setBit(&win->internal.flags, RGFW_windowNoBorder, !border);
10192 NSBackingStoreType storeType = (NSBackingStoreType)(NSWindowStyleMaskBorderless | NSWindowStyleMaskFullSizeContentView);
10193 if (border)
10194 storeType = (NSBackingStoreType)(NSWindowStyleMaskTitled | NSWindowStyleMaskClosable | NSWindowStyleMaskMiniaturizable);
10195 if (!(win->internal.flags & RGFW_windowNoResize)) {
10196 storeType = (NSBackingStoreType)(storeType | (NSBackingStoreType)NSWindowStyleMaskResizable);
10197 }
10198
10199 ((void (*)(id, SEL, NSBackingStoreType))objc_msgSend)((id)win->src.window, sel_registerName("setStyleMask:"), storeType);
10200
10201 if (!border) {
10202 id miniaturizeButton = objc_msgSend_int((id)win->src.window, sel_registerName("standardWindowButton:"), NSWindowMiniaturizeButton);
10203 id titleBarView = objc_msgSend_id(miniaturizeButton, sel_registerName("superview"));
10204 objc_msgSend_void_bool(titleBarView, sel_registerName("setHidden:"), true);
10205
10206 offset = (double)(frame.size.height - content.size.height);
10207 }
10208
10209 RGFW_window_resize(win, win->w, win->h + (i32)offset);
10210 win->h -= (i32)offset;
10211}
10212
10213RGFW_bool RGFW_getGlobalMouse(i32* x, i32* y) {
10214 RGFW_ASSERT(_RGFW->root != NULL);
10215
10216 CGEventRef e = CGEventCreate(NULL);
10217 CGPoint point = CGEventGetLocation(e);
10218 CFRelease(e);
10219
10220 if (x) *x = (i32)point.x;
10221 if (y) *y = (i32)point.y;
10222 return RGFW_TRUE;
10223}
10224
10225void RGFW_stopCheckEvents(void) {
10226 id eventPool = objc_msgSend_class(objc_getClass("NSAutoreleasePool"), sel_registerName("alloc"));
10227 eventPool = objc_msgSend_id(eventPool, sel_registerName("init"));
10228
10229 id e = (id) ((id(*)(Class, SEL, NSEventType, NSPoint, NSEventModifierFlags, void*, NSInteger, void**, short, NSInteger, NSInteger))objc_msgSend)
10230 (objc_getClass("NSEvent"), sel_registerName("otherEventWithType:location:modifierFlags:timestamp:windowNumber:context:subtype:data1:data2:"),
10231 NSEventTypeApplicationDefined, (NSPoint){0, 0}, (NSEventModifierFlags)0, NULL, (NSInteger)0, NULL, 0, 0, 0);
10232
10233 ((void (*)(id, SEL, id, bool))objc_msgSend)
10234 ((id)_RGFW->NSApp, sel_registerName("postEvent:atStart:"), e, 1);
10235
10236 objc_msgSend_bool_void(eventPool, sel_registerName("drain"));
10237}
10238
10239void RGFW_waitForEvent(i32 waitMS) {
10240 id eventPool = objc_msgSend_class(objc_getClass("NSAutoreleasePool"), sel_registerName("alloc"));
10241 eventPool = objc_msgSend_id(eventPool, sel_registerName("init"));
10242
10243 void* date = (void*) ((id(*)(Class, SEL, double))objc_msgSend)
10244 (objc_getClass("NSDate"), sel_registerName("dateWithTimeIntervalSinceNow:"), waitMS);
10245
10246 SEL eventFunc = sel_registerName("nextEventMatchingMask:untilDate:inMode:dequeue:");
10247 id e = (id) ((id(*)(id, SEL, NSEventMask, void*, id, bool))objc_msgSend)
10248 ((id)_RGFW->NSApp, eventFunc,
10249 ULONG_MAX, date, NSString_stringWithUTF8String("kCFRunLoopDefaultMode"), true);
10250
10251 if (e) {
10252 ((void (*)(id, SEL, id, bool))objc_msgSend)
10253 ((id)_RGFW->NSApp, sel_registerName("postEvent:atStart:"), e, 1);
10254 }
10255
10256 objc_msgSend_bool_void(eventPool, sel_registerName("drain"));
10257}
10258
10259u8 RGFW_rgfwToKeyChar(u32 rgfw_keycode) {
10260 return (u8)rgfw_keycode; /* TODO */
10261}
10262
10263void RGFW_pollEvents(void) {
10264 /*
10265 * TODO look to see if all these events can be replaced with callbacks
10266 * callbacks seem to give better info on mac's api
10267 */
10268
10269 RGFW_resetPrevState();
10270
10271 id eventPool = objc_msgSend_class(objc_getClass("NSAutoreleasePool"), sel_registerName("alloc"));
10272 eventPool = objc_msgSend_id(eventPool, sel_registerName("init"));
10273 SEL eventFunc = sel_registerName("nextEventMatchingMask:untilDate:inMode:dequeue:");
10274
10275 while (1) {
10276 void* date = NULL;
10277 id e = (id) ((id(*)(id, SEL, NSEventMask, void*, id, bool))objc_msgSend)
10278 ((id)_RGFW->NSApp, eventFunc, ULONG_MAX, date, NSString_stringWithUTF8String("kCFRunLoopDefaultMode"), true);
10279
10280 if (e == NULL) {
10281 objc_msgSend_void_id((id)_RGFW->NSApp, sel_registerName("sendEvent:"), e);
10282 ((void(*)(id, SEL))objc_msgSend)((id)_RGFW->NSApp, sel_registerName("updateWindows"));
10283 break;
10284 }
10285
10286 RGFW_event event;
10287 RGFW_MEMSET(&event, 0, sizeof(event));
10288 objc_msgSend_void_id((id)_RGFW->NSApp, sel_registerName("sendEvent:"), e);
10289 ((void(*)(id, SEL))objc_msgSend)((id)_RGFW->NSApp, sel_registerName("updateWindows"));
10290 }
10291
10292 objc_msgSend_bool_void(eventPool, sel_registerName("drain"));
10293}
10294
10295
10296void RGFW_window_move(RGFW_window* win, i32 x, i32 y) {
10297 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
10298
10299 win->x = x;
10300 win->y = y;
10301 ((void(*)(id, SEL, NSRect, bool, bool))objc_msgSend)
10302 ((id)win->src.window, sel_registerName("setFrame:display:animate:"), (NSRect){{(double)win->x, (double)win->y}, {(double)win->w, (double)win->h}}, true, true);
10303}
10304
10305void RGFW_window_resize(RGFW_window* win, i32 w, i32 h) {
10306 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
10307
10308 NSRect frame = ((NSRect(*)(id, SEL))abi_objc_msgSend_stret)((id)win->src.window, sel_registerName("frame"));
10309 NSRect content = ((NSRect(*)(id, SEL))abi_objc_msgSend_stret)((id)win->src.view, sel_registerName("frame"));
10310 float offset = (float)(frame.size.height - content.size.height);
10311
10312 win->w = w;
10313 win->h = h;
10314
10315
10316 ((void(*)(id, SEL, CGRect))objc_msgSend)((id)win->src.view, sel_registerName("setFrame:"), (NSRect){{0, 0}, {(double)win->w, (double)win->h}});
10317 ((void(*)(id, SEL, NSRect, bool, bool))objc_msgSend)
10318 ((id)win->src.window, sel_registerName("setFrame:display:animate:"), (NSRect){{(double)win->x, (double)win->y}, {(double)win->w, (double)win->h + (double)offset}}, true, true);
10319}
10320
10321void RGFW_window_focus(RGFW_window* win) {
10322 RGFW_ASSERT(win);
10323 objc_msgSend_void_bool((id)_RGFW->NSApp, sel_registerName("activateIgnoringOtherApps:"), true);
10324 ((void (*)(id, SEL))objc_msgSend)((id)win->src.window, sel_registerName("makeKeyWindow"));
10325}
10326
10327void RGFW_window_raise(RGFW_window* win) {
10328 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
10329 ((id(*)(id, SEL, SEL))objc_msgSend)((id)win->src.window, sel_registerName("orderFront:"), (SEL)NULL);
10330 objc_msgSend_void_id(win->src.window, sel_registerName("setLevel:"), kCGNormalWindowLevelKey);
10331}
10332
10333void RGFW_window_setFullscreen(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_bool fullscreen) {
10334 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
10335 if (fullscreen && (win->internal.flags & RGFW_windowFullscreen)) return;
10336 if (!fullscreen && !(win->internal.flags & RGFW_windowFullscreen)) return;
10337
10338 if (fullscreen) {
10339 win->internal.oldX = win->x;
10340 win->internal.oldY = win->y;
10341 win->internal.oldW = win->w;
10342 win->internal.oldH = win->h;
10343 RGFW_monitor mon = RGFW_window_getMonitor(win);
10344 win->x = 0;
10345 win->y = 0;
10346 win->w = mon.x;
10347 win->h = mon.y;
10348 win->internal.flags |= RGFW_windowFullscreen;
10349 RGFW_window_resize(win, mon.mode.w, mon.mode.h);
10350 RGFW_window_move(win, 0, 0);
10351 }
10352 objc_msgSend_void_SEL(win->src.window, sel_registerName("toggleFullScreen:"), NULL);
10353
10354 if (!fullscreen) {
10355 win->x = win->internal.oldX;
10356 win->y = win->internal.oldY;
10357 win->w = win->internal.oldW;
10358 win->h = win->internal.oldH;
10359 win->internal.flags &= ~(u32)RGFW_windowFullscreen;
10360
10361 RGFW_window_resize(win, win->w, win->h);
10362 RGFW_window_move(win, win->x, win->y);
10363 }
10364}
10365
10366void RGFW_window_maximize(RGFW_window* win) {
10367 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
10368 if (RGFW_window_isMaximized(win)) return;
10369
10370 win->internal.flags |= RGFW_windowMaximize;
10371 objc_msgSend_void_SEL(win->src.window, sel_registerName("zoom:"), NULL);
10372}
10373
10374void RGFW_window_minimize(RGFW_window* win) {
10375 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
10376 objc_msgSend_void_SEL(win->src.window, sel_registerName("performMiniaturize:"), NULL);
10377}
10378
10379void RGFW_window_setFloating(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_bool floating) {
10380 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
10381 if (floating) objc_msgSend_void_id(win->src.window, sel_registerName("setLevel:"), kCGFloatingWindowLevelKey);
10382 else objc_msgSend_void_id(win->src.window, sel_registerName("setLevel:"), kCGNormalWindowLevelKey);
10383}
10384
10385void RGFW_window_setOpacity(RGFW_window* win, u8 opacity) {
10386 objc_msgSend_int(win->src.window, sel_registerName("setAlphaValue:"), opacity);
10387 objc_msgSend_void_bool(win->src.window, sel_registerName("setOpaque:"), (opacity < (u8)255));
10388
10389 if (opacity)
10390 objc_msgSend_void_id((id)win->src.window, sel_registerName("setBackgroundColor:"), NSColor_colorWithSRGB(0, 0, 0, opacity));
10391
10392}
10393
10394void RGFW_window_restore(RGFW_window* win) {
10395 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
10396
10397 if (RGFW_window_isMaximized(win))
10398 objc_msgSend_void_SEL(win->src.window, sel_registerName("zoom:"), NULL);
10399
10400 objc_msgSend_void_SEL(win->src.window, sel_registerName("deminiaturize:"), NULL);
10401 RGFW_window_show(win);
10402}
10403
10404RGFW_bool RGFW_window_isFloating(RGFW_window* win) {
10405 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
10406 int level = ((int (*)(id, SEL))objc_msgSend) ((id)(win->src.window), (SEL)sel_registerName("level"));
10407 return level > kCGNormalWindowLevelKey;
10408}
10409
10410void RGFW_window_setName(RGFW_window* win, const char* name) {
10411 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
10412
10413 id str = NSString_stringWithUTF8String(name);
10414 objc_msgSend_void_id((id)win->src.window, sel_registerName("setTitle:"), str);
10415}
10416
10417#ifndef RGFW_NO_PASSTHROUGH
10418void RGFW_window_setMousePassthrough(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_bool passthrough) {
10419 objc_msgSend_void_bool(win->src.window, sel_registerName("setIgnoresMouseEvents:"), passthrough);
10420}
10421#endif
10422
10423void RGFW_window_setAspectRatio(RGFW_window* win, i32 w, i32 h) {
10424 if (w == 0 && h == 0) { w = 1; h = 1; };
10425
10426 ((void (*)(id, SEL, NSSize))objc_msgSend)
10427 ((id)win->src.window, sel_registerName("setContentAspectRatio:"), (NSSize){(CGFloat)w, (CGFloat)h});
10428}
10429
10430void RGFW_window_setMinSize(RGFW_window* win, i32 w, i32 h) {
10431 ((void (*)(id, SEL, NSSize))objc_msgSend) ((id)win->src.window, sel_registerName("setMinSize:"), (NSSize){(CGFloat)w, (CGFloat)h});
10432}
10433
10434void RGFW_window_setMaxSize(RGFW_window* win, i32 w, i32 h) {
10435 if (w == 0 && h == 0) {
10436 RGFW_monitor mon = RGFW_window_getMonitor(win);
10437 w = mon.mode.w;
10438 h = mon.mode.h;
10439 }
10440
10441 ((void (*)(id, SEL, NSSize))objc_msgSend)
10442 ((id)win->src.window, sel_registerName("setMaxSize:"), (NSSize){(CGFloat)w, (CGFloat)h});
10443}
10444
10445RGFW_bool RGFW_window_setIconEx(RGFW_window* win, u8* data, i32 w, i32 h, RGFW_format format, RGFW_icon type) {
10446 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
10447 RGFW_UNUSED(type);
10448
10449 if (data == NULL) {
10450 objc_msgSend_void_id((id)_RGFW->NSApp, sel_registerName("setApplicationIconImage:"), NULL);
10451 return RGFW_TRUE;
10452 }
10453
10454 id representation = NSBitmapImageRep_initWithBitmapData(NULL, w, h, 8, (NSInteger)4, true, false, "NSCalibratedRGBColorSpace", 1 << 1, w * 4, 32);
10455 RGFW_copyImageData(NSBitmapImageRep_bitmapData(representation), w, h, RGFW_formatRGBA8, data, format);
10456
10457 id dock_image = ((id(*)(id, SEL, NSSize))objc_msgSend) (NSAlloc((id)objc_getClass("NSImage")), sel_registerName("initWithSize:"), ((NSSize){(CGFloat)w, (CGFloat)h}));
10458
10459 objc_msgSend_void_id(dock_image, sel_registerName("addRepresentation:"), representation);
10460
10461 objc_msgSend_void_id((id)_RGFW->NSApp, sel_registerName("setApplicationIconImage:"), dock_image);
10462
10463 NSRelease(dock_image);
10464 NSRelease(representation);
10465
10466 return RGFW_TRUE;
10467}
10468
10469id NSCursor_arrowStr(const char* str) {
10470 void* nclass = objc_getClass("NSCursor");
10471 SEL func = sel_registerName(str);
10472 return (id) objc_msgSend_id(nclass, func);
10473}
10474
10475RGFW_mouse* RGFW_loadMouse(u8* data, i32 w, i32 h, RGFW_format format) {
10476 if (data == NULL) {
10477 objc_msgSend_void(NSCursor_arrowStr("arrowCursor"), sel_registerName("set"));
10478 return NULL;
10479 }
10480
10481 id representation = (id)NSBitmapImageRep_initWithBitmapData(NULL, w, h, 8, (NSInteger)4, true, false, "NSCalibratedRGBColorSpace", 1 << 1, w * 4, 32);
10482 RGFW_copyImageData(NSBitmapImageRep_bitmapData(representation), w, h, RGFW_formatRGBA8, data, format);
10483
10484 id cursor_image = ((id(*)(id, SEL, NSSize))objc_msgSend) (NSAlloc((id)objc_getClass("NSImage")), sel_registerName("initWithSize:"), ((NSSize){(CGFloat)w, (CGFloat)h}));
10485
10486 objc_msgSend_void_id(cursor_image, sel_registerName("addRepresentation:"), representation);
10487
10488 id cursor = (id) ((id(*)(id, SEL, id, NSPoint))objc_msgSend)
10489 (NSAlloc(objc_getClass("NSCursor")), sel_registerName("initWithImage:hotSpot:"), cursor_image, (NSPoint){0.0, 0.0});
10490
10491 NSRelease(cursor_image);
10492 NSRelease(representation);
10493
10494 return (void*)cursor;
10495}
10496
10497void RGFW_window_setMouse(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_mouse* mouse) {
10498 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL); RGFW_ASSERT(mouse);
10499 CGDisplayShowCursor(kCGDirectMainDisplay);
10500 objc_msgSend_void((id)mouse, sel_registerName("set"));
10501 win->src.mouse = mouse;
10502}
10503
10504void RGFW_freeMouse(RGFW_mouse* mouse) {
10505 RGFW_ASSERT(mouse);
10506 NSRelease((id)mouse);
10507}
10508
10509RGFW_bool RGFW_window_setMouseDefault(RGFW_window* win) {
10510 return RGFW_window_setMouseStandard(win, RGFW_mouseArrow);
10511}
10512
10513void RGFW_window_showMouse(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_bool show) {
10514 RGFW_window_showMouseFlags(win, show);
10515 if (show) CGDisplayShowCursor(kCGDirectMainDisplay);
10516 else CGDisplayHideCursor(kCGDirectMainDisplay);
10517}
10518
10519RGFW_bool RGFW_window_setMouseStandard(RGFW_window* win, u8 stdMouses) {
10520 static const char* mouseIconSrc[16] = {"arrowCursor", "arrowCursor", "IBeamCursor", "crosshairCursor", "pointingHandCursor", "resizeLeftRightCursor", "resizeUpDownCursor", "_windowResizeNorthWestSouthEastCursor", "_windowResizeNorthEastSouthWestCursor", "closedHandCursor", "operationNotAllowedCursor"};
10521 if (stdMouses > ((sizeof(mouseIconSrc)) / (sizeof(char*))))
10522 return RGFW_FALSE;
10523
10524 const char* mouseStr = mouseIconSrc[stdMouses];
10525 id mouse = NSCursor_arrowStr(mouseStr);
10526
10527 if (mouse == NULL)
10528 return RGFW_FALSE;
10529
10530 RGFW_UNUSED(win);
10531 CGDisplayShowCursor(kCGDirectMainDisplay);
10532 objc_msgSend_void(mouse, sel_registerName("set"));
10533 win->src.mouse = mouse;
10534
10535 return RGFW_TRUE;
10536}
10537
10538void RGFW_releaseCursor(RGFW_window* win) {
10539 RGFW_UNUSED(win);
10540 CGAssociateMouseAndMouseCursorPosition(1);
10541}
10542
10543void RGFW_captureCursor(RGFW_window* win) {
10544 RGFW_UNUSED(win);
10545
10546 CGWarpMouseCursorPosition((CGPoint){(CGFloat)(win->x + (win->w / 2)), (CGFloat)(win->y + (win->h / 2))});
10547 CGAssociateMouseAndMouseCursorPosition(0);
10548}
10549
10550void RGFW_window_moveMouse(RGFW_window* win, i32 x, i32 y) {
10551 RGFW_UNUSED(win);
10552
10553 win->internal.lastMouseX = x - win->x;
10554 win->internal.lastMouseY = y - win->y;
10555 CGWarpMouseCursorPosition((CGPoint){(CGFloat)x, (CGFloat)y});
10556}
10557
10558
10559void RGFW_window_hide(RGFW_window* win) {
10560 objc_msgSend_void_bool(win->src.window, sel_registerName("setIsVisible:"), false);
10561}
10562
10563void RGFW_window_show(RGFW_window* win) {
10564 if (win->internal.flags & RGFW_windowFocusOnShow)
10565 ((id(*)(id, SEL, SEL))objc_msgSend)((id)win->src.window, sel_registerName("makeKeyAndOrderFront:"), NULL);
10566
10567 ((id(*)(id, SEL, SEL))objc_msgSend)((id)win->src.window, sel_registerName("orderFront:"), NULL);
10568 objc_msgSend_void_bool(win->src.window, sel_registerName("setIsVisible:"), true);
10569}
10570
10571RGFW_bool RGFW_window_isHidden(RGFW_window* win) {
10572 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
10573
10574 bool visible = objc_msgSend_bool(win->src.window, sel_registerName("isVisible"));
10575 return visible == NO && !RGFW_window_isMinimized(win);
10576}
10577
10578RGFW_bool RGFW_window_isMinimized(RGFW_window* win) {
10579 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
10580
10581 return objc_msgSend_bool(win->src.window, sel_registerName("isMiniaturized")) == YES;
10582}
10583
10584RGFW_bool RGFW_window_isMaximized(RGFW_window* win) {
10585 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
10586 RGFW_bool b = (RGFW_bool)objc_msgSend_bool(win->src.window, sel_registerName("isZoomed"));
10587 return b;
10588}
10589
10590id RGFW_getNSScreenForDisplayID(CGDirectDisplayID display) {
10591 Class NSScreenClass = objc_getClass("NSScreen");
10592
10593 id screens = objc_msgSend_id(NSScreenClass, sel_registerName("screens"));
10594
10595 NSUInteger count = (NSUInteger)objc_msgSend_uint(screens, sel_registerName("count"));
10596 NSUInteger i;
10597 for (i = 0; i < count; i++) {
10598 id screen = ((id (*)(id, SEL, int))objc_msgSend) (screens, sel_registerName("objectAtIndex:"), (int)i);
10599 id description = objc_msgSend_id(screen, sel_registerName("deviceDescription"));
10600 id screenNumberKey = NSString_stringWithUTF8String("NSScreenNumber");
10601 id screenNumber = objc_msgSend_id_id(description, sel_registerName("objectForKey:"), screenNumberKey);
10602
10603 if ((CGDirectDisplayID)objc_msgSend_uint(screenNumber, sel_registerName("unsignedIntValue")) == display) {
10604 return screen;
10605 }
10606 }
10607
10608 return NULL;
10609}
10610
10611u32 RGFW_osx_getFallbackRefreshRate(CGDirectDisplayID displayID);
10612
10613u32 RGFW_osx_getRefreshRate(CGDirectDisplayID display, CGDisplayModeRef mode) {
10614 if (mode) {
10615 u32 refreshRate = (u32)CGDisplayModeGetRefreshRate(mode);
10616 if (refreshRate != 0) return refreshRate;
10617 }
10618
10619#ifndef RGFW_NO_IOKIT
10620 u32 res = RGFW_osx_getFallbackRefreshRate(display);
10621 if (res != 0) return res;
10622#else
10623 RGFW_UNUSED(display);
10624#endif
10625 return 60;
10626}
10627
10628RGFW_monitor RGFW_NSCreateMonitor(CGDirectDisplayID display, id screen) {
10629 RGFW_monitor monitor;
10630
10631 const char name[] = "MacOS\0";
10632 RGFW_MEMCPY(monitor.name, name, 6);
10633
10634 CGRect bounds = CGDisplayBounds(display);
10635 monitor.x = (i32)bounds.origin.x;
10636 monitor.y = (i32)bounds.origin.y;
10637 monitor.mode.w = (i32) bounds.size.width;
10638 monitor.mode.h = (i32) bounds.size.height;
10639
10640 monitor.mode.red = 8; monitor.mode.green = 8; monitor.mode.blue = 8;
10641
10642 CGDisplayModeRef mode = CGDisplayCopyDisplayMode(display);
10643 monitor.mode.refreshRate = RGFW_osx_getRefreshRate(display, mode);
10644 CFRelease(mode);
10645
10646 CGSize screenSizeMM = CGDisplayScreenSize(display);
10647 monitor.physW = (float)screenSizeMM.width / 25.4f;
10648 monitor.physH = (float)screenSizeMM.height / 25.4f;
10649
10650 float ppi_width = (monitor.mode.w/monitor.physW);
10651 float ppi_height = (monitor.mode.h/monitor.physH);
10652
10653 monitor.pixelRatio = (float)((CGFloat (*)(id, SEL))abi_objc_msgSend_fpret) (screen, sel_registerName("backingScaleFactor"));
10654 float dpi = 96.0f * monitor.pixelRatio;
10655
10656 monitor.scaleX = ((i32)(((float) (ppi_width) / dpi) * 10.0f)) / 10.0f;
10657 monitor.scaleY = ((i32)(((float) (ppi_height) / dpi) * 10.0f)) / 10.0f;
10658
10659 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeInfo, RGFW_infoMonitor, "monitor found");
10660 return monitor;
10661}
10662
10663
10664RGFW_monitor* RGFW_getMonitors(size_t* len) {
10665 static CGDirectDisplayID displays[7];
10666 u32 count;
10667
10668 if (CGGetActiveDisplayList(6, displays, &count) != kCGErrorSuccess)
10669 return NULL;
10670
10671 if (count > 6) count = 6;
10672
10673 static RGFW_monitor monitors[7];
10674
10675 u32 i;
10676 for (i = 0; i < count; i++)
10677 monitors[i] = RGFW_NSCreateMonitor(displays[i], RGFW_getNSScreenForDisplayID(displays[i]));
10678
10679 if (len != NULL) *len = count;
10680 return monitors;
10681}
10682
10683RGFW_bool RGFW_monitor_requestMode(RGFW_monitor mon, RGFW_monitorMode mode, RGFW_modeRequest request) {
10684 CGPoint point = { (CGFloat)mon.x, (CGFloat)mon.y };
10685
10686 CGDirectDisplayID display;
10687 u32 displayCount = 0;
10688 CGError err = CGGetDisplaysWithPoint(point, 1, &display, &displayCount);
10689 if (err != kCGErrorSuccess || displayCount != 1)
10690 return RGFW_FALSE;
10691
10692 CFArrayRef allModes = CGDisplayCopyAllDisplayModes(display, NULL);
10693
10694 if (allModes == NULL)
10695 return RGFW_FALSE;
10696
10697 CFIndex i;
10698 for (i = 0; i < CFArrayGetCount(allModes); i++) {
10699 CGDisplayModeRef cmode = (CGDisplayModeRef)CFArrayGetValueAtIndex(allModes, i);
10700
10701 RGFW_monitorMode foundMode;
10702 foundMode.w = (i32)CGDisplayModeGetWidth(cmode);
10703 foundMode.h = (i32)CGDisplayModeGetHeight(cmode);
10704 foundMode.refreshRate = RGFW_osx_getRefreshRate(display, cmode);
10705 foundMode.red = 8; foundMode.green = 8; foundMode.blue = 8;
10706
10707 if (RGFW_monitorModeCompare(mode, foundMode, request)) {
10708 if (CGDisplaySetDisplayMode(display, cmode, NULL) == kCGErrorSuccess) {
10709 CFRelease(allModes);
10710 return RGFW_TRUE;
10711 }
10712 break;
10713 }
10714 }
10715
10716 CFRelease(allModes);
10717
10718 return RGFW_FALSE;
10719}
10720
10721RGFW_monitor RGFW_getPrimaryMonitor(void) {
10722 CGDirectDisplayID primary = CGMainDisplayID();
10723 return RGFW_NSCreateMonitor(primary, RGFW_getNSScreenForDisplayID(primary));
10724}
10725
10726RGFW_monitor RGFW_window_getMonitor(RGFW_window* win) {
10727 id screen = objc_msgSend_id(win->src.window, sel_registerName("screen"));
10728 id description = objc_msgSend_id(screen, sel_registerName("deviceDescription"));
10729 id screenNumberKey = NSString_stringWithUTF8String("NSScreenNumber");
10730 id screenNumber = objc_msgSend_id_id(description, sel_registerName("objectForKey:"), screenNumberKey);
10731
10732 CGDirectDisplayID display = (CGDirectDisplayID)objc_msgSend_uint(screenNumber, sel_registerName("unsignedIntValue"));
10733
10734 return RGFW_NSCreateMonitor(display, screen);
10735}
10736
10737RGFW_ssize_t RGFW_readClipboardPtr(char* str, size_t strCapacity) {
10738 size_t clip_len;
10739 char* clip = (char*)NSPasteboard_stringForType(NSPasteboard_generalPasteboard(), NSPasteboardTypeString, &clip_len);
10740 if (clip == NULL) return -1;
10741
10742 if (str != NULL) {
10743 if (strCapacity < clip_len)
10744 return 0;
10745
10746 RGFW_MEMCPY(str, clip, clip_len);
10747
10748 str[clip_len] = '\0';
10749 }
10750
10751 return (RGFW_ssize_t)clip_len;
10752}
10753
10754void RGFW_writeClipboard(const char* text, u32 textLen) {
10755 RGFW_UNUSED(textLen);
10756
10757 NSPasteboardType array[] = { NSPasteboardTypeString, NULL };
10758 NSPasteBoard_declareTypes(NSPasteboard_generalPasteboard(), array, 1, NULL);
10759
10760 SEL func = sel_registerName("setString:forType:");
10761 ((bool (*)(id, SEL, id, id))objc_msgSend)
10762 (NSPasteboard_generalPasteboard(), func, NSString_stringWithUTF8String(text), NSString_stringWithUTF8String((const char*)NSPasteboardTypeString));
10763}
10764
10765#ifdef RGFW_OPENGL
10766void NSOpenGLContext_setValues(id context, const int* vals, NSOpenGLContextParameter param);
10767void NSOpenGLContext_setValues(id context, const int* vals, NSOpenGLContextParameter param) {
10768 ((void (*)(id, SEL, const int*, NSOpenGLContextParameter))objc_msgSend)
10769 (context, sel_registerName("setValues:forParameter:"), vals, param);
10770}
10771
10772
10773/* MacOS OpenGL API spares us yet again (there are no extensions) */
10774RGFW_bool RGFW_extensionSupportedPlatform_OpenGL(const char * extension, size_t len) { RGFW_UNUSED(extension); RGFW_UNUSED(len); return RGFW_FALSE; }
10775
10776RGFW_proc RGFW_getProcAddress_OpenGL(const char* procname) {
10777 static CFBundleRef RGFWnsglFramework = NULL;
10778 if (RGFWnsglFramework == NULL)
10779 RGFWnsglFramework = CFBundleGetBundleWithIdentifier(CFSTR("com.apple.opengl"));
10780
10781 CFStringRef symbolName = CFStringCreateWithCString(kCFAllocatorDefault, procname, kCFStringEncodingASCII);
10782
10783 RGFW_proc symbol = (RGFW_proc)CFBundleGetFunctionPointerForName(RGFWnsglFramework, symbolName);
10784
10785 CFRelease(symbolName);
10786
10787 return symbol;
10788}
10789
10790RGFW_bool RGFW_window_createContextPtr_OpenGL(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_glContext* ctx, RGFW_glHints* hints) {
10791 win->src.ctx.native = ctx;
10792 win->src.gfxType = RGFW_gfxNativeOpenGL;
10793
10794 i32 attribs[40];
10795 size_t render_type_index = 0;
10796 {
10797 RGFW_attribStack stack;
10798 RGFW_attribStack_init(&stack, attribs, 40);
10799
10800 i32 colorBits = (i32)(hints->red + hints->green + hints->blue + hints->alpha) / 4;
10801 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, NSOpenGLPFAColorSize, colorBits);
10802
10803 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, NSOpenGLPFAAlphaSize, hints->alpha);
10804 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, NSOpenGLPFADepthSize, hints->depth);
10805 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, NSOpenGLPFAStencilSize, hints->stencil);
10806 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, NSOpenGLPFAAuxBuffers, hints->auxBuffers);
10807 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttrib(&stack, NSOpenGLPFAClosestPolicy);
10808 if (hints->samples) {
10809 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, NSOpenGLPFASampleBuffers, 1);
10810 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, NSOpenGLPFASamples, hints->samples);
10811 } else RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, NSOpenGLPFASampleBuffers, 0);
10812
10813 if (hints->doubleBuffer)
10814 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttrib(&stack, NSOpenGLPFADoubleBuffer);
10815
10816 #ifdef RGFW_COCOA_GRAPHICS_SWITCHING
10817 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, NSOpenGLPFAAllowOfflineRenderers, kCGLPFASupportsAutomaticGraphicsSwitching)
10818 #endif
10819 #if MAC_OS_X_VERSION_MAX_ALLOWED < 101200
10820 if (hints->stereo]) RGFW_attribStack_pushAttrib(&stack, NSOpenGLPFAStereo);
10821 #endif
10822
10823 /* macOS has the surface attribs and the OpenGL attribs connected for some reason maybe this is to give macOS more control to limit openGL/the OpenGL version? */
10824 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, NSOpenGLPFAOpenGLProfile,
10825 (hints->major >= 4) ? NSOpenGLProfileVersion4_1Core : (hints->major >= 3) ?
10826 NSOpenGLProfileVersion3_2Core : NSOpenGLProfileVersionLegacy);
10827
10828 if (hints->major <= 2) {
10829 i32 accumSize = (i32)(hints->accumRed + hints->accumGreen + hints->accumBlue + hints->accumAlpha) / 4;
10830 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, NSOpenGLPFAAccumSize, accumSize);
10831 }
10832
10833 if (hints->renderer == RGFW_glSoftware) {
10834 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, NSOpenGLPFARendererID, kCGLRendererGenericFloatID);
10835 } else {
10836 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttrib(&stack, NSOpenGLPFAAccelerated);
10837 }
10838 render_type_index = stack.count - 1;
10839
10840 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, 0, 0);
10841 }
10842
10843 void* format = (void*) ((id(*)(id, SEL, const u32*))objc_msgSend) (NSAlloc((id)objc_getClass("NSOpenGLPixelFormat")), sel_registerName("initWithAttributes:"), (u32*)attribs);
10844 if (format == NULL) {
10845 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeError, RGFW_errOpenGLContext, "Failed to load pixel format for OpenGL");
10846
10847 assert(render_type_index + 3 < (sizeof(attribs) / sizeof(attribs[0])));
10848 attribs[render_type_index] = NSOpenGLPFARendererID;
10849 attribs[render_type_index + 1] = kCGLRendererGenericFloatID;
10850 attribs[render_type_index + 3] = 0;
10851
10852 format = (void*) ((id(*)(id, SEL, const u32*))objc_msgSend) (NSAlloc((id)objc_getClass("NSOpenGLPixelFormat")), sel_registerName("initWithAttributes:"), (u32*)attribs);
10853 if (format == NULL)
10854 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeError, RGFW_errOpenGLContext, "and loading software rendering OpenGL failed");
10855 else
10856 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeWarning, RGFW_warningOpenGL, "Switching to software rendering");
10857 }
10858
10859 /* the pixel format can be passed directly to OpenGL context creation to create a context
10860 this is because the format also includes information about the OpenGL version (which may be a bad thing) */
10861
10862 if (win->src.view)
10863 NSRelease(win->src.view);
10864 win->src.view = (id) ((id(*)(id, SEL, NSRect, u32*))objc_msgSend) (NSAlloc(_RGFW->customViewClasses[1]),
10865 sel_registerName("initWithFrame:pixelFormat:"), (NSRect){{0, 0}, {(double)win->w, (double)win->h}}, (u32*)format);
10866
10867 id share = NULL;
10868 if (hints->share) {
10869 share = (id)hints->share->ctx;
10870 }
10871
10872 win->src.ctx.native->ctx = ((id (*)(id, SEL, id, id))objc_msgSend)(NSAlloc(objc_getClass("NSOpenGLContext")),
10873 sel_registerName("initWithFormat:shareContext:"),
10874 (id)format, share);
10875
10876 objc_msgSend_void_id(win->src.view, sel_registerName("setOpenGLContext:"), win->src.ctx.native->ctx);
10877 if (win->internal.flags & RGFW_windowTransparent) {
10878 i32 opacity = 0;
10879 #define NSOpenGLCPSurfaceOpacity 236
10880 NSOpenGLContext_setValues((id)win->src.ctx.native->ctx, &opacity, (NSOpenGLContextParameter)NSOpenGLCPSurfaceOpacity);
10881
10882 }
10883
10884 objc_msgSend_void(win->src.ctx.native->ctx, sel_registerName("makeCurrentContext"));
10885
10886 objc_msgSend_void_id((id)win->src.window, sel_registerName("setContentView:"), win->src.view);
10887 objc_msgSend_void_bool(win->src.view, sel_registerName("setWantsLayer:"), true);
10888 objc_msgSend_int((id)win->src.view, sel_registerName("setLayerContentsPlacement:"), 4);
10889
10890 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeInfo, RGFW_infoOpenGL, "OpenGL context initalized.");
10891 return RGFW_TRUE;
10892}
10893
10894void RGFW_window_deleteContextPtr_OpenGL(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_glContext* ctx) {
10895 objc_msgSend_void(ctx->ctx, sel_registerName("release"));
10896 win->src.ctx.native->ctx = NULL;
10897 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeInfo, RGFW_infoOpenGL, "OpenGL context freed.");
10898}
10899
10900void RGFW_window_makeCurrentContext_OpenGL(RGFW_window* win) {
10901 if (win) RGFW_ASSERT(win->src.ctx.native);
10902 if (win != NULL)
10903 objc_msgSend_void(win->src.ctx.native->ctx, sel_registerName("makeCurrentContext"));
10904 else
10905 objc_msgSend_id(objc_getClass("NSOpenGLContext"), sel_registerName("clearCurrentContext"));
10906}
10907void* RGFW_getCurrentContext_OpenGL(void) {
10908 return objc_msgSend_id(objc_getClass("NSOpenGLContext"), sel_registerName("currentContext"));
10909}
10910
10911void RGFW_window_swapBuffers_OpenGL(RGFW_window* win) {
10912 RGFW_ASSERT(win && win->src.ctx.native);
10913 objc_msgSend_void(win->src.ctx.native->ctx, sel_registerName("flushBuffer"));
10914}
10915void RGFW_window_swapInterval_OpenGL(RGFW_window* win, i32 swapInterval) {
10916 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL && win->src.ctx.native != NULL);
10917 NSOpenGLContext_setValues((id)win->src.ctx.native->ctx, &swapInterval, (NSOpenGLContextParameter)222);
10918}
10919#endif
10920
10921void RGFW_deinitPlatform(void) { }
10922
10923void RGFW_window_closePlatform(RGFW_window* win) {
10924 NSRelease(win->src.view);
10925}
10926
10927#ifdef RGFW_WEBGPU
10928WGPUSurface RGFW_window_createSurface_WebGPU(RGFW_window* window, WGPUInstance instance) {
10929 WGPUSurfaceDescriptor surfaceDesc = {0};
10930 id* nsView = (id*)window->src.view;
10931 if (!nsView) {
10932 fprintf(stderr, "RGFW Error: NSView is NULL for macOS window.\n");
10933 return NULL;
10934 }
10935
10936 ((void (*)(id, SEL, BOOL))objc_msgSend)(nsView, sel_registerName("setWantsLayer:"), YES);
10937 id layer = ((id (*)(id, SEL))objc_msgSend)(nsView, sel_registerName("layer"));
10938
10939 void* metalLayer = RGFW_getLayer_OSX();
10940 if (metalLayer == NULL) {
10941 return NULL;
10942 }
10943 ((void (*)(id, SEL, id))objc_msgSend)((id)nsView, sel_registerName("setLayer:"), metalLayer);
10944 layer = metalLayer; /* Use the newly created layer */
10945
10946 /* At this point, 'layer' should be a valid CAMetalLayer* */
10947 WGPUSurfaceSourceMetalLayer fromMetal = {0};
10948 fromMetal.chain.sType = WGPUSType_SurfaceSourceMetalLayer;
10949#ifdef __OBJC__
10950 fromMetal.layer = (__bridge CAMetalLayer*)layer; /* Use __bridge for ARC compatibility if mixing C/Obj-C */
10951#else
10952 fromMetal.layer = layer;
10953#endif
10954
10955 surfaceDesc.nextInChain = (WGPUChainedStruct*)&fromMetal.chain;
10956 return wgpuInstanceCreateSurface(instance, &surfaceDesc);
10957}
10958#endif
10959
10960#endif /* RGFW_MACOS */
10961
10962/*
10963 End of MaOS defines
10964*/
10965
10966/*
10967 WASM defines
10968*/
10969
10970#ifdef RGFW_WASM
10971EM_BOOL Emscripten_on_resize(int eventType, const EmscriptenUiEvent* E, void* userData) {
10972 RGFW_UNUSED(eventType); RGFW_UNUSED(userData);
10973
10974 if (!(_RGFW->root->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_windowResizedFlag)) return EM_TRUE;
10975
10976 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_windowResized; e.common.win = _RGFW->root);
10977 RGFW_windowResizedCallback(_RGFW->root, E->windowInnerWidth, E->windowInnerHeight);
10978 return EM_TRUE;
10979}
10980
10981EM_BOOL Emscripten_on_fullscreenchange(int eventType, const EmscriptenFullscreenChangeEvent* E, void* userData) {
10982 RGFW_UNUSED(eventType); RGFW_UNUSED(userData);
10983
10984 if (!(_RGFW->root->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_windowResizedFlag)) return EM_TRUE;
10985
10986 static u8 fullscreen = RGFW_FALSE;
10987 static i32 originalW, originalH;
10988
10989 if (fullscreen == RGFW_FALSE) {
10990 originalW = _RGFW->root->w;
10991 originalH = _RGFW->root->h;
10992 }
10993
10994 fullscreen = !fullscreen;
10995 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_windowResized; e.common.win = _RGFW->root);
10996 _RGFW->root->w = E->screenWidth;
10997 _RGFW->root->h = E->screenHeight;
10998
10999 EM_ASM("Module.canvas.focus();");
11000
11001 if (fullscreen == RGFW_FALSE) {
11002 _RGFW->root->w = originalW;
11003 _RGFW->root->h = originalH;
11004 } else {
11005 #if __EMSCRIPTEN_major__ >= 1 && __EMSCRIPTEN_minor__ >= 29 && __EMSCRIPTEN_tiny__ >= 0
11006 EmscriptenFullscreenStrategy FSStrat = {0};
11007 FSStrat.scaleMode = EMSCRIPTEN_FULLSCREEN_SCALE_STRETCH;
11008 FSStrat.canvasResolutionScaleMode = EMSCRIPTEN_FULLSCREEN_CANVAS_SCALE_HIDEF;
11009 FSStrat.filteringMode = EMSCRIPTEN_FULLSCREEN_FILTERING_DEFAULT;
11010 emscripten_request_fullscreen_strategy("#canvas", 1, &FSStrat);
11011 #else
11012 emscripten_request_fullscreen("#canvas", 1);
11013 #endif
11014 }
11015
11016 emscripten_set_canvas_element_size("#canvas", _RGFW->root->w, _RGFW->root->h);
11017 RGFW_windowResizedCallback(_RGFW->root, _RGFW->root->w, _RGFW->root->h);
11018 return EM_TRUE;
11019}
11020
11021EM_BOOL Emscripten_on_focusin(int eventType, const EmscriptenFocusEvent* E, void* userData) {
11022 RGFW_UNUSED(eventType); RGFW_UNUSED(userData); RGFW_UNUSED(E);
11023
11024 if (!(_RGFW->root->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_focusInFlag)) return EM_TRUE;
11025
11026 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_focusIn; e.common.win = _RGFW->root);
11027 _RGFW->root->internal.inFocus = RGFW_TRUE;
11028 RGFW_focusCallback(_RGFW->root, 1);
11029
11030 if ((_RGFW->root->internal.holdMouse)) RGFW_window_holdMouse(_RGFW->root);
11031 return EM_TRUE;
11032}
11033
11034EM_BOOL Emscripten_on_focusout(int eventType, const EmscriptenFocusEvent* E, void* userData) {
11035 RGFW_UNUSED(eventType); RGFW_UNUSED(userData); RGFW_UNUSED(E);
11036
11037 if (!(_RGFW->root->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_focusOutFlag)) return EM_TRUE;
11038
11039 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_focusOut; e.common.win = _RGFW->root);
11040 RGFW_window_focusLost(_RGFW->root);
11041 RGFW_focusCallback(_RGFW->root, 0);
11042 return EM_TRUE;
11043}
11044
11045EM_BOOL Emscripten_on_mousemove(int eventType, const EmscriptenMouseEvent* E, void* userData) {
11046 RGFW_UNUSED(eventType); RGFW_UNUSED(userData);
11047
11048 if (!(_RGFW->root->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_mousePosChangedFlag)) return EM_TRUE;
11049
11050 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_mousePosChanged;
11051 e.mouse.x = E->targetX; e.mouse.y = E->targetY;
11052 e.mouse.vecX = E->movementX; e.mouse.vecY = E->movementY;
11053 e.common.win = _RGFW->root);
11054
11055 _RGFW->vectorX = E->movementX;
11056 _RGFW->vectorY = E->movementY;
11057 _RGFW->root->internal.lastMouseX = E->targetX;
11058 _RGFW->root->internal.lastMouseY = E->targetY;
11059 RGFW_mousePosCallback(_RGFW->root, E->targetX, E->targetY, E->movementX, E->movementY);
11060 return EM_TRUE;
11061}
11062
11063EM_BOOL Emscripten_on_mousedown(int eventType, const EmscriptenMouseEvent* E, void* userData) {
11064 RGFW_UNUSED(eventType); RGFW_UNUSED(userData);
11065
