11066 if (!(_RGFW->root->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_mouseButtonPressedFlag)) return EM_TRUE;
11067
11068 int button = E->button;
11069 if (button > 2)
11070 button += 2;
11071
11072 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_mouseButtonPressed;
11073 e.mouse.x = E->targetX; e.mouse.y = E->targetY;
11074 e.mouse.vecX = E->movementX; e.mouse.vecY = E->movementY;
11075 e.button.value = (u8)button;
11076 e.common.win = _RGFW->root);
11077 _RGFW->vectorX = E->movementX;
11078 _RGFW->vectorY = E->movementY;
11079 _RGFW->mouseButtons[button].prev = _RGFW->mouseButtons[button].current;
11080 _RGFW->mouseButtons[button].current = 1;
11081
11082 RGFW_mouseButtonCallback(_RGFW->root, button, 1);
11083 return EM_TRUE;
11084}
11085
11086EM_BOOL Emscripten_on_mouseup(int eventType, const EmscriptenMouseEvent* E, void* userData) {
11087 RGFW_UNUSED(eventType); RGFW_UNUSED(userData);
11088
11089 if (!(_RGFW->root->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_mouseButtonReleasedFlag)) return EM_TRUE;
11090
11091 int button = E->button;
11092 if (button > 2)
11093 button += 2;
11094
11095 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_mouseButtonReleased;
11096 e.mouse.x = E->targetX; e.mouse.y = E->targetY;
11097 e.mouse.vecX = E->movementX; e.mouse.vecY = E->movementY;
11098 e.button.value = (u8)button;
11099 e.common.win = _RGFW->root);
11100 _RGFW->vectorX = E->movementX;
11101 _RGFW->vectorY = E->movementY;
11102 _RGFW->mouseButtons[button].prev = _RGFW->mouseButtons[button].current;
11103 _RGFW->mouseButtons[button].current = 0;
11104
11105 RGFW_mouseButtonCallback(_RGFW->root, button, 0);
11106 return EM_TRUE;
11107}
11108
11109EM_BOOL Emscripten_on_wheel(int eventType, const EmscriptenWheelEvent* E, void* userData) {
11110 RGFW_UNUSED(eventType); RGFW_UNUSED(userData);
11111
11112 if (!(_RGFW->root->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_mouseScrollFlag)) return EM_TRUE;
11113
11114 _RGFW->scrollX = E->deltaX;
11115 _RGFW->scrollY = E->deltaY;
11116 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_mouseButtonPressed;
11117 e.scroll.x = E->deltaX;
11118 e.scroll.y = E->deltaY;
11119 );
11120 RGFW_mouseScrollCallback(_RGFW->root, E->deltaX, E->deltaY);
11121
11122 return EM_TRUE;
11123}
11124
11125EM_BOOL Emscripten_on_touchstart(int eventType, const EmscriptenTouchEvent* E, void* userData) {
11126 RGFW_UNUSED(eventType); RGFW_UNUSED(userData);
11127
11128 if (!(_RGFW->root->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_mouseButtonPressedFlag)) return EM_TRUE;
11129
11130 size_t i;
11131 for (i = 0; i < (size_t)E->numTouches; i++) {
11132 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_mouseButtonPressed;
11133 e.mouse.x = E->touches[i].targetX; e.mouse.y = E->touches[i].targetY;
11134 e.button.value = RGFW_mouseLeft;
11135 e.common.win = _RGFW->root);
11136
11137 _RGFW->mouseButtons[RGFW_mouseLeft].prev = _RGFW->mouseButtons[RGFW_mouseLeft].current;
11138 _RGFW->mouseButtons[RGFW_mouseLeft].current = 1;
11139
11140 _RGFW->root->internal.lastMouseX = E->touches[i].targetX;
11141 _RGFW->root->internal.lastMouseX = E->touches[i].targetY;
11142 RGFW_mousePosCallback(_RGFW->root, E->touches[i].targetX, E->touches[i].targetY, 0, 0);
11143 RGFW_mouseButtonCallback(_RGFW->root, RGFW_mouseLeft, 1);
11144 }
11145
11146 return EM_TRUE;
11147}
11148
11149EM_BOOL Emscripten_on_touchmove(int eventType, const EmscriptenTouchEvent* E, void* userData) {
11150 RGFW_UNUSED(eventType); RGFW_UNUSED(userData);
11151
11152 if (!(_RGFW->root->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_mousePosChangedFlag)) return EM_TRUE;
11153
11154 size_t i;
11155 for (i = 0; i < (size_t)E->numTouches; i++) {
11156 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_mousePosChanged;
11157 e.mouse.x = E->touches[i].targetX;
11158 e.mouse.y = E->touches[i].targetY;
11159 e.mouse.x = E->touches[i].targetX; e.mouse.y = E->touches[i].targetY;
11160 e.button.value = RGFW_mouseLeft;
11161 e.common.win = _RGFW->root);
11162
11163 _RGFW->root->internal.lastMouseX = E->touches[i].targetX;
11164 _RGFW->root->internal.lastMouseX = E->touches[i].targetY;
11165 RGFW_mousePosCallback(_RGFW->root, E->touches[i].targetX, E->touches[i].targetY, 0, 0);
11166 }
11167 return EM_TRUE;
11168}
11169
11170EM_BOOL Emscripten_on_touchend(int eventType, const EmscriptenTouchEvent* E, void* userData) {
11171 RGFW_UNUSED(eventType); RGFW_UNUSED(userData);
11172
11173 if (!(_RGFW->root->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_mouseButtonReleasedFlag)) return EM_TRUE;
11174
11175 size_t i;
11176 for (i = 0; i < (size_t)E->numTouches; i++) {
11177 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_mouseButtonReleased;
11178 e.mouse.x = E->touches[i].targetX; e.mouse.y = E->touches[i].targetY;
11179 e.button.value = RGFW_mouseLeft;
11180 e.common.win = _RGFW->root);
11181
11182 _RGFW->mouseButtons[RGFW_mouseLeft].prev = _RGFW->mouseButtons[RGFW_mouseLeft].current;
11183 _RGFW->mouseButtons[RGFW_mouseLeft].current = 0;
11184
11185 _RGFW->root->internal.lastMouseX = E->touches[i].targetX;
11186 _RGFW->root->internal.lastMouseY = E->touches[i].targetY;
11187 RGFW_mousePosCallback(_RGFW->root, E->touches[i].targetX, E->touches[i].targetY, 0, 0);
11188 RGFW_mouseButtonCallback(_RGFW->root, RGFW_mouseLeft, 0);
11189 }
11190 return EM_TRUE;
11191}
11192
11193EM_BOOL Emscripten_on_touchcancel(int eventType, const EmscriptenTouchEvent* E, void* userData) { RGFW_UNUSED(eventType); RGFW_UNUSED(userData); return EM_TRUE; }
11194
11195u32 RGFW_WASMPhysicalToRGFW(u32 hash);
11196
11197void EMSCRIPTEN_KEEPALIVE RGFW_handleKeyEvent(char* key, char* code, RGFW_bool press) {
11198 const char* iCode = code;
11199
11200 u32 hash = 0;
11201 while(*iCode) hash = ((hash ^ 0x7E057D79U) << 3) ^ (unsigned int)*iCode++;
11202
11203 u32 physicalKey = RGFW_WASMPhysicalToRGFW(hash);
11204
11205 u8 mappedKey = (u8)(*((u32*)key));
11206
11207 if (*((u16*)key) != mappedKey) {
11208 mappedKey = 0;
11209 if (*((u32*)key) == *((u32*)"Tab")) mappedKey = RGFW_tab;
11210 }
11211
11212 if (!(press ? (_RGFW->root->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_keyPressedFlag) : (_RGFW->root->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_keyReleasedFlag))) return;
11213
11214 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = (RGFW_eventType)(press ? RGFW_keyPressed : RGFW_keyReleased);
11215 e.key.value = (u8)physicalKey;
11216 e.key.sym = (u8)mappedKey;
11217 e.key.mod = _RGFW->root->internal.mod;
11218 e.key.repeat = RGFW_window_isKeyDown(_RGFW->root, (u8)physicalKey);
11219 e.common.win = _RGFW->root);
11220
11221 _RGFW->keyboard[physicalKey].prev = _RGFW->keyboard[physicalKey].current;
11222 _RGFW->keyboard[physicalKey].current = press;
11223
11224 RGFW_keyCallback(_RGFW->root, physicalKey, mappedKey, _RGFW->root->internal.mod, RGFW_window_isKeyDown(_RGFW->root, (u8)physicalKey), press);
11225}
11226
11227void EMSCRIPTEN_KEEPALIVE RGFW_handleKeyMods(RGFW_bool capital, RGFW_bool numlock, RGFW_bool control, RGFW_bool alt, RGFW_bool shift, RGFW_bool super, RGFW_bool scroll) {
11228 RGFW_updateKeyModsEx(_RGFW->root, capital, numlock, control, alt, shift, super, scroll);
11229}
11230
11231void EMSCRIPTEN_KEEPALIVE Emscripten_onDrop(size_t count) {
11232 if (!(_RGFW->root->internal.flags & RGFW_windowAllowDND))
11233 return;
11234
11235 if (!(_RGFW->root->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_dataDropFlag)) return;
11236
11237 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_dataDrop;
11238 e.drop.count = count;
11239 e.common.win = _RGFW->root);
11240
11241 _RGFW->windowState.win = _RGFW->root;
11242 _RGFW->windowState.dataDrop = RGFW_TRUE;
11243 _RGFW->windowState.filesCount = count;
11244 RGFW_dataDropCallback(_RGFW->root, _RGFW->files, count);
11245}
11246
11247void RGFW_stopCheckEvents(void) {
11248 _RGFW->stopCheckEvents_bool = RGFW_TRUE;
11249}
11250
11251RGFW_bool RGFW_createSurfacePtr(u8* data, i32 w, i32 h, RGFW_format format, RGFW_surface* surface) {
11252 surface->data = data;
11253 surface->w = w;
11254 surface->h = h;
11255 surface->format = format;
11256 return RGFW_TRUE;
11257}
11258
11259void RGFW_window_blitSurface(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_surface* surface) {
11260 /* TODO: Needs fixing. */
11261 RGFW_copyImageData(surface->data, surface->w, RGFW_MIN(win->h, surface->h), RGFW_formatRGBA8, surface->data, surface->format);
11262 EM_ASM_({
11263 var data = Module.HEAPU8.slice($0, $0 + $1 * $2 * 4);
11264 let context = document.getElementById("canvas").getContext("2d");
11265 let image = context.getImageData(0, 0, $1, $2);
11266 image.data.set(data);
11267 context.putImageData(image, 0, $4 - $2);
11268 }, surface->data, surface->w, surface->h, RGFW_MIN(win->h, surface->w), RGFW_MIN(win->h, surface->h));
11269}
11270
11271void RGFW_surface_freePtr(RGFW_surface* surface) { }
11272
11273void EMSCRIPTEN_KEEPALIVE RGFW_makeSetValue(size_t index, char* file) {
11274 /* This seems like a terrible idea, don't replicate this unless you hate yourself or the OS */
11275 /* TODO: find a better way to do this
11276 */
11277 RGFW_STRNCPY((char*)_RGFW->files[index], file, RGFW_MAX_PATH - 1);
11278 _RGFW->files[index][RGFW_MAX_PATH - 1] = '\0';
11279}
11280
11281#include <sys/stat.h>
11282#include <sys/types.h>
11283#include <errno.h>
11284#include <stdio.h>
11285
11286void EMSCRIPTEN_KEEPALIVE RGFW_mkdir(char* name) { mkdir(name, 0755); }
11287
11288void EMSCRIPTEN_KEEPALIVE RGFW_writeFile(const char *path, const char *data, size_t len) {
11289 FILE* file = fopen(path, "w+");
11290 if (file == NULL)
11291 return;
11292
11293 fwrite(data, sizeof(char), len, file);
11294 fclose(file);
11295}
11296
11297void RGFW_initKeycodesPlatform(void) {
11298 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_BACK_QUOTE] = RGFW_backtick;
11299 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_0] = RGFW_0;
11300 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_1] = RGFW_1;
11301 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_2] = RGFW_2;
11302 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_3] = RGFW_3;
11303 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_4] = RGFW_4;
11304 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_5] = RGFW_5;
11305 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_6] = RGFW_6;
11306 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_7] = RGFW_7;
11307 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_8] = RGFW_8;
11308 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_9] = RGFW_9;
11309 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_SPACE] = RGFW_space;
11310 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_A] = RGFW_a;
11311 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_B] = RGFW_b;
11312 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_C] = RGFW_c;
11313 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_D] = RGFW_d;
11314 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_E] = RGFW_e;
11315 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_F] = RGFW_f;
11316 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_G] = RGFW_g;
11317 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_H] = RGFW_h;
11318 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_I] = RGFW_i;
11319 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_J] = RGFW_j;
11320 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_K] = RGFW_k;
11321 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_L] = RGFW_l;
11322 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_M] = RGFW_m;
11323 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_N] = RGFW_n;
11324 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_O] = RGFW_o;
11325 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_P] = RGFW_p;
11326 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_Q] = RGFW_q;
11327 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_R] = RGFW_r;
11328 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_S] = RGFW_s;
11329 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_T] = RGFW_t;
11330 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_U] = RGFW_u;
11331 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_V] = RGFW_v;
11332 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_W] = RGFW_w;
11333 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_X] = RGFW_x;
11334 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_Y] = RGFW_y;
11335 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_Z] = RGFW_z;
11336 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_PERIOD] = RGFW_period;
11337 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_COMMA] = RGFW_comma;
11338 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_SLASH] = RGFW_slash;
11339 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_OPEN_BRACKET] = RGFW_bracket;
11340 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_CLOSE_BRACKET] = RGFW_closeBracket;
11341 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_SEMICOLON] = RGFW_semicolon;
11342 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_QUOTE] = RGFW_apostrophe;
11343 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_BACK_SLASH] = RGFW_backSlash;
11344 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_RETURN] = RGFW_return;
11345 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_DELETE] = RGFW_delete;
11346 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_NUM_LOCK] = RGFW_numLock;
11347 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_DIVIDE] = RGFW_kpSlash;
11348 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_MULTIPLY] = RGFW_kpMultiply;
11349 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_SUBTRACT] = RGFW_kpMinus;
11350 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_NUMPAD1] = RGFW_kp1;
11351 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_NUMPAD2] = RGFW_kp2;
11352 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_NUMPAD3] = RGFW_kp3;
11353 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_NUMPAD4] = RGFW_kp4;
11354 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_NUMPAD5] = RGFW_kp5;
11355 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_NUMPAD6] = RGFW_kp6;
11356 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_NUMPAD9] = RGFW_kp9;
11357 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_NUMPAD0] = RGFW_kp0;
11358 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_DECIMAL] = RGFW_kpPeriod;
11359 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_RETURN] = RGFW_kpReturn;
11360 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_HYPHEN_MINUS] = RGFW_minus;
11361 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_EQUALS] = RGFW_equals;
11362 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_BACK_SPACE] = RGFW_backSpace;
11363 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_TAB] = RGFW_tab;
11364 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_CAPS_LOCK] = RGFW_capsLock;
11365 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_SHIFT] = RGFW_shiftL;
11366 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_CONTROL] = RGFW_controlL;
11367 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_ALT] = RGFW_altL;
11368 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_META] = RGFW_superL;
11369 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_F1] = RGFW_F1;
11370 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_F2] = RGFW_F2;
11371 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_F3] = RGFW_F3;
11372 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_F4] = RGFW_F4;
11373 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_F5] = RGFW_F5;
11374 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_F6] = RGFW_F6;
11375 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_F7] = RGFW_F7;
11376 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_F8] = RGFW_F8;
11377 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_F9] = RGFW_F9;
11378 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_F10] = RGFW_F10;
11379 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_F11] = RGFW_F11;
11380 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_F12] = RGFW_F12;
11381 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_UP] = RGFW_up;
11382 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_DOWN] = RGFW_down;
11383 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_LEFT] = RGFW_left;
11384 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_RIGHT] = RGFW_right;
11385 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_INSERT] = RGFW_insert;
11386 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_END] = RGFW_end;
11387 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_PAGE_UP] = RGFW_pageUp;
11388 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_PAGE_DOWN] = RGFW_pageDown;
11389 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_ESCAPE] = RGFW_escape;
11390 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_HOME] = RGFW_home;
11391 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_SCROLL_LOCK] = RGFW_scrollLock;
11392 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_PRINTSCREEN] = RGFW_printScreen;
11393 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_PAUSE] = RGFW_pause;
11394 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_F13] = RGFW_F13;
11395 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_F14] = RGFW_F14;
11396 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_F15] = RGFW_F15;
11397 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_F16] = RGFW_F16;
11398 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_F17] = RGFW_F17;
11399 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_F18] = RGFW_F18;
11400 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_F19] = RGFW_F19;
11401 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_F20] = RGFW_F20;
11402 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_F21] = RGFW_F21;
11403 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_F22] = RGFW_F22;
11404 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_F23] = RGFW_F23;
11405 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_F24] = RGFW_F24;
11406}
11407
11408i32 RGFW_initPlatform(void) { return 0; }
11409
11410RGFW_window* RGFW_createWindowPlatform(const char* name, RGFW_windowFlags flags, RGFW_window* win) {
11411 emscripten_set_canvas_element_size("#canvas", win->w, win->h);
11412 emscripten_set_window_title(name);
11413
11414 /* load callbacks */
11415 emscripten_set_resize_callback(EMSCRIPTEN_EVENT_TARGET_WINDOW, NULL, EM_FALSE, Emscripten_on_resize);
11416 emscripten_set_fullscreenchange_callback(EMSCRIPTEN_EVENT_TARGET_DOCUMENT, NULL, EM_FALSE, Emscripten_on_fullscreenchange);
11417 emscripten_set_mousemove_callback("#canvas", NULL, EM_FALSE, Emscripten_on_mousemove);
11418 emscripten_set_touchstart_callback("#canvas", NULL, EM_FALSE, Emscripten_on_touchstart);
11419 emscripten_set_touchend_callback("#canvas", NULL, EM_FALSE, Emscripten_on_touchend);
11420 emscripten_set_touchmove_callback("#canvas", NULL, EM_FALSE, Emscripten_on_touchmove);
11421 emscripten_set_touchcancel_callback("#canvas", NULL, EM_FALSE, Emscripten_on_touchcancel);
11422 emscripten_set_mousedown_callback("#canvas", NULL, EM_FALSE, Emscripten_on_mousedown);
11423 emscripten_set_mouseup_callback("#canvas", NULL, EM_FALSE, Emscripten_on_mouseup);
11424 emscripten_set_wheel_callback("#canvas", NULL, EM_FALSE, Emscripten_on_wheel);
11425 emscripten_set_focusin_callback(EMSCRIPTEN_EVENT_TARGET_WINDOW, NULL, EM_FALSE, Emscripten_on_focusin);
11426 emscripten_set_focusout_callback(EMSCRIPTEN_EVENT_TARGET_WINDOW, NULL, EM_FALSE, Emscripten_on_focusout);
11427
11428 if (flags & RGFW_windowAllowDND) {
11429 win->internal.flags |= RGFW_windowAllowDND;
11430 }
11431
11432 EM_ASM({
11433 window.addEventListener("keydown",
11434 (event) => {
11435 var key = stringToNewUTF8(event.key.value); var code = stringToNewUTF8(event.code);
11436 Module._RGFW_handleKeyMods(event.getModifierState("CapsLock"), event.getModifierState("NumLock"), event.getModifierState("Control"), event.getModifierState("Alt"), event.getModifierState("Shift"), event.getModifierState("Meta"), event.getModifierState("ScrollLock"));
11437 Module._RGFW_handleKeyEvent(key, code, 1);
11438 _free(key); _free(code);
11439 },
11440 true);
11441 window.addEventListener("keyup",
11442 (event) => {
11443 var key = stringToNewUTF8(event.key.value); var code = stringToNewUTF8(event.code);
11444 Module._RGFW_handleKeyMods(event.getModifierState("CapsLock"), event.getModifierState("NumLock"), event.getModifierState("Control"), event.getModifierState("Alt"), event.getModifierState("Shift"), event.getModifierState("Meta"), event.getModifierState("ScrollLock"));
11445 Module._RGFW_handleKeyEvent(key, code, 0);
11446 _free(key); _free(code);
11447 },
11448 true);
11449 });
11450
11451 EM_ASM({
11452 var canvas = document.getElementById('canvas');
11453 canvas.addEventListener('drop', function(e) {
11454 e.preventDefault();
11455 if (e.dataTransfer.file < 0)
11456 return;
11457
11458 var filenamesArray = [];
11459 var count = e.dataTransfer.files.length;
11460
11461 /* Read and save the files to emscripten's files */
11462 var drop_dir = '.rgfw_dropped_files';
11463 Module._RGFW_mkdir(drop_dir);
11464
11465 for (var i = 0; i < count; i++) {
11466 var file = e.dataTransfer.files[i];
11467
11468 var path = '/' + drop_dir + '/' + file.name.replace("//", '_');
11469 var reader = new FileReader();
11470
11471 reader.onloadend = (e) => {
11472 if (reader.readyState != 2) {
11473 out('failed to read dropped file: '+file.name+': '+reader.error);
11474 }
11475 else {
11476 var data = e.target.result;
11477
11478 Module._RGFW_writeFile(path, new Uint8Array(data), file.size);
11479 }
11480 };
11481
11482 reader.readAsArrayBuffer(file);
11483 /* This works weird on modern OpenGL */
11484 var filename = stringToNewUTF8(path);
11485
11486 filenamesArray.push(filename);
11487
11488 Module._RGFW_makeSetValue(i, filename);
11489 }
11490
11491 Module._Emscripten_onDrop(count);
11492
11493 for (var i = 0; i < count; ++i) {
11494 _free(filenamesArray[i]);
11495 }
11496 }, true);
11497
11498 canvas.addEventListener('dragover', function(e) { e.preventDefault(); return false; }, true);
11499 });
11500
11501 return win;
11502}
11503
11504u8 RGFW_rgfwToKeyChar(u32 rgfw_keycode) {
11505 return (u8)rgfw_keycode; /* TODO */
11506}
11507
11508void RGFW_pollEvents(void) { RGFW_resetPrevState(); }
11509
11510void RGFW_window_resize(RGFW_window* win, i32 w, i32 h) {
11511 RGFW_UNUSED(win);
11512 emscripten_set_canvas_element_size("#canvas", w, h);
11513}
11514
11515/* NOTE: I don't know if this is possible */
11516void RGFW_window_moveMouse(RGFW_window* win, i32 x, i32 y) { RGFW_UNUSED(win); RGFW_UNUSED(x); RGFW_UNUSED(y); }
11517/* this one might be possible but it looks iffy */
11518RGFW_mouse* RGFW_loadMouse(u8* data, i32 w, i32 h, RGFW_format format) { RGFW_UNUSED(data); RGFW_UNUSED(w); RGFW_UNUSED(h); RGFW_UNUSED(format); return NULL; }
11519
11520void RGFW_window_setMouse(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_mouse* mouse) { RGFW_UNUSED(win); RGFW_UNUSED(mouse); }
11521void RGFW_freeMouse(RGFW_mouse* mouse) { RGFW_UNUSED(mouse); }
11522
11523RGFW_bool RGFW_window_setMouseStandard(RGFW_window* win, u8 mouse) {
11524 static const char cursors[16][16] = {
11525 "default", "default", "text", "crosshair",
11526 "pointer", "ew-resize", "ns-resize", "nwse-resize", "nesw-resize",
11527 "move", "not-allowed"
11528 };
11529
11530 RGFW_UNUSED(win);
11531 EM_ASM( { document.getElementById("canvas").style.cursor = UTF8ToString($0); }, cursors[mouse]);
11532 return RGFW_TRUE;
11533}
11534
11535RGFW_bool RGFW_window_setMouseDefault(RGFW_window* win) {
11536 return RGFW_window_setMouseStandard(win, RGFW_mouseNormal);
11537}
11538
11539void RGFW_window_showMouse(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_bool show) {
11540 RGFW_window_showMouseFlags(win, show);
11541 if (show)
11542 RGFW_window_setMouseDefault(win);
11543 else
11544 EM_ASM(document.getElementById('canvas').style.cursor = 'none';);
11545}
11546
11547RGFW_bool RGFW_getGlobalMouse(i32* x, i32* y) {
11548 if(x) *x = EM_ASM_INT({
11549 return window.mouseX || 0;
11550 });
11551 if (y) *y = EM_ASM_INT({
11552 return window.mouseY || 0;
11553 });
11554 return RGFW_TRUE;
11555}
11556
11557void RGFW_window_setMousePassthrough(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_bool passthrough) {
11558 RGFW_UNUSED(win);
11559
11560 EM_ASM_({
11561 var canvas = document.getElementById('canvas');
11562 if ($0) {
11563 canvas.style.pointerEvents = 'none';
11564 } else {
11565 canvas.style.pointerEvents = 'auto';
11566 }
11567 }, passthrough);
11568}
11569
11570void RGFW_writeClipboard(const char* text, u32 textLen) {
11571 RGFW_UNUSED(textLen);
11572 EM_ASM({ navigator.clipboard.writeText(UTF8ToString($0)); }, text);
11573}
11574
11575
11576RGFW_ssize_t RGFW_readClipboardPtr(char* str, size_t strCapacity) {
11577 RGFW_UNUSED(str); RGFW_UNUSED(strCapacity);
11578 /*
11579 placeholder code for later
11580 I'm not sure if this is possible do the the async stuff
11581 */
11582 return 0;
11583}
11584
11585#ifdef RGFW_OPENGL
11586RGFW_bool RGFW_window_createContextPtr_OpenGL(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_glContext* ctx, RGFW_glHints* hints) {
11587 win->src.ctx.native = ctx;
11588 win->src.gfxType = RGFW_gfxNativeOpenGL;
11589
11590 EmscriptenWebGLContextAttributes attrs;
11591 attrs.alpha = hints->depth;
11592 attrs.depth = hints->alpha;
11593 attrs.stencil = hints->stencil;
11594 attrs.antialias = hints->samples;
11595 attrs.premultipliedAlpha = EM_TRUE;
11596 attrs.preserveDrawingBuffer = EM_FALSE;
11597
11598 if (hints->doubleBuffer == 0)
11599 attrs.renderViaOffscreenBackBuffer = 0;
11600 else
11601 attrs.renderViaOffscreenBackBuffer = hints->auxBuffers;
11602
11603 attrs.failIfMajorPerformanceCaveat = EM_FALSE;
11604 attrs.majorVersion = (hints->major == 0) ? 1 : hints->major;
11605 attrs.minorVersion = hints->minor;
11606
11607 attrs.enableExtensionsByDefault = EM_TRUE;
11608 attrs.explicitSwapControl = EM_TRUE;
11609
11610 emscripten_webgl_init_context_attributes(&attrs);
11611 win->src.ctx.native->ctx = emscripten_webgl_create_context("#canvas", &attrs);
11612 emscripten_webgl_make_context_current(win->src.ctx.native->ctx);
11613
11614 #ifdef LEGACY_GL_EMULATION
11615 EM_ASM("Module.useWebGL = true; GLImmediate.init();");
11616 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeInfo, RGFW_infoOpenGL, "OpenGL context initalized.");
11617 #endif
11618 return RGFW_TRUE;
11619}
11620
11621void RGFW_window_deleteContextPtr_OpenGL(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_glContext* ctx) {
11622 emscripten_webgl_destroy_context(ctx->ctx);
11623 win->src.ctx.native->ctx = 0;
11624 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeInfo, RGFW_infoOpenGL, "OpenGL context freed.");
11625}
11626
11627void RGFW_window_makeCurrentContext_OpenGL(RGFW_window* win) {
11628 if (win) RGFW_ASSERT(win->src.ctx.native);
11629 if (win == NULL)
11630 emscripten_webgl_make_context_current(0);
11631 else
11632 emscripten_webgl_make_context_current(win->src.ctx.native->ctx);
11633}
11634
11635void RGFW_window_swapBuffers_OpenGL(RGFW_window* win) {
11636 RGFW_ASSERT(win && win->src.ctx.native);
11637 emscripten_webgl_commit_frame();
11638 emscripten_sleep(0);
11639}
11640void* RGFW_getCurrentContext_OpenGL(void) { return (void*)emscripten_webgl_get_current_context(); }
11641
11642RGFW_bool RGFW_extensionSupportedPlatform_OpenGL(const char* extension, size_t len) {
11643 return EM_ASM_INT({
11644 var ext = UTF8ToString($0, $1);
11645 var canvas = document.querySelector('canvas');
11646 var gl = canvas.getContext('webgl') || canvas.getContext('experimental-webgl');
11647 if (!gl) return 0;
11648
11649 var supported = gl.getSupportedExtensions();
11650 return supported && supported.includes(ext) ? 1 : 0;
11651 }, extension, len);
11652 return RGFW_FALSE;
11653}
11654
11655RGFW_proc RGFW_getProcAddress_OpenGL(const char* procname) {
11656 return (RGFW_proc)emscripten_webgl_get_proc_address(procname);
11657 return NULL;
11658}
11659
11660#endif
11661
11662void RGFW_window_swapInterval_OpenGL(RGFW_window* win, i32 swapInterval) { RGFW_UNUSED(win); RGFW_UNUSED(swapInterval); }
11663
11664void RGFW_deinitPlatform(void) { }
11665
11666void RGFW_window_closePlatform(RGFW_window* win) { }
11667
11668int RGFW_innerWidth(void) { return EM_ASM_INT({ return window.innerWidth; }); }
11669int RGFW_innerHeight(void) { return EM_ASM_INT({ return window.innerHeight; }); }
11670
11671void RGFW_releaseCursor(RGFW_window* win) {
11672 RGFW_UNUSED(win);
11673 emscripten_exit_pointerlock();
11674}
11675
11676void RGFW_captureCursor(RGFW_window* win) {
11677 RGFW_UNUSED(win);
11678 emscripten_request_pointerlock("#canvas", 1);
11679}
11680
11681
11682void RGFW_window_setName(RGFW_window* win, const char* name) {
11683 RGFW_UNUSED(win);
11684 emscripten_set_window_title(name);
11685}
11686
11687void RGFW_window_maximize(RGFW_window* win) {
11688 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
11689
11690 RGFW_monitor mon = RGFW_window_getMonitor(win);
11691 RGFW_window_move(win, 0, 0);
11692 RGFW_window_resize(win, mon.mode.w, mon.mode.h);
11693}
11694
11695void RGFW_window_setFullscreen(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_bool fullscreen) {
11696 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
11697 if (fullscreen) {
11698 win->internal.flags |= RGFW_windowFullscreen;
11699 EM_ASM( Module.requestFullscreen(false, true); );
11700 return;
11701 }
11702 win->internal.flags &= ~(u32)RGFW_windowFullscreen;
11703 EM_ASM( Module.exitFullscreen(false, true); );
11704}
11705
11706void RGFW_window_setOpacity(RGFW_window* win, u8 opacity) {
11707 RGFW_UNUSED(win);
11708 EM_ASM({
11709 var element = document.getElementById("canvas");
11710 if (element)
11711 element.style.opacity = $1;
11712 }, "elementId", opacity);
11713}
11714
11715#ifdef RGFW_WEBGPU
11716WGPUSurface RGFW_window_createSurface_WebGPU(RGFW_window* window, WGPUInstance instance) {
11717 WGPUSurfaceDescriptor surfaceDesc = {0};
11718 WGPUEmscriptenSurfaceSourceCanvasHTMLSelector canvasDesc = {0};
11719 canvasDesc.chain.sType = WGPUSType_EmscriptenSurfaceSourceCanvasHTMLSelector;
11720 canvasDesc.selector = (WGPUStringView){.data = "#canvas", .length = 7};
11721
11722 surfaceDesc.nextInChain = &canvasDesc.chain;
11723 return wgpuInstanceCreateSurface(instance, &surfaceDesc);
11724}
11725#endif
11726
11727u32 RGFW_WASMPhysicalToRGFW(u32 hash) {
11728 switch(hash) { /* 0x0000 */
11729 case 0x67243A2DU /* Escape */: return RGFW_escape; /* 0x0001 */
11730 case 0x67251058U /* Digit0 */: return RGFW_0; /* 0x0002 */
11731 case 0x67251059U /* Digit1 */: return RGFW_1; /* 0x0003 */
11732 case 0x6725105AU /* Digit2 */: return RGFW_2; /* 0x0004 */
11733 case 0x6725105BU /* Digit3 */: return RGFW_3; /* 0x0005 */
11734 case 0x6725105CU /* Digit4 */: return RGFW_4; /* 0x0006 */
11735 case 0x6725105DU /* Digit5 */: return RGFW_5; /* 0x0007 */
11736 case 0x6725105EU /* Digit6 */: return RGFW_6; /* 0x0008 */
11737 case 0x6725105FU /* Digit7 */: return RGFW_7; /* 0x0009 */
11738 case 0x67251050U /* Digit8 */: return RGFW_8; /* 0x000A */
11739 case 0x67251051U /* Digit9 */: return RGFW_9; /* 0x000B */
11740 case 0x92E14DD3U /* Minus */: return RGFW_minus; /* 0x000C */
11741 case 0x92E1FBACU /* Equal */: return RGFW_equals; /* 0x000D */
11742 case 0x36BF1CB5U /* Backspace */: return RGFW_backSpace; /* 0x000E */
11743 case 0x7B8E51E2U /* Tab */: return RGFW_tab; /* 0x000F */
11744 case 0x2C595B51U /* KeyQ */: return RGFW_q; /* 0x0010 */
11745 case 0x2C595B57U /* KeyW */: return RGFW_w; /* 0x0011 */
11746 case 0x2C595B45U /* KeyE */: return RGFW_e; /* 0x0012 */
11747 case 0x2C595B52U /* KeyR */: return RGFW_r; /* 0x0013 */
11748 case 0x2C595B54U /* KeyT */: return RGFW_t; /* 0x0014 */
11749 case 0x2C595B59U /* KeyY */: return RGFW_y; /* 0x0015 */
11750 case 0x2C595B55U /* KeyU */: return RGFW_u; /* 0x0016 */
11751 case 0x2C595B4FU /* KeyO */: return RGFW_o; /* 0x0018 */
11752 case 0x2C595B50U /* KeyP */: return RGFW_p; /* 0x0019 */
11753 case 0x45D8158CU /* BracketLeft */: return RGFW_closeBracket; /* 0x001A */
11754 case 0xDEEABF7CU /* BracketRight */: return RGFW_bracket; /* 0x001B */
11755 case 0x92E1C5D2U /* Enter */: return RGFW_return; /* 0x001C */
11756 case 0xE058958CU /* ControlLeft */: return RGFW_controlL; /* 0x001D */
11757 case 0x2C595B41U /* KeyA */: return RGFW_a; /* 0x001E */
11758 case 0x2C595B53U /* KeyS */: return RGFW_s; /* 0x001F */
11759 case 0x2C595B44U /* KeyD */: return RGFW_d; /* 0x0020 */
11760 case 0x2C595B46U /* KeyF */: return RGFW_f; /* 0x0021 */
11761 case 0x2C595B47U /* KeyG */: return RGFW_g; /* 0x0022 */
11762 case 0x2C595B48U /* KeyH */: return RGFW_h; /* 0x0023 */
11763 case 0x2C595B4AU /* KeyJ */: return RGFW_j; /* 0x0024 */
11764 case 0x2C595B4BU /* KeyK */: return RGFW_k; /* 0x0025 */
11765 case 0x2C595B4CU /* KeyL */: return RGFW_l; /* 0x0026 */
11766 case 0x2707219EU /* Semicolon */: return RGFW_semicolon; /* 0x0027 */
11767 case 0x92E0B58DU /* Quote */: return RGFW_apostrophe; /* 0x0028 */
11768 case 0x36BF358DU /* Backquote */: return RGFW_backtick; /* 0x0029 */
11769 case 0x26B1958CU /* ShiftLeft */: return RGFW_shiftL; /* 0x002A */
11770 case 0x36BF2438U /* Backslash */: return RGFW_backSlash; /* 0x002B */
11771 case 0x2C595B5AU /* KeyZ */: return RGFW_z; /* 0x002C */
11772 case 0x2C595B58U /* KeyX */: return RGFW_x; /* 0x002D */
11773 case 0x2C595B43U /* KeyC */: return RGFW_c; /* 0x002E */
11774 case 0x2C595B56U /* KeyV */: return RGFW_v; /* 0x002F */
11775 case 0x2C595B42U /* KeyB */: return RGFW_b; /* 0x0030 */
11776 case 0x2C595B4EU /* KeyN */: return RGFW_n; /* 0x0031 */
11777 case 0x2C595B4DU /* KeyM */: return RGFW_m; /* 0x0032 */
11778 case 0x92E1A1C1U /* Comma */: return RGFW_comma; /* 0x0033 */
11779 case 0x672FFAD4U /* Period */: return RGFW_period; /* 0x0034 */
11780 case 0x92E0A438U /* Slash */: return RGFW_slash; /* 0x0035 */
11781 case 0xC5A6BF7CU /* ShiftRight */: return RGFW_shiftR;
11782 case 0x5D64DA91U /* NumpadMultiply */: return RGFW_kpMultiply;
11783 case 0xC914958CU /* AltLeft */: return RGFW_altL; /* 0x0038 */
11784 case 0x92E09CB5U /* Space */: return RGFW_space; /* 0x0039 */
11785 case 0xB8FAE73BU /* CapsLock */: return RGFW_capsLock; /* 0x003A */
11786 case 0x7174B789U /* F1 */: return RGFW_F1; /* 0x003B */
11787 case 0x7174B78AU /* F2 */: return RGFW_F2; /* 0x003C */
11788 case 0x7174B78BU /* F3 */: return RGFW_F3; /* 0x003D */
11789 case 0x7174B78CU /* F4 */: return RGFW_F4; /* 0x003E */
11790 case 0x7174B78DU /* F5 */: return RGFW_F5; /* 0x003F */
11791 case 0x7174B78EU /* F6 */: return RGFW_F6; /* 0x0040 */
11792 case 0x7174B78FU /* F7 */: return RGFW_F7; /* 0x0041 */
11793 case 0x7174B780U /* F8 */: return RGFW_F8; /* 0x0042 */
11794 case 0x7174B781U /* F9 */: return RGFW_F9; /* 0x0043 */
11795 case 0x7B8E57B0U /* F10 */: return RGFW_F10; /* 0x0044 */
11796 case 0xC925FCDFU /* Numpad7 */: return RGFW_kpMultiply; /* 0x0047 */
11797 case 0xC925FCD0U /* Numpad8 */: return RGFW_kp8; /* 0x0048 */
11798 case 0xC925FCD1U /* Numpad9 */: return RGFW_kp9; /* 0x0049 */
11799 case 0x5EA3E8A4U /* NumpadSubtract */: return RGFW_minus; /* 0x004A */
11800 case 0xC925FCDCU /* Numpad4 */: return RGFW_kp4; /* 0x004B */
11801 case 0xC925FCDDU /* Numpad5 */: return RGFW_kp5; /* 0x004C */
11802 case 0xC925FCDEU /* Numpad6 */: return RGFW_kp6; /* 0x004D */
11803 case 0xC925FCD9U /* Numpad1 */: return RGFW_kp1; /* 0x004F */
11804 case 0xC925FCDAU /* Numpad2 */: return RGFW_kp2; /* 0x0050 */
11805 case 0xC925FCDBU /* Numpad3 */: return RGFW_kp3; /* 0x0051 */
11806 case 0xC925FCD8U /* Numpad0 */: return RGFW_kp0; /* 0x0052 */
11807 case 0x95852DACU /* NumpadDecimal */: return RGFW_period; /* 0x0053 */
11808 case 0x7B8E57B1U /* F11 */: return RGFW_F11; /* 0x0057 */
11809 case 0x7B8E57B2U /* F12 */: return RGFW_F12; /* 0x0058 */
11810 case 0x7B8E57B3U /* F13 */: return DOM_PK_F13; /* 0x0064 */
11811 case 0x7B8E57B4U /* F14 */: return DOM_PK_F14; /* 0x0065 */
11812 case 0x7B8E57B5U /* F15 */: return DOM_PK_F15; /* 0x0066 */
11813 case 0x7B8E57B6U /* F16 */: return DOM_PK_F16; /* 0x0067 */
11814 case 0x7B8E57B7U /* F17 */: return DOM_PK_F17; /* 0x0068 */
11815 case 0x7B8E57B8U /* F18 */: return DOM_PK_F18; /* 0x0069 */
11816 case 0x7B8E57B9U /* F19 */: return DOM_PK_F19; /* 0x006A */
11817 case 0x7B8E57A8U /* F20 */: return DOM_PK_F20; /* 0x006B */
11818 case 0x7B8E57A9U /* F21 */: return DOM_PK_F21; /* 0x006C */
11819 case 0x7B8E57AAU /* F22 */: return DOM_PK_F22; /* 0x006D */
11820 case 0x7B8E57ABU /* F23 */: return DOM_PK_F23; /* 0x006E */
11821 case 0x7393FBACU /* NumpadEqual */: return RGFW_kpReturn;
11822 case 0xB88EBF7CU /* AltRight */: return RGFW_altR; /* 0xE038 */
11823 case 0xC925873BU /* NumLock */: return RGFW_numLock; /* 0xE045 */
11824 case 0x2C595F45U /* Home */: return RGFW_home; /* 0xE047 */
11825 case 0xC91BB690U /* ArrowUp */: return RGFW_up; /* 0xE048 */
11826 case 0x672F9210U /* PageUp */: return RGFW_pageUp; /* 0xE049 */
11827 case 0x3799258CU /* ArrowLeft */: return RGFW_left; /* 0xE04B */
11828 case 0x4CE33F7CU /* ArrowRight */: return RGFW_right; /* 0xE04D */
11829 case 0x7B8E55DCU /* End */: return RGFW_end; /* 0xE04F */
11830 case 0x3799379EU /* ArrowDown */: return RGFW_down; /* 0xE050 */
11831 case 0xBA90179EU /* PageDown */: return RGFW_pageDown; /* 0xE051 */
11832 case 0x6723CB2CU /* Insert */: return RGFW_insert; /* 0xE052 */
11833 case 0x6725C50DU /* Delete */: return RGFW_delete; /* 0xE053 */
11834 case 0x6723658CU /* OSLeft */: return RGFW_superL; /* 0xE05B */
11835 case 0x39643F7CU /* MetaRight */: return RGFW_superR; /* 0xE05C */
11836 case 0x380B9C8CU /* NumpadAdd */: return DOM_PK_NUMPAD_ADD; /* 0x004E */
11837 default: return DOM_PK_UNKNOWN;
11838 }
11839
11840 return 0;
11841}

11845void RGFW_window_raise(RGFW_window* win) { RGFW_UNUSED(win); }
11846RGFW_bool RGFW_monitor_requestMode(RGFW_monitor mon, RGFW_monitorMode mode, RGFW_modeRequest request) { RGFW_UNUSED(mon); RGFW_UNUSED(mode); RGFW_UNUSED(request); return RGFW_FALSE; }
11847RGFW_monitor* RGFW_getMonitors(size_t* len) { RGFW_UNUSED(len); return NULL; }
11848RGFW_monitor RGFW_getPrimaryMonitor(void) { return (RGFW_monitor){}; }
11849void RGFW_window_move(RGFW_window* win, i32 x, i32 y) { RGFW_UNUSED(win); RGFW_UNUSED(x); RGFW_UNUSED(y); }
11850void RGFW_window_setAspectRatio(RGFW_window* win, i32 w, i32 h) { RGFW_UNUSED(win); RGFW_UNUSED(w); RGFW_UNUSED(h); }
11851void RGFW_window_setMinSize(RGFW_window* win, i32 w, i32 h) { RGFW_UNUSED(win); RGFW_UNUSED(w); RGFW_UNUSED(h); }
11852void RGFW_window_setMaxSize(RGFW_window* win, i32 w, i32 h) { RGFW_UNUSED(win); RGFW_UNUSED(w); RGFW_UNUSED(h); }
11853void RGFW_window_minimize(RGFW_window* win) { RGFW_UNUSED(win); }
11854void RGFW_window_restore(RGFW_window* win) { RGFW_UNUSED(win); }
11855void RGFW_window_setFloating(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_bool floating) { RGFW_UNUSED(win); RGFW_UNUSED(floating); }
11856void RGFW_window_setBorder(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_bool border) { RGFW_UNUSED(win); RGFW_UNUSED(border); }
11857RGFW_bool RGFW_window_setIconEx(RGFW_window* win, u8* data, i32 w, i32 h, RGFW_format format, RGFW_icon type) { RGFW_UNUSED(win); RGFW_UNUSED(data); RGFW_UNUSED(w); RGFW_UNUSED(h); RGFW_UNUSED(format); RGFW_UNUSED(type); return RGFW_FALSE; }
11858void RGFW_window_hide(RGFW_window* win) { RGFW_UNUSED(win); }
11859void RGFW_window_show(RGFW_window* win) {RGFW_UNUSED(win); }
11860RGFW_bool RGFW_window_isHidden(RGFW_window* win) { RGFW_UNUSED(win); return RGFW_FALSE; }
11861RGFW_bool RGFW_window_isMinimized(RGFW_window* win) { RGFW_UNUSED(win); return RGFW_FALSE; }
11862RGFW_bool RGFW_window_isMaximized(RGFW_window* win) { RGFW_UNUSED(win); return RGFW_FALSE; }
11863RGFW_bool RGFW_window_isFloating(RGFW_window* win) { RGFW_UNUSED(win); return RGFW_FALSE; }
11864RGFW_monitor RGFW_window_getMonitor(RGFW_window* win) { RGFW_UNUSED(win); return (RGFW_monitor){}; }
11865void RGFW_waitForEvent(i32 waitMS) { RGFW_UNUSED(waitMS); }
11866#endif

11868/* end of web asm defines */
11869
11870/*
11871 * RGFW function pointer backend, made to allow you to compile for Wayland but fallback to X11
11872*/
11873#ifdef RGFW_DYNAMIC
11874typedef RGFW_window* (*RGFW_createWindowPlatform_ptr)(const char* name, RGFW_windowFlags flags, RGFW_window* win);
11875typedef RGFW_bool (*RGFW_getMouse_ptr)(i32* x, i32* y);
11876typedef u8 (*RGFW_rgfwToKeyChar_ptr)(u32 key);
11877typedef void (*RGFW_pollEvents_ptr)(void);
11878typedef void (*RGFW_window_move_ptr)(RGFW_window* win, i32 x, i32 y);
11879typedef void (*RGFW_window_resize_ptr)(RGFW_window* win, i32 w, i32 h);
11880typedef void (*RGFW_window_setAspectRatio_ptr)(RGFW_window* win, i32 w, i32 h);
11881typedef void (*RGFW_window_setMinSize_ptr)(RGFW_window* win, i32 w, i32 h);
11882typedef void (*RGFW_window_setMaxSize_ptr)(RGFW_window* win, i32 w, i32 h);
11883typedef void (*RGFW_window_maximize_ptr)(RGFW_window* win);
11884typedef void (*RGFW_window_focus_ptr)(RGFW_window* win);
11885typedef void (*RGFW_window_raise_ptr)(RGFW_window* win);
11886typedef void (*RGFW_window_setFullscreen_ptr)(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_bool fullscreen);
11887typedef void (*RGFW_window_setFloating_ptr)(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_bool floating);
11888typedef void (*RGFW_window_setOpacity_ptr)(RGFW_window* win, u8 opacity);
11889typedef void (*RGFW_window_minimize_ptr)(RGFW_window* win);
11890typedef void (*RGFW_window_restore_ptr)(RGFW_window* win);
11891typedef RGFW_bool (*RGFW_window_isFloating_ptr)(RGFW_window* win);
11892typedef void (*RGFW_window_setName_ptr)(RGFW_window* win, const char* name);
11893typedef void (*RGFW_window_setMousePassthrough_ptr)(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_bool passthrough);
11894typedef RGFW_bool (*RGFW_window_setIconEx_ptr)(RGFW_window* win, u8* data, i32 w, i32 h, RGFW_format format, u8 type);
11895typedef RGFW_mouse* (*RGFW_loadMouse_ptr)(u8* data, i32 w, i32 h, RGFW_format format);
11896typedef void (*RGFW_window_setMouse_ptr)(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_mouse* mouse);
11897typedef void (*RGFW_window_moveMouse_ptr)(RGFW_window* win, i32 x, i32 y);
11898typedef RGFW_bool (*RGFW_window_setMouseDefault_ptr)(RGFW_window* win);
11899typedef RGFW_bool (*RGFW_window_setMouseStandard_ptr)(RGFW_window* win, u8 mouse);
11900typedef void (*RGFW_window_hide_ptr)(RGFW_window* win);
11901typedef void (*RGFW_window_show_ptr)(RGFW_window* win);
11902typedef RGFW_ssize_t (*RGFW_readClipboardPtr_ptr)(char* str, size_t strCapacity);
11903typedef void (*RGFW_writeClipboard_ptr)(const char* text, u32 textLen);
11904typedef RGFW_bool (*RGFW_window_isHidden_ptr)(RGFW_window* win);
11905typedef RGFW_bool (*RGFW_window_isMinimized_ptr)(RGFW_window* win);
11906typedef RGFW_bool (*RGFW_window_isMaximized_ptr)(RGFW_window* win);
11907typedef RGFW_monitor* (*RGFW_getMonitors_ptr)(size_t* len);
11908typedef RGFW_monitor (*RGFW_getPrimaryMonitor_ptr)(void);
11909typedef RGFW_bool (*RGFW_monitor_requestMode_ptr)(RGFW_monitor mon, RGFW_monitorMode mode, RGFW_modeRequest request);
11910typedef RGFW_monitor (*RGFW_window_getMonitor_ptr)(RGFW_window* win);
11911typedef void (*RGFW_window_closePlatform_ptr)(RGFW_window* win);
11912typedef RGFW_bool (*RGFW_createSurfacePtr_ptr)(u8* data, i32 w, i32 h, RGFW_format format, RGFW_surface* surface);
11913typedef void (*RGFW_window_blitSurface_ptr)(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_surface* surface);
11914typedef void (*RGFW_surface_freePtr_ptr)(RGFW_surface* surface);
11915typedef void (*RGFW_freeMouse_ptr)(RGFW_mouse* mouse);
11916typedef void (*RGFW_window_setBorder_ptr)(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_bool border);
11917typedef void (*RGFW_releaseCursor_ptr)(RGFW_window* win);
11918typedef void (*RGFW_captureCursor_ptr)(RGFW_window* win);
11919#ifdef RGFW_OPENGL
11920typedef void (*RGFW_window_makeCurrentContext_OpenGL_ptr)(RGFW_window* win);
11921typedef void* (*RGFW_getCurrentContext_OpenGL_ptr)(void);
11922typedef void (*RGFW_window_swapBuffers_OpenGL_ptr)(RGFW_window* win);
11923typedef void (*RGFW_window_swapInterval_OpenGL_ptr)(RGFW_window* win, i32 swapInterval);
11924typedef RGFW_bool (*RGFW_extensionSupportedPlatform_OpenGL_ptr)(const char* extension, size_t len);
11925typedef RGFW_proc (*RGFW_getProcAddress_OpenGL_ptr)(const char* procname);
11926typedef RGFW_bool (*RGFW_window_createContextPtr_OpenGL_ptr)(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_glContext* ctx, RGFW_glHints* hints);
11927typedef void (*RGFW_window_deleteContextPtr_OpenGL_ptr)(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_glContext* ctx);
11928#endif
11929#ifdef RGFW_WEBGPU
11930typedef WGPUSurface (*RGFW_window_createSurface_WebGPU_ptr)(RGFW_window* window, WGPUInstance instance);
11931#endif
11932
11933/* Structure to hold all function pointers */
11934typedef struct RGFW_FunctionPointers {
11935 RGFW_createSurfacePtr_ptr createSurfacePtr;
11936 RGFW_window_blitSurface_ptr window_blitSurface;
11937 RGFW_surface_freePtr_ptr surface_freePtr;
11938 RGFW_freeMouse_ptr freeMouse;
11939 RGFW_window_setBorder_ptr window_setBorder;
11940 RGFW_releaseCursor_ptr releaseCursor;
11941 RGFW_captureCursor_ptr captureCursor;
11942 RGFW_createWindowPlatform_ptr createWindowPlatform;
11943 RGFW_getMouse_ptr getGlobalMouse;
11944 RGFW_rgfwToKeyChar_ptr rgfwToKeyChar;
11945 RGFW_pollEvents_ptr pollEvents;
11946 RGFW_window_move_ptr window_move;
11947 RGFW_window_resize_ptr window_resize;
11948 RGFW_window_setAspectRatio_ptr window_setAspectRatio;
11949 RGFW_window_setMinSize_ptr window_setMinSize;
11950 RGFW_window_setMaxSize_ptr window_setMaxSize;
11951 RGFW_window_maximize_ptr window_maximize;
11952 RGFW_window_focus_ptr window_focus;
11953 RGFW_window_raise_ptr window_raise;
11954 RGFW_window_setFullscreen_ptr window_setFullscreen;
11955 RGFW_window_setFloating_ptr window_setFloating;
11956 RGFW_window_setOpacity_ptr window_setOpacity;
11957 RGFW_window_minimize_ptr window_minimize;
11958 RGFW_window_restore_ptr window_restore;
11959 RGFW_window_isFloating_ptr window_isFloating;
11960 RGFW_window_setName_ptr window_setName;
11961 RGFW_window_setMousePassthrough_ptr window_setMousePassthrough;
11962 RGFW_window_setIconEx_ptr window_setIconEx;
11963 RGFW_loadMouse_ptr loadMouse;
11964 RGFW_window_setMouse_ptr window_setMouse;
11965 RGFW_window_moveMouse_ptr window_moveMouse;
11966 RGFW_window_setMouseDefault_ptr window_setMouseDefault;
11967 RGFW_window_setMouseStandard_ptr window_setMouseStandard;
11968 RGFW_window_hide_ptr window_hide;
11969 RGFW_window_show_ptr window_show;
11970 RGFW_readClipboardPtr_ptr readClipboardPtr;
11971 RGFW_writeClipboard_ptr writeClipboard;
11972 RGFW_window_isHidden_ptr window_isHidden;
11973 RGFW_window_isMinimized_ptr window_isMinimized;
11974 RGFW_window_isMaximized_ptr window_isMaximized;
11975 RGFW_getMonitors_ptr getMonitors;
11976 RGFW_getPrimaryMonitor_ptr getPrimaryMonitor;
11977 RGFW_monitor_requestMode_ptr monitor_requestMode;
11978 RGFW_window_getMonitor_ptr window_getMonitor;
11979 RGFW_window_closePlatform_ptr window_closePlatform;
11980#ifdef RGFW_OPENGL
11981 RGFW_extensionSupportedPlatform_OpenGL_ptr extensionSupportedPlatform_OpenGL;
11982 RGFW_getProcAddress_OpenGL_ptr getProcAddress_OpenGL;
11983 RGFW_window_createContextPtr_OpenGL_ptr window_createContextPtr_OpenGL;
11984 RGFW_window_deleteContextPtr_OpenGL_ptr window_deleteContextPtr_OpenGL;
11985 RGFW_window_makeCurrentContext_OpenGL_ptr window_makeCurrentContext_OpenGL;
11986 RGFW_getCurrentContext_OpenGL_ptr getCurrentContext_OpenGL;
11987 RGFW_window_swapBuffers_OpenGL_ptr window_swapBuffers_OpenGL;
11988 RGFW_window_swapInterval_OpenGL_ptr window_swapInterval_OpenGL;
11989#endif
11990#ifdef RGFW_WEBGPU
11991 RGFW_window_createSurface_WebGPU_ptr window_createSurface_WebGPU;
11992#endif
11993} RGFW_functionPointers;
11994
11995RGFW_functionPointers RGFW_api;
11996
11997RGFW_bool RGFW_createSurfacePtr(u8* data, i32 w, i32 h, RGFW_format format, RGFW_surface* surface) { return RGFW_api.createSurfacePtr(data, w, h, format, surface); }
11998void RGFW_surface_freePtr(RGFW_surface* surface) { RGFW_api.surface_freePtr(surface); }
11999void RGFW_freeMouse(RGFW_mouse* mouse) { RGFW_api.freeMouse(mouse); }
12000void RGFW_window_blitSurface(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_surface* surface) { RGFW_api.window_blitSurface(win, surface); }
12001void RGFW_window_setBorder(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_bool border) { RGFW_api.window_setBorder(win, border); }
12002void RGFW_releaseCursor(RGFW_window* win) { RGFW_api.releaseCursor(win); }
12003void RGFW_captureCursor(RGFW_window* win) { RGFW_api.captureCursor(win); }
12004RGFW_window* RGFW_createWindowPlatform(const char* name, RGFW_windowFlags flags, RGFW_window* win) { RGFW_init(); return RGFW_api.createWindowPlatform(name, flags, win); }
12005RGFW_bool RGFW_getGlobalMouse(i32* x, i32* y) { return RGFW_api.getGlobalMouse(x, y); }
12006u8 RGFW_rgfwToKeyChar(u32 key) { return RGFW_api.rgfwToKeyChar(key); }
12007void RGFW_pollEvents(void) { RGFW_api.pollEvents(); }
12008void RGFW_window_move(RGFW_window* win, i32 x, i32 y) { RGFW_api.window_move(win, x, y); }
12009void RGFW_window_resize(RGFW_window* win, i32 w, i32 h) { RGFW_api.window_resize(win, w, h); }
12010void RGFW_window_setAspectRatio(RGFW_window* win, i32 w, i32 h) { RGFW_api.window_setAspectRatio(win, w, h); }
12011void RGFW_window_setMinSize(RGFW_window* win, i32 w, i32 h) { RGFW_api.window_setMinSize(win, w, h); }
12012void RGFW_window_setMaxSize(RGFW_window* win, i32 w, i32 h) { RGFW_api.window_setMaxSize(win, w, h); }
12013void RGFW_window_maximize(RGFW_window* win) { RGFW_api.window_maximize(win); }
12014void RGFW_window_focus(RGFW_window* win) { RGFW_api.window_focus(win); }
12015void RGFW_window_raise(RGFW_window* win) { RGFW_api.window_raise(win); }
12016void RGFW_window_setFullscreen(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_bool fullscreen) { RGFW_api.window_setFullscreen(win, fullscreen); }
12017void RGFW_window_setFloating(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_bool floating) { RGFW_api.window_setFloating(win, floating); }
12018void RGFW_window_setOpacity(RGFW_window* win, u8 opacity) { RGFW_api.window_setOpacity(win, opacity); }
12019void RGFW_window_minimize(RGFW_window* win) { RGFW_api.window_minimize(win); }
12020void RGFW_window_restore(RGFW_window* win) { RGFW_api.window_restore(win); }
12021RGFW_bool RGFW_window_isFloating(RGFW_window* win) { return RGFW_api.window_isFloating(win); }
12022void RGFW_window_setName(RGFW_window* win, const char* name) { RGFW_api.window_setName(win, name); }
12023

12026#endif

12029RGFW_mouse* RGFW_loadMouse(u8* data, i32 w, i32 h, RGFW_format format) { return RGFW_api.loadMouse(data, w, h, format); }

12031void RGFW_window_moveMouse(RGFW_window* win, i32 x, i32 y) { RGFW_api.window_moveMouse(win, x, y); }

12063/*
12064 * start of X11 AND wayland defines
12065 * this allows a single executable to support x11 AND wayland
12066 * falling back to x11 if wayland fails to initalize
12067*/
12068#if defined(RGFW_WAYLAND) && defined(RGFW_X11)
12069void RGFW_load_X11(void) {
12070 RGFW_api.createSurfacePtr = RGFW_createSurfacePtr_X11;
12071 RGFW_api.window_blitSurface = RGFW_window_blitSurface_X11;
12072 RGFW_api.surface_freePtr = RGFW_surface_freePtr_X11;
12073 RGFW_api.freeMouse = RGFW_freeMouse_X11;
12074 RGFW_api.window_setBorder = RGFW_window_setBorder_X11;
12075 RGFW_api.releaseCursor = RGFW_releaseCursor_X11;
12076 RGFW_api.captureCursor = RGFW_captureCursor_X11;
12077 RGFW_api.createWindowPlatform = RGFW_createWindowPlatform_X11;
12078 RGFW_api.getGlobalMouse = RGFW_getGlobalMouse_X11;
12079 RGFW_api.rgfwToKeyChar = RGFW_rgfwToKeyChar_X11;
12080 RGFW_api.pollEvents = RGFW_pollEvents_X11;
12081 RGFW_api.window_move = RGFW_window_move_X11;
12082 RGFW_api.window_resize = RGFW_window_resize_X11;
12083 RGFW_api.window_setAspectRatio = RGFW_window_setAspectRatio_X11;
12084 RGFW_api.window_setMinSize = RGFW_window_setMinSize_X11;
12085 RGFW_api.window_setMaxSize = RGFW_window_setMaxSize_X11;
12086 RGFW_api.window_maximize = RGFW_window_maximize_X11;
12087 RGFW_api.window_focus = RGFW_window_focus_X11;
12088 RGFW_api.window_raise = RGFW_window_raise_X11;
12089 RGFW_api.window_setFullscreen = RGFW_window_setFullscreen_X11;
12090 RGFW_api.window_setFloating = RGFW_window_setFloating_X11;
12091 RGFW_api.window_setOpacity = RGFW_window_setOpacity_X11;
12092 RGFW_api.window_minimize = RGFW_window_minimize_X11;
12093 RGFW_api.window_restore = RGFW_window_restore_X11;
12094 RGFW_api.window_isFloating = RGFW_window_isFloating_X11;
12095 RGFW_api.window_setName = RGFW_window_setName_X11;
12096#ifndef RGFW_NO_PASSTHROUGH
12097 RGFW_api.window_setMousePassthrough = RGFW_window_setMousePassthrough_X11;
12098#endif
12099 RGFW_api.window_setIconEx = RGFW_window_setIconEx_X11;
12100 RGFW_api.loadMouse = RGFW_loadMouse_X11;
12101 RGFW_api.window_setMouse = RGFW_window_setMouse_X11;
12102 RGFW_api.window_moveMouse = RGFW_window_moveMouse_X11;
12103 RGFW_api.window_setMouseDefault = RGFW_window_setMouseDefault_X11;
12104 RGFW_api.window_setMouseStandard = RGFW_window_setMouseStandard_X11;
12105 RGFW_api.window_hide = RGFW_window_hide_X11;
12106 RGFW_api.window_show = RGFW_window_show_X11;
12107 RGFW_api.readClipboardPtr = RGFW_readClipboardPtr_X11;
12108 RGFW_api.writeClipboard = RGFW_writeClipboard_X11;
12109 RGFW_api.window_isHidden = RGFW_window_isHidden_X11;
12110 RGFW_api.window_isMinimized = RGFW_window_isMinimized_X11;
12111 RGFW_api.window_isMaximized = RGFW_window_isMaximized_X11;
12112 RGFW_api.getMonitors = RGFW_getMonitors_X11;
12113 RGFW_api.getPrimaryMonitor = RGFW_getPrimaryMonitor_X11;
12114 RGFW_api.monitor_requestMode = RGFW_monitor_requestMode_X11;
12115 RGFW_api.window_getMonitor = RGFW_window_getMonitor_X11;
12116 RGFW_api.window_closePlatform = RGFW_window_closePlatform_X11;
12117#ifdef RGFW_OPENGL
12118 RGFW_api.extensionSupportedPlatform_OpenGL = RGFW_extensionSupportedPlatform_OpenGL_X11;
12119 RGFW_api.getProcAddress_OpenGL = RGFW_getProcAddress_OpenGL_X11;
12120 RGFW_api.window_createContextPtr_OpenGL = RGFW_window_createContextPtr_OpenGL_X11;
12121 RGFW_api.window_deleteContextPtr_OpenGL = RGFW_window_deleteContextPtr_OpenGL_X11;
12122 RGFW_api.window_makeCurrentContext_OpenGL = RGFW_window_makeCurrentContext_OpenGL_X11;
12123 RGFW_api.getCurrentContext_OpenGL = RGFW_getCurrentContext_OpenGL_X11;
12124 RGFW_api.window_swapBuffers_OpenGL = RGFW_window_swapBuffers_OpenGL_X11;
12125 RGFW_api.window_swapInterval_OpenGL = RGFW_window_swapInterval_OpenGL_X11;
12126#endif
12127#ifdef RGFW_WEBGPU
12128 RGFW_api.window_createSurface_WebGPU = RGFW_window_createSurface_WebGPU_X11;
12129#endif
12130}
12131
12132void RGFW_load_Wayland(void) {
12133 RGFW_api.createSurfacePtr = RGFW_createSurfacePtr_Wayland;
12134 RGFW_api.window_blitSurface = RGFW_window_blitSurface_Wayland;
12135 RGFW_api.surface_freePtr = RGFW_surface_freePtr_Wayland;
12136 RGFW_api.freeMouse = RGFW_freeMouse_Wayland;
12137 RGFW_api.window_setBorder = RGFW_window_setBorder_Wayland;
12138 RGFW_api.releaseCursor = RGFW_releaseCursor_Wayland;
12139 RGFW_api.captureCursor = RGFW_captureCursor_Wayland;
12140 RGFW_api.createWindowPlatform = RGFW_createWindowPlatform_Wayland;
12141 RGFW_api.getGlobalMouse = RGFW_getGlobalMouse_Wayland;
12142 RGFW_api.rgfwToKeyChar = RGFW_rgfwToKeyChar_Wayland;

12144 RGFW_api.window_move = RGFW_window_move_Wayland;
12145 RGFW_api.window_resize = RGFW_window_resize_Wayland;
12146 RGFW_api.window_setAspectRatio = RGFW_window_setAspectRatio_Wayland;
12147 RGFW_api.window_setMinSize = RGFW_window_setMinSize_Wayland;
12148 RGFW_api.window_setMaxSize = RGFW_window_setMaxSize_Wayland;
12149 RGFW_api.window_maximize = RGFW_window_maximize_Wayland;
12150 RGFW_api.window_focus = RGFW_window_focus_Wayland;
12151 RGFW_api.window_raise = RGFW_window_raise_Wayland;

12154 RGFW_api.window_setOpacity = RGFW_window_setOpacity_Wayland;
12155 RGFW_api.window_minimize = RGFW_window_minimize_Wayland;
12156 RGFW_api.window_restore = RGFW_window_restore_Wayland;

12165 RGFW_api.window_moveMouse = RGFW_window_moveMouse_Wayland;
12166 RGFW_api.window_setMouseDefault = RGFW_window_setMouseDefault_Wayland;
12167 RGFW_api.window_setMouseStandard = RGFW_window_setMouseStandard_Wayland;
12168 RGFW_api.window_hide = RGFW_window_hide_Wayland;
12169 RGFW_api.window_show = RGFW_window_show_Wayland;
12170 RGFW_api.readClipboardPtr = RGFW_readClipboardPtr_Wayland;
12171 RGFW_api.writeClipboard = RGFW_writeClipboard_Wayland;
12172 RGFW_api.window_isHidden = RGFW_window_isHidden_Wayland;
12173 RGFW_api.window_isMinimized = RGFW_window_isMinimized_Wayland;
12174 RGFW_api.window_isMaximized = RGFW_window_isMaximized_Wayland;
12175 RGFW_api.getMonitors = RGFW_getMonitors_Wayland;
12176 RGFW_api.getPrimaryMonitor = RGFW_getPrimaryMonitor_Wayland;
12177 RGFW_api.monitor_requestMode = RGFW_monitor_requestMode_Wayland;
12178 RGFW_api.window_getMonitor = RGFW_window_getMonitor_Wayland;
12179 RGFW_api.window_closePlatform = RGFW_window_closePlatform_Wayland;
12180#ifdef RGFW_OPENGL
12181 RGFW_api.extensionSupportedPlatform_OpenGL = RGFW_extensionSupportedPlatform_OpenGL_Wayland;
12182 RGFW_api.getProcAddress_OpenGL = RGFW_getProcAddress_OpenGL_Wayland;
12183 RGFW_api.window_createContextPtr_OpenGL = RGFW_window_createContextPtr_OpenGL_Wayland;

12189#endif

12192#endif

RGFW_setXInstName

RGFW_STRNCMP
